original: Abhidhammamātikāpāḷi
Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā devesu viharati tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ. Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi.

analyzed: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī hoti

original: So vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ
analyzed: so vivittam senāsanam bhajati araññam rukkha mūlam pabbatam kandaram giri guham su sānam

original: vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ vijanavātaṃ manussarāhasseyyakaṃ

original: paṭisallānasāruppaṃ.
analyzed: paṭisallāna sāruppam

original: So araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
analyzed: saḥ arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā

analyzed: cetasā viharati abhijjhāya cittam parisodheti byāpāda padosam pahāya a byāpanna cittaḥ

original: viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṃ parisodheti, thinamiddhaṃ

analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam pahāya anuddhataḥ viharati ajjhattam vūpasanta cittaḥ uddhacca kukkuccā

analyzed: dhammesu vicikicchāya cittam parisodheti

original: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe vivicceva kāmehi

analyzed: ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sataḥ ca sampajāno sukham ca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti

original: vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ alobho adoso
analyzed: vīriya balam sati balam samādhi balam paññā balam hiri balam ottappa balam alobhaḥ adoso

original: amoho anabhijjhā abyāpādo sammādiṭṭhi hirī ottappaṃ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi
analyzed: amohaḥ anabhijjhā a byāpādaḥ sammādiṭṭhi hirī ottappam kāya passaddhi citta passaddhi

original: kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā
analyzed: kāya lahu tā citta lahu tā kāya mudu tā citta mudu tā kāya kammañña tā citta kammañña tā kāya pāguñña tā

original: cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā sati sampajaññaṃ samatho vipassanā paggāho avikkhepo hotī”ti –
analyzed: citta pāguñña tā kāya ujuka tā citta ujuka tā sati sampajaññam samathaḥ vipassanā paggāhaḥ avikkhepaḥ hoti iti

original: Evaṃ sarūpato uddiṭṭhā chapaññāsa dhammā “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā
analyzed: evam sarūpataḥ uddiṭṭhā cha paññāsa dhammā ye vā pana tasmin samaye aññe pi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā

original: arūpino dhammā”ti evaṃ yevāpanakavasena sāmaññato uddiṭṭhā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ cassā tesu
analyzed: arūpino dhammā ti evam yeva āpanaka vasena sāmaññato uddiṭṭhāḥ aṭṭhakathā ayam ca ssā tesu

original: tesu suttappadesesu āgate gahetvā sarūpato niddiṭṭhā chandādayo navāti pañcasaṭṭhi
analyzed: tesu sutta ppadesesu āgate gahetvā sarūpataḥ niddiṭṭhā chanda ādayaḥ nava ati pañca saṭṭhi

original: dhammā āgatā. Yasmā pana tesu sarūpena āgatā jhānaṅgaindriyamaggaṅgabalamūlādīnaṃ
analyzed: dhammāḥ āgatāḥ yasmā pana tesu sarūpena āgatā

original: vasena ekasseva bahukiccatādassanatthaṃ punappunaṃ gahetvā pariyāyena chapaññāsavidhena
analyzed: vasena ekassa iva bahu kicca tā dassana attham punappunam gahetvā pariyāyena cha paññāsavidhena

original: desitāpi agahitaggahaṇena yathāvuttā samatiṃseva dhammā honti, te pana savibhattikā
analyzed: desitā api agahita ggahaṇena yathā vuttā samatiṃsā iva dhammā honti te pana sa vibhattikā

original: avibhattikāti duvidhā. Tattha phassādayo aṭṭhārasa ekakattā avibhattikā. Vedanādayo
analyzed: avibhattikā ati duvidhā tattha phassa ādayaḥ aṭṭhārasa eka kattā avibhattikāḥ vedanā ādayaḥ

original: dvādasa dhammā aṭṭhatiṃsappabhedena yathāyogaṃ vibhattattā savibhattikā, yevāpanakā
analyzed: dvādasa dhammāḥ aṭṭhatiṃsa ppabhedena yathāyogam vibhatta ttā sa vibhattikā

original: pana avibhattikā eva. Tasmā te sabbepi nippariyāyena ekūnacattālīsa dhammāva honti. Honti cettha –
analyzed: pana avibhattikāḥ eva tasmā te sabbe pi nippariyāyena ekūnacattālīsa dhammāḥ ava honti honti ca ittha

original: Phassādipañcakaṃ pañcajhānaṅgānindriyaṭṭhakaṃ;
Maggaṅgapañcakaṃ sattabalaṃ mūlattikampi ca.
analyzed: maggaṅgapañcakam sattabalam mūlattikam pi ca

original: Kammapathattikañceva, lokapāladukaṃ tathā;
analyzed: kamma pathattikam ca iva lokapāla dukam tathā

original: Passaddhiādī cha dukā, tīṇi piṭṭhidukāniti.
analyzed: passaddhi ādī cha dukā tīṇi piṭṭhi dukāni iti

original: Sattarasahi rāsīhi, chapaññāseva pāḷiyaṃ;
analyzed: sattarasahi rāsīhi cha paññāsā iva pāḷiyam

original: Vuttā sabhāvato tiṃsa, dhammā agahitaggahe.
analyzed: vuttā sabhāvataḥ tiṃsa dhammā agahita ggahe

original: Phasso jīvitasaññā ca, cetanā cārapītiyo;
analyzed: phassaḥ jīvita saññā ca cetanā cāra pītiyaḥ

original: Cha dukā kāyapassaddhi-pamukhāṭṭhārasekakā.
analyzed: cha dukā

original: Cittaṃ vitakko saddhā ca, hiriottappiyampi ca;
analyzed: cittam vitakko saddhā ca ca

original: Alobho ca adoso ca, satta dvidhā vibhāvitā.
analyzed: ca adoso ca satta dvidhā vibhāvitā

original: Vedanā tividhā vīriyaṃ, sati ca catudhā matā;
analyzed: vedanā tividhā sati ca catudhā matā

original: Chaddhā ekaggatā paññā, sattadhāva vibhāvitā.
analyzed: chaddhā ekagga tā paññā sattadhā ava vibhāvitā

original: Viratī appamaññāyo, manakkāro chandamajjhattā;
analyzed: viratī appamaññāyaḥ manakkāraḥ chanda majjhattā

original: Dhimokkho yevāpanakā, navete paṭhame mane.
analyzed: dhimokkhaḥ yevāpanakāḥ navā ete paṭhame mane

original: Pañcasaṭṭhividheneva, pariyāyena desitā;
analyzed: pañca saṭṭhividhena iva pariyāyena desitā

original: Navādhikā ca tettiṃsa, dhammāva paramatthatoti.
analyzed: nava adhikā ca tettiṃsa

original: Ettha ca sarūpena āgatā tiṃsa dhammā, yevāpanakesu cattāro cāti catuttiṃsa dhammā
analyzed: ettha ca sarūpena āgatā tiṃsa dhammā yevāpanakesu cattāro ca ati catuttiṃsa dhammā

original: ekakkhaṇe niyatā labbhanti, sesā pana karuṇādayo pañca karuṇāpubbabhāgamuditāpubbabhāgavasena,
analyzed: eka kkhaṇe niyatāḥ labbhanti sesā pana karuṇā ādayo pañca karuṇā pubbabhāga muditā pubbabhāga vasena

original: kāyaduccaritavacīduccaritamicchājīvehi viramaṇavasena ca cittassa pavattikālesu eva
analyzed: kāya duccarita vacī duccarita micchājīvehi viramaṇa vasena ca cittassa pavatti kālesu eva

original: uppajjitvā aññathānuppajjanato aniyatā. Te ca yasmā dukkhitasukhitasattavasena, kāyaduccaritādittayavasena
analyzed: uppajjitvā aññathā an uppajjanataḥ aniyatā te ca yasmā dukkhita sukhita satta vasena kāya duccarita ādi ttaya vasena

original: ca paccekaṃ bhinnavisayattā ekato na uppajjanti, tasmā karuṇāpubbabhāgādivasena pavattesu
analyzed: ca paccekam bhinna visaya ttā ekatas na uppajjanti tasmā karuṇā pubbabhāga ādi vasena pavattesu

original: pañcasu cittakkhaṇesu niyatā catuttiṃsa, karuṇādīsu ekanti pañcatiṃsa dhammā uppajjanti,
analyzed: pañcasu cittakkhaṇesu niyatā catuttiṃsa karuṇā ādīsu ekanti pañcatiṃsa dhammā uppajjanti

original: kevalaṃ pana dānādivasena pavattiyaṃ niyatā catuttiṃseva uppajjantīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kevalam pana dāna ādi vasena pavattiyam niyatā catuttiṃsā iva uppajjanti iti veditabbam

original: Ayaṃ dhammuddesato vinicchayo.
analyzed: ayam dhamma uddesataḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Lakkhaṇādivibhāgatoti evaṃ uddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇarasādito vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādi vibhāgato ti evam uddiṭṭhānam dhammānam lakkhaṇa rasa āditaḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Phusatīti phasso. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanaraso, sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: phusati iti phassaḥ svāyam phusana lakkhaṇo saṅghaṭṭana raso sannipāta paccupaṭṭhāno

original: āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno. Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākārena pavattatīti
analyzed: āpātha gata visaya padaṭṭhānaḥ ayam hi arūpa dhammaḥ api samānaḥ ārammaṇe phusana ākārena pavattati iti

original: phusanalakkhaṇo, sā cassa phusanākārappavatti ambilādidassane kheḷuppādādinā ñātabbā.
analyzed: phusana lakkhaṇo sā ca ssa phusana ākāra ppavatti ambila ādi dassane kheḷuppāda ādinā ñātabbā

original: Ekadesena pana anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittamārammaṇañca
analyzed: eka desena pana rūpam viya cakkhum saddaḥ viya ca sotam cittam ārammaṇam ca

original: saṅghaṭṭetīti saṅghaṭṭanaraso. Tikasannipātasaṅkhātassa pana attano kāraṇassa vasena
analyzed: saṅghaṭṭeti iti saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ tika sannipāta saṅkhātassa pana attanaḥ kāraṇassa vasena

original: paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno, phalaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena panesa vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: sannipāta paccupaṭṭhāno phala aṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena pana esa vedanā paccupaṭṭhāno

original: nāma hoti. Tajjāsamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyena uppajjanato
analyzed: nāma hoti tajjā samannāhārena ca iva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyena uppajjanato

original: āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti vuccati. Vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato panesa niccammā gāvī
analyzed: āpātha gata visaya padaṭṭhāno ti vuccati vedanā adhiṭṭhāna bhāvato pana esa niccammā gāvī

original: viya daṭṭhabbo. Lakkhaṇādīsu ca tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo vā sāmaññaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: viya daṭṭhabbaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīsu ca tesam tesam dhammānam sabhāvaḥ vā sāmaññam vā lakkhaṇam

original: nāma, kiccaṃ vā sampatti vā raso nāma, upaṭṭhānākāro vā phalaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: nāma kiccam vā sampatti vā rasaḥ nāma upaṭṭhāna ākāraḥ vā phalam vā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: nāma, āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Evaṃ uparipi sabbattha lakkhaṇādīnaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nāma āsanna kāraṇam padaṭṭhānam nāma evam upari pi sabbattha lakkhaṇa ādīnam nānattam veditabbam

original: Vedayatīti vedanā, sā vedayitalakkhaṇā, sabhāvabhedato panesā pañcavidhā hoti – sukhaṃ
analyzed: vedayati iti vedanā sā vedayita lakkhaṇā sa bhāva bhedato pana esā pañcavidhā hoti sukham

original: dukkhaṃ somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhāti. Tattha iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: dukkham somanassam domanassam upekkhāti tattha iṭṭha phoṭṭhabba anubhavana lakkhaṇam

original: sukhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ, kāyikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyindriyapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sukham sampayuttānam upabrūhana rasam kāyika assāda paccupaṭṭhānam kāyindriya padaṭṭhānam

original: Aniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ milāpanarasaṃ, kāyikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: aniṭṭha phoṭṭhabba anubhavana lakkhaṇam dukkham sampayuttānam milāpana rasam kāyika ābādha paccupaṭṭhānam

original: kāyindriyapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ somanassaṃ, yathā tathā vā
analyzed: kāya indriya padaṭṭhānam iṭṭha ārammaṇa anubhavana lakkhaṇam somanassam yathā tathā vā

original: iṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ vā, cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: iṭṭha ākāra sambhoga rasam sampayuttānam upabrūhana rasam vā cetasika assāda paccupaṭṭhānam

original: iṭṭhākāradassanapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ, yathā tathā
analyzed: iṭṭha ākāra dassana padaṭṭhānam aniṭṭha ārammaṇa anubhavana lakkhaṇam domanassam yathā tathā

original: vā aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ milāpanarasaṃ vā, cetasikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: vā aniṭṭha ākāra sambhoga rasam sampayuttānam milāpana rasam vā cetasika ābādha paccupaṭṭhānam

original: ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. Majjhattavedayitalakkhaṇā upekkhā, sampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: ekantena hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhānam majjhatta vedayita lakkhaṇā upekkhā sampayuttānam

original: nātiupabrūhanamilāpanarasā, santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, nippītikacittapadaṭṭhānā. Ettha
analyzed: na ati upabrūhana milāpana rasā santa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā nippītika citta padaṭṭhānā ettha

original: ca sukhaṃ, dukkhañca ekantamabyākataṃ, domanassamekantamakusalaṃ, somanassupekkhā
analyzed: ca sukham dukkham ca ekantam abyākatam domanassam ekantam akusalam somanassa upekkhā

original: pana siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā. Idha pana kusalā somanassavedanā adhippetā.
analyzed: pana siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā idha pana kusalā somanassa vedanā adhippetā

original: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānātīti saññā. Sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā, paccābhiññāṇarasā,
analyzed: nīla ādi bhedam ārammaṇam sañjānāti iti saññā sā sañjānana lakkhaṇā pacca abhiññāṇa rasā

original: punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā vā dāruādīsu tacchakādayo viya, yathāgahitanimittavasena
analyzed: puna sañjānana paccaya nimitta karaṇa rasāḥ vā dāru ādīsu tad śaka ādayaḥ yathā gahita nimitta vasena

original: abhinivesakaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā hatthidassakaandhā viya, ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya
analyzed: abhinivesa karaṇa paccupaṭṭhānā hatthi dassaka andhāḥ viya ārammaṇe anogāḷha vutti tāya

original: aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā vijju viya, yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisesu
analyzed: acira ṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānā vā yathā upaṭṭhita visaya padaṭṭhānā tiṇa purisesu

original: migapotakānaṃ purisāti uppannasaññā viya.
analyzed: miga potakānam purisa ati uppanna saññā viya

original: Cetetīti cetanā, saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
analyzed: ceteti iti cetanā saddhim attanā sampayutta dhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahati iti attho

original: Sā cetanābhāvalakkhaṇā, āyūhanarasā, sā ca kusalākusalesu eva hoti. Itaresu pana
analyzed: sā cetanā bhāva lakkhaṇā āyūhana rasā sā ca kusala akusalesu eva hoti itaresu pana

original: taṃsadisatāya saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānā sakiccaparakiccasādhakā jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakiādayo
analyzed: taṃsadisa tāya saṃvidahana paccupaṭṭhānā sa kicca para kicca sādhakāḥ jeṭṭha sissa mahāvaḍḍhaki ādayo

original: viya. Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu panāyaṃ sampayuttesu ussāhanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti.
analyzed: viya accāyika kamma anussaraṇa ādīsu pana ayam sampayuttesu ussāhana bhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti

original: Ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti cittaṃ, viññāṇaṃ. Vitthārato panassa vacanattho cittaduke āvi
analyzed: ārammaṇam cinteti iti cittam viññāṇam vitthārato pana assa vacana attho citta duke āvi

original: bhavissati. Tadetaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ, pubbaṅgamarasaṃ, nirantarappavattito
analyzed: bhavissati tat etam vijānana lakkhaṇam cittam pubbaṅgama rasam nirantara ppavattitaḥ

original: sandhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sandhāna paccupaṭṭhānam nāma rūpa padaṭṭhānam

original: Vitakketi ūheti, vitakkanamattameva vā soti vitakko. Svāyamārammaṇe cittassa abhiropanalakkhaṇo, āhananapariyāhananaraso, ārammaṇe cittassa ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: vitakketi ūheti vitakkana mattam eva vā saḥ ti vitakko svāyam ārammaṇe cittassa abhiropana lakkhaṇaḥ āhanana pariyāhanana rasaḥ ārammaṇe cittassa ānayana paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Ārammaṇe tena cittaṃ vicarati, vicaraṇamattameva vā soti vicāro. Svāyamārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo,
analyzed: ārammaṇe tena cittam vicarati vicaraṇam attam eva vā saḥ ti vicāro svāyam ārammaṇa anumajjana lakkhaṇo

original: tattha sahajātānuyojanaraso, cittassa anuppabandhanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Abhiniropanānumajjanavasena
analyzed: tattha sahajāta anuyojana rasaḥ cittassa anuppabandhana paccupaṭṭhānaḥ abhiniropana anumajjana vasena

original: panesaṃ yathākkamaṃ oḷārikasukhumatāya ghaṇṭābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto
analyzed: pana īsam yathākkamam oḷārika sukhumatāya ghaṇṭā abhighātaḥ viya cetasaḥ paṭhama abhinipāto

original: vitakko, ghaṇṭānuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko ākāse uppatitukāmapakkhino
analyzed: vitakkaḥ ghaṇṭā anuravaḥ viya an uppabandhaḥ vicāraḥ ca ittha vitakkaḥ ākāse uppatitu kāma pakkhino

original: pakkhavikkhepo viya, santavutti vicāro ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhapasāraṇaṃ
analyzed: pakkha vikkhepaḥ viya santa vutti vicāraḥ ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkha pasāraṇam

original: viya. So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti. Ubhopi panete sampayuttadhammapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: so pana nesam visesaḥ paṭhama dutiya jhānesu pākaṭaḥ hoti ubho pi pana ete sampayutta dhamma padaṭṭhānā

original: Piṇayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā, kāyacittapīṇanarasā, pharaṇarasā vā, odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā, somanassasahagatacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: piṇayati iti pīti sā sampiyāyana lakkhaṇā kāya citta pīṇana rasā pharaṇa rasā vā odagya paccupaṭṭhānā somanassa sahagata citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Vīrānaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā vīriyaṃ, vividhena vā upāyena īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti
analyzed: vīrānam bhāvaḥ kammam vā vīriyam vividhena vā upāyena īrayitabbam pavattayitabbanti

original: vīriyaṃ. Tañca ussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: vīriyam tat ca ussāha lakkhaṇam sahajātānam upatthambhana rasam a saṃsīdana bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: “saṃviggo yoniso padahatī”ti vacanato saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ, vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: saṃviggaḥ yonisaḥ padahati iti vacanato saṃvega padaṭṭhānam vīriya ārambha vatthu padaṭṭhānam

original: vā. Idaṃ pana kusalapakkhe padaṭṭhānaṃ, akusalādipakkhe pana sādhāraṇavasena yathā

original: akammaññabhāvanimmaddanarasā, kāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇasampattipaccupaṭṭhānā, tesaṃ
analyzed: akammañña bhāva nimmaddana rasā kāya cittānam ārammaṇa karaṇa sampatti paccupaṭṭhānā tesam

original: akammaññabhāvakarāvasesanīvaraṇapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā. Pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā,
analyzed: akammañña bhāva kara avasesa nīvaraṇa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā pasādanīya vatthūsu pasāda āvahā

original: hitakiriyāsu viniyogakkhamabhāvāvahā suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: hita kiriyāsu viniyoga khama bhāva āvahā viyā ti daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā kāyapāguññatā, cittapāguññatā ca, tesaṃ gelaññanimmaddanarasā,
analyzed: kāya cittānam a gelañña bhāva lakkhaṇā kāya pāguñña tā citta pāguñña tā ca tesam gelañña nimmaddana rasā

original: nirādīnavapaccupaṭṭhānā, tesaṃ gelaññakaraassaddhiyādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: nirādīnava paccupaṭṭhānā tesam gelañña kara assaddhi yā ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā kāyujukatā, cittujukatā ca, tesaṃ kuṭilabhāvanimmaddanarasā,
analyzed: kāya cittānaṃ ajjava lakkhaṇā kāya ujuka tā citta ujuka tā ca tesam kuṭila bhāva nimmaddana rasā

original: ajimhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā, tesaṃ kuṭilabhāvakaramāyāsāṭheyyādipaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: a jimha tā paccupaṭṭhānā tesam kuṭila bhāva kara māyā sāṭheyya ādi paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Sabbepete passaddhiādayo dhammā kāyacittapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sabbe pete passaddhi ādayaḥ dhammā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā ti veditabbā

original: Kiṃ panettha passaddhādayo dhammā uddhaccādiṃ vinodetuṃ na sakkonti, yena ime passaddhādayo
analyzed: kim pana ittha passaddha ādayaḥ dhammāḥ uddhacca ādim vinodetum na sakkonti yena ime passaddha ādayaḥ

original: dhammā na visuṃ vibhattāti? No na sakkonti, ime pana sahitā eva sakkonti, itarathā
analyzed: dhammā na visum vibhattā ati no na sakkonti ime pana sahitāḥ eva sakkonti itarathā

original: tesaṃ uppattiyā eva asambhavato. Yathā vā passaddhādīsu vijjamānesu mohāhirikādīnaṃ
analyzed: tesam uppattiyāḥ eva asambhavataḥ yathā vā passaddha ādīsu vijjamānesu moha āhirika ādīnam

original: ujupaṭipakkhabhāvena amohahiriādayo honti, evametepi uddhaccādiujupaṭipakkhabhāvena
analyzed: uju paṭipakkha bhāvena amoha hiri ādayaḥ honti evam ete api uddhacca ādi uju paṭipakkha bhāvena

original: icchitabbāti gahetabbā. Yasmā cettha dvīhi dvīhi eva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhā haritabbā,
analyzed: icchitabbā ati gahetabbā yasmai ca ittha dvīhi dvīhi eva yathāsakam paṭipakkhā haritabbā

original: tasmā te ete eva dvidhā vibhattā, na amohādayoti ñātabbā.
analyzed: tasmā te ete eva dvidhā vibhattāḥ na amoha ādayaḥ iti ñātabbā

original: Yevāpanakesu chandoti kattukāmatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā so kattukāmatālakkhaṇo,
analyzed: yevāpanakesu chandaḥ ti kattu kāma tāya itam adhivacanam tasmā saḥ kattu kāma tā lakkhaṇo

original: ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, tadevassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: ārammaṇa pariyesana rasaḥ ārammaṇena atthika tā paccupaṭṭhāno tat eva assa padaṭṭhānam

original: Ārammaṇaggahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo. Ayañca yasmā virajjitabbādīsupi
analyzed: ārammaṇa ggahaṇe ca ayam cetasaḥ hattha ppasāraṇam viya daṭṭhabbaḥ ayam ca yasmā virajjitabba ādīsu pi

original: nekkhammādinā saha lobhavisadisena kattukāmatākārena pavattati, tasmā asekhānampi
analyzed: nekkhamma ādinā saha lobha visadisena kattu kāma tā ākārena pavattati tasmai

original: uppajjati. Lobho pana subhasukhādivipallāsapubbakena abhisaṅgākāreneva pavattatīti
analyzed: uppajjati lobhaḥ pana subha sukha ādi vipallāsa pubbakena abhisaṅga ākārena iva pavattati iti

original: ayametesaṃ viseso. Evaṃ mettākaruṇādīnampi lobhādīhi viseso yathānurūpaṃ ñātabbo.
analyzed: ayam etesam visesaḥ evam mettā karuṇā ādīnam pi lobha ādīhi visesaḥ yathānurūpam ñātabbo

original: Adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: adhimuccanam adhimokkhaḥ so sanniṭṭhāna lakkhaṇaḥ a saṃsappana rasaḥ nicchaya paccupaṭṭhāno

original: sanniṭṭhātabbadhammapadaṭṭhāno, ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: ārammaṇe niccala bhāvena inda khīlaḥ viya daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: Nanu ca saddhāpi adhimokkhoti vuccati. Tathā hi adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
analyzed: nanu ca saddhā api adhimokkhaḥ ti vuccati tathā hi adhimokkha lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti

original: saddhindriyanti vuccatīti? Saccaṃ, sā ca kho sampasādanabhāvena adhimokkho, ayaṃ
analyzed: saddhindriyam ti vuccati iti saccam sā ca kho sampasādana bhāvena adhimokkhaḥ ayam

original: pana yathā tathā vā nicchayabhāvenāti na koci virodho.
analyzed: yathā tathā vā nicchaya bhāvena ati na koci virodhaḥ

original: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro, purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotītipi manasikāro,
analyzed: kiriyā kāraḥ manasmin kāraḥ manasikāraḥ purima manataḥ visadisam manam karoti iti pi manasikāraḥ

original: svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako vīthipaṭipādako javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro, tattha ārammaṇapaṭipādako
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ javana paṭipādako ti tippakāro tattha ārammaṇa paṭipādako

original: idha manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇesu payojanaraso, ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: idha manasikāro so sāraṇa lakkhaṇo sampayuttānam ārammaṇesu payojana rasaḥ ārammaṇa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno

original: ārammaṇapadaṭṭhāno, saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno. Ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa padaṭṭhāno saṅkhāra khandha pariyāpanno ārammaṇa paṭipādaka ttena sampayuttānam

original: sārathi viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pana pañcadvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: sārathi viya daṭṭhabbaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ ti pana pañca dvāra āvajjanassa etam adhivacanam

original: Javanapaṭipādakoti manodvārāvajjanassa, na te idha adhippetā. Ettha cāyaṃ manasikāro
analyzed: javana paṭipādako ti manaḥ dvāra āvajjanassa na te idha adhippetāḥ ettha ca ayam manasikāro

original: samannāhāramattākārena ārammaṇe sampayuttānaṃ payojako, cetanā cetokiriyābhāvena,
analyzed: samannāhāra matta ākārena ārammaṇe sampayuttānam cetanā cetaḥ kiriyā abhāvena

original: vitakko pana saṅkappākārena, upanijjhāyanākārena ca abhiniropako. Teneva hettha padabhājanīye
analyzed: vitakko pana saṅkappa ākārena upanijjhāyana ākārena ca abhiniropako tena iva ha ittha pada bhājanīye

original: “takko saṅkappoti ca, jhānaṅga”nti ca vuccatīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
analyzed: takko saṅkappo ti ca jhānaṅganti ca vuccati iti ayam etesam viseso

original: Tesu tesu dhammesu majjhattatā tatramajjhattatā. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: tesu tesu dhammesu majjhatta tā tatra majjhatta tā sā citta cetasikānam samavāhita lakkhaṇā

original: ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā, pakkhapātupacchedanarasā vā, majjhattabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: ūna adhika tā nivāraṇa rasā pakkhapāta upacchedana rasā vā majjhatta bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: samappavattasampayuttadhammapadaṭṭhānā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ ajjhupekkhaṇena samappavattānaṃ
analyzed: sama ppavatta sampayutta dhamma padaṭṭhānā sampayutta dhammānam ajjhupekkhaṇena sama ppavattānam

original: ājānīyānaṃ ajjhupekkhakasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ājānīyānam ajjhupekkhaka sārathi viya daṭṭhabbā

original: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā, kirati vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati
analyzed: para dukkhe sati sādhūnam hadaya kampanam karoti iti karuṇā kirati vā para dukkham hiṃsati

original: ca, kirīyati vā dukkhitesu pasārīyatīti karuṇā. Sā paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā,
analyzed: ca vā dukkhitesu pasārīyati iti karuṇā sā para dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavatti lakkhaṇā

original: paradukkhāsahanarasā, avihiṃsāpaccupaṭṭhānā, dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ anāthabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: para dukkha asahana rasāḥ avihiṃsā paccupaṭṭhānāḥ dukkha abhibhūtānam anātha bhāva dassana padaṭṭhānā

original: Modanti tāya taṃsamaṅgino, sayaṃ vā modati, modanamattameva vā tanti muditā. Sā pamodalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: modanti tāya taṃsamaṅgino sayam vā modati modana mattam eva vā tanti muditā sā pamoda lakkhaṇā

original: anissāyanarasā, arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā, sattānaṃ sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: a nissāyana rasā arati vighāta paccupaṭṭhānā sattānam sampatti dassana padaṭṭhānā

original: Kasmā panettha mettupekkhā na vuttāti? Pubbe gahitattā. Adoso eva hi sattesu hitapharaṇavasena
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha mettupekkhā na vuttā ati pubbe gahita ttā adosaḥ eva hi sattesu hita pharaṇa vasena

original: pavattiyaṃ mettā. Tatramajjhattatā eva ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhasattesu majjhattākārena pavattiyaṃ
analyzed: pavattiyam mettā tatra majjhatta tā eva ca iṭṭha aniṭṭha sattesu majjhatta ākārena pavattiyam

original: upekkhā. Te ca dhammā niyatā, kevalaṃ pana nesaṃ sattesu mettupekkhābhāvena pavatti
analyzed: upekkhā te ca dhammā niyatā kevalam pana nesam sattesu mettu pekkhā bhāvena pavatti

original: aniyatāti. Kāyaduccaritato virati kāyaduccaritavirati. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: aniyata ati kāya duccaritataḥ virati kāya duccarita virati

original: Lakkhaṇādito panetā tissopi kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā, tato saṃkocanarasā,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana itā tissaḥ api kāya duccarita ādi vatthūnam avītikkama lakkhaṇā tatas saṃkocana rasā

original: tesaṃ akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā, saddhāhirottappaappicchatādiguṇapadaṭṭhānā, pāpakiriyato
analyzed: tesam akiriya paccupaṭṭhānā saddhā hira uttappa appiccha tā ādi guṇa padaṭṭhānā pāpa kiriyato

original: cittassa vimukhabhāvabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā. Evaṃ lakkhaṇādito vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: cittassa vimukha bhāva bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā evam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Saṅgahāti evaṃ ye ime imasmiṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusale vibhattā ekūnacattālīsa dhammā,
analyzed: evam ye ime imasmin kāmāvacara paṭhama kusale vibhattāḥ ekūnacattālīsa dhammāḥ

original: sabbete khandhato catubbidhā honti – vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho
analyzed: sabbe ete khandhato catubbidhāḥ honti vedanā kkhandhaḥ saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho

original: viññāṇakkhandhoti. Tattha rāsaṭṭhena somanassavedanā vedanākkhandho, tathā saññā
analyzed: viññāṇa kkhandho ti tattha rāsaṭṭhena somanassa vedanā vedanā kkhandho tathā saññā

original: saññākkhandho, cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, avasesā phassādayo chattiṃsa dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhoti veditabbā.
analyzed: saññā kkhandho cittam viññāṇa kkhandho avasesā phassa ādayo chattiṃsa dhammā saṅkhāra kkhandho ti veditabbā

original: Nanu ca yadi rāsaṭṭhena khandho, phassādīnaṃ tāva anekattā saṅkhārakkhandhatā yuttā,
analyzed: nanu ca yadi rāsaṭṭhena khandhaḥ phassa ādīnam tāva aneka ttā saṅkhāra kkhandha tā yuttā

original: kathaṃ pana vedanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ khandhatāti? Upacārato. Paccekaṃ hi atītādibhedabhinnesu
analyzed: katham pana vedanā ādīnam tiṇṇam khandha tā ati upacārato paccekam hi atīta ādi bheda bhinnesu

original: vedanāsaññāviññāṇesu niruḷhopi khandha-saddo tadekadesesu ekekavedanādīsupi samudāyopacārena
analyzed: vedanā saññā viññāṇesu niruḷhaḥ api khandha saddaḥ tad eka desesu ekeka vedanā ādīsu pi samudāya upacārena

original: voharīyatīti tadekadesepi tabbohāro, yathā rukkhassa sākhāya chijjamānāya “rukkho
analyzed: voharīyati iti tad eka dese pi tad bohāraḥ yathā rukkhassa sākhāya chijjamānāya rukkho

original: chijjatī”tiādīsu viyāti. Evaṃ khandhato catubbidhā honti.
analyzed: chijjati iti ādīsu viyāti evam khandhato catubbidhāḥ honti

original: Te puna āyatanato duvidhā honti – manāyatanaṃ dhammāyatananti. Sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: te puna āyatanataḥ duvidhā honti manāyatanam dhammāyatanam ti sañjāti samosaraṇa ṭhāna ṭṭhena

original: hettha cittaṃ manāyatanaṃ, sesā pana aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā dhammāyatananti. Evaṃ āyatanato
analyzed: ha ittha cittam mana āyatanam sesā pana aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā dhamma āyatanan ti evam āyatanato

original: duvidhā honti. Te puna dhātuvasena duvidhā manoviññāṇadhātu dhammadhātūti. Nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
analyzed: duvidhāḥ honti te puna dhātu vasena duvidhā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dhammadhātu uti nissatta nijjīva ṭṭhena

original: hettha cittaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu, sesā dhammadhātūti. Evaṃ dhātuvasena duvidhā.
analyzed: ha ittha cittam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu sesāḥ dhamma dhātu uti evam dhātu vasena duvidhā

original: Tathā āhārānāhāravasena. Tattha phasso cetanā cittanti ime tayo dhammā visesapaccayattena
analyzed: tathā āhāra anāhāra vasena tattha phasso cetanā cittanti ime tayo dhammā visesa paccaya ttena

original: yathākkamaṃ “phassāhāro manosañcetanāhāro viññāṇāhāro”ti vuccanti, avasesā na āhārāti.
analyzed: yathākkamam phassa āhāraḥ manaḥ sañcetanā āhāraḥ viññāṇa āhāro ti vuccanti avasesā na āhārā ti

original: Kiṃ panete paccayā na honti, ye na āhārāti vucceyyunti? No na honti, visesapaccayā
analyzed: kim pana ete paccayāḥ na honti ye na āhārā ti vucceyyuṃ ti no na honti visesa paccayā

original: pana na honti, phassādayo pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ visesapaccayā honti, visesato vedanādayo
analyzed: pana na honti phassa ādayaḥ pana tesam dhammānam visesa paccayāḥ honti visesataḥ vedanā ādayo

original: ca āharanti. Phassāhāro hi tisso vedanāyo āharati, manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave,
analyzed: ca āharanti phassa āhāraḥ hi tissaḥ vedanāyaḥ āharati manaḥ sañcetanā āhāro bhave

original: viññāṇāhāro paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ. Nanu ca so vipāko, idaṃ pana kusalaviññāṇanti? Kiñcāpi
analyzed: viññāṇa āhāro paṭisandhi nāma rūpam nanu ca so vipāko idam pana kusala viññāṇan ti kiñca api

original: evaṃ, taṃsarikkhatāya pana viññāṇāhārotveva vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā ime “arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ
analyzed: evam tad sarikkha tāya pana viññāṇa āhāraḥ tu eva vuttam yasmā vā ime arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānam

original: dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato kabaḷīkārāhāro
analyzed: dhammānam tad samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ āhāra paccayena paccayaḥ ti vacanataḥ kabaḷīkāra āhāro

original: viya rūpakāyassa upatthambhakaṭṭhena nāmakāyassa āhārapaccayā honti, tasmā imeva
analyzed: rūpakāyassa upatthambhaka ṭṭhena nāmakāyassa āhāra paccayāḥ honti tasmai ime eva

original: “āhārā”ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ āhārānāhāravasena duvidhā.
analyzed: āhārā ati vuttā ati veditabbam evam āhāra anāhāra vasena duvidhā

original: Tathā indriyānindriyato. Tattha saddhā vīriyaṃ sati ekaggatā amoho cittaṃ somanassavedanā
analyzed: tathā indriya anindriyato tattha saddhā vīriyam sati ekagga tā amohaḥ cittam somanassa vedanā

original: jīvitanti ime aṭṭha dhammā adhipatiyaṭṭhena yathākkamaṃ “saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ
analyzed: jīvitanti ime aṭṭha dhammā adhipatiya ṭṭhena yathākkamam saddhā indriyam vīriya indriyam

original: satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ jīvitindriya”nti
analyzed: satindriyam samādhindriyam paññindriyam manindriyam somanassindriyam jīvitindriyanti

original: vuccanti, avasesā na “indriyānī”ti. Evaṃ indriyānindriyato duvidhā.
analyzed: vuccanti avasesāḥ na indriyāni iti evam indriya anindriyataḥ duvidhā

original: Tathā jhānaṅgājhānaṅgavasena. Tattha vitakko vicāro pīti somanassaṃ ekaggatāti ime
analyzed: tathā jhāna aṅga ajhāna aṅga vasena tattha vitakkaḥ vicāraḥ pi iti somanassam ekagga tā ti ime

original: pañca dhammā upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena “jhānaṅgānī”ti vuccanti, itare “ajhānaṅgānī”ti.
analyzed: pañca dhammā upanijjhāyana ṭṭhena jhāna aṅgāni iti vuccanti itare ajhāna aṅgāni iti

original: Evaṃ jhānaṅgājhānaṅgavasena duvidhā.
analyzed: evam jhā an aṅga a jhā an aṅga vasena duvidhā

original: Tathā maggaṅgāmaggaṅgavasena. Tattha amoho vitakko viratittayaṃ vīriyaṃ sati ekaggatāti
analyzed: tathā maggaṅga amaggaṅga vasena tattha amohaḥ vitakkaḥ virati tayam vīriyam sati ekagga tā ti

original: ime aṭṭha dhammā niyyānaṭṭhena, vimokkhaṭṭhena ca yathākkamaṃ “sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo
analyzed: ime aṭṭha dhammā niyyāna ṭṭhena vimokkha ṭṭhena ca yathākkamam sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo

original: sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhī”ti nāmena “maggaṅgānī”ti
analyzed: sammā vācā sammā kammantaḥ sammā ājīvo sammā vāyāmo sammā sati sammā samādhī iti nāmena maggaṅgāni iti

original: vuccanti, itare “amaggaṅgānī”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana lokiyacitte viratīnaṃ aniyatattā, yevāpanakattā
analyzed: vuccanti itare amaggaṅgāni iti pāḷiyam pana lokiya citte viratīnam aniyata ttā yevāpanaka ttā

original: ca tā vajjetvā “pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti vuccati. Evaṃ maggaṅgāmaggaṅgavasena duvidhā.
analyzed: ca tā vajjetvā pañcaṅgikaḥ maggo hoti iti vuccati evam maggaṅga a maggaṅga vasena duvidhā

original: Tathā balābalavasena. Tattha saddhāvīriyaṃ sati samādhi paññā hirī ottappanti ime satta dhammā akampiyaṭṭhena balānīti vuccanti, itare abalānīti. Evaṃ balābalavasena duvidhā.
analyzed: tathā bala abala vasena tattha saddhā vīriyam sati samādhi paññā hirī ottappanti ime satta dhammā akampiya ṭṭhena balāni iti vuccanti itare abalāni iti evam bala abala vasena duvidhā

original: Tathā hetunahetuvasena. Tattha alobho adoso amohoti ime tayo dhammā mūlaṭṭhena hetūti
analyzed: tathā hetunā hetu vasena tattha alobhaḥ adosaḥ amohaḥ ti ime tayo dhammā mūla ṭṭhena hetu ti

original: vuccanti, itare nahetūti. Evaṃ hetunahetuvasena duvidhā. Evaṃ phassāphassavedanāvedanā
analyzed: vuccanti itare na hetu iti evam hetu na hetu vasena duvidhā evam phassa aphassa vedanā vedanā

original: saññāsaññācittācittādivasenapi vuttanayānusārena yathāyogaṃ saṅgahavibhāgo veditabbo.
analyzed: saññā saññā citta acitta ādi vasena api vutta naya anusārena yathāyogam saṅgaha vibhāgaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana padabhājanīyasaṅgahavāre, tadaṭṭhakathāyañca gahetabbo.
analyzed: ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana padabhājanīya saṅgaha vāre tad aṭṭhakathāyañca gahetabbo

original: Evaṃ saṅgahato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam saṅgahataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Suññato cevāti evaṃ khandhādīhi saṅgahitesu tesu dhammesu tabbinimutto kārakavedakādisabhāvo
analyzed: suññataḥ ca iva ati evam khandha ādīhi saṅgahitesu tesu dhammesu tad vinimuttaḥ kāraka vedaka ādi sabhāvaḥ

original: attā vā sassato vā bhāvo na upalabbhati. Suññā te dhammā attena vā attaniyena vā,
analyzed: attā vā sassataḥ vā bhāvaḥ na upalabbhati suññā te dhammā attena vā attaniyena vā

original: kevalaṃ paṭiccasamuppannā, salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dhammamattā, niccasukhādisāravirahato
analyzed: kevalam paṭicca samuppannā sa lakkhaṇa dhāraṇataḥ dhamma mattā nicca sukha ādi sāra virahato

original: asārā, pavattakaniyāmakābhāvato apariṇāyakā aniccā, dukkhā, anattā, anattaniyā ca
analyzed: asārā pavattaka niyāmaka abhāvataḥ apariṇāyakā aniccā dukkhā anattā anatta niyā ca

original: hutvā pavattantīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana padabhājanīyasuññatavāre, tadaṭṭhakathāyañca
analyzed: hutvā pavattanti iti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana pada bhājanīya suññata vāre tad aṭṭhakathāyañca

original: gahetabboti. Evaṃ suññato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: gahetabbo ti evam suññatas vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Niṭṭhitā paṭhamakusalassa atthavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā paṭhama kusalassa attha vaṇṇanā

original: Dutiyādīsupi paṭhamakusale vuttanayena dhammuddesādinā sabbo vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: dutiya ādīsu pi paṭhama kusale vutta nayena dhamma uddesa ādinā sabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Na kevalañca ettheva, ito paresupi sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttasadisānaṃ padānaṃ, dhammānañca
analyzed: na kevalam ca ettha iva itas paresu pi sabbattha heṭṭhā vutta sadisānam padānam dhammānam ca

original: attho, sabbo ca vinicchayo ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ito paraṃ pana apubbameva
analyzed: atthaḥ sabbaḥ ca vinicchayaḥ ettha vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ itas param pana apubbam eva

original: vaṇṇayissāma. Dutiyacitte tāva sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva paṭhamacittato viseso, sesaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇayissāma dutiya citte tāva sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva paṭhama cittato visesaḥ sesam

original: tādisameva. Dutiyakusalaṃ.
analyzed: tādisam eva dutiya kusalam

original: Tatiyepi dhammuddese amohābhāvā indriyamaggaṅgabalamūlasaṅgahesu paññindriyasammādiṭṭhimaggaṅgapaññābalaamohamūlānaṃ
analyzed: tatiye pi dhamma uddese amoha abhāvā indriya maggaṅga bala mūla saṅgahesu paññindriya sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅga paññā bala amoha mūlānaṃ

original: parihāniyā saddhindriyādīnaṃ bhāvova viseso, sesaṃ tādisameva. Tathā catutthe sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva
analyzed: parihāniyā saddhi indriya ādīnam bhāvaḥ u visesaḥ sesam tādisam eva tathā catutthe sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva

original: viseso. Tatiyacatutthāni.
analyzed: visesaḥ tatiya catutthāni

original: Pañcamachaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamesu pana sukhasomanassaṭṭhānesu upekkhābhāvo, pītiyā ca
analyzed: pañcama chaṭṭha sattama ṭṭhamesu pana sukha somanassa ṭṭhānesu upekkhā bhāvo pītiyā ca

original: abhāvo. Teneva jhānaṅgasaṅgahavāre caturaṅgajjhānatāva viseso, sesaṃ paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthacittasadisameva.
analyzed: tena iva jhān aṅga saṅgaha vāre viseso sesam paṭhama dutiya tatiya catuttha citta sadisam eva

original: Upekkhāsahagatesu cettha catūsu karuṇāmuditā na uppajjantīti keci vadanti, parikammabhūtānaṃ
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatesu ca ittha catūsu karuṇā muditā na uppajjanti iti keci vadanti

original: panettha tāsaṃ uppattiyā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātattā upacārappattā pana uppajjanti,
analyzed: pana ittha tāsam uppattiyāḥ mahā aṭṭhakathāyam anuññāta ttā upacāra ppattā pana uppajjanti

original: na itarāti gahetabbaṃ. Pañcamachaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamāni.
analyzed: na itarāti gahetabbam pañcama chaṭṭha sattama ṭṭhamāni

original: Visayādippabhedatoti evaṃ dhammuddesādinā vibhattāni aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalāni ārammaṇavibhāgato
analyzed: visaya ādi ppabhedato ti evam dhamma uddesa ādinā vibhattāni aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusalāni ārammaṇa vibhāgato

original: paccekaṃ chabbidhāni honti rūpārammaṇaṃ…pe… dhammārammaṇanti. Tattha nīlādibhedabhinnā,
analyzed: paccekam chabbidhāni honti rūpa ārammaṇam pe dhamma ārammaṇam ti tattha nīla ādi bheda bhinnā

original: atītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattikabāhiraoḷārikasukhumādibhedabhinnā ca vaṇṇadhātu rūpārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppanna ajjhattika bāhira oḷārika sukhuma ādi bheda bhinnā ca vaṇṇa dhātu rūpa ārammaṇam

original: nāma. Evaṃ saddārammaṇādīsupi yathānurūpaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: nāma evam yathānurūpam bhedaḥ veditabbo

original: Ettha ca phoṭṭhabbanti āpodhātuvajjitabhūtattayaṃ, dhammārammaṇanti pañcārammaṇāni
analyzed: ettha ca phoṭṭhabbanti āpodhātu vajjita bhūta ttayam dhamma ārammaṇanti pañca ārammaṇāni

original: vajjetvā avasesā rūpārūpapaññattiyo veditabbā, sesaṃ tādisameva. Keci panettha “cakkhuviññāṇādīnamāpāthagatāni
analyzed: vajjetvā avasesā rūpa arūpa paññattiyaḥ veditabbā sesam tādisam eva keci pana ittha cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam āpātha gatāni

original: etānārammaṇāni rūpārammaṇādivohāraṃ labhanti, anāpāthagatāni pana atītānāgatadūrasukhumādibhedabhinnāni
analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇa ādi vohāram labhanti anāpātha gatāni pana atīta anāgata dūra sukhuma ādi bheda bhinnāni

original: dhammārammaṇānevā”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ dibbacakkhādīnaṃ rūpārammaṇatādivacanato.
analyzed: dhamma ārammaṇān eva ati vadanti tam na yuttam dibba cakkha ādīnam rūpa ārammaṇa tā ādi vacanato

original: Anāpāthagatā eva hi tāni dibbacakkhuādīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, na ca tāni dhammārammaṇāni.
analyzed: anāpātha gatāḥ eva hi tāni dibba cakkhu ādīnam ārammaṇam na ca tāni dhamma ārammaṇāni

original: Rūpādayo hi pañca paccekaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu ekasmiṃ khaṇe āpāthamāgantvā taṃtaṃdvārikajavanānaṃ,
analyzed: rūpa ādayaḥ hi pañca paccekam dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu ekasmin khaṇe āpātham āgantvā

original: tadanantare manodvārikānañca aparabhāge ca diṭṭhasutādivasenānussarantassa suddhamanodvārikānañca
analyzed: tad anantare manodvārikā anañca apara bhāge ca diṭṭha sutā divasena anussarantassa

original: ārammaṇāni honti. Tathā hi nānāvaṇṇavicittacetiyādidassanaṃ karontassa, dhammaṃ suṇantassa,
analyzed: ārammaṇāni honti tathā hi nānā vaṇṇa vicitta cetiya ādi dassanam karontassa dhammam suṇantassa

original: bherisaddādīhi vā pūjādiṃ karontassa ca gandhamālādīni ghāyitvā, khādanīyabhojanīyādiñca
analyzed: bheri sadda ādīhi vā pūjā ādim karontassa ca gandha mālā ādīni ghāyitvā khādanīya bhojanīya ādin ca

original: sāyitvā, sukhasamphassāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni ca phusitvā manāpabhāvaṃ ñatvā tehi
analyzed: sāyitvā sukha samphassāni attharaṇa pāvuraṇa ādīni ca phusitvā manāpa bhāvam ñatvā tehi

original: cetiyapūjaṃ karontassa, tattha tattha akusalaṃ vā uppādentassa, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe
analyzed: cetiya pūjam karontassa tattha tattha akusalam vā uppādentassa tasmin tasmin khaṇe

original: gayhamānāni rūpādipañcārammaṇāni sākhāya akkamanaṃ, pathaviyaṃ chāyāpharaṇañca ekakkhaṇe
analyzed: gayhamānāni rūpa ādi pañca ārammaṇāni sākhāya akkamanam pathaviyam chāyā pharaṇam ca eka kkhaṇe

original: kurumānaṃ rukkhagge nilīyamānaṃ pakkhino sarīraṃ viya yathāsakaṃ pasādañca ghaṭṭetvā
analyzed: kurumānam rukkha agge nilīyamānam pakkhino sarīram viya yathāsakam pasādam ca ghaṭṭetvā

original: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhavaṅgacalanapaccayabhāvena manodvārepi āpāthamāgantvā tato bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: tasmin yeva khaṇe bhavaṅga calana paccaya bhāvena manaḥ dvāre pi āpātham āgantvā tatas bhavaṅgam

original: vicchinditvā uppannānaṃ āvajjanādivoṭṭhabbanapariyosānānaṃ, vīthicittānaṃ, tadanantarānañca
analyzed: vicchinditvā uppannānam āvajjana ādi voṭṭhabbana pariyosānānam vīthi cittānam tad anantarānam ca

original: kusalākusalādijavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hutvā tadanantarāsu manodvāravīthīsu ca aparabhāge
analyzed: ārammaṇam hutvā tad anantarāsu manaḥ dvāra vīthīsu ca apara bhāge

original: tathārūpaṃ paccayaṃ āgamma attanā pūjādikaraṇakālesu, diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphuṭṭhavasenānussarantassa,
analyzed: tathārūpam paccayam āgamma attanā pūjā ādi karaṇa kālesu diṭṭha suta ghāyita sāyita phuṭṭha vasena anussarantassa

original: paccakkhato anubhuyyamānāni viya manodvāre ca ārammaṇāni honti.
analyzed: paccakkhatas anubhuyyamānāni viya manaḥ dvāre ca ārammaṇāni honti

original: Athāpi pañcahi dvārehi agahitapubbāni buddharūpādīni, dibbarūpādīni ca pañcārammaṇāni
analyzed: atha api pañcahi dvārehi agahita pubbāni buddha rūpa ādīni dibba rūpa ādīni ca pañca ārammaṇāni

original: savanavasena sallakkhetvā javanakkhaṇe vā aparabhāge sutavaseneva anussaritvā vā
analyzed: savana vasena sallakkhetvā java nakkhaṇe vā aparabhāge suta vasena iva anussaritvā vā

original: pasādaṃ, kammaphalasaddhādiṃ, lobhādiñca uppādentassāpi manodvāre āpāthamāgacchanti.
analyzed: pasādam kamma phala saddhā ādim lobha ādiñca uppādentassa api manaḥ dvāre āpātham āgacchanti

original: Abhiññānaṃ pana suddhamanodvāre eva, tasmā evaṃ pañcadvāre, manodvāre, suddhamanodvāre
analyzed: abhiññānam pana suddha manaḥ dvāre eva tasmai evam pañca dvāre manaḥ dvāre suddha manaḥ dvāre

original: ca āpāthagatāni atītādibhedabhinnāni sabbānipi pañcārammaṇāni kadācipi dhammārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ca āpātha gatāni atīta ādi bheda bhinnāni sabbāni pi pañca ārammaṇāni kadāci pi dhamma ārammaṇam

original: na honti, taditarā nāmarūpapaññattiyo dhammārammaṇanti gahetabbaṃ. Nanu cetāni iṭṭhakantamanāpāni
analyzed: na honti tad itarāḥ nāma rūpa paññattiyaḥ dhamma ārammaṇanti gahetabbam nanu ca itāni iṭṭha kanta manāpāni

original: ārammaṇāni lobhassa vatthu, kathamettha kusalaṃ uppajjatīti? Niyamādikāraṇato. Cittaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇāni lobhassa vatthu katham ettha kusalam uppajjati iti niyama ādi kāraṇato cittam

original: hi “kusalameva mayā kattabba”nti pubbe niyamitavasena sabbattha akusalappavattiṃ
analyzed: hi kusalam eva mayā kattabbanti pubbe niyamita vasena sabbattha akusala ppavattim

original: nivattetvā kusale pariṇāmanavasena ca abhiṇhaṃ āsevitakusalasamudācāravasena ca sappurisūpanissayādiupanissayavasena
analyzed: nivattetvā kusale pariṇāmana vasena ca abhiṇham āsevita kusala samudācāra vasena ca sappurisa upanissaya ādi upanissaya vasena

original: ca yonisoābhujitavasena cāti imehi kāraṇehi kusalaṃ hutvā uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca ca ati imehi kāraṇehi kusalam hutvā uppajjati iti veditabbam

original: Evamimesu chasu ārammaṇesu uppajjanato paccekaṃ chabbidhāni honti. Ārammaṇavavatthānakathā.
analyzed: evam imesu chasu ārammaṇesu uppajjanato paccekam chabbidhāni honti ārammaṇa vavatthāna kathā

original: Evaṃ ārammaṇabhedabhinnesu rūpārammaṇaṃ tāva kusalaṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasena
analyzed: evam ārammaṇa bheda bhinnesu rūpa ārammaṇam tāva kusalam dasa puñña kiriya vatthu vasena

original: dasavidhaṃ hoti. Tattha ekekaṃ pana kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammanti tividhaṃ.
analyzed: dasavidham hoti tattha ekekam pana kāya kammam vacī kammam manaḥ kammanti tividham

original: Tattha kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīdvāre pavattaṃ vacīkammaṃ, manodvāre pavattaṃ
analyzed: tattha kāya dvāre pavattam kāya kammam vacī dvāre pavattam vacī kammam manaḥ dvāre pavattam

original: manokammaṃ. Tattha kāyadvāranti kāyaviññatti. Vacīdvāranti vacīviññatti. Tāsaṃ vibhāgo
analyzed: manaḥ kammam tattha kāya dvāranti kāya viññatti vacī dvāranti vacī viññatti tāsam vibhāgaḥ

original: rūpavibhattiyaṃ āvi bhavissati. Manodvāranti sabbaṃ cetanāsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ vuccati,
analyzed: rūpa vibhattiyam bhavissati manaḥ dvāram ti sabbam cetanā sampayuttam cittam vuccati

original: visesato kusalākusalaṃ. Taṃ hi sahajātānaṃ cetanānaṃ, kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopanaṃ asampāpuṇitvā
analyzed: visesataḥ kusala akusalam tam hi sahajātānam cetanānam kāyaṅga vācaṅga copanam a sampāpuṇitvā

original: pavattānaṃ suddhamanokammānaṃ pavattiokāsadānato dvāranti vuccati, imesu pana tīsu
analyzed: pavattānam suddha manokammānam pavatti okāsa dānataḥ dvāran ti vuccati imesu pana tīsu

original: dvāresu pavattā cetanā kāyakammādayo nāma. Apica pāṇātipātādayo, pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādayo
analyzed: dvāresu pavattā cetanā kāya kamma ādayaḥ nāma apica pāṇa atipāta ādayaḥ pāṇa atipāta averamaṇi ādayaḥ

original: ca kāyakammaṃ nāma, musāvādādayo, musāvādāveramaṇiādayo ca vacīkammaṃ nāma, abhijjhādayo,
analyzed: ca kāya kammam nāma musāvāda ādayaḥ ca vacī kammam nāma abhijjhā ādayaḥ

original: anabhijjhādayo ca manokammaṃ nāma.
analyzed: anabhijjhā ādayaḥ ca manokammam nāma

original: Kusalapakkhe pana dānādidasapuññakiriyavatthūni ca yathārahaṃ kāyavacīmanokammāni
analyzed: kusala pakkhe pana dāna ādi dasa puñña kiriya vatthūni ca yathāraham kāya vacī manaḥ kammāni

original: honti. Evaṃ yebhuyyavuttito cesa kāyakammādibhāvo vutto pāṇātipātādīnampi vacīdvārādīsu
analyzed: honti evam yebhuyya vuttitaḥ ca īsa kāya kamma ādi bhāvo vutto pāṇa atipāta ādīnam pi vacī dvāra ādīsu

original: pavattito kesañci purisānaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya, dvārānañca kāyakammadvārādibhāvo
analyzed: pavattitaḥ kesañci purisānam vana caraka ādi bhāvaḥ viya dvārānam ca kāya kamma dvāra ādi bhāvaḥ

original: kesañci gāmānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo viya. Akusale tāva ettha pāṇātipātādikāyakammaṃ
analyzed: gāmānam brāhmaṇa gāma ādi bhāvaḥ viya akusale tāva ettha pāṇa atipāta ādi kāya kammaṃ

original: kāyadvāre, vacīdvāre ca yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhāti, no manodvāre. Tathā musāvādādivacīkammaṃ.
analyzed: kāya dvāre vacī dvāre ca yathāraham samuṭṭhāti no manaḥ dvāre tathā musāvāda ādi vacī kammaṃ

original: Pāṇātipātādinipphādanatthaṃ hi manodvāre eva cintentassa cetanābyāpādādīsu kammapathappattesu
analyzed: pāṇa atipāta ādi nipphādana ttham hi manaḥ dvāre eva cintentassa cetanā byāpāda ādīsu kammapatha ppattesu

original: vā kammapathaṃ appattesu vā manokammesu eva pavisanato kāyakammādibhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: vā kamma patham appattesu vā manaḥ kammesu eva pavisanataḥ kāya kamma ādi bhāvam na pāpuṇāti

original: Nanu vijjāmayenāpi kevalaṃ manokammena pāṇātipātādiṃ karontīti? Na aloṇabhojanadabbhasayanamantaparijappanādikāyavacīpayogaṃ
analyzed: nanu vijjā mayena api kevalam manaḥ kammena pāṇa atipāta ādim karonti iti na

original: vinā tassāsijjhanato. Abhijjhādimanokammaṃ pana tīsupi dvāresu samuṭṭhāti. Abhijjhāya
analyzed: vinā abhijjhā ādi manaḥ kammam pana tīsu pi dvāresu samuṭṭhāti

original: hi kāyena parabhaṇḍaggāhādīnaṃ, byāpādena daṇḍaparāmasanādīnaṃ, micchādiṭṭhiyā titthiyavandanādīnaṃ
analyzed: hi kāyena parabhaṇḍa ggāha ādīnam byāpādena daṇḍa parāmasana ādīnam micchā diṭṭhiyā titthiya vandanā ādīnam

original: karaṇakāle, vācāya parasampattipatthanāya “haññantu bajjhantū”ti anatthapatthanāya
analyzed: karaṇa kāle vācāya para sampatti patthanāya haññantu bajjhantu iti anattha patthanāya

original: ca titthiyatthutitadatthadīpanādīnañca yathākkamaṃ pavattikāle ca tassa manokammassa
analyzed: ca yathākkamam pavatti kāle ca tassa mano kammassa

original: kāyavācāsu pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: kāya vācāsu pavatti veditabbā

original: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ pana pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādikaṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ paccekaṃ dvārattayepi
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam pana pāṇa atipāta averamaṇi ādikam kāya vacī manaḥ kammam paccekam

original: pavattati. Tattha pāṇātipātādīhi samphappalāpapariyosānehi sattahi viramantassa tāva
analyzed: pavattati tattha pāṇātipāta ādīhi samphappalāpa pariyosānehi sattahi viramantassa tāva

original: hatthamuddāya, vacībhedena ca samādiyanakāle, manasā viramaṇakāle ca tesaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ
analyzed: hattham uddāya vacī bhedena ca samādiyana kāle manasā viramaṇa kāle ca tesam kāya vacī kammānam

original: tīsu dvāresu pavatti veditabbā. Anabhijjhādīhi sahagatena cetasā tajjassa kāyapayogassa,
analyzed: tīsu dvāresu veditabbā anabhijjhā ādīhi sahagatena cetasā tad jassa kāya payogassa

original: “paravittupakaraṇaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hotu, sabbe sattā averā hontu, so bhagavā arahaṃ
analyzed: para vittupakaraṇam cira ṭṭhitikam hotu sabbe sattāḥ averāḥ hontu saḥ bhagavā arahan

original: sammāsambuddho”tiādinā vacīpayogassa, kevalaṃ manopayogassa ca karaṇakāle manokammassa
analyzed: sammāsambuddha iti ādinā vacī payogassa kevalam manaḥ upayogassa ca karaṇa kāle mano kammassa

original: tīsupi dvāresu pavatti veditabbā. Ettha ca pañcadvāre uppannāni javanāni kāyavacīkammāni
analyzed: tīsu pi dvāresu veditabbā ettha ca pañca dvāre uppannāni javanāni kāya vacī kammāni

original: na honti, manokammāni eva. Tāni ca na kammapathappattāni, kevalaṃ kusalādīni honti.
analyzed: na honti manaḥ kammāni eva tāni ca na kammapatha ppattāni kevalam kusala ādīni honti

original: Manodvāre paṭutarappavattāni eva hi kammapathappattāni manokammāni honti, rūpārūpajavanāni
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre paṭutara ppavattāni eva hi kammapatha ppattāni manaḥ kammāni honti rūpa arūpa javanāni

original: pana ekantaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ manokammameva manodvāre eva ca pavattanti.
analyzed: pana ekantam bhāvanā mayam manaḥ kammam eva manaḥ dvāre eva ca pavattanti

original: Kiñcāpi abhiññāñāṇāni viññattidvayajanakāni, tathāpi kāyavacīkammavohāraṃ na labhanti,
analyzed: kiñca api abhiññā ñāṇāni viññatti dvaya janakāni tathā api kāya vacī kamma vohāram na labhanti

original: lokuttarakusalaṃ pana kāyavacīdvāresu anuppajjamānampi micchāvācākammantājīvānaṃ
analyzed: lokuttara kusalam pana kāya vacī dvāresu anuppajjamānam pi micchā vācā kammanta ājīvānam

original: samucchedappahānakārīnaṃ viratīnaṃ vasena kāyavacīkammampi hoti, taditaramaggaṅgavasena
analyzed: samuccheda ppahāna kārīnam viratīnam vasena kāya vacī kammam pi hoti tad itara maggaṅga vasena

original: manokammampīti ekakkhaṇe tīṇipi kammāni honti, tañca bhāvanāmayaṃ, dvāraṃ panassa
analyzed: manaḥ kammam pi iti eka kkhaṇe tīṇi pi kammāni honti tat ca bhāvanā mayam dvāram panassa

original: manodvārameva. Yathā ca pāṇātipātāveramaṇiyādīnaṃ vasena kusalassa dvārattaye pavatti
analyzed: manaḥ dvāram eva yathā ca vasena kusalassa

original: vuttā, evaṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthūnampi vasena vattabbā. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana na vicāritā,
analyzed: vuttāḥ evam dasa puñña kiriya vatthūnam pi vasena vattabbāḥ aṭṭhakathāsu pana na vicāritā

original: tathāpi nayato evaṃ veditabbā.
analyzed: tathā api nayataḥ evam veditabbā

original: Tesu dānaṃ kāyakammameva, vacīkammampi vā. Pattānuppadānaṃ, abbhanumodanaṃ, desanā
analyzed: tesu dānam kāya kammam eva vacī kammam pi vā patta anuppadānam abbhanumodanam desanā

original: vacīkammameva. Sīlaṃ apacitisahagataṃ, veyyāvaccasahagatañca kāyakammampi atthi,
analyzed: vacī kammam eva sīlam apaciti sahagatam veyyāvacca sahagatam ca kāya kammam pi atthi

original: vacīkammampi atthi. Tattha sīlassa kāyavacīkammabhāvo siddho eva. Apacitiyā pana
analyzed: vacī kammam pi atthi tattha sīlassa kāya vacī kamma bhāvo siddhaḥ eva apacitiyā pana

original: pupphapūjādinā, vandanādinā vā pavattikāle kāyakammabhāvo, thutimayapūjādinā pavattikāle
analyzed: puppha pūjā ādinā vandanā ādinā vā pavatti kāle kāya kamma bhāvo thuti maya pūjā ādinā pavatti kāle

original: vacīkammabhāvo ca veditabbo. Veyyāvaccassāpi sahatthā karaṇakāle kāyakammabhāvo,
analyzed: vacī kamma bhāvaḥ ca veditabbaḥ veyyāvaccassa api sahatthā karaṇa kāle kāya kamma bhāvaḥ

original: gilānādīnaṃ catupaccayasamādāpanādivasena, garūhi āṇattasaddena ārocanapakkosanādivasena
analyzed: gilāna ādīnam catu paccaya samādāpana ādi vasena garūhi āṇatta saddena ārocana pakkosana ādi vasena

original: vacīkammabhāvo ca veditabbo. Bhāvanā, savanaṃ, diṭṭhijukammañca manokammameva, abbhanumodanampīti
analyzed: vacī kamma bhāvaḥ ca veditabbaḥ bhāvanā savanam diṭṭhi ju kammam ca manaḥ kammam eva abbhanumodanam pi iti

original: keci. Savanampi hi sotadvārānusārena manodvāre eva dhammatthasallakkhaṇavasena pavattikāle manokammameva.
analyzed: keci savanam pi hi sota dvāra anusārena manaḥ dvāre eva dhamma attha sallakkhaṇa vasena pavatti kāle mano kammam eva

original: Tattha dānaṃ apaciti veyyāvaccaṃ pattānuppadānaṃ desanāti imāni pañca kāyavacīdvāresu
analyzed: tattha dānam apaciti veyyāvaccam pattānuppadānam desanā ati imāni pañca kāyavacī dvāresu

original: eva pavattanti, na manodvāre. Ettha ca pattānuppadānadesanānaṃ kāyavikārena pattiṃ
analyzed: eva pavattanti na manaḥ dvāre ettha ca patta anuppadāna desanānam kāya vikārena pattim

original: dentassa, dhammaṃ desentassa ca kāyadvārepi pavatti veditabbā. Sīlaṃ bhāvanā abbhanumodanaṃ
analyzed: dentassa dhammam desentassa ca kāya dvāre pi pavatti veditabbā sīlam bhāvanā abbhanumodanam

original: savanaṃ diṭṭhijukammanti imāni pana pañca tīsupi dvāresu pavattanti, “na punevaṃ
analyzed: savanam diṭṭhi ju kammanti imāni pana pañca tīsu pi dvāresu pavattanti na puna evam

original: karissāmī”ti cettha manasāva duccaritato viramantassa, abbhanumodantassa ca vasena
analyzed: karissāmi iti ca itthā manasā ava duccaritataḥ viramantassa ca vasena

original: sīlabbhanumodanānaṃ manodvārepi pavatti veditabbā. Yaṃ pana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “dānamayaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pi pavatti veditabbā yam pana aṭṭhasāliniyam dāna mayam

original: kāyavacīmanokammavasena tividhaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbacetanāvasena manodvāre
analyzed: kāya vacī manaḥ kamma vasena tividham hoti itiādi vuttam tam pubba cetanā vasena manaḥ dvāre

original: pavattaṃ gahetvā pariyāyato vuttaṃ, nippariyāyato kāyavacīdvārappavattā sanniṭṭhānacetanāva.
analyzed: pavattam gahetvā pariyāyataḥ vuttam nippariyāyataḥ kāya vacī dvāra ppavattā sanniṭṭhāna cetanā va

original: Teneva hi tattheva vuttaṃ “vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā hi ‘dassāmi karissāmī’ti vācā bhinnā
analyzed: tena iva hi tattha eva vuttam vinaya pariyāyam patvā hi dassāmi karissāmi iti vācā bhinnā

original: hotīti. Iminā lakkhaṇena dānaṃ nāma hoti, abhidhammapariyāyaṃ patvā pana vijjamānakavatthuṃ
analyzed: hoti iti iminā lakkhaṇena dānam nāma hoti abhidhamma pariyāyam patvā pana vijjamānaka vatthum

original: ārabbha manasā cintitakālato paṭṭhāya kusalaṃ hoti. Aparabhāge kāyena vā vācāya vā
analyzed: ārabbha manasā cintita kālataḥ paṭṭhāya kusalam hoti aparabhāge kāyena vā vācāya vā

original: kattabbaṃ karissatī”ti. Itarathā “dassāmī”ti cintitamattenāpi dānaṃ nāma bhaveyya,
analyzed: kattabbam karissati iti itarathā dassāmi iti cintita mattena api dānam nāma bhaveyya

original: tathā ca tādisaṃ vatthuṃ yathācintitaniyāmena adentassa dhuranikkhepe adinnādānampi
analyzed: tathā ca tādisam vatthum yathā cintita niyāmena adentassa dhura nikkhepe adinna ādānam pi

original: siyā. Evaṃ manasā pāṇātipātādayopi siyuṃ, tañca na yuttaṃ, tasmā vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: siyā evam manasā pāṇātipāta ādayaḥ api siyum tat ca na yuttam tasmā vutta nayena iva gahetabbam

original: Atha vā “sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dinnaññeva haratū”ti pariccajanasambhavato dānassa manodvārepi pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: atha vā sabbam sāpateyyam haratu uti pariccajana sambhavataḥ dānassa manaḥ dvāre pi pavatti veditabbā

original: Ettha ca dānasīlādikāyakammānaṃ kāyadvāre pavattiyaṃ kammaṃ kāyakammameva, dvārampi
analyzed: ettha ca dāna sīla ādi kāya kammānam kāya dvāre pavattiyam kammam kāya kammam eva dvāram pi

original: kāyadvārameva. Vacīdvāre pavattiyaṃ kammaṃ kāyakammameva, dvāraṃ pana vacīdvāraṃ.
analyzed: kāya dvāram eva vacī dvāre pavattiyam kammam kāya kammam eva dvāram pana vacī dvāram

original: Manodvāre pavattiyampi kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ, dvāraṃ pana manodvāraṃ. Desanābbhanumodanādīnaṃ

analyzed: pavattiyam pi kammam vacī kammam eva dvāram pana kāya dvāram manaḥ dvāre pavattiyam pi

analyzed: kammam vacī kammam dvāram pana manaḥ dvāram bhāvanā ādi manaḥ kammānam manaḥ dvāre pavattiyam

analyzed: kammam pi manaḥ kammam dvāram pi manaḥ dvāram eva kāya dvāre pavattiyam pi kammam manaḥ kammam eva

original: vacīdvāraṃ. Evaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ, pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīnañca vuttānusārena kammavavatthānaṃ,
analyzed: vacī dvāram evam pāṇātipāta ādīnam vutta anusārena kamma vavatthānam

original: dvāravavatthānañca yathānurūpaṃ yojetvā asaṅkarato ñātabbaṃ.
analyzed: dvāra vavatthānam ca yathānurūpam yojetvā asaṅkarataḥ ñātabbam

original: Dvārakammavavatthānakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dvāra kamma vavatthāna kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Idāni yasmā dasavidhāni cetāni puññakiriyavatthūni tīsu evaṃ saṅgayhanti dānamaye
analyzed: idāni yasmai dasavidhāni cetāni puñña kiriya vatthūni tīsu evam saṅgayhanti dāna maye

original: sīlamaye bhāvanāmayeti. Pattānuppadānaṃ hi dānamaye saṅgayhati, “abbhanumodanampī”ti
analyzed: sīla maye bhāvanā maye iti patta an uppadānam hi dāna maye saṅgayhati abbhanumodanam pi iti

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Apacitiveyyāvaccāni sīlamaye. Desanāsavanadiṭṭhijukammāni bhāvanāmaye,
analyzed: apaciti veyyāvaccāni sīla maye desanā savana diṭṭhi ju kammāni bhāvanā maye

original: tasmā rūpārammaṇassa kusalassa dānasīlabhāvanāvasena dvārattayappavattiṃ yojetvā
analyzed: tasmā rūpa ārammaṇassa kusalassa dāna sīla bhāvanā vasena dvāra ttaya ppavattim yojetvā

original: dassessāma. Tadanusāreneva itaresaṃ vasenāpi sakkā ñātunti. Kusalaṃ hi vaṇṇārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: dassessāma tad anusārena iva itaresam vasena api sakkā ñātum ti kusalam hi vaṇṇa ārammaṇam

original: hutvā uppajjamānaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāvaseneva tīsu dvāresu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Yadā hi
analyzed: hutvā uppajjamānam dāna sīla bhāvanā vasena iva tīsu dvāresu pavattati katham yadā hi

analyzed: nīla pīta ādi vaṇṇa vicittam puppha vattha ādi deyya dhammam labhitvā vaṇṇa dānam me bhavissati iti

analyzed: vaṇṇa vasena ābhujitvā cetiya ādīsu sahatthena pūjā iti tadā rūpa ārammaṇam dāna mayam kāyadvāre

original: pavattati, tañca pubbacetanā sanniṭṭhānacetanā aparacetanāti tividhaṃ hoti. Evaṃ
analyzed: pavattati tat ca pubba cetanā sanniṭṭhāna cetanā apara cetanā ati tividham hoti evam

original: uparipi sabbavāresu tividhatā veditabbā. Yadā pana tadeva yathāvuttavatthuṃ vācāya
analyzed: upari pi sabba vāresu tividha tā veditabbā yadā pana tat eva yathā vutta vatthum vācāya

analyzed: āṇāpetvā putta dāra ādīhi dāpeti tadārūpa ārammaṇam dāna mayam vacī dvāre pavattati yadā

original: pana tadeva vijjamānakavatthuṃ “dassāmī”ti cinteti, paccāsīsati, yathādhippāyaṃ nipphādessati,

original: tadā pubbacetanāvasena pariyāyato dānamayaṃ manodvāre pavattati nāma. Evaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tadā pubba cetanā vasena pariyāyataḥ dāna mayam manaḥ dvāre pavattati nāma evam rūpa ārammaṇam

original: dānamayaṃ dvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: dāna mayam dvāra vasena tividham

analyzed: nāma mayham sahatthā pūjā iti tādi savaṇṇavantam vā para pariggahita ādi bhoga sampattim

original: pariccajitvā sīlaṃ rakkhati, tadā rūpārammaṇaṃ sīlaṃ kāyadvāre ca pavattati. Yadā

analyzed: vacī dvāre pavattati yadā pana tādisam vijjamānaka vatthum kula vaṃsa ādi vasena dassāmi iti

analyzed: anicca āditaḥ vipassati tadā rūpa ārammaṇam bhāvanā mayam kāya dvāre pavattati tat eva

original: vacībhedaṃ katvā sammasantassa rūpārammaṇaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ vacīdvāre pavattati. Tadeva
analyzed: vacī bhedam katvā sammasantassa rūpa ārammaṇam bhāvanā mayam vacī dvāre pavattati tat eva

analyzed: evam rūpa ārammaṇam bhāvanā mayam dvāra vasena tividham hoti iti rūpa ārammaṇassa kusalassa

original: tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navasu kammadvāresu pavattivibhāgo veditabbo. Imināva
analyzed: tividha puñña kiriya vatthu vasena navasu kamma dvāresu pavatti vibhāgaḥ veditabbaḥ iminā ava

original: nayena rūpārammaṇassa kusalassa dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasenāpi tiṃsāya kammadvāresu
analyzed: nayena rūpa ārammaṇassa kusalassa dasa puñña kiriya vatthu vasena api tiṃsāya kamma dvāresu

original: pavattivibhāgo yojetvā ñātabbo. Yathā ca rūpārammaṇassa, evaṃ saddārammaṇādīnampi
analyzed: pavatti vibhāgaḥ yojetvā ñātabbaḥ yathā ca rūpa ārammaṇassa evam sadda ārammaṇa ādīnam pi

original: pañcannaṃ kusalānaṃ puññakiriyavatthudvārehi vibhāgo, yojanānayo ca yathānurūpaṃ ñātabbo.
analyzed: pañcannam kusalānam puñña kiriya vatthu dvārehi vibhāgaḥ yojana anayaḥ ca yathānurūpam ñātabbo

original: Apica saddaṃ nāma kandamūlaṃ viya hatthena gahetvā dātuṃ na sakkā. Yadā pana “saddadānaṃ
analyzed: apica saddam nāma kanda mūlam viya hatthena gahetvā dātum na sakkā yadā pana

original: me”ti ābhujitvā bheriāditūriye tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ deti, tehi upahāraṃ vā karoti, dhammakathikādīnaṃ

original: sarabhesajjādiṃ deti, dhammassavanaṃ ghoseti, sarabhaññadhammakathādiṃ vā karoti,
analyzed: sara bhesajja ādim deti dhamma ssavanam ghoseti sarabhañña dhamma kathā ādim vā karoti

original: tadā kusalaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ gandhādivatthupariccāgepi gandhādiārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tadā kusalam sadda ārammaṇam hoti evam gandha ādi vatthu pariccāge pi gandha ādi ārammaṇam

original: Dhammārammaṇaṃ pana ojājīvitindriyatadāyattānaṃ vasena ñātabbaṃ. Yadā hi ojavantāni
analyzed: dhamma ārammaṇam pana ojā jīvita indriya tad āyattānam vasena ñātabbam yadā hi ojavantāni

original: annapānasappinavanītādīni “ojadānaṃ me bhavissatī”ti deti, gilānānaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā

original: vejjaṃ vā upanetvā, pāṇoparodhakaṃ āvudhajālakuminādiṃ vināsetvā vā, vajjhappatte
analyzed: vejjam vā upanetvā pāṇa uparodhakam āvudha jāla kumina ādim vināsetvā vā vajjha ppatte

original: pāṇino mocetvā vā “jīvitadānaṃ me bhavissati jīvitāyattavuttitāya, pañcapasādasoḷasasukhumarūpacittacetasikānaṃ
analyzed: pāṇinaḥ mocetvā vā jīvita dānam me bhavissati jīvita āyatta vutti tāya pañca pasāda soḷasa sukhuma rūpa citta cetasikānam

original: vasena pasādādidānaṃ me bhavissatī”ti ca manasi karoti, tadā kusalaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: vasena pasāda ādi dānam me bhavissati iti ca manasi karoti tadā kusalam dhamma ārammaṇam

original: hoti. Sesaṃ tādisameva.
analyzed: hoti sesam tādisam eva

original: Ayaṃ nānāvatthūsu ṭhitārammaṇānaṃ yojanā. Ekavatthusmimpi chārammaṇaṃ labbhateva.
analyzed: ayam nānā vatthūsu ṭhita ārammaṇānam yojanā eka vatthusmim pi cha ārammaṇam labbhateva

original: Piṇḍapātasmiṃ hi manāpo vaṇṇo, khādanakāle murumurāyanasaddo, gandho, raso, phoṭṭhabbaṃ,

analyzed: evam cīvara ādīsu ca iva vattha ādīsu ca yathā anurūpam ñātabbam ettha api dāna sīla bhāvanā maya tā

original: Evaṃ ārammaṇato, puññakiriyavatthuto, kammato, dvārato ca anekasahassappabhedesu

original: ñātabboti. Evaṃ visayādippabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: ñātabbaḥ ti evam visaya ādi ppabhedataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Kāmāvacarakusaladhammā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusala dhammā niṭṭhitā

original: – vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsampayuttaṃ paṭhamajjhānikaṃ, tato vūpasantaṃ atikkantavitakkaṃ

analyzed: catuttha jhānikam tatas vūpasantam atthaṅgata sukham upekkhā ikagga tā sampayuttam pañcama jhānikam ti

original: Evaṃ sampayogabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam sampayoga bhedataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Dhammuddesādito pana paṭhamajjhāne tāva kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusale vuttesu ṭhapetvā

original: viratittayaṃ sesā chattiṃsa dhammā honti. Tattha chandādayo cattāro, karuṇā, muditā

original: cāti cha yevāpanakā. Sesaṃ suññatavārapariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusale

original: rūpāvacarabhāvo ca viseso, sesaṃ tādisameva. Paṭhamajjhānaṃ.
analyzed: rūpāvacara bhāvaḥ ca visesaḥ sesam tādisam eva paṭhama jhānam

original: Tathā dutiyajjhānepi kevalaṃ dhammuddese vitakkābhāvo, saṅgahavāre catukkajjhānaṅgamaggaṅgabhāvo ca viseso, sesaṃ paṭhamasadisameva. Dutiyaṃ.

original: Tathā tatiyajjhānepi kevalaṃ dhammuddese vicārābhāvo, saṅgahavāre tivaṅgikajjhānatā ca viseso, sesaṃ dutiyasadisameva. Tatiyaṃ.
analyzed: tathā tatiya jhāne pi kevalam dhamma uddese vicāra abhāvaḥ saṅgaha vāre tivaṅgika jhāna tā ca visesaḥ sesam dutiya sadisam eva tatiyam

original: Tathā catutthe kevalaṃ dhammuddese pītiyā abhāvo, koṭṭhāsavāre duvaṅgikajjhānabhāvo ca viseso, sesaṃ tatiyasadisameva. Catutthaṃ.
analyzed: tathā catutthe kevalam dhamma uddese pītiyāḥ abhāvo koṭṭhāsa vāre ca viseso sesam tatiya sadisam eva catuttham

original: Tathā pañcame kevalaṃ dhammuddese karuṇāmuditādīnaṃ abhāvo, somanassaṭṭhāne upekkhābhāvo,

analyzed: koṭṭhāsa vāre jhāna indriyesu upekkhā jhāna aṅga bhāvo upekkhindriya bhāvo ca viseso sesam

original: catutthasamameva. Pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: catuttha samam eva pañcamam

original: Padabhājanīye pana vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā dutiyaṃ, pītiyā ca virāgā tatiyaṃ, somanassassa
