original: etānipi “suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā, parittaappamāṇavaseneva abhibhāyatanānī”ti
analyzed: etāni api suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā paritta appamāṇa vasena iva abhibhāyatanāni iti

original: āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vaṇṇitāni. Vaṇṇābhogassa hi atthitāya purimāni abhibhāyatanāni vaṇṇābhogarahitasahitatāya
analyzed: āgama aṭṭhakathāsu vaṇṇitāni vaṇṇa ābhogassa hi atthi tāya purimāni abhibhāyatanāni vaṇṇa ābhoga rahita sahita tāya

original: ettha kevalato visesasabbhāvā catudhā vuttāni, nīlādīni pana cattāri suvisuddhavaṇṇavasena
sukhārohatāya ñāṇuttariko abhibhavitvā appanaṃ nibbatteti, tasmā ārammaṇavisesābhāvepi
analyzed: sukha āroha tāya ñāṇuttarikaḥ abhibhavitvā appanam nibbatteti tasmai ārammaṇa visesa abhāve pi

original: jhānuppattivisesato imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ vasena paccekaṃ aṭṭhavidhā
analyzed: jhāna uppatti visesato imesam aṭṭhannam abhibhāyatanānam vasena paccekam aṭṭhavidhā

original: hontīti veditabbā. Abhibhāyatanakathā.
analyzed: honti iti veditabbā abhibhāyatana kathā

original: Tāni puna yathā ca abhibhāyatanavasena, evaṃ vimokkhavasenāpi paccekaṃ tividhā honti.
analyzed: tāni puna yathā ca abhibhāyatana vasena evam vimokkha vasena api paccekam tividhā honti

original: Bhagavatā hi “rūpī rūpāni passati, ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati,
analyzed: bhagavatā hi rūpī rūpāni passati ajjhattam a rūpa saññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati

original: subhantveva adhimutto hotī”ti tayo vimokkhā desitā. Te ca kasiṇesveva adhimuccanavasena
analyzed: adhimuttaḥ hoti iti tayaḥ vimokkhāḥ desitā te ca kasiṇesu eva adhimuccana vasena

original: jhānuppattivisesato, bhāvanārammaṇavisesato kimidaṃ adhimuccanaṃ nāma? Paccanīkadhammehi
analyzed: jhāna uppatti visesataḥ bhāvanā ārammaṇa visesataḥ kim idam adhimuccanam nāma paccanīka dhammehi

original: suṭṭhu vimuccanaṃ, ārammaṇesu ca suṭṭhu abhirati, pitu mātu aṅke vissaṭṭhaṅgapaccaṅgassa
analyzed: suṭṭhu vimuccanaṃ ārammaṇesu ca suṭṭhu abhirati pitu mātu aṅke vissaṭṭhaṅga paccaṅgassa

original: dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: dārakassa sayanam viya a niggahita bhāvena nirāsaṅka tāya ārammaṇe pavatti iti vuttam

original: hoti. Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ nāma, tadassa
analyzed: hoti tattha rūpī iti ajjhattam kesa ādīsu uppāditam rūpajjhānam rūpam nāma tat assa

original: atthīti rūpī. Ajjhattampi hi kesādīsu nīlaṃ, medādīsu pītaṃ, maṃsādīsu lohitaṃ, dantādīsu
analyzed: atthi iti rūpī ajjhattam pi hi kesa ādīsu nīlam meda ādīsu pītam maṃsa ādīsu lohitam danta ādīsu

original: odātañca vaṇṇakasiṇavasena ābhujitvā parikammaṃ karontassa rūpajjhānāni, kasiṇaṃ
analyzed: odātam ca vaṇṇa kasiṇa vasena ābhujitvā parikammam karontassa rūpa jhānāni kasiṇam

original: ugghāṭetvā ca arūpajjhānāni uppajjanteva. Rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni
analyzed: ugghāṭetvā ca arūpa jjhānāni uppajjantā iva rūpāni passati iti bahiddhā api nīla kasiṇa ādi rūpāni

original: jhānacakkhunā passati, iminā ajjhattabahiddhavatthukesu kasiṇesu jhānappaṭilābho
analyzed: jhāna cakkhunā passati iminā ajjhatta bahiddha vatthukesu kasiṇesu jhāna ppaṭilābho

original: dassito. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti attano kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhāno, iminā
analyzed: dassitaḥ ajjhattam arūpa saññī iti attanaḥ kesa ādīsu anuppādita rūpāvacara jjhānaḥ iminā

original: bahiddhā paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā. Subhantveva adhimutto hotīti iminā suvisuddhesu
analyzed: bahiddhā paṭiladdha jhāna tā dassitā adhimuttaḥ hoti iti iminā su visuddhesu

original: nīlādivaṇṇakasiṇesu “subha”nti adhimuttivasena paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā. Evaṃ ārammaṇavisesābhāvepi
analyzed: nīla ādi vaṇṇa kasiṇesu adhimutti vasena paṭiladdha jhāna tā dassitā evam ārammaṇa visesa abhāve pi

original: adhimuttivasena jhānuppattivisesato imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vimokkhānaṃ vasena paccekaṃ tividhā
analyzed: adhimutti vasena jhāna uppatti visesato imesam tiṇṇam vimokkhānam vasena paccekam tividhā

original: hontīti veditabbā. Vimokkhakathā.
analyzed: honti iti veditabbā vimokkha kathā

original: Yathā ca vimokkhato, evaṃ paṭipadābhedato paccekaṃ catubbidhā honti dukkhapaṭipadaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca vimokkhataḥ evam paṭipadā bhedato paccekam catubbidhāḥ honti dukkha paṭipadam

original: dandhābhiññaṃ, dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ, sukhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, sukhapaṭipadaṃ
analyzed: dandha abhiññam dukkha paṭipadam khippa abhiññam sukha paṭipadam dandha abhiññam sukha paṭipadam

original: khippābhiññanti. Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva upacāraṃ uppajjati, tāva
analyzed: tattha paṭhama samannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva upacāram uppajjati tāva

original: pavattā jhānabhāvanā “paṭipadā”ti vuccati. Sā ekaccassa dukkhā nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammasamudācāragahanatāya
analyzed: pavattā jhāna bhāvanā paṭipadā iti vuccati sā ekaccassa dukkhā nīvaraṇa ādi paccanīka dhamma samudācāra gahana tāya

original: asukhasevanā hoti, ekaccassa tadabhāvato sukhā. Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā,
analyzed: asukha sevanā hoti ekaccassa tad abhāvato sukhā upacārataḥ pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā

original: tāva pavattā paññā “abhiññā”ti vuccati. Sā ekaccassa dandhā asīghappavattinī, ekaccassa
analyzed: tāva pavattā paññā abhiññā iti vuccati sā ekaccassa dandhā asīgha ppavattinī ekaccassa

original: khippā. Asappāyasevino dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā, sappāyasevino sukhā
analyzed: khippā a sappāya sevino dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā sappāya sevino sukhā

original: paṭipadā hoti khippā ca abhiññā. Pubbāparakālesu sappāyāsappāyasevanavasena vomissatā
analyzed: paṭipadā hoti khippā ca abhiññā pubba apara kālesu sappāya asappāya sevana vasena vomissa tā

original: ca veditabbā. Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ asampādentassa paṭipadā dukkhā,
analyzed: ca veditabbā tathā palibodha upaccheda ādikam pubba kiccam a sampādentassa paṭipadā dukkhā

original: sampādentassa sukhā paṭipadā. Appanākosallaṃ asampādentassa dandhābhiññā, sampādentassa
analyzed: sampādentassa sukhā paṭipadā appanā ākosallam a sampādentassa dandhā abhiññā sampādentassa

original: khippā. Kilesindriyānaṃ vā tikkhamudutāya paṭhamā, vipariyāyena catutthā, vomissatāya
analyzed: khippā kilesa indriyānam vā tikkha mudu tāya paṭhamā vipariyāyena catutthā vomissa tāya

original: majjhimā dveti veditabbā. Taṇhāvijjābhibhavanānabhibhavanavasena vā samathavipassanāsu
analyzed: majjhimā dve iti veditabbā taṇhā vijjā abhibhavana an abhibhavana vasena vā samatha vipassanāsu

original: katādhikārākatādhikāratāvasena vāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Paṭhamajjhānādiāgamanavasenāpi
analyzed: kata adhikāra akata adhikāra tā vasena vā api etāsam pabhedaḥ veditabbaḥ paṭhamajjhāna ādi āgamana vasena api

original: dutiyādīnaṃ paṭipadābhiññābhedo hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipadāvasena paccekaṃ
analyzed: dutiya ādīnam paṭipadā abhiññā bhedo daṭṭhabbam evam paṭipadā vasena paccekam

original: catubbidhā hontīti veditabbā. Paṭipadākathā.
analyzed: catubbidhāḥ honti iti veditabbā paṭipadā kathā

original: Yathā ca paṭipadāhi, evaṃ ārammaṇabhedatopi paccekaṃ catubbidhā honti parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ,
analyzed: yathā ca paṭipadā hi evam ārammaṇa bhedataḥ pi paccekam catubbidhāḥ honti parittam paritta ārammaṇam

original: parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ, appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti.
analyzed: parittam appamāṇa ārammaṇam appamāṇam paritta ārammaṇam appamāṇam appamāṇa ārammaṇam

original: Tattha yaṃ appaguṇaṃ, uparijjhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, idaṃ parittaṃ.
analyzed: tattha yam appaguṇam upari jhānassa paccayaḥ bhavitum na sakkoti idam parittam

original: Yaṃ pana avaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavattaṃ, taṃ parittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti parittārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yam pana avaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavattam tam parittam ārammaṇam assa ati paritta ārammaṇam

original: Vipariyāyato appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ. Tadubhayavomissatāya majjhe itaradvayaṃ
analyzed: vipariyāyataḥ appamāṇam appamāṇa ārammaṇam tad ubhaya vomissatāya majjhe itara dvayam

original: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ ārammaṇabhedato catubbidhā hontīti veditabbā. Ārammaṇakathā.
analyzed: veditabbam evam ārammaṇa bhedato catubbidhāḥ honti iti veditabbā ārammaṇa kathā

original: Yathā ca paṭipadārammaṇehi, evaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena paccekaṃ catubbidhatā, hīnattikavasena puna tividhatā ca yojetvā veditabbā.
analyzed: yathā ca paṭipad ārammaṇehi evam adhipatīnam vasena paccekam catubbidha tā hīna ttika vasena puna tividha tā ca yojetvā veditabbā

original: Dasakasiṇamūlavibhāgakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dasa kasiṇa mūla vibhāga kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Yathā kasiṇamūlesu, evaṃ brahmavihāramūlesupi yathāyogaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo – mettākaruṇāmuditāvasena
analyzed: yathā kasiṇa mūlesu evam brahmavihāra mūlesu pi yathāyogam vibhāgaḥ veditabbaḥ mettā karuṇā muditā vasena

original: hi ādito cattāri jhānāni paccekaṃ tividhā honti mettāsahagataṃ, karuṇāsahagataṃ,
analyzed: hi āditas cattāri jhānāni paccekam tividhā honti mettā sahagatam karuṇā sahagatam

original: muditāsahagatanti. Pañcamajjhānaṃ pana upekkhābrahmavihāravasena ekavidhaṃ upekkhāsahagatanti.
analyzed: muditā sahagatan ti pañcama jhānam pana upekkhā brahmavihāra vasena ekavidham upekkhā sahagatan ti

original: Purimesu hi tīsu pañcamajjhānaṃ nuppajjati. Kasmā? Somanassāvippayogato, somanassasamuṭṭhitānaṃ
analyzed: purimesu hi tīsu pañcama jhānam nuppajjati kasmā somanassa avippayogato somanassa samuṭṭhitānam

original: byāpādavihiṃsāratīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ nissaraṇattā, pacchime ca tikacatukkajjhānaṃ nuppajjati.
analyzed: byāpāda vihiṃsā ratīnam yathākkamam nissaraṇa ttā pacchime ca tika catukka jhānam na uppajjati

original: Kasmā? Upekkhāvedanāsampayogato, tassā ca paṭighānunayanissaraṇato majjhattākārena
analyzed: kasmai upekkhā vedanā sampayogato tassā ca paṭigha anunaya nissaraṇato majjhatta ākārena

original: pavattito, tāni puna paṭipadārammaṇādhipatihīnattikabhedehi pubbe vuttanayena yojetvā
analyzed: pavattitaḥ tāni puna paṭipada ārammaṇa adhipati hīna ttika bhedehi pubbe vutta nayena yojetvā

original: veditabbāni. Ettha ca appasattārammaṇavasena parittārammaṇatā, bahusattārammaṇavasena
analyzed: veditabbāni ettha ca appasatta ārammaṇa vasena paritta ārammaṇa tā bahu satta ārammaṇa vasena

original: appamāṇārammaṇatā ca ekasmiṃ satte appanaṃ pāpetvā anukkamena ekāvāsaekavīthigāmādigatasattesu
analyzed: appamāṇa ārammaṇa tā ca ekasmin satte appanam pāpetvā anukkamena eka āvāsa eka vīthi gāma ādi gata sattesu

original: pāpanavasena vaḍḍhanā ca veditabbā. Dhammuddese panettha karuṇāsahagate muditāvirahitā
analyzed: pāpana vasena vaḍḍhanā ca veditabbā dhamma uddese pana ittha karuṇā sahagate muditā avirahitā

original: pañcatiṃsa dhammā, tesu chandādayo cattāro, karuṇā cāti pañceva yevāpanakā, karuṇā
analyzed: pañcatiṃsa dhammā tesu chanda ādayo cattāro karuṇā ca ati pañca iva yevāpanakā karuṇā

original: ca niyatāti veditabbā. Evaṃ muditāsahagatepi. Kevalaṃ karuṇāvirahitā muditā niyatā
analyzed: ca niyatā iti veditabbā evam muditā sahagate api kevalam karuṇā virahitā muditā niyatā

original: pavattāti ayamettha viseso. Avasesabrahmavihāradvaye, pana kasiṇāsubhādīsu ca sabbattha
analyzed: pavattā ati ayam ettha visesaḥ avasesa brahmavihāra dvaye pana kasiṇāsubha ādīsu ca sabbattha

original: karuṇāmuditāvirahitā ca catuttiṃsa dhammā, tattha ca chandādayo cattārova yevāpanakā
analyzed: ca catuttiṃsa dhammā tattha ca chanda ādayo

original: veditabbāti. Brahmavihāramūlavibhāgakathā.
analyzed: brahmavihāra mūla vibhāga kathā

original: Asubhabhedato pana paṭhamajjhānamevekaṃ dasavidhaṃ hoti uddhumātakasaññāsahagataṃ
analyzed: asubha bhedato pana paṭhamajjhānam eva ekam dasavidham hoti uddhumātaka saññā sahagatam

original: vinīlakavipubbakavicchiddakavikkhāyitakavikkhittakahatavikkhittakalohitakapuḷavakaaṭṭhikasaññāsahagatanti,
analyzed: vinīlaka vipubbaka vicchiddaka vikkhāyitaka vikkhittaka hatavikkhittaka lohitaka puḷavaka aṭṭhika saññā sahagatanti

original: dasavidhepi cetasmiṃ asubhe paṭikūlattā, dubbalattā ca vitakkabaleneva jhānaṃ tiṭṭhati,
analyzed: dasavidhe api ca itasmin asubhe paṭikūla ttā dubbala ttā ca vitakka balena iva jhānam tiṭṭhati

original: na vinā vitakkena sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā viya, tasmā paṭhamajjhānamevettha
analyzed: na vinā vitakkena sīghasotāya nadiyāḥ aritta balena iva nāvā

original: uppajjati, samathavipassanādiānisaṃsadassāvitāya, panettha nīvaraṇappahānena ca pītisomanassaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati pana ittha nīvaraṇa pahānena ca pīti somanassam

original: uppajjati bahuvetanalābhadassanena pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi viya, upasantabyādhidukkhassa
analyzed: uppajjati bahu vetana lābha dassanena pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtha rāsimhi viya upasanta byādhi dukkhassa

original: ca rogino vamanavirecanappavattiyaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ pana dasavidhampi paṭhamajjhānaṃ
analyzed: ca roginaḥ vamana virecana pavattiyam viyā ti daṭṭhabbam tam pana dasavidham pi paṭhamajjhānam

original: paṭipadārammaṇādhipatihīnattikavasena paccekaṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca asubhārammaṇassa
analyzed: paṭipada ārammaṇa adhipati hīna ttika vasena paccekam yojetvā veditabbam ettha ca asubha ārammaṇassa

original: avaḍḍhanīyatāya khuddake uddhumātakādiṭṭhāne uppannaṃ nimittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ, mahante
analyzed: a vaḍḍhanīya tāya khuddake uddhumātaka ādi ṭṭhāne uppannam nimittam paritta ārammaṇam mahante

original: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Etesu pana dasasu asubhesu sāmaññato dvattiṃsākāravasena,
analyzed: appamāṇa ārammaṇam veditabbam etesu pana dasasu asubhesu sāmaññataḥ dvattiṃsa ākāra vasena

original: navasivathikapabbavasena ca pavattā kāyagatāsati saṅgahitā, vaṇṇakasiṇesu ca kesādīnaṃ
analyzed: ca pavattā kāya gatā asati saṅgahitā vaṇṇa kasiṇesu ca kesa ādīnam

original: koṭṭhāsānaṃ nīlādivaṇṇārammaṇā, catukkapañcakajjhānavasena uppannā kāyagatāsati ca
analyzed: koṭṭhāsānam nīla ādi vaṇṇa ārammaṇā catukka pañcaka jjhāna vasena uppannā kāya gatā asati ca

original: saṅgahitā. Padabhājanīye visuṃ na vuttā, tasmā tesaṃ vasenāpi vibhāgo veditabbo.
analyzed: saṅgahitā pada bhājanīye visum na vuttā tasmā tesam vasena api vibhāgaḥ veditabbo

original: Asubhamūlavibhāgakathā.
analyzed: asubha mūla vibhāga kathā

original: Evaṃ ārammaṇādibhedato ca bhinnānaṃ rūpāvacarakusaladhammānaṃ kāladesādibhedena anantatā,
analyzed: evam ārammaṇa ādi bhedato ca bhinnānam rūpāvacara kusala dhammānam kāla desa ādi bhedena ananta tā

original: bhagavatā ca ekattaṃ upanetvā desitabhāvo, vitthāranayātideso ca kāmāvacarakusale
analyzed: bhagavatā ca ekattam upanetvā desita bhāvaḥ vitthāra naya atideso ca kāmāvacara kusale

original: vuttānusārena yathānurūpaṃ ñātabbo. Ito paraṃ arūpāvacarādīsupi visesamattameva vakkhāma.
analyzed: vutta anusārena yathānurūpam ñātabbaḥ itas param arūpāvacara ādīsu pi visesa mattam eva vakkhāma

original: Evaṃ visayādippabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam visaya ādi ppabhedataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Rūpāvacarakusaladhammā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara kusala dhammā niṭṭhitā

original: Arūpāvacarā pana kusaladhammā sampayogato na bhinnā, sabbepi upekkhekaggatāsampayuttāva,
analyzed: arūpāvacarā pana kusala dhammā sampayogataḥ na bhinnā sabbe pi upekkhā ikagga tā sampayuttā va

original: dhammuddesāditopi sabbaso rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānasadisā. Arūpāvacarabhāvo eva hettha
analyzed: dhamma uddesa āditaḥ pi sabbasas rūpāvacara pañcama jhāna sadisā arūpāvacara bhāvaḥ eva ha ittha

original: viseso. Visayādippabhedatoti ettha pana ārammaṇato te catubbidhā honti. Seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: visesaḥ visaya ādi ppabhedato ti ettha pana ārammaṇato te catubbidhāḥ honti seyyathidam

original: – ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatanam viññāṇañcāyatanam ākiñcaññāyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti

original: Tattha hi kasiṇugghāṭimākāse “ananto ākāso”ti pavattaṃ paṭhamaṃ, tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe
analyzed: tattha hi anantaḥ ākāso ti pavattam paṭhamam tasmim paṭhama āruppa viññāṇe

original: “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti pavattaṃ dutiyaṃ, tassa paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāve “natthi
analyzed: anantam viññāṇanti pavattam dutiyam tassa paṭhama āruppa viññāṇassa abhāve natthi

original: kiñcī”ti pavattaṃ tatiyaṃ, tasmiṃ tatiye “santametaṃ paṇītameta”nti pavattaṃ catutthaṃ.
analyzed: kiñci iti pavattam tatiyam tasmin tatiye santam etam paṇītam etat iti pavattam catuttham

original: Purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimaṃ santasantatarasantatamanti ca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: purima purimehi pacchima pacchimam ca veditabbam

original: Nanu rūpāvacaresu vitakkādiaṅgasamatikkamato uparūparijhānānaṃ santatarādibhāvo vutto,
analyzed: nanu rūpāvacaresu vitakka ādi aṅga samatikkamataḥ upari upari jhānānam santatara ādi bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ

original: aṅgātikkamarahitesu pana āruppesu kathanti? Ārammaṇātikkamato. Etesu hi kasiṇarūpasamatikkamato
analyzed: aṅga atikkama rahitesu pana āruppesu kathanti ārammaṇa atikkamataḥ etesu hi kasiṇa rūpa sama tikkamataḥ

original: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānato santaṃ, tatopi kasiṇugghāṭimākāsātikkamato
analyzed: paṭhamam jhānam rūpāvacara pañcamajjhānataḥ santam tatas pi

original: dutiyaṃ, tatopi ākāse pavattaviññāṇātikkamato tatiyaṃ, tatopi ākāse pavattaviññāṇassa
analyzed: dutiyam tatas pi ākāse pavatta viññāṇa atikkamato tatiyam tatas pi ākāse pavatta viññāṇassa

original: samatikkamato catutthanti. Evaṃ aṅgasamattepi thūlathūlātikkamena sukhumasukhumārammaṇatāya
analyzed: samatikkamato catutthan ti evam aṅga samatte pi thūla thūla atikkamena sukhuma sukhuma ārammaṇa tāya

original: uparūparijjhānānaṃ santatarādibhāvo veditabbo samāyāmavitthārānampi vatthānaṃ suttasukhumatarādibhāvo
analyzed: upari upari jhānānam santatara ādi bhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ samāyāma vitthārānam pi vatthānam sutta sukhumatara ādi bhāvaḥ

original: viya. Nanu abhāvārammaṇatāya tatiyāruppaṃ santapaṇītato manasi karontassa catutthāruppassa
analyzed: viya nanu abhāva ārammaṇa tāya tatiya āruppam santa paṇītataḥ manasi karontassa catuttha āruppassa

original: kathaṃ tattha nikantipariyādānaṃ, kathaṃ ca samatikkamo vā hotīti? Asamāpajjitukāmatāya,
analyzed: katham tattha nikanti pariyādānam katham ca samatikkamaḥ vā hoti iti a samāpajjitu kāma tāya

original: sā ca attano santapaṇītatāya. Yathā hi rājā dantakārādisippikānaṃ atisukhumamanāpasippaṃ
analyzed: sā ca attano santa paṇīta tāya yathā hi rājā dantakāra ādi sippikānam ati sukhuma manāpa sippam

original: disvā “chekā vatime ācariyā”ti tesaṃ chekatāya tussantopi na taṃ sippikabhāvaṃ pattheti,
analyzed: disvā chekāḥ vatime ācariyā ti tesam cheka tāya tussantaḥ api na tam sippika bhāvam pattheti

original: taṃ samatikkamma rājabhāve eva tiṭṭhati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ ārammaṇabhedato
analyzed: tam samatikkamma rāja bhāve eva tiṭṭhati evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam evam ārammaṇa bhedato

original: catubbidhānampetesaṃ puna paṭipadārammaṇādhipatihīnattikabhedehi pubbe vuttanayeneva
analyzed: catubbidhānam petesam puna paṭipada ārammaṇa adhipati hīna ttika bhedehi pubbe vutta nayena iva

original: paccekaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: paccekam bhedaḥ veditabbo

original: Ettha ca rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānanikanti pariyādānadukkhatāya paṭhamāruppassa, paṭhamāruppādinikantipariyādānadukkhatāya
analyzed: ettha ca rūpāvacara catuttha jjhāna nikanti pariyādāna dukkha tāya paṭhama āruppassa paṭhama āruppa ādi nikanti pariyādāna dukkha tāya

original: dutiyāruppādīnañca dukkhapaṭipadatā, pariyādiṇṇanikantikassa tadappanāparivāsadandhatāya
analyzed: dutiya āruppa ādīnam ca dukkha paṭipada tā pariyādiṇṇa nikantikassa tad appanā parivāsa dandha tāya

original: dandhābhiññatā, vipariyāyena itarā ca veditabbā. Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāsamūlakānaṃ
analyzed: dandha abhiñña tā vipariyāyena itarā ca veditabbā paritta kasiṇugghāṭima ākāsamūlakānam

original: pana catunnaṃ parittārammaṇatā, vipariyāyānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā veditabbā. Rūpārūpāvacarā
analyzed: pana catunnam paritta ārammaṇa tā vipariyāyānam appamāṇa ārammaṇa tā veditabbā rūpa arūpa avacarā

original: panettha adhipatisahitāva uppajjanti, na vinā adhipatīhi. Kāmāvacarā tu adhipatirahitāpi
analyzed: pana ittha adhipati sahitā ava uppajjanti na vinā adhipatīhi kāmāvacarā tu adhipati rahitā api

original: uppajjanti, te ca ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipatīti dvepi labbhanti. Rūpārūpāvacarā
analyzed: uppajjanti te ca ārammaṇa adhipati sahajāta adhipati iti dve pi labbhanti rūpa arūpa avacarā

original: pana sahajātādhipatimeva, netaraṃ. Tattha ca chandādhipatinā sahajātā dhammā chandādhipateyyā,
analyzed: pana sahajāta adhipatim eva na itaram tattha ca chanda adhipatinā sahajātāḥ dhammāḥ chanda ādhipateyyā

original: chando pana adhipati eva, na chandādhipateyyo. Itare pana adhipateyyāva, nādhipatayo
analyzed: chandaḥ pana adhipati eva na chanda ādhipateyyaḥ itare pana adhipateyyāva na adhipatayaḥ

original: aññassa attanā sahajātassa chandassa, itaresañca adhipatiyatthassa abhāvā. Ekasmiṃ
analyzed: aññassa attanā sahajātassa chandassa itaresañca adhipatiyatthassa abhāvā ekasmin

original: hi cittuppāde chandādīsu catūsupi vijjamānesu yathāpaccayaṃ sahajātādhipati ekova
analyzed: hi cittuppāde chanda ādīsu catūsu pi vijjamānesu yathāpaccayam sahajāta adhipati ekaḥ uva

original: labbhati. Evaṃ vīriyādhipatiyādīsupi yathānurūpaṃ ñātabbaṃ. Evaṃ visayādippabhedato vinicchayo ñātabbo.
analyzed: labbhati evam yathā anurūpam ñātabbam evam visaya ādi ppabhedataḥ vinicchayaḥ ñātabbaḥ

original: Arūpāvacarakusaladhammā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: arūpa avacara kusala dhammā niṭṭhitā

original: Lokuttarā pana kusalā maggasampayogabhedato catubbidhā. Seyyathidaṃ – sotāpattimaggasampayuttaṃ
analyzed: lokuttarā pana kusalā magga sampayoga bhedato catubbidhā seyyathā idam sotāpatti magga sampayuttam

original: sakadāgāmimaggasampayuttaṃ anāgāmimaggasampayuttaṃ arahattamaggasampayuttanti. Nanu
analyzed: sakadāgāmi magga sampayuttam anāgāmi magga sampayuttam arahatta magga sampayuttam nanu

original: catūsupi cetesu maggasampayogo samāno aṭṭhannampi maggaṅgānaṃ sabbattha uppattito
analyzed: catūsu pi ca itesu magga sampayogaḥ samānaḥ aṭṭhannam pi maggaṅgānam sabbattha uppattito

original: kathaṃ tattha bhedoti? Anusayappahānasaṅkhātassa maggakiccassa bhedato. Anusaye mārento
analyzed: katham tattha bhedaḥ ti anusaya ppahāna saṅkhātassa magga kiccassa bhedataḥ anusaye mārento

original: gacchatīti hi maggo. Maggā hi yathāsakaṃ anusaye pajahanti eva, nimittā vuṭṭhahanti,
analyzed: gacchati iti hi maggaḥ maggāḥ hi yathāsakam anusaye pajahanti eva nimittāḥ vuṭṭhahanti

original: pavattañca chindanti nāmāti vuccanti. Nimittanti ca pañcakkhandhā, pavattantipi te
analyzed: pavattam ca chindanti nāma ati vuccanti nimittan ti ca pañca kkhandhāḥ pavattanti pi te

original: eva. Taṃ duvidhaṃ upādinnakaṃ, anupādinnakañca.
analyzed: eva tam duvidham upādinnakam anupādinnakam ca

original: Tatthapi sotāpattimaggo diṭṭhānusayaṃ, vicikicchānusayaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese, taṃsahajātāni
analyzed: tattha api sa utāpatti maggaḥ diṭṭha anusayam vicikicchā anusayam tad ekaṭṭhe ca kilese tad sahajātāni

original: diṭṭhisampayuttāni, vicikicchāsampayuttañcāti pañcākusalacittāni ca uppajjamānova
analyzed: diṭṭhi sampayuttāni vicikicchā sampayuttam ca ati pañca akusala cittāni ca uppajjamānaḥ eva

original: samugghāteti, samugghātento ca apāyabhavato ceva sugatibhavato ca ṭhapetvā satta
analyzed: samugghāteti ca apāya bhavato ca iva sugati bhavato ca ṭhapetvā satta

original: bhave tadavasesato vuṭṭhāti. Tattha yadetaṃ paṭhamamaggānuppattiyaṃ uppajjamānārahaṃ
analyzed: bhave tad avasesataḥ vuṭṭhāti tattha yat etam paṭhama magga anuppattiyam uppajjamāna araham

original: diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttapañcacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ rūpakkhandho, tāni pañca
analyzed: diṭṭhi vicikicchā sampayutta pañca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpam tam rūpa kkhandho tāni pañca

original: cittāni viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsampayuttā vedanādayo itare tayo khandhā. Ime anupādinnapañcakkhandhā
analyzed: cittāni viññāṇa kkhandho tad sampayuttāḥ vedanā ādayo itare tayo khandhāḥ ime anupādinna pañca kkhandhāḥ

original: anupādinnanimittaṃ, anupādinnappavattaṃ nāma. Tato paṭhamamaggo vuṭṭhāti, taṃ chindati
analyzed: an upādinna nimittam an upādinna ppavattam nāma tatas paṭhama maggaḥ vuṭṭhāti tam chindati

original: nāma. Yadetaṃ apāyabhave, sugatiyañca ṭhapetvā satta bhave tadavasese ca paṭhamamaggānuppattiyaṃ
analyzed: nāma yat etam apāya bhave sugatiyam ca ṭhapetvā satta bhave tad avasese ca paṭhama magga anuppattiyam

original: āyatiṃ uppajjamānārahaṃ kammajakkhandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ upādinnanimittaṃ, upādinnappavattaṃ
analyzed: āyatim uppajjamāna araham kamma ja khandha pañcakam tam upādinna nimittam upādinna ppavattam

original: nāma. Tato paṭhamamaggo vuṭṭhāti, tañca chindati nāma. Tatova paṭhamamaggo anusayaṃ
analyzed: nāma tatas paṭhama maggo vuṭṭhāti tat ca chindati nāma tatas va paṭhama maggo anusayam

original: pajahantova nimittā vuṭṭhahati, pavattañca chindati nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ itaramaggesupi
analyzed: pajahantaḥ iva nimittā vuṭṭhahati pavattam ca chindati nāma ati veditabbam evam itara maggesu pi

original: upādinnānupādinnanimittappavattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ chindanaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ñātabbaṃ.
analyzed: upādinna an upādinna nimitta ppavattam vuṭṭhānam chindanam yathā anurūpam ñātabbam

original: Sakadāgāmimaggo pana oḷārikakāmarāgānusayaṃ, paṭighānusayaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese,
analyzed: sakadāgāmi maggo pana oḷārika kāma rāga anusayam paṭigha anusayam tad ekaṭṭhe ca kilese

original: taṃsahajātāni ca tathā pavattāni cattāri diṭṭhivippayuttāni, dve ca domanassasahagatānīti
analyzed: tad sahajātāni ca tathā pavattāni cattāri diṭṭhi vippayuttāni dve ca domanassa sahagatāni iti

original: cha akusalacittāni ca uppajjamānova samugghāteti, samugghātento ca kāmasugatito ṭhapetvā
analyzed: akusala cittāni ca uppajjamānaḥ iva samugghāteti samugghātento ca kāma sugatitaḥ ṭhapetvā

original: ekabhavaṃ tadavasesato vuṭṭhāti, patanubhūtāva taṃsamaṅgino kāmarāgabyāpādā adhimattā,
analyzed: eka bhavam tad avasesataḥ vuṭṭhāti kāma rāga byāpādāḥ adhimattā

original: te ca kadāci viraḷāva uppajjantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: te ca kadāci viraḷau uppajjanti iti veditabbā

original: Anāgāmimaggopi tāneva tanusahagatakāmarāgappaṭighānusayavasena uppannāni cha cittāni
analyzed: anāgāmi maggaḥ upi tāni eva tanu sahagata kāma rāga ppaṭigha anusaya vasena uppannāni cha cittāni

original: uppajjamānova samugghāteti, samugghātento ca kāmabhavato vuṭṭhāti. Arahattamaggo
analyzed: uppajjamānaḥ iva samugghāteti samugghātento ca kāma bhavataḥ vuṭṭhāti arahatta maggo

original: pana rūparāgaarūparāgamānāvijjānusaye, uddhaccaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe sabbe kilese ca taṃsahajātāni
analyzed: pana rūpa rāga arūpa rāga māna vijjā anusaye uddhaccam tad ekaṭṭhe sabbe kilese ca tad sahajātāni

original: cattāri diṭṭhivippayuttāni, uddhaccasahagatañcāti pañcākusalacittāni ca uppajjamānova
analyzed: cattāri diṭṭhi vippayuttāni uddhacca sahagatam ca ati pañca akusala cittāni ca uppajjamānaḥ uva

original: samugghāteti, samugghātento ca rūpārūpato, sabbabhavatopi vuṭṭhāti. Sesaṃ paṭhamamagge
analyzed: samugghāteti samugghātento ca rūpa arūpataḥ sabba bhavataḥ pi vuṭṭhāti sesam paṭhama magge

original: vuttānusārato veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ anusayappahānasaṅkhātakiccabhedato catunnaṃ maggānaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: vutta anusārataḥ veditabbam evam anusaya ppahāna saṅkhāta kicca bhedato catunnam maggānam bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Tadevaṃ maggasampayogabhedato catubbidhaṃ, puna jhānaṅgasampayogabhedato paccekaṃ
analyzed: tat evam magga sampayoga bhedato catubbidham puna jhāna aṅga sampayoga bhedato paccekam

original: pañcavidhā honti. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamamaggasampayuttaṃ tāva vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsampayuttaṃ
analyzed: pañcavidhāḥ honti katham paṭhama magga sampayuttam tāva vitakka vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sampayuttam

original: paṭhamajjhānikaṃ, vicārapītisukhekaggatāsampayuttaṃ dutiyajjhānikaṃ, pītisukhekaggatāsampayuttaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama jhānikam vicāra pīti sukha ekagga tā sampayuttam dutiya jhānikam pīti sukha ekagga tā sampayuttam

original: tatiyajjhānikaṃ, sukhekaggatāsampayuttaṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ, upekkhekaggatāsampayuttaṃ
analyzed: tatiya jhānikam sukha ikagga tā sampayuttam catuttha jhānikam upekkhā ikagga tā sampayuttam

original: pañcamajjhānikañcāti pañcavidhaṃ hoti. Evaṃ dutiyamaggādisampayuttā cāti vīsatividhā
analyzed: pañcama jjhānikam ca ati pañcavidham hoti evam dutiya magga ādi sampayuttā ca ati vīsatividhā

original: honti, ettha ca catukkanayavasena soḷasavidhatāpi yojetabbā. Kiṃ panettha evaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedassa
analyzed: honti ettha ca catukka naya vasena soḷasavidha tā api yojetabbā kim pana ittha evam jhāna aṅga yoga bhedassa

original: niyāmakaṃ kāraṇanti? Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ hi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanābhūte
analyzed: niyāmakam kāraṇan ti saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam tasmin hi vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā bhūte

original: somanassasahagate ariyamaggā pañcamajjhānikā na uppajjanti, somanassasahagatā catukkajjhānikāva
analyzed: somanassa sahagate ariya maggā pañcama jhānikā na uppajjanti somanassa sahagatā catukka jhānikā va

original: uppajjanti, upekkhāsahagate ca catukkajjhānikā na uppajjanti, upekkhāsahagatā pañcamajjhānikāva uppajjanti.
analyzed: uppajjanti upekkhā sahagate ca catukkajjhānikā na uppajjanti upekkhā sahagatā pañcamajjhānikā va uppajjanti

original: Nanu cettha saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ somanassupekkhāsahagatattā catukkapañcamajjhānikānaṃ
analyzed: nanu ca ittha saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam somanassa upekkhā sahagata ttā catukka pañcama jhānikānam

original: somanassupekkhāsahagatabhāvassa niyāmakahetu, vitakkādiaṅgasamatikkamato pana nesaṃ
analyzed: somanassa upekkhā sahagata bhāvassa niyāmaka hetu vitakka ādi aṅga samatikkamataḥ pana nesam

original: dutiyādijjhānabhāvassa niyāmakena aññena bhavitabbaṃ. Na hi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ vitakkādivikalaṃ
analyzed: dutiya ādi jhāna bhāvassa niyāmakena aññena bhavitabbam na hi saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam vitakka ādi vikalam

original: uppajjati. Yena taṃ niyāmakaṃ bhaveyya, kiṃ taṃ niyāmakakāraṇanti? Pādakajjhānaṃ,
analyzed: uppajjati yena tam niyāmakam bhaveyya kim tam niyāmaka kāraṇanti pādaka jhānam

original: sammasitajjhānaṃ vā. Rūpārūpāvacaresu hi yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tatuṭṭhāya ye
analyzed: vā rūpa arūpāvacaresu hi yam yam jhānam samāpajjitvā ye

original: keci pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā ye magge uppādeti, te sabbe taṃtaṃjhānasadisāva
analyzed: keci pakiṇṇaka saṅkhāre sammasitvā ye magge uppādeti te sabbe tad tad jhāna sadisā ava

original: honti. Yaṃ yaṃ vā pana jhānaṃ, taṃsampayutte ca aniccādito vipassitvā ye ye magge
analyzed: honti yam yam vā pana jhānam tad sampayutte ca anicca āditaḥ vipassitvā ye ye magge

original: uppādeti, te ca taṃtaṃjhānasadisāva honti bhūmivaṇṇasadisavaṇṇā godhā viya. Tattha
analyzed: uppāde ti te ca taṃ taṃ jhāna sadisā ava honti bhūmi vaṇṇa sadisa vaṇṇā godhā viya tattha

original: ca sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggāpi, samāpattilābhinā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā asammasitvāva
analyzed: ca sukkha vipassakassa uppanna maggā api samāpatti lābhinā jhānam pādakam a katvā a sammasitvā ava

original: uppāditamaggāpi paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā taṃ taṃ vā sammasitvā uppāditamaggāpi
analyzed: uppādita maggā api paṭhamajjhānam pādakam katvā tam tam vā sammasitvā uppādita maggā api

original: sabbe ekasadisā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti. Na hi lokuttaramaggo appanaṃ appatto nāma
analyzed: sabbe eka sadisāḥ paṭhamajjhānikāḥ ava honti na hi lokuttara maggaḥ appanam appattaḥ nāma

original: atthi. Dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā vā tattha gate dhamme sammasitvā
analyzed: atthi dutiya tatiya catuttha jhānāni pādakāni katvā vā tattha gate dhamme sammasitvā

original: vā uppāditamaggā yathākkamaṃ caturaṅgikā, tivaṅgikā, duvaṅgikā ca honti. Pañcamajjhānaṃ,
analyzed: vā uppādita maggāḥ yathākkamam caturaṅgikā tivaṅgikā duvaṅgikā ca honti pañcama jhānam

original: pana āruppajjhānāni ca pādakaṃ katvā vā tattha gate dhamme sammasitvā vā uppāditamaggā
analyzed: pana āruppa jhānāni ca pādakam katvā vā tattha gate dhamme sammasitvā vā uppādita maggā

original: upekkhekaggatāvasena duvaṅgikāva honti. Etesañca pañcannaṃ jhānikānampi pubbabhāge
analyzed: upekkhā ikagga tā vasena duvaṅgikāḥ ava honti etesam ca pañcannam jhānikānam pi pubbabhāge

original: vipassanā somanassasahagatāpi hoti upekkhāsahagatāpi, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā
analyzed: vipassanā somanassa sahagatā api hoti upekkhā sahagatā api vuṭṭhāna gāminī pana vipassanā

original: catukkajjhānikānaṃ somanassasahagatā hoti. Pañcamajjhānikānaṃ pana upekkhāsahagatāvāti
analyzed: catukkajjhānikānam somanassa sahagatā hoti pañcamajjhānikānam pana upekkhā sahagatā avāti

original: tadeva pādakajjhānaṃ, sammasitajjhānaṃ vā niyāmakakāraṇanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ sampayogato vinicchayo.

original: Dhammuddesādito pana paṭhamajjhānikesu tāva catūsu kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusale vuttadhammesu
analyzed: dhamma uddesa āditaḥ pana paṭhama jhānikesu tāva catūsu kāmāvacara paṭhama kusale vutta dhammesu

original: ṭhapetvā karuṇāmuditā sattatiṃsa dhammā honti. Viratiyo panettha niyatā, pāḷiyañca
analyzed: ṭhapetvā karuṇā muditā sattatiṃsa dhammā honti viratiyaḥ pana ittha niyatā

original: rūpena niddiṭṭhā, chandādayo ca cattāro yevāpanakāti veditabbā.
analyzed: rūpena niddiṭṭhā chanda ādayaḥ ca cattāro veditabbā

original: Saṅgahavāre pana bodhipakkhiyadhammesu pubbe saṅgahitāvasesānaṃ satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādabojjhaṅgānaṃ
analyzed: saṅgaha vāre pana bodhi pakkhiya dhammesu pubbe saṅgahita avasesānam sati paṭṭhāna sammappadhāna eddhipāda bojjhaṅgānaṃ

original: vasena atirekā cattāro saṅgahā veditabbā. Paṭhamajjhānikamaggasampayuttesu hi dhammesu
analyzed: vasena atirekā cattāro saṅgahā veditabbā paṭhama jhānika magga sampayuttesu hi dhammesu

original: sati upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sā visayabhedena catubbidhā, itare assatipaṭṭhānāti
analyzed: sati upaṭṭhāna ṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānam sā visaya bhedena catubbidhā itare assatipaṭṭhānā ti

original: sabbeva te dvidhā honti. Tathā vīriyaṃ padahanaṭṭhena sammappadhānaṃ, taṃ kiccabhedena

original: catubbidhaṃ, itare asammappadhānāti. Tathā chando vīriyaṃ cittaṃ amohoti cattāro
analyzed: catubbidham itare tathā chandaḥ vīriyam cittam amoho ti cattāro

original: dhammā ijjhanakaṭṭhena yathākkamaṃ “chandiddhipādo vīriyacittavīmaṃsiddhipādo”ti
analyzed: dhammāḥ ijjhana kaṭṭhena yathākkamam chanda iddhipādaḥ vīriya citta vīmaṃsa iddhipādaḥ ti

original: nāmena “iddhipādā”ti vuccanti, itare “aniddhipādā”ti. Tathā sati amoho vīriyaṃ pīti
analyzed: nāmena iddhipādā ati vuccanti itare aniddhipādā ati tathā sati amohaḥ vīriyam pīti

original: passaddhi samādhi tatramajjhattatāti ime satta dhammā bujjhanaṭṭhena yathākkamaṃ
analyzed: ime satta dhammā bujjhana aṭṭhena yathākkamam

original: “satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgo”ti
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīriya pīti passaddhi samādhi upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo ti

original: vuccanti, itare abojjhaṅgāti evaṃ cattāro saṅgahā.
analyzed: vuccanti itare a bojjhaṅgā ti evam cattāro saṅgahā

original: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ lakkhaṇādito paṭṭhāya suññatavārapariyosānaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusale
analyzed: sesam sabbam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ paṭṭhāya suññata vāra pariyosānam kāmāvacara paṭhama kusale

original: vuttasadisameva, kevalaṃ pana maggaṅgasaṅgahe “aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti padabhājanīye
analyzed: vutta sadisam eva kevalam pana magga aṅga saṅgahe aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo hoti iti pada bhājanīye

original: sarūpeneva niddiṭṭhaṃ, indriyasaṅgahe paññindriyaṭṭhāne paṭhamamaggassa anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ

original: gahetvā itaramaggānaṃ aññindriyaṃ gahetvāva aṭṭhindriyanti aṭṭhindriyatā, sabbattha
analyzed: gahetvā itara maggānam aññindriyam gahetvā ava aṭṭhindriyan ti aṭṭhindriya tā sabbattha

original: lokuttaratā ca viseso, sesaṃ tādisameva. Paṭhamajjhānikā cattāro maggā.
analyzed: lokuttara tā ca visesaḥ sesam tādisam eva paṭhama jhānikā cattāro maggā

original: Tathā dutiyajjhānikesupi kevalaṃ dhammuddese vitakkābhāvo, saṅgahavāre caturaṅgajjhānatā, sattaṅgamaggatā ca viseso, sesaṃ paṭhamajjhānikasadisameva. Dutiyajjhānikamaggā.
analyzed: tathā dutiya jhānikesu pi kevalam dhamma uddese vitakka abhāvo saṅgaha vāre catur aṅga jjhāna tā sattaṅga magga tā ca visesaḥ sesam paṭhama jhānika sadisam eva dutiya jhānika maggāḥ

original: Tathā tatiyajjhānikesupi kevalaṃ dhammuddese vicārābhāvo, saṅgahavāre tivaṅgikajjhānatā ca viseso, sesaṃ dutiyajjhānikasadisameva. Tatiyajjhānikamaggā.
analyzed: tathā tatiya jhānikesu pi kevalam dhamma uddese vicāra abhāvo saṅgaha vāre tivaṅgika jhāna tā ca viseso sesam dutiya jhānika sadisam eva tatiya jhānika maggāḥ

original: Tathā catutthajjhānikesupi kevalaṃ dhammuddese pītiyā abhāvo, koṭṭhāsavāre duvaṅgikajjhānatā,
analyzed: tathā catuttha jhānikesu pi kevalam dhamma uddese pītiyāḥ abhāvaḥ koṭṭhāsa vāre duvaṅgika jhāna tā

original: chaḷaṅgikabojjhaṅgatā ca viseso, sesaṃ tatiyajjhānikasadisameva. Catutthajjhānikamaggā.
analyzed: chaḷaṅgika bojjhaṅga tā ca visesaḥ sesam tatiya jhānika sadisam eva catuttha jhānika maggā

original: Tathā pañcamajjhānikesupi kevalaṃ sabbattha vedanāparivattanameva viseso, sesaṃ catutthajjhānikasadisameva. Pañcamajjhānikamaggā. Evaṃ dhammuddesādito vinicchayo.
analyzed: tathā pañcama jhānikesu pi kevalam sabbattha vedanā parivattanam eva visesaḥ sesam catuttha jjhānika sadisam eva pañcama jhānika maggāḥ evam dhamma uddesa āditaḥ vinicchayo

original: Visayādippabhedato pana sabbepi lokuttarakusalā ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇāva, tasmā
analyzed: visaya ādi ppabhedato pana sabbe pi lokuttara kusalāḥ ārammaṇataḥ nibbāna ārammaṇāḥ ava tasmā

original: na tato nesaṃ bhedo, paṭipadādibhedato pana pubbe vuttanayena paccekaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: na tatas nesam bhedaḥ paṭipadā ādi bhedato pana pubbe vutta nayena paccekam bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Ettha ca yo nāmarūpapariggahato paṭṭhāya kilamanto vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā dukkhena
analyzed: ettha ca yaḥ nāma rūpa pariggahataḥ paṭṭhāya kilamantaḥ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā dukkhena

original: kasirena kilese vikkhambheti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti. Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso,
analyzed: kasirena kilese vikkhambheti tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti yaḥ pana vikkhambhita kileso

original: so vipassanāparivāsaṃ vāsento cirena maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa dandhābhiññā
analyzed: so vipassanā parivāsam vāsentaḥ cirena magga pātubhāvam pāpuṇāti tassa dandhā abhiññā

original: hoti. Iminā nayena itarā tissopi paṭipadābhiññāyo veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭipadādibhedato,
analyzed: hoti iminā nayena itarā tissaḥ api paṭipadābhiññāyaḥ veditabbā yathā ca paṭipadā ādi bhedato

original: evaṃ vimokkhabhedatopi paccekaṃ dvidhā honti – suññatavimokkho appaṇihitavimokkhoti.
analyzed: evam vimokkha bhedataḥ pi paccekam dvidhā honti suññata vimokkho appaṇihita vimokkho ti

original: Tattha suññatanti, appaṇihitanti ca lokuttaramaggassa nāmaṃ. So hi āgamanato saguṇato
analyzed: tattha suññatanti appaṇihitanti ca lokuttara maggassa nāmam saḥ hi āgamanataḥ saguṇataḥ

original: ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko
analyzed: ārammaṇato ti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmam labhati katham idha bhikkhu vipassanā kammaṭṭhānikaḥ

original: ādito paṭṭhāya “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tividhaṃ anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto
analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya aniccam dukkham anattā ti tividham anupassanam āropetvā sammasantaḥ

original: vicarati, sacassa vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā tebhūmake saṅkhāre anattato vipassati,
analyzed: vicarati sacassa vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā tebhūmake saṅkhāre anattataḥ vipassati

original: ayaṃ attasuññatādassanaṭṭhena suññatā nāma hoti. Sace dukkhato vipassati, ayaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhirahitaṭṭhena
analyzed: ayam atta suñña tā dassana ṭṭhena suñña tā nāma hoti sace dukkhataḥ vipassati ayam taṇhā paṇidhi rahita ṭṭhena

analyzed: suññata maggo appaṇihita maggo ti nāmam denti evam āgamanataḥ nāma lābhaḥ veditabbaḥ nanu

analyzed: suttantesu sace vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāḥ aniccato passati tassāḥ vasena maggaḥ a nimitta vimokkho

analyzed: hoti iti katvā tayaḥ vimokkhā kathitā ati saccam api ca kho pariyāyataḥ kathitā nippariyāyataḥ

analyzed: pana sayam pi sa nimittā attanaḥ maggassa animitta nāmam dātum a sakkuṇeyya tāya dve eva

analyzed: vimokkhāḥ honti iti tissaḥ api hi vipassanā nicca nimittam sukha nimittam ca ugghāṭanena

original: animittavohāraṃ labhanti, tissopi nimittabhūtesu khandhesu caraṇato sanimittāva,
analyzed: a nimitta vohāram labhanti tissaḥ api nimitta bhūtesu khandhesu caraṇataḥ

analyzed: na sakkonti yasmā pana maggo sayam rāga ādīhi suññaḥ rāga ādi nimitta paṇidhi rahito ca

analyzed: nāma lābhassa suttantesu pariyāya desita ttā tena iva ha ittha maggānam sa guṇa ārammaṇataḥ pi

analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca mohavicchedaniyā nāma

analyzed: tattha iṭṭha ārammaṇe lobha bahula tā ādīhi kāraṇehi somanassa sahagata tā asat dhamma savana akalyāṇa mitta tā ādīhi

original: maggaṅgāni cattāri, vīriyasamādhiahirikānottappavasena balāni cattāri, lobho mohoti
analyzed: maggaṅgāni cattāri vīriya samādhi ahirika anottappa vasena balāni cattāri lobho moho ti

original: dve mūlāni, abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhīti dve kammapathāni, ahirikaṃ anottappanti lokanāsadukaṃ,
analyzed: dve mūlāni abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhī iti dve kamma pathāni ahirikam anottappanti lokanāsadukam

original: samatho paggāho avikkhepo cāti evaṃ sarūpenāgatānaṃ dvattiṃsadhammānaṃ soḷasasu eva
analyzed: samathaḥ paggāhaḥ avikkhepaḥ ca ati evam sarūpena āgatānam dvattiṃsa dhammānam soḷasasu eva

original: samavarodho, savibhattikāvibhattikabhedo ca kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusale vuttānusārato
analyzed: samavarodho sa vibhattika avibhattika bhedo ca kāmāvacara paṭhama kusale vutta anusārataḥ

original: ñātabbo. Ayaṃ dhammuddesato vinicchayo.
analyzed: ñātabbaḥ ayam dhamma uddesataḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Lakkhaṇādivibhāgato pana na hirīyatīti ahiriko, ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikkaṃ, na ottappaṃ
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādi vibhāgataḥ pana na hirīyati iti ahirikaḥ ahirikassa bhāvaḥ ahirikkam na ottappam

original: anottappaṃ. Tesu ahirikkaṃ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: anottappam tesu ahirikkam kāya duccarita ādīhi a jigucchana lakkhaṇam a lajjā lakkhaṇam

original: vā, anottappaṃ teheva asārajjanalakkhaṇaṃ, anuttāsalakkhaṇaṃ vā, sesaṃ hiriottappānaṃ
analyzed: vā anottappam a sārajjana lakkhaṇam an uttāsa lakkhaṇam vā sesam hiri uttappānam

original: vuttappaṭipakkhavasena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutta paṭipakkha vasena veditabbam

original: Lubbhati tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. So ārammaṇagahaṇalakkhaṇo
analyzed: lubbhati tena sayam vā lubbhati lubbhana mattam eva vā lobho saḥ ārammaṇa gahaṇa lakkhaṇo

original: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle khittamaṃsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: makkaṭa ālepaḥ viya abhisaṅga rasaḥ tatta kapāle khitta maṃsa pesi viya a pariccāga paccupaṭṭhāno

original: telañjanarāgo viya, saññojanīyadhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. Taṇhānadibhāvena
analyzed: telañjana rāgaḥ viya saññojanīya dhammesu assāda dassana padaṭṭhāno taṇhā nadi bhāvena

original: vaḍḍhamāno sīghasotā nadī viya mahāsamuddaṃ apāyameva gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: vaḍḍhamānaḥ sīghasotā nadī viya mahā samuddam apāyam eva gahetvā gacchati iti daṭṭhabbo

original: Muyhanti tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. So cittassa andhakāralakkhaṇo,
analyzed: muyhanti tena sayam vā muyhati muyhana mattam eva vā tanti moho so cittassa andhakāra lakkhaṇo

original: aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso vā, asammāpaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: aññāṇa lakkhaṇaḥ vā a sampaṭivedha rasaḥ ārammaṇa sabhā avacchādana rasaḥ vā asammāpaṭipatti paccupaṭṭhāno

original: andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāno, sabbākusalānaṃ mūlanti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: andhakāra paccupaṭṭhānaḥ vā ayonisomanasikāra padaṭṭhāno sabba akusalānam mūlan ti daṭṭhabbo

original: Micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattameva vā esāti micchādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: micchā passanti tāya sayam vā micchā passati micchā dassana mattam eva va esā ati micchādiṭṭhi

original: Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā, ariyānaṃ
analyzed: sā ayonisas abhinivesa lakkhaṇā parāmāsa rasā micchā abhinivesa paccupaṭṭhānā ariyānaṃ

original: adassanakāmatādipadaṭṭhānā, paramaṃ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: a dassana kāma tā ādi pada ṭṭhānā paramam vajjanti daṭṭhabbā

original: Uddhatabhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ, bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: uddhata bhāvaḥ uddhaccam tam a vūpasama lakkhaṇam an avaṭṭhāna rasam bhanta tā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ, cittavikkhepoti daṭṭhabbo. Seso panettha suññatavārapariyosāno
analyzed: ayoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānam citta vikkhepo ti daṭṭhabbo sesaḥ pana ittha suññata vāra pariyosāno

original: sabbopi vinicchayo kusalādhikāre vuttānusārato veditabbo. Kevalaṃ saṅgahavāre pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: sabbaḥ api vinicchayaḥ kusala adhikāre vutta anusārataḥ veditabbaḥ kevalam saṅgaha vāre pāḷiyam

original: āgatavasena pañcindriyatā, caturaṅgamaggatā, catubbidhabalatā, dvehetutā, sabbattha
analyzed: āgata vasena pañca indriya tā catur aṅga magga tā catubbidha bala tā dve hetu tā sabbattha

original: akusalabhāvo ca viseso, sesaṃ tādisameva. Paṭhamākusalaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: akusala bhāvo ca viseso sesam tādisam eva paṭhama akusalam niṭṭhitam

original: Yathā ca paṭhame, evaṃ dutiyepi sasaṅkhāratā, yevāpanakesu thinamiddhānaṃ sambhavo,
analyzed: yathā ca paṭhame evam dutiye api sa saṅkhāra tā sambhavaḥ

original: niyatatā ca viseso. Tattha thinanatā thinaṃ, middhanatā middhaṃ, anussāhanasaṃsīdanatā,
analyzed: niyata tā ca visesaḥ tattha thina natā thinam middha natā middham anussāhana saṃsīdana tā

original: sattivighāto cāti attho. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ, saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: satti vighāto ca ati attho tattha thinam anussāha lakkhaṇam vīriya vinodana rasam saṃsīdana paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Middhaṃ akammaññatālakkhaṇaṃ, onahanarasaṃ, līnatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: middham akammañña tā lakkhaṇam onahana rasam līna tā paccupaṭṭhānam pacalāyikā niddā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: vā, ubhayampi aratitandivijambhikādīsu ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: vā ubhayam pi arati tandi vijambhikā ādīsu a yoni soma nasikāra padaṭṭhānam dutiyam

original: Tatiye sabbopi vinicchayo paṭhamākusale vuttanayova. Kevalaṃ diṭṭhiyā abhāvo, yevāpanakesu
analyzed: tatiye sabbaḥ api vinicchayo paṭhama akusale vutta nayaḥ uva kevalam diṭṭhiyāḥ abhāvaḥ yevāpanakesu

original: mānassa sambhavo, aniyatatā ca, saṅgahavāre tivaṅgikamaggatā ca viseso, sesaṃ tādisameva.
analyzed: mānassa sambhavaḥ aniyata tā ca saṅgaha vāre tivaṅgika magga tā ca viseso sesam tādisam eva

original: Tattha maññatīti māno. So uṇṇatilakkhaṇo, sampaggaharaso, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: tattha maññati iti māno saḥ uṇṇa ti lakkhaṇo sampaggaha raso ketu kamya tā paccupaṭṭhāno

original: diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno, ummādo viya daṭṭhabbo. Tatiyaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhi vippayutta lobha padaṭṭhānaḥ ummādaḥ viya daṭṭhabbaḥ tatiyam

original: Yathā ca tatiye, evaṃ catutthepi. Thinamiddhañcettha sasaṅkhāratā ca adhikā, sesaṃ tādisameva. Catutthaṃ.
analyzed: yathā ca tatiye evam catutthe pi thinam iddham ca itthā sa saṅkhāra tā ca adhikā sesam tādisam eva catuttham

original: Pañcamachaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamesu somanassaṭṭhāne upekkhāsambhavo, pītiyā ca abhāvo,
analyzed: pañcama chaṭṭha sattama ṭṭhamesu somanassa ṭṭhāne upekkhā sambhavo pītiyā ca abhāvo

original: tato eva saṅgahavāre caturaṅgajjhānatā ca viseso, sesaṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthacittasadisameva.
analyzed: tatas eva saṅgaha vāre catur aṅga jjhāna tā ca visesaḥ sesam sabbam paṭhama dutiya tatiya catuttha citta sadisam eva

original: Lobhamūlā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: lobha mūlā niṭṭhitā

original: Dosamūlavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dosa mūla vaṇṇanā

original: Dosamūlā pana dvidhā domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, tathā sasaṅkhāraṃ.
analyzed: dosa mūlā pana dvidhā domanassa sahagatam paṭigha sampayuttam asaṅkhāram tathā sa saṅkhāram

original: Evaṃ sampayogato. Dhammuddesādito pana paṭhame tāva paṭhamākusale vuttesu pītilobhadiṭṭhiyo
analyzed: evam sampayogataḥ dhamma uddesa ādito pana paṭhame tāva paṭhama akusale vuttesu pīti lobha diṭṭhiyo

original: vajjetvā dosaṃ, yevāpanakesu aniyatāni issāmacchariyakukkuccāni, somanassaṭṭhāne
analyzed: vajjetvā dosam yevāpanakesu aniyatāni issā macchariya kukkuccāni somanassa ṭṭhāne

original: domanassañca pakkhipitvā ekavīsati dhammā honti. Yevāpanakā cettha satta. Tattha
analyzed: domanassañca pakkhipitvā ekavīsati dhammāḥ honti yevāpanakā ca ittha satta tattha

original: dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti doso. So caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo
analyzed: dussanti tena sayam vā dussati dussana mattam eva vā doso so caṇḍikka lakkhaṇo

original: pahaṭāsīviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya, attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi
analyzed: pahaṭa asīvisaḥ viya visappana rasaḥ visa nipātaḥ viya attanaḥ nissaya dahana rasaḥ vā

original: viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto, āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno, visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ
analyzed: viya dussana paccupaṭṭhānaḥ laddha ukāsaḥ viya sa pattaḥ āghāta vatthu padaṭṭhānaḥ visa saṃsaṭṭha pūti muttam

original: viya daṭṭhabbo. Issāyanā issā. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā,
analyzed: viya daṭṭhabbaḥ issāyanā issā sā para sampattīnam usūyana lakkhaṇā tattha iva an abhirati rasā

original: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā, saññojananti daṭṭhabbā. Maccherabhāvo
analyzed: tatas vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā para sampatti padaṭṭhānā saññojana nti daṭṭhabbā macchera bhāvaḥ

original: macchariyaṃ. Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: macchariyam tam laddhānam vā labhitabbānam vā attanaḥ sampattīnam nigūhana lakkhaṇam

original: tāsaññeva parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaakkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, kaṭukañcukatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tāsam eva parehi sādhāraṇa bhāva akkhamana rasam saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānam kaṭu kañcuka tā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ, cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ,
analyzed: vā atta sampatti padaṭṭhānam cetasaḥ virūpa bhāvaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam kucchitam katam ku katam

original: tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ kukkuccam tam pacchā anutāpa lakkhaṇam kata akata anusocana rasam vippaṭisāra paccupaṭṭhānam

original: katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ, dāsabyamiva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṅgahavāre dukkhena saddhiṃ caturaṅgajjhānatā,
analyzed: kata akata padaṭṭhānam dāsabyam iva daṭṭhabbam saṅgaha vāre dukkhena saddhim catur aṅga jjhāna tā

original: domanassena pañcindriyatā, tivaṅgikamaggatā, dosamohavasena dvihetukatā ca veditabbā.
analyzed: domanassena pañca indriya tā tivaṅgika magga tā dosa moha vasena dvi hetuka tā ca veditabbā

original: Seso pana sabbo vinicchayo paṭhamākusale vuttasadiso eva. Yathā ca paṭhame, evaṃ
analyzed: seso pana sabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ paṭhamā kusale vutta sadisaḥ eva yathā ca paṭhame evam

original: dutiyepi, sasaṅkhāratā pana thinamiddhehi saddhiṃ navayevāpanakatā ca viseso, sesaṃ tādisameva.
analyzed: dutiye pi sa saṅkhāra tā pana thina middhehi saddhim ca visesaḥ sesam tādisam eva

original: Dosamūlā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dosa mūlā niṭṭhitā

original: Mohamūlavaṇṇanā
analyzed: moha mūla vaṇṇanā

original: Mohamūlāpi dvidhā upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ, tathā uddhaccasampayuttanti.
analyzed: moha mūlā api dvidhā upekkhā sahagatam vicikicchā sampayuttam tathā uddhacca sampayuttan ti

original: Tattha paṭhame dhammuddesato tāva phassapañcakaṃ vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ ekaggatā
analyzed: tattha paṭhame dhamma uddesato tāva phassa pañcakam vitakkaḥ vicāraḥ vīriyam ekagga tā

original: jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ moho vicikicchāti sarūpenāgatā cuddasa, uddhaccaṃ manasikāroti
analyzed: jīvitam ahirikam anottappam mohaḥ vicikicchā ati sarūpena āgatā uddhaccam manasikāroti

original: yevāpanakā dve cāti soḷasa dhammā honti, ekaggatā cettha cittaṭṭhitimattā, indriyamaggabalabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yevāpanakā dve ca ati soḷasa dhammāḥ honti ekagga tā ca ittha citta ṭṭhitimat tā indriya magga bala bhāvam

original: na sampāpuṇāti. Tato eva saṅgahavāre samādhiṃ vajjetvā upekkhāya saddhiṃ cattāri
analyzed: na sampāpuṇāti tatas eva saṅgaha vāre samādhim vajjetvā upekkhāya saddhim cattāri

original: indriyāni, dve maggaṅgāni, tīṇi balāni honti. Moho panettha ekova hetu. Seso panettha
analyzed: indriyāni dve maggaṅgāni tīṇi balāni honti mohaḥ pana ittha ekaḥ iva hetu sesaḥ pana ittha

original: sabbo vinicchayo vuttanayo eva.
analyzed: sabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ vutta nayaḥ eva

original: Tattha vigatā cikicchā etissāti vicikicchā. Sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, kampanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: tattha vigatā cikicchā etissa ati vicikicchā sā saṃsaya lakkhaṇā kampana rasā anicchaya paccupaṭṭhānā

original: anekaṃsabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānā, paṭipattiantarāyakarāti
analyzed: aneka sabhāva paccupaṭṭhānā vā a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānā paṭipatti antarāya karāti

original: daṭṭhabbā. Yathā ca vicikicchāsampayutte, evaṃ uddhaccasampayuttepi. Kevalaṃ vicikicchāya
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā yathā ca vicikicchā sampayutte evam uddhacca sampayutte api kevalam vicikicchāya

original: abhāvo, adhimokkhassa ca bhāvo, tato eva balavatarasamādhitā, teneva saṅgahavāre
analyzed: abhāvaḥ adhimokkhassa ca bhāvaḥ tatas eva balavatara samādhi tā tena iva saṅgaha vāre

original: samādhinā saddhiṃ pañcindriyatā, tivaṅgikamaggatā, catubbalatā ca hoti. Uddhaccañcettha
analyzed: samādhinā saddhim pañca indriya tā tivaṅgika magga tā catur bala tā ca hoti uddhaccañca ittha

original: sarūpeneva niddiṭṭhaṃ, adhimokkhamanasikārā dve yevāpanakavasenāti ayaṃ viseso, sesaṃ
analyzed: sarūpena iva niddiṭṭham adhimokkha manasikārāḥ dve yeva āpanaka vasena ati ayam visesaḥ sesam

original: tādisameva. Imāni pana dve cittāni nānāvisaye, ekavisaye ca asaṇṭhahanato pavaṭṭanakāni.
analyzed: tādisam eva imāni pana dve cittāni nānā visaye eka visaye ca a saṇṭhahanataḥ pavaṭṭanakāni

original: Uddhaccasahagataṃ hi laddhādhimokkhatāya laddhapatiṭṭhaṃ ekārammaṇeyeva patiṭṭhāya
analyzed: uddhacca sahagatam hi laddha adhimokkha tāya laddha patiṭṭham eka ārammaṇe iva iva patiṭṭhāya

original: patiṭṭhāya pavaṭṭati caturassamaṇi viya, itaraṃ nānārammaṇesu vaṭṭamaṇi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāya pavaṭṭati caturassa maṇi viya itaram nānā ārammaṇesu vaṭṭa maṇi viya ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Uddhaccasahagatañca ṭhapetvā sesā ekādasa paṭisandhiṃ janentīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: uddhacca sahagatam ca ṭhapetvā sesāḥ ekādasa paṭisandhim janenti iti veditabbam

original: Visayādippabhedato panete dvādasapi vatthārammaṇavasena tāva chabbidhā honti. Tesu
analyzed: visaya ādi ppabhedato pana ete dvādasa api vattha ārammaṇa vasena tāva chabbidhāḥ honti tesu

original: lobhamohamūlā pana dasa pañcadvāre hadayavatthuṃ nissāyeva, manodvāre nissāya vā
analyzed: lobha moha mūlā pana dasa pañca dvāre hadaya vatthum nissāya iva manaḥ dvāre nissāya vā

original: anissāya vā javanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā chabbidhā. Tathā dosamūlā nissāyeva pana pavattanti.
analyzed: a nissāya vā javana kiccam sādhayamānā chabbidhā tathā dosa mūlāḥ nissāya iva pana pavattanti

original: Lobhamūlā pana adinnādānakāmamicchācāramusāvādapesuññasamphappalāpābhijjhāsaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: lobha mūlā pana adinnādāna kāma micchācāra musāvāda pesuñña samphappalāpa abhijjhā saṅkhātānam

original: channaṃ kammapathānaṃ vasena chabbidhā. Diṭṭhisampayuttā panettha micchādiṭṭhivasenāpīti
analyzed: channam kamma pathānam vasena chabbidhā diṭṭhi sampayuttā pana ittha micchādiṭṭhi vasena api iti

original: sattavidhā honti. Dosamūlā pana pāṇābhipātādinnādānamusāvādapesuññapharusasamphappalāpabyāpādavasena
analyzed: sattavidhāḥ honti dosa mūlā pana

original: sattavidhā honti. Dasannampi panesaṃ dvārakammavasena ceva vīmaṃsāvajjitādhipatittayavasena
analyzed: sattavidhāḥ honti dasannam pi pana isam dvāra kamma vasena ca iva vīmaṃsā vajjita adhipati tittaya vasena

original: ca kusale vuttanayena vibhāgo veditabbo. Ekantahīnattā hīnattikabhedo natthi. Ārammaṇādhipati
analyzed: ca kusale vutta nayena vibhāgaḥ veditabbaḥ ekanta hīna ttā hīna ttika bhedaḥ natthi ārammaṇa adhipati

original: pavattanti, ime pana asekhānanti ayameva viseso. Rūpāvacarakiriyā.
analyzed: pavattanti ime pana ayam eva visesaḥ rūpāvacara kiriyā

original: Arūpāvacarakiriyāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: arūpāvacara kiriyā vaṇṇanā

original: Arūpāvacarakiriyā ca kusalā viya catubbidhā. Vinicchayo ca tattha vuttanayo eva.
analyzed: arūpāvacara kiriyā ca kusalā viya catubbidhā vinicchayo ca tattha vutta nayo eva

original: Kevalaṃ hi kusalā sekhaputhujjanānaṃ savatthukā, avatthukā vā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
analyzed: kevalam hi kusalā sekha puthujjanānam savatthukāḥ avatthukāḥ vā heṭṭhā vutta nayena

original: yathāyogaṃ paññattimahaggatārammaṇā manodvāre javanakiccaṃ sāyemānā pavattanti, ime
analyzed: yathāyogam paññatti mahaggata ārammaṇāḥ manaḥ dvāre javana kiccam sāyemānāḥ pavattanti ime

original: pana asekhānanti ayaṃ viseso. Arūpāvacarakiriyā.
analyzed: pana ayam visesaḥ arūpāvacara kiriyā

original: Kiriyābyākatā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kiriyā abyākatā niṭṭhitā

original: Pakiṇṇakakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Ettha ṭhatvā sabbe cittacetasikadhamme jātisaṅgahādito samodhānetvā pakiṇṇakakathā
analyzed: ettha ṭhatvā sabbe citta cetasika dhamme jāti saṅgaha ādito samodhānetvā pakiṇṇaka kathā

original: vattabbā. Yathāvuttāni hi cittāni kusalāni ekavīsati, akusalāni dvādasa, vipākāni
analyzed: vattabbā yathāvuttāni hi cittāni kusalāni ekavīsati akusalāni dvādasa vipākāni

original: chattiṃsa, kiriyāni vīsati cāti sabbānipi ekūnanavutividhāni, lokuttarānaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedato
analyzed: chattiṃsa kiriyāni vīsati ca ati sabbāni pi ekūna navutividhāni jhā an aṅga yoga bhedato

original: cattālīsavidhattā ekavīsasataṃ vā honti. Tesu kāmāvacarāni catupaññāsa, rūpāvacarāni
analyzed: cattālīsavidhattāḥ ekavīsasatam vā honti tesu kāmāvacarāni catupaññāsa rūpāvacarāni

original: pannarasa, arūpāvacarāni dvādasa, lokuttarāni aṭṭha, cattālīsaṃ vā. Kāmāvacaresu
analyzed: pannarasa arūpāvacarāni dvādasa lokuttarāni aṭṭha cattālīsam vā kāmāvacaresu

original: ca kusalāni aṭṭha, vipākāni tevīsati, kiriyāni ekādasa, ahetukāni aṭṭhārasa. Sesāni
analyzed: ca kusalāni aṭṭha vipākāni tevīsati kiriyāni ekādasa ahetukāni aṭṭhārasa sesāni

original: pana catubhūmakānipi sahetukāni. Tesu ca jātito cittagaṇanā pubbe vuttāva. Cetasikā
analyzed: pana catu bhūmakāni pi sa hetukāni tesu ca jātitaḥ citta gaṇanā pubbe vuttā ava cetasikā

original: pana saddhā sati hirīottappaṃ alobho adoso kāyapassaddhādayo dvādasa, tatramajjhattatā
analyzed: pana saddhā sati hirī ottappam alobho adoso kāyapassaddhā ādayaḥ dvādasa tatram ajjhatta tā

original: amoho appamaññādvayaṃ, viratittayañca moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccañca lobho
analyzed: amohaḥ appamaññā dvayam virati ttayam ca moho ahirikam anottappam uddhaccam ca lobho

original: diṭṭhi doso vicikicchā ca māno issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhañca phasso
analyzed: diṭṭhi dosaḥ vicikicchā ca mānaḥ issā macchariyam kukkuccam thinam middham ca phasso

original: vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyañca manasikāro ca vitakko vicāro pīti vīriyaṃ
analyzed: vedanā saññā cetanā ekagga tā jīvitindriyañca manasikāro ca vitakko vicāro pīti vīriyaṃ

original: chando adhimokkho cāti dvepaññāsa honti.
analyzed: chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ ca ati dvepaññāsa honti

original: Tattha tatramajjhattatā, appamaññādvayaṃ, mānādīni cha, manasikāro chando adhimokkho
analyzed: tattha tatram ajjhatta tā appamaññā dvayam māna ādīni cha manasikāro chandaḥ adhimokkho

original: cāti dvādasa dhammā yathāṭhāne yevāpanakā eva, viratittayaṃ, uddhaccañca katthaci
analyzed: ca ati dvādasa dhammāḥ yathāṭhāne eva virati ttayam uddhaccam ca katthaci

original: yevāpanakā. Tesu ca tatramajjhattatā manasikāro chando adhimokkho uddhaccaṃ viratiyoti
analyzed: yevā apanakā tesu ca tatram ajjhatta tā manasikāraḥ chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ uddhaccam

original: ime ṭhapetvā sesā aṭṭha yathāṭhāne aniyatā eva, viratiyo pana katthaci aniyatā, ime
analyzed: ime ṭhapetvā sesāḥ aṭṭha yathāṭhāne aniyatāḥ eva viratiyaḥ pana katthaci aniyatāḥ ime

original: pana ekādasa ṭhapetvā sesā ekacattālīsa dhammā niyatā eva. Tattha saddhādayo pañcavīsati
analyzed: pana ekādasa ṭhapetvā sesāḥ ekacattālīsa dhammāḥ niyatāḥ eva tattha saddhā ādayo pañcavīsati

original: dhammā kusalābyākatāyeva, mohādayo cuddasa akusalā eva, phassādayo terasa kusalākusalābyākatā
analyzed: dhammā kusala abyākatāya iva moha ādayo cuddasa akusalāḥ eva phassa ādayo terasa kusala akusala abyākatā

original: tijātikā. Ekantato hi kusalā vā abyākatā vā dhammā natthi, kusalacittasampayuttasamaye
analyzed: ti jātikāḥ ekantataḥ hi kusalāḥ vā abyākatāḥ vā dhammāḥ natthi kusala citta sampayutta samaye

original: pana kusalā, abyākatacittasampayuttasamaye abyākatā ca honti. Mohādayo pana sarūpeneva
analyzed: pana kusalāḥ abyākata citta sampayutta samaye abyākatā ca honti moha ādayaḥ pana sarūpena iva

original: akusalā, itare ca taṃsampayogena sabbepi cete atthanā sampayuttacittabhedena bhedavantova hontīti veditabbā.
analyzed: akusalāḥ itare ca tad sampayogena sabbe pi ca ite atthanā sampayutta citta bhedena bhedavantaḥ va honti iti veditabbā

original: Tesu hi saddhādayo ekūnavīsati sabbesu kusalesu ceva sahetukābyākatesu cāti ekūnasaṭṭhicittesu
analyzed: tesu hi saddhā ādayaḥ ekūnavīsati sabbesu kusalesu ca iva sa hetuka abyākatesu ca ati ekūna saṭṭhi cittesu

original: uppajjanti, tato paccekaṃ ekūnasaṭṭhippabhedā ca honti. Evamaññepi ñātabbā. Amoho
analyzed: uppajjanti tatas paccekam ekūna saṭṭhippa bhedā ca honti evam aññe pi ñātabbā amoho

original: tesu ñāṇavippayuttāni dvādasa ṭhapetvā sesesu, appamaññā pana kāmāvacaresu sahetukakiriyakusalesu
analyzed: tesu ñāṇa vippayuttāni dvādasa ṭhapetvā sesesu appamaññā pana kāmāvacaresu sa hetuka kiriya kusalesu

original: ceva pañcamajjhānavajjitarūpāvacaresu cāti aṭṭhavīsaticittesu, viratiyo pana kāmāvacarakusalesu,
analyzed: ca iva pañcama jhāna vajjita rūpāvacaresu ca ati aṭṭhavīsati cittesu viratiyo pana kāmāvacara kusalesu

original: lokuttaresu cāti soḷasasu. Evamete pañcavīsati dhammā kusalābyākatesu uppajjanato
analyzed: lokuttaresu ca ati soḷasasu evam ete pañcavīsati dhammā kusala abyākatesu uppajjanato

original: kusalābyākatā nāma jātā. Akusalesu pana mohādayo cattāro dvādasasupi akusalacittesu
analyzed: kusala abyākatāḥ nāma jātāḥ akusalesu pana moha ādayo cattāro dvādasasu pi akusala cittesu

original: uppajjanti, lobho aṭṭhasu lobhamūlesu, diṭṭhi tattha diṭṭhisampayuttesu, māno diṭṭhivippayuttesu,
analyzed: uppajjanti lobhaḥ aṭṭhasu lobha mūlesu diṭṭhi tattha diṭṭhi sampayuttesu mānaḥ diṭṭhi vippayuttesu

original: doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ paṭighasampayuttesu, thinamiddhaṃ pañcasu sasaṅkhārikesu,
analyzed: dosaḥ issā macchariyam kukkuccam paṭigha sampayuttesu thinam iddham pañcasu sa saṅkhārikesu

original: vicikicchā vicikicchāsampayutte evāti. Evamete cuddasapi sayaṃ akusalattā, akusalesveva
analyzed: vicikicchā vicikicchā sampayutte eva ati evam ete sayam akusala ttāḥ akusalesu eva

original: uppajjanato ca akusalā nāma.
analyzed: uppajjanataḥ ca akusalā nāma

original: Itaresu ca phassādayo satta dhammā sabbacittesu, na hi taṃ cittamatthi, yaṃ imesu
analyzed: itaresu ca phassa ādayo satta dhammā sabba cittesu na hi tat cittam atthi yam imesu

original: ekenāpi vinā uppajjati. Sabbatthakā hi ete. Vitakkādayo pana yathāyogikā. Tesu hi
analyzed: ekena api vinā uppajjati sabbatthakāḥ hi ete vitakka ādayaḥ pana yathāyogikā tesu hi

original: vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaresu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānikarūpāvacaralokuttaresu
analyzed: vitakko tāva dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjita kāmāvacaresu ca iva ekādasasu paṭhama jhānika rūpāvacara lokuttaresu

original: cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjati. Vicāro pana tesu ceva tathā dutiyajjhānikacittesu
analyzed: ca ati pañca paññāsa cittesu uppajjati vicāraḥ pana tesu ca iva tathā dutiya jjhānika cittesu

original: cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu. Pīti catutthajjhānikavajjitasomanassasahagatesu. Vīriyaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇamanodhātusantīraṇattikavajjitesu.
analyzed: ca ati cha saṭṭhi cittesu pi iti catuttha jjhānika vajjita somanassa sahagatesu vīriyam dvi pañca viññāṇa manaḥ dhātu santīraṇa ttika vajjitesu

original: Chando ahetukamomūhavajjitesu. Adhimokkho dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāyuttavajjitesu.
analyzed: chandaḥ ahetuka momūha vajjitesu adhimokkhaḥ dvi pañca viññāṇa vicikicchā yutta vajjitesu

original: Evamete terasa kusalākusalābyākatesu uppajjanato tijātikā nāma jātā. Sampayuttacittabhedena
analyzed: evam ete terasa kusala akusala abyākatesu uppajjanato ti jātikāḥ nāma jātā sampayutta citta bhedena

original: cesaṃ paccekaṃ gaṇanābhedopi veditabbo. Yathā hi cittaṃ salakkhaṇato ekavidhampi
analyzed: paccekam gaṇanā bhedaḥ api veditabbaḥ yathā hi cittam sa lakkhaṇato ekavidham pi

original: sampayogāvatthādibhedeneva bhinnaṃ, tathā cetasikāpi paccekanti ñātabbā, visesaṃ
analyzed: sampayoga avatthā ādi bhedena iva bhinnam tathā cetasikā api paccekam ti ñātabbā visesam

original: pana nesaṃ vakkhāma.
analyzed: pana nesam vakkhāma

original: Vatthusaṅgahe pana nesaṃ cittesu tāva kāmāvacaravipākamanodhātuhasitāni, dosasampayuttapaṭigharūpāvacarapaṭhamamaggāni
analyzed: vatthu saṅgahe pana nesam cittesu tāva kāmāvacara vipāka manaḥ dhātu hasitāni dosa sampayutta paṭigha rūpāvacara paṭhama maggāni

original: cāti tecattālīsa cittāni heṭṭhā vuttanayena yathāsakaṃ vatthūni nissāyeva uppajjanti,
analyzed: ca ati tecattālīsa cittāni heṭṭhā vutta nayena yathāsakam vatthūni nissāya iva uppajjanti

original: arūpāvacaravipākāni pana anissāyeva, sesāni dvecattālīsa nissāyapi, āruppesupi uppajjanato
analyzed: arūpāvacara vipākāni pana a nissāya iva sesāni dvecattālīsa nissāya pi āruppesu pi uppajjanato

original: anissāyapi. Arūpīnaṃ hi chapi vatthūni na santi, rūpīnaṃ pana ghānādīni tīṇi, sabbattha
analyzed: anissāya pi arūpīnam hi cha pi vatthūni na santi rūpīnam pana ghāna ādīni tīṇi sabbattha

original: ca taṃtaṃvatthurahitānaṃ sabbattha niyataviññāṇānipi, asaññīnaṃ pana sabbānipi vatthuviññāṇāni
analyzed: ca tad tad vatthu rahitānam sabbattha niyata viññāṇāni pi asaññīnam pana sabbāni api vatthu viññāṇāni

original: na santi. Tesaṃ hi jīvitanavakameva rūpaṃ paṭisandhi, pavattiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, maraṇakāle
analyzed: na santi tesam hi jīvita navakam eva rūpam paṭisandhi pavattiyam bhavaṅgam maraṇa kāle

original: cuti ca hutvā pavattati. Yathā cettha cittānaṃ, evaṃ taṃsampayuttacetasikānampi vatthuto
analyzed: cuti ca hutvā pavattati yathā ca ittha cittānam evam tad sampayutta cetasikānam pi vatthutaḥ

original: saṅgahabhedo veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tesu hi doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañca
analyzed: saṅgaha bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ tesu hi dosaḥ issā macchariyam kukkuccam ca

original: hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāmaloke eva uppajjati. Karuṇāmuditā pana rūpalokepi, na arūpe.
analyzed: hadaya vatthum nissāya kāma loke eva uppajjati karuṇā muditā pana rūpa loke pi na arūpe

original: Tattha hi rūpāvacarapubbabhāgānipi na uppajjanti, sesā pana sabbe nissāyapi anissāyapi
analyzed: tattha hi rūpāvacara pubbabhāgāni pi na uppajjanti sesā pana sabbe nissāya pi a nissāya pi

original: tīsupi bhavesu uppajjanti. Tattha hi phassādayo satta chapi vatthūni, itare pana
analyzed: tīsu pi bhavesu uppajjanti tattha hi phassa ādayo satta vatthūni itare pana

original: hadayamevāti, sesaṃ cittasamaṃ.
analyzed: hadayam eva ati sesam citta samam

original: Kiccadvārasaṅgahe pana nesaṃ cittaṃ yathā ca cuddasahi kiccehi chadvārikadvāravinimuttabhāvena,
analyzed: kicca dvāra saṅgahe pana na īsam cittam yathā ca kiccehi cha dvārika dvāra vinimutta bhāvena

original: evaṃ pavattikkamo veditabbo. Yadā hi kusalākusalabalena tīsu bhūmīsu sattā nibbattanti,
analyzed: evam pavatti kkamaḥ veditabbaḥ yadā hi kusala akusala balena tīsu bhūmīsu sattāḥ nibbattanti

original: tadā tesaṃ maraṇakāle yebhuyyena channaṃ dvārānamaññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammakammanimittagatinimittānamaññataraṃ
analyzed: tadā tesam maraṇa kāle yebhuyyena channam dvārānam aññatarasmim paccupaṭṭhitam kamma kamma nimitta gati nimittānam aññataram

original: gahetvā upekkhāsahagatavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātudvayañceva aṭṭha mahāvipākāni,
analyzed: gahetvā upekkhā sahagata vipāka ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dvayam ca iva aṭṭha mahā vipākāni

original: nava rūpārūpavipākāni ceti ekūnavīsati cittāni heṭṭhā vuttanayena yathāsakabhūmīsu
analyzed: nava rūpa arūpa vipākāni ca iti ekūnavīsati cittāni heṭṭhā vutta nayena yathā asaka bhūmīsu

original: paṭisandhi hutvā uppajjanti, tāneva bhavaṅgacutivasena dvāravinimuttāni nāma honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi hutvā uppajjanti tāni eva bhavaṅga cuti vasena dvāravinimuttāni nāma honti

original: Maraṇakāle hi sattānaṃ asaññisattavirahitānaṃ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṃ atītaṃ
analyzed: maraṇa kāle hi sattānam asaññi satta virahitānam bhavantare paṭisandhi janakam atītam

original: kammaṃ vā taṃkammakaraṇakāle visayopakaraṇādibhūtaṃ rūpādichabbidhampi atītādibhedaṃ
analyzed: kammam vā tad kamma karaṇa kāle visaya upakaraṇa ādi bhūtam rūpa ādi chabbidham pi atīta ādi bhedam

original: kālavinimuttañca kammanimittaṃ vā upapajjamānabhavānurūpaṃ kapparukkhamātukucchinirayaggijālādigatinimittaṃ
analyzed: kāla vinimuttam ca kamma nimittam vā upapajjamāna bhava anurūpam kappa rukkha mātukucchi niraya ggi jāla ādi gati nimittam

original: vā kammabalena yathārahaṃ channaṃ dvārānamaññatarasmiṃ sāyanhe pabbatacchāyā pathaviyaṃ
analyzed: vā kamma balena yathāraham channam sāyanhe pabbata chāyā pathaviyam

original: viya cittasantāne allīyamānaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ upaṭṭhite ca tasmiṃ ārammaṇe kammabalena
analyzed: viya citta santāne allīyamānam upaṭṭhāti evam upaṭṭhite ca tasmin ārammaṇe kamma balena

original: nirantaraṃ pavattamānacittasantānassa āyukkhayakammakkhayaubhayakkhayaupacchedakakammānamaññatarena
analyzed: nirantaram pavattamāna citta santānassa āyu kkhaya kamma kkhaya ubhaya kkhaya upacchedaka kammānam aññatarena

original: paccāsannamaraṇassa tassa tassa vīthicittabhavaṅgānantaraṃ cuticittaṃ hoti, tadanantaraṃ
analyzed: pacca āsanna maraṇassa tassa tassa vīthi citta bhavaṅga anantaram cuti cittam hoti tad anantaram

original: kammakammanimittādīsu yathāgahitaṃ ārabbha yathārahaṃ tīsu bhavesu yaṃ kiñci paṭisandhicittaṃ
analyzed: kamma kamma nimitta ādīsu ārabbha yathāraham tīsu bhavesu yam kiñci paṭisandhi cittam

original: bhavantare paṭhamacittaṃ hutvā uppajjati.
analyzed: bhavantare paṭhamacittam hutvā uppajjati

original: Tattha ca duhetukāhetukacutiyānantaraṃ dasa kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyova honti, na itarā,
analyzed: tattha ca du hetuka ahetuka cutiyā anantaram dasa honti na itarā

original: kāmāvacaratihetukāya cutiyā sabbāpi honti, rūpāvacarāya pana cutiyāpi ahetukapaṭisandhirahitā,
analyzed: kāmāvacara ti hetukāya cutiyā sabbā api honti rūpāvacarāya pana cutiyā api ahetuka paṭisandhi rahitā

original: arūpāvacarāya cutiyā heṭṭhimavajjitāruppapaṭisandhiyo ceva kāmāvacaratihetukapaṭisandhiyo
analyzed: arūpāvacarāya cutiyāḥ heṭṭhima vajjita āruppa paṭisandhiyaḥ ca iva kāmāvacara ti hetuka paṭisandhiyaḥ

original: ca, asaññīnaṃ pana rūpacutito bhavantare gahitapubbaṃ kammādimevārabbha ahetukarahitā
analyzed: ca asaññīnam pana rūpa cutitaḥ bhavantare gahita pubbam kamma ādim eva ārabbha ahetuka rahitā

original: kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyova honti, na itarā. Puthujjanānaṃ, pana sotāpannasakadāgāmīnañca
analyzed: kāmāvacara paṭisandhiyaḥ uva honti na itarā puthujjanānam pana sotāpanna sakadāgāmīnam ca

original: cutiyā suddhāvāsesu paṭisandhi na hoti, sekhānaṃ dvihetukāhetukāsaññipaṭisandhiyo,
analyzed: cutiyā suddhāvāsesu paṭisandhi na hoti sekhānam dvi hetuka ahetuka asaññi paṭisandhiyaḥ

original: asekhānaṃ pana sabbāpi paṭisandhiyo na honti. Te hi cutito nirupadhisesanibbānena
analyzed: asekhānam pana sabbā api paṭisandhiyaḥ na honti te hi cutitaḥ nirupadhi sesa nibbānena

original: anupādāparinibbānappattā nāma honti. Evaṃ gahitapaṭisandhinirodhato paraṃ tadeva
analyzed: anupādā parinibbāna pattāḥ nāma honti evam gahita paṭisandhi nirodhataḥ param tat eva

original: cittaṃ tasmiññevārammaṇe bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā cutipariyosānaṃ asati vīthicittuppāde supinampi
analyzed: cittam tasmin ñeva ārammaṇe bhavaṅgam hutvā cuti pariyosānam asati vīthi cittuppāde

original: adisvā niddokkamanakālādīsu aparimāṇasaṅkhampi nadīsotaṃ viya nirantaraṃ pavattati.
analyzed: a disvā niddokkamana kāla ādīsu nadī sotam viya nirantaram pavattati

original: Evaṃ ekūnavīsativiññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattikkamo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ekūnavīsati viññāṇānam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavatti kkamaḥ veditabbo

original: Evaṃ pana vattamāne bhavaṅgasantāne yadā indriyaparipākamāgamma sabhāgapaccayantarasahitaṃ
analyzed: evam pana vattamāne bhavaṅga santāne yadā indriya paripākam āgamma sa bhāga paccaya antara sahitam

original: atimahantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre ghaṭṭeti, tadā ghaṭṭanānubhāvena dvikkhattuṃ
analyzed: ati mahantam rūpa ārammaṇam cakkhu dvāre ghaṭṭeti tadā ghaṭṭana anubhāvena dvi khattum

original: tattha bhavaṅgacalanaṃ hoti, tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vocchinditvā tasmiṃ rūpārammaṇe

original: kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tathā tadanantaraṃ

original: cakkhuviññāṇadvaye yathārahamekaṃ dassanakiccaṃ, tadanantaraṃ vipākamanodhātudvayā
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa dvaye yathāraham ekam dassana kiccam tad anantaram vipāka manaḥ dhātu dvayā

original: aññataraṃ sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ, tadanantaraṃ vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuttayā aññataraṃ

original: santīraṇakiccaṃ, tadanantaraṃ upekkhāsahagatakiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ,
analyzed: santīraṇa kiccam tad anantaram upekkhā sahagata kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu voṭṭhabbana kiccam

original: tadanantaraṃ ekūnatiṃsakāmāvacarajavanesu yaṃ kiñci yathārahaṃ sattakkhattuṃ, chakkhattuṃ,
analyzed: tad anantaram ekūnatiṃsa kāmāvacara javanesu yam kiñci yathāraham satta kkhattum cha khattum

original: maraṇakālādīsu pañcakkhattumeva vā javanakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ, tadanantaraṃ ekādasasu

analyzed: sādhayamānam uppajjitvā nirujjhati tad anantaram bhavaṅga santati eva pavattati evam

original: cakkhudvāre sattakiccāni chacattālīsa cittāni sambhavanti.
analyzed: cakkhu dvāre satta kiccāni cha cattālīsa cittāni sambhavanti

original: Yadā pana vuttanayena saddārammaṇādīni sotadvārādīsu ghaṭṭenti, tadāpi cakkhudvāre

analyzed: paccekam ca cha cattālīsā iva bhavanti kevalam ha ittha āvajjana anantaram cakkhu viññāṇa ṭhāne

original: pañcadvāre atimahante pañcārammaṇe catupaññāsa kāmāvacaracittāneva sambhavanti. Keci

original: panettha “sasaṅkhārikajavanāni pañcadvāre na uppajjanti pubbappayogāsambhavā, manodvāreyevetāni
analyzed: pana ittha sa saṅkhārika javanāni pañca dvāre na uppajjanti pubbappayoga asambhavā manaḥ dvāre iva etāni

original: uppajjantī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: uppajjanti iti vadanti

original: Mahante pana tadārammaṇavajjitāni. Visayassa javanasamakālameva atītattā javanāvasāne
analyzed: mahante pana tad ārammaṇa vajjitāni visayassa javana sama kālam eva atīta ttā javana avasāne

original: bhavaṅgaṃ hoti. Paritte pana javanampi natthi. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ hettha javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā
analyzed: bhavaṅgam hoti paritte pana javanam pi natthi voṭṭhabbanam ha ittha javana ṭhāne ṭhatvā

original: dvattikkhattuṃ pavattitvā nirujjhati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana vāro “diṭṭhaṃ

original: viya me, sutaṃ viya me”tiādikathanakāle labbhati. Atiparitte pana voṭṭhabbanappādā
analyzed: viya me sutam viya mā iti ādi kathana kāle labbhati ati paritte pana voṭṭhabbana ppādā

original: asaṇṭhahanato bhavaṅgacalanamattameva, na āvajjanādīni. Āvajjanena hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite

original: ṭhānaṃ vijjati, nāpi appavattamāne visaye pañcadvārikavīthicittāni pavattantīti.
analyzed: ṭhānam vijjati na api appavattamāne visaye pañcadvārika vīthi cittāni pavattanti iti

original: Ayaṃ pañcadvāre visayappavattibhedena cittappavattiniyamo.

analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana chasu ārammaṇesu āpātha gatesu vutta nayena bhavaṅga calana manodvāra āvajjana anantaram

original: – samathavipassanākammaṭṭhānikānaṃ hi yathāsakavisaye uppāditapubbabhāgabhāvanānaṃ
analyzed: samatha vipassanā kammaṭṭhānikānam hi yathā saka visaye uppādita pubbabhāga bhāvanānam

original: “idāni appanā uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgacalanāvajjanāvasāne ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarajavanesu

original: aññatarasmiṃ yathārahaṃ parikammopacārānulomagotrabhunāmena catukkhattuṃ, tikkhattumeva

original: ekasantāne ekavārameva javanti, tadanantaraṃ yathāsakaṃ phalacittañca dvattivāraṃ,

original: phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ phalameva anantavārampi javati, nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ pana anupubbanirodhavasena

original: anantaraṃ kusalañceva ādito phalattayañca appeti, kiriyāgotrabhuto kiriyaṃ, arahattaphalañca.
analyzed: anantaram kusalam ca iva āditas kiriyam arahatta phalam ca

original: Tatthāpi somanassasahagatato somanassasahagatameva, upekkhāsahagatato ca upekkhāsahagatameva
analyzed: tattha api somanassa sahagatato somanassa sahagatam eva upekkhā sahagatato ca upekkhā sahagatam eva

original: appeti. Asekhānameva cettha arahattaphalakiriyājavanāni, yathāsakaṃ sekhānameva sesalokuttarāni,
analyzed: appeti a sekhānam eva ca ittha arahatta phala kiriyā javanāni yathāsakam sekhānam eva sesa lokuttarāni

original: sekhaputhujjanānameva kusalākusalāni, tihetukānameva appanā honti, ayaṃ javananiyamo.
analyzed: sekha puthujjanānam eva kusala akusalāni ti hetukānam eva appanāḥ honti ayam javana niyamaḥ

original: Appanājavanato paraṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ natthi. Javanārammaṇesu hi kāmāvacarabhūtesveva

original: kāmāvacarapaṭisandhikānameva atimahante, vibhūte ca visaye tadārammaṇamuppajjati.
analyzed: kāmāvacara paṭisandhikānam eva ati mahante vibhūte ca visaye tad ārammaṇam uppajjati

original: Atiiṭṭhe panārammaṇe santīraṇakiriyājavanatadārammaṇāni somanassasahagatāni, iṭṭhamajjhatte,

na uppajjanti, tadā aññaṃ paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha anāvajjanampi nirodhato

analyzed: bhavaṅgam hoti iti ayam tad ārammaṇa niyamo

analyzed: sādhayamānam pavattati tasmin niruddhe satto cutaḥ nāma hoti tatas api cutitaḥ punar

original: paṭisandhibhavaṅgavīthicutiyoti evaṃ punappunaṃ cittasantānaṃ yantayuttagoṇo viya
analyzed: evam punappunam citta santānam viya

original: bhavādīsu yāvānupādāya āsavehi na vimuccati, tāvāvicchinnaṃ pavattati eva. Evaṃ pavattamāne

original: Pañcavidho hi niyāmo – bījaniyāmo utuniyāmo kammaniyāmo dhammaniyāmo cittaniyāmoti,
analyzed: pañcavidhaḥ hi niyāmaḥ bīja niyāmaḥ utu niyāmo kamma niyāmaḥ dhamma niyāmo citta niyāmo ti

original: tattha aṅkurapaṇṇadaṇḍapupphaphalādikkamena tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ aññoññavisadisarukkhatiṇagacchalatādisantāne

original: attanā sadisaphaladānaṃ bījaniyāmo nāma. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ

analyzed: eka ppahārena puppha phala pallavānam gahaṇam utuniyāmaḥ nāma tassa tassa vā kusala akusala kammassa

original: Bodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe, mātukucchito abhinikkhamane, abhisambodhidhammacakkappavattanādīsu

original: sesāni pana dviticatupañcakiccaṭṭhānāni, tāni ca pubbe vuttāni, suviññeyyāni ca.

original: Evaṃ ekadvārikādīni ca. Yathā ca cittānaṃ, evaṃ taṃsampayuttacetasikānampi kiccadvāravasena
analyzed: evam ekadvārika ādīni ca yathā ca evam kicca dvāra vasena

original: saṅgaho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – kiccato hi sabbatthakā tāva satta cittaṃ viya
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ kiccataḥ hi sabbatthakā tāva satta cittam viya

original: cuddasa kiccāni karonti. Vitakkavicārādhimokkhā pana tayo dassanādipañcakiccāni vajjetvā

original: nava, vīriyaṃ tato sampaṭicchanasantīraṇāni vajjetvā satta, pīti voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānipi

analyzed: vajjetvā santi īraṇena saddhim cha virati appamaññā vajjitā pana vīsati kusalā abyākatā

original: ceva chando ca santīraṇampi vajjetvā pañca, tato appamaññā tadārammaṇampi vajjetvā

original: cattāri, viratiyo pana kusalā javanakiccameva karonti. Dvārato ca viratiyo manodvārikā
analyzed: cattāri viratiyaḥ pana kusalāḥ javana kiccam eva karonti dvārato ca viratiyaḥ manodvārikā

original: eva, tathā karuṇāmuditā, dvāravinimuttā ca pana honti. Manodvāre eva hi duccaritaviramaṇaṃ
