analyzed: satta paññatti ggahaṇam ca hoti akusalā pana cha dvārikā tattha api

original: manodvārikānevāti keci. Avasesā chadvārikā ceva dvāravinimuttā ca. Sesaṃ cittasadisameva.
analyzed: manaḥ dvārikā na eva ati avasesā cha dvārikā ca iva dvāra vinimuttā ca sesam citta sadisam eva

original: Ārammaṇasaṅgaho pana nesaṃ parittārammaṇattike āvi bhavissatīti. Ayaṃ pakiṇṇakakathā.

original: Cittuppādakaṇḍavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: cittuppāda kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Abyākatapadaṃ pana neva tāva niṭṭhitaṃ. Abyākatesu hi vipākābyākataṃ, kiriyābyākatañca
analyzed: abyākata padam pana na iva tāva niṭṭhitam abyākatesu hi vipāka abyākatam kiriyā abyākatam ca

original: vibhattaṃ, rūpābyākataṃ, pana nibbānābyākatañca avasiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha rūpābyākataṃ tāva

original: viññāṇuppattihetubhūtaṃ upagantabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ tattheva ṭhitānaññeva viññāṇuppādanasāmatthiyopagamanaṃ.

original: Kuṭṭaleṇādiantaritānañca rūpasaddānaṃ sahakāripaccayavirahato anāpāthagamanaṃ. Itarathā
analyzed: kuṭṭa leṇa ādi antaritānam ca rūpa saddānam sahakāri paccaya virahataḥ anāpātha gamanam itarathā

original: tesampi tādisesu indriyasaññogaṃ na dhāvitabbaṃ. Gamananivāraṇampi uppattinivāraṇameva,
analyzed: tesam pi tādisesu indriya saññogam na dhāvitabbam gamana nivāraṇam pi uppatti nivāraṇam eva

original: tatheva sahakāripaccayavirahato yādiseva tesaṃ indriyasaññogo hoti, tādise viññāṇuppatti hotīti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tathā iva sahakāri paccaya virahato yādisā iva tesam indriya saññogaḥ hoti tādise viññāṇa uppatti hoti iti gahetabbam

original: Cakkhu tāva dūre ṭhitānaṃ candādīnampi gahaṇato asampattaggāhakaṃ hotu, sotaṃ pana
analyzed: cakkhu tāva dūre ṭhitānam canda ādīnam pi gahaṇataḥ a sampatta gāhakam hotu sotam pana

original: dūre rukkhaṃ chindantānaṃ, vatthaṃ dhovantānañca dūratova paññāyamānakāyavikārādinā
analyzed: dūre rukkham chindantānam vattham dhovantānam ca dūratas va paññāyamāna kāya vikāra ādinā

original: saddhiṃ saddaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthatāya kathaṃ saṇikaṃ vavatthāpayamānaṃ taṃ asampattaggāhakaṃ
analyzed: saddhim saddam gahetum a samattha tāya katham saṇikam vavatthāpayamānam tam a sampatta ggāhakam

original: hotīti? Tatthāpi ca kuṭhārivatthādīnaṃ paṭhamanipātasaddānaṃ mandatāya yathā hatthachijjamānasākhāpalāsacalanādisamuṭṭhitamandasaddānaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti tattha api ca kuṭhāri vattha ādīnam paṭhama nipāta saddānam manda tāya yathā hattha chijjamāna sākhā palāsa calana ādi samuṭṭhita manda saddānam

original: paramparāyāgamanaṃ natthi, tathā anāpāthagamanampi, pacchā pana ghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa
analyzed: paramparāyā gamanam natthi tathā anāpātha gamanam pi pacchā pana ghaṭṭana anighaṃsassa

original: balavatāya uppannamahāsaddānaṃ āgamanaṃ viya tattheva ṭhitānaññeva āpāthagamanaṃ
analyzed: balavatāya uppanna mahā saddānam āgamanam viya tattha iva ṭhita anaññā iva āpātha gamanam

original: hoti, itarathā dūrāsannādivavatthānāni na siyuṃ gandhādīnaṃ viya, tasmā asampattagocarānevetāni,
analyzed: itarathā dūra āsanna ādi vavatthānāni na siyum tasmai

original: ghānādīni ca sampattagocarānīti veditabbāni.
analyzed: ghāna ādīni ca sampatta gocarāni iti veditabbāni

original: Ahisuṃsumārapakkhikukkurasiṅgālasadisāni cetāni. Yathā hi ahi nāma bahisittasammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne
analyzed: ahi suṃsumāra pakkhi kukkura siṅgāla sadisāni cetāni yathā hi ahi nāma bahi sitta sammaṭṭha ṭṭhāne

original: nābhiramati, taṃ vihāya tiṇapaṇṇagahanavammikādivisamajjhāsayova hoti, evaṃ cakkhupi
analyzed: na abhiramati tam vihāya hoti evam cakkhu pi

original: sammaṭṭhabhittiādiṃ vihāya itthipurisapupphalatācittādivisamajjhāsayaṃ hoti. Yathā
analyzed: sammaṭṭha bhitti ādim vihāya hoti yathā

original: ca suṃsumāropi bahi caraṇaṃ vihāya udake bilajjhāsayo hoti, evaṃ sotampi vātapānacchiddādibilajjhāsayaṃ
analyzed: ca bahi caraṇam vihāya udake bilajjhāsayaḥ hoti evam vāta pāna chidda ādi bilajjhāsayam

original: hoti. Yathā hi gijjhādipakkhīpi bhūmirukkhādiṃ vihāya ākāse pakkhandanajjhāsayo hoti,
analyzed: hoti yathā hi bhūmi rukkha ādim vihāya ākāse pakkhandana jjhāsayaḥ hoti

original: evaṃ ghānampi uddhaggaṃ hutvā gandhapavesakavātākaḍḍhanatthaṃ ākāsajjhāsayaṃ hoti.
analyzed: evam ghānam pi uddhaggam hutvā gandha pavesaka vāta ākaḍḍhana attham ākāsajjhāsayam hoti

original: Yathā kukkuro bahigāmacāraṃ vihāya āmisagavesī gāmajjhāsayo mahānasādininnacitto
analyzed: yathā kukkuraḥ bahigāma cāram vihāya āmisa gavesī gām ajjhāsayaḥ mahānasa ādi ninna cittaḥ

original: hoti, evaṃ jivhāpi āpajjhāsayā hoti. Yathā ca siṅgālo bahisusānacāraṃ vihāya maṃsagavesī
analyzed: hoti evam jivhā api hoti yathā ca siṅgālaḥ bahi susāna cāram vihāya maṃsa gavesī

original: susānajjhāsayo hoti, evaṃ kāyopi anupādinnaṃ sukhasamphassasayanādiṃ labhitvāpi upādinnajjhāsayo
analyzed: hoti evam kāyaḥ api anupādinnam sukha samphassa sayana ādim labhitvā api

original: hoti. Aññaṃ hi upādinnakaṃ alabhamānā sattā attano jaṇṇukāni urantaraṃ pavesetvā
analyzed: hoti aññam hi upādinnakam a labhamānā sattā attanaḥ jaṇṇukāni urantaram pavesetvā

original: hatthatale sīsaṃ katvāpi nipajjanti. Ālokavivaravāyujalapathavipaccayāni cetāni viññāṇuppādakāni.
analyzed: hattha tale sīsam katvā api nipajjanti āloka vivara vāyu jala patha vi paccayāni cetāni viññāṇa uppādakāni

original: Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ pasādānaṃ lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadesanissayagocarajjhāsayappaccayabhedena
analyzed: evam etesam pañcannam pasādānam lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padesa nissaya gocara ajjhāsaya ppaccaya bhedena

original: vavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vavatthānam veditabbam

original: Cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvarasaṃ, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: cakkhu paṭihanana lakkhaṇam rūpam cakkhu viññāṇassa visaya bhāva rasam tassa iva gocara bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: catumahābhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ, yathā cetassa, evaṃ sabbesampi upādārūpānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: catu mahābhūta padaṭṭhānam yathā cetassa evam sabbesam pi upādā rūpānam padaṭṭhānam

original: veditabbaṃ, visesaṃ pana vakkhāma. Tayidaṃ rūpaṃ nīlapītalohitodātakāḷamañjiṭṭhasāmachāyātapaālokandhakārādivasena
analyzed: veditabbam visesam pana vakkhāma tayā idam rūpam nīla pīta lohita udāta kāḷa mañjiṭṭha sāma chāyā ātapa āloka andhakāra ādi vasena

original: anekavidhaṃ. Keci pana “andhakāro nāma ālokābhāvamatto eva, tato eva tattha gatarūpāni
analyzed: anekavidham andhakāraḥ nāma eva eva gata rūpāni

original: na dissantī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Yathā hi nīlameghamaṇiādīnaṃ chāyā ālokavisadisā
analyzed: na dissanti iti vadanti tam na yuttam yathā hi nīla megha maṇi ādīnam chāyā āloka visadisā

original: vaṇṇāyatanabhūtā hoti, evaṃ bhitticchadanabhūmipabbatādicchāyā ca ghanībhūtā ghaṭarūpādicchādanato
analyzed: vaṇṇa āyatana bhūtā hoti evam bhitti chadana bhūmi pabbata ādi chāyā ca ghanībhūtā ghaṭa rūpa ādi chādanataḥ

original: ālokavisadiso andhakāroti daṭṭhabbo, sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo saddo, sotaviññāṇassa
analyzed: āloka visadisaḥ andhakāraḥ ti daṭṭhabbo sota paṭihanana lakkhaṇo saddo sota viññāṇassa

original: visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. So gītabherisaddādivasena anekavidho.
analyzed: visaya bhāva rasaḥ tassa iva gocara bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno so gīta bheri sadda ādi vasena anekavidho

original: Ghānapaṭihananalakkhaṇo gandho, ghānaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: ghāna paṭihanana lakkhaṇaḥ gandhaḥ ghāna viññāṇassa visaya bhāva raso tassa iva gocara bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno

original: So mūlagandhasāragandhādivasena anekavidho. Jivhāpaṭihananalakkhaṇo raso, jivhāviññāṇassa
analyzed: saḥ mūla gandha sāra gandha ādi vasena anekavidhaḥ jivhā paṭihanana lakkhaṇaḥ rasaḥ jivhā viññāṇassa

original: visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. So mūlarasatacarasādīnaṃ vasena anekavidho.
analyzed: visaya bhāva raso tassa iva gocara bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno so mūla rasa taca rasa ādīnam vasena anekavidhaḥ

original: Itthibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ itthindriyaṃ, itthīti pakāsanarasaṃ, itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ
analyzed: itthi bhāva lakkhaṇam itthi indriyam itthī iti pakāsana rasam itthi liṅga nimitta kuttā kappānam

original: kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Purisabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ purisindriyaṃ, purisoti pakāsanarasaṃ,
analyzed: kāraṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam purisa bhāva lakkhaṇam purisa indriyam purisaḥ ti pakāsana rasam

original: purisaliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Ubhinnampesaṃ itthipurisaliṅgādīnaṃ
analyzed: purisa liṅga nimitta kuttā kappānam kāraṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam ubhinnam pesam itthi purisa liṅga ādīnam

original: kāraṇabhāvo na sarasato atthi kenaci paccayena nesaṃ paccayabhāvassa paṭṭhāne anāgatattā,
analyzed: kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na sarasataḥ atthi kenacid paccayena na īsam paccaya bhāvassa paṭṭhāne anāgata ttā

original: attano pana janakapaccayabhūtaāgamanatova. Itthipurisānaṃ paṭiniyataliṅganimittakuttākappabhāvānuguṇarūpānampi
analyzed: attanaḥ pana janaka paccaya bhūta āgamanataḥ va itthi purisānam paṭiniyata liṅga nimitta kuttā kappa bhāva anuguṇa rūpānam pi

original: niyamena uppajjanato, liṅganimittādivohārānañca tappadhānato paccayabhāvo, indriyabhāvo
analyzed: niyamena uppajjanataḥ tad padhānato paccaya bhāvaḥ indriya bhāvo

original: ca pariyāyato vutto. Teneva hi itthiubhatobyañjanakassa purisindriyābhāvepi purisaliṅganimittādibyañjanaṃ,
analyzed: ca pariyāyataḥ vuttaḥ tena iva hi itthi ubhatas byañjanakassa purisa indriya abhāve pi purisa liṅga nimitta ādi byañjanam

original: purisaubhatobyañjanakassa itthindriyābhāvepi itthiliṅganimittādibyañjanañca purimakammato
analyzed: itthi indriya abhāve pi itthi liṅga nimitta ādi byañjanam ca purima kammataḥ

original: eva uppajjati. Yadi hi nesaṃ taṃtaṃindriyeneva paṭiniyatabyañjanāni uppajjeyyuṃ,
analyzed: eva uppajjati yadi hi na esam taṃtaṃ indriyena iva paṭiniyata byañjanāni uppajjeyyum

original: dutiyabyañjanassa abhāvo āpajjati. Na hi tesaṃ bhāvadvayaṃ atthi. Yadi siyā, sabbadāpi
analyzed: dutiya byañjanassa abhāvaḥ āpajjati na hi tesam bhāva dvayam atthi yadi siyā sabbadā api

original: byañjanadvayassa bhāvappasaṅgo siyā. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi itthindriyameva
analyzed: byañjana dvayassa bhāva ppasaṅgaḥ siyā itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa hi itthi indriyam eva

original: vijjati, na itaraṃ. Tassa pana yadā itthiyaṃ rāgacittaṃ uppajjati, tadā purisabyañjanaṃ
analyzed: vijjati na itaram tassa pana yadā itthiyam rāga cittam uppajjati tadā purisa byañjanam

original: pātubhavati, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti. Tathā itarassa itaraṃ. Yasmā panesaṃ
analyzed: pātubhavati itthi byañjanam paṭicchannam hoti tathā itarassa itaram yasmai pana īsam

original: ekameva indriyaṃ niyataṃ, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi
analyzed: ekam eva indriyam niyatam tasmai sayam pi gabbham gaṇhāti param pi

original: gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana na gaṇhāti. Yathā tesaṃ
analyzed: gaṇhāpa iti param gaṇhāpa iti sayam pana na gaṇhāti yathā

original: ubhatobyañjanakānaṃ kammasahāyaṃ rāgacittameva byañjanakāraṇaṃ, na bhāvo, evaṃ pakatitthipurisānampi
analyzed: ubhatobyañjanakānam kamma sahāyam rāga cittam eva byañjana kāraṇam na bhāvaḥ evam paka titthi purisānam pi

original: bhāvadvayajanakakammādipaccayo eva taṃtaṃliṅganimittādikāraṇanti gahetabbaṃ. Ubhayampi
analyzed: bhāva dvaya janaka kamma ādi paccayaḥ eva tad tad liṅga nimitta ādi kāraṇam ti gahetabbam ubhayam pi

original: cetaṃ paṭhamakappikānaṃ pavatte samuṭṭhāti, tato aparabhāge paṭisandhiyameva, sabbesaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama kappikānam pavatte samuṭṭhāti tatas apara bhāge paṭisandhiyam eva sabbesam

original: pana pavatte eva parivattati. Imesu ca purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ, itthiliṅgaṃ hīnaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: pana pavatte eva parivattati imesu ca purisa liṅgam uttamam itthi liṅgam hīnam tasmāt

original: purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: purisa liṅgam balava akusalena antaradhāyati itthi liṅgam dubbala kusalena patiṭṭhāti

original: Itthiliṅgaṃ pana antaradhāyantaṃ dubbalākusalena antaradhāyati, itaraṃ balavakusalena
analyzed: itthi liṅgam pana antaradhāyantam dubbala akusalena antaradhāyati itaram

original: patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ubhayampi sugatiyaṃ akusaleneva antaradhāyati, kusaleneva patiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāti evam ubhayam pi sugatiyam akusalena iva antaradhāyati kusalena iva patiṭṭhāti

original: Kāyappasādo viya ca sakalasarīrabyāpakameva, na ca kāyappasādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāse tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: kāya ppasādaḥ ca sakala sarīra byāpakam eva na ca kāya ppasāda ādīnam ṭhitokāse tiṭṭhati

original: Yadi evaṃ na sabbattha kāyabhāvindriyānīti? Nevaṃ paramatthato sabbattha, vinibbhujitvā
analyzed: yadi evam na sabbattha kāya bhāva indriyāni iti na ivam paramatthataḥ sabbattha vinibbhujitvā

original: panesaṃ okāsabhedaṃ paññāpetuṃ na sakkā rūparasādīnaṃ viya. Na hi paramatthato rūpe
analyzed: pana isam okāsa bhedam paññāpetum na sakkā rūpa rasa ādīnam viya na hi paramatthato rūpe

original: raso atthi. Yadi siyā, rūpaggahaṇeneva gahaṇaṃ gaccheyya. Evaṃ kāyabhāvindriyāni
analyzed: rasaḥ atthi yadi siyā rūpa ggahaṇena iva gahaṇam gaccheyya evam kāya bhāva indriyāni

original: paramatthato na sabbattha, na ca sabbattha natthi vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya heṭṭhā
analyzed: paramatthataḥ na sabbattha na ca sabbattha natthi vivecetum a sakkuṇeyya tāya heṭṭhā

original: vuttalakkhaṇādivavatthānatopi cesaṃ asammissatā desato na vivekābhāvepi. Na kevalañca
analyzed: vutta lakkhaṇa ādi vavatthānataḥ api ca īsam asammissa tā desataḥ na viveka abhāve pi na kevalam ca

original: imāneva, sabbānipi rūpāni asammissāneva honti. Yathā hi pañcavaṇṇena kappāsena vaṭṭiṃ
analyzed: imāni eva sabbāni api rūpāni a sammissāna iva honti yathā hi pañca vaṇṇena kappāsena vaṭṭim

original: katvā dīpe jalite kiñcāpi jālā ekābaddhā viya honti, tassa tassa pana aṃsuno pāṭiyekkaṃ
analyzed: katvā dīpe jalite kiñca api jālāḥ ekābaddhāḥ viya honti tassa tassa pana aṃsuno pāṭiyekkam

original: jālā aññamaññaṃ asammissāva. Evaṃ kāyabhāvindriyādīni ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samosaṭānipi
analyzed: evam kāya bhāvindriya ādīni ekasmin ṭhāne

original: bhinnaṭṭhānesu heṭṭhupariyādivasena natthi, tānipi asammissāneva honti.
analyzed: bhinna ṭhānesu heṭṭhu pariyā ādi vasena na atthi tāni pi honti

original: Sahajarūpānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesaṃyeva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sahaja rūpānam anupālana lakkhaṇam jīvitindriyam tesam pavattana rasam tesam yeva ṭhapana paccupaṭṭhānam

original: yāpayitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Atthikkhaṇe eva cetaṃ sahajarūpāni anupāleti udakaṃ
analyzed: yāpayitabba dhamma padaṭṭhānam atthi kkhaṇe eva ca itam sahaja rūpāni anupāleti udakam

original: viya uppalādīni, na bhaṅgakkhaṇe sayaṃ bhijjamānattā, yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi
analyzed: viya uppala ādīni na bhaṅga kkhaṇe sayam bhijjamāna ttā yathāsakam paccaya uppanne pi

original: ca dhamme pāleti dhātī viya kumāraṃ, sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva ca pavattati
analyzed: ca dhamme pāleti dhātī viya kumāram sayaṃpavattita dhamma sambandhena iva ca pavattati

original: niyāmako viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: niyāmakaḥ viya āti daṭṭhabbam

original: Manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthu, tāsaññeva dhātūnaṃ dhāraṇarasaṃ,
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam nissaya lakkhaṇam hadaya vatthu tāsaññeva dhātūnam dhāraṇa rasam

original: ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Idaṃ pana hadayavatthu yadetaṃ antosarīre dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ
analyzed: ubbahana paccupaṭṭhānam idam pana hadaya vatthu yat etam antosarīre dvinnam

original: majjhe bāhirapattāni apanetvā adhomukhaṭṭhapitarattapadumamakulasaṇṭhānaṃ bahi maṭṭhaṃ,
analyzed: majjhe bāhira pattāni apanetvā bahi maṭṭham

original: anto kosātakīphalassa abbhantarasadisaṃ, paññavantānaṃ thokaṃ vikasitaṃ, mandapaññānaṃ
analyzed: antar kosātakī phalassa abbhantara sadisam paññavantānam thokam vikasitam manda paññānam

original: makuḷitaṃ, hadayamaṃsayamakaṃ parikkhipitvā vakkayakanakilomakapihakādayo tiṭṭhanti.
analyzed: makuḷitam hadayam aṃsa yamakam parikkhipitvā vakkayaka nakilomaka pihaka ādayo tiṭṭhanti

original: Tassa sasambhārahadayamaṃsassa anto punnāgaṭṭhipatiṭṭhānamatte āvāṭake saṇṭhitaṃ
analyzed: tassa sa sambhāra hadaya maṃsassa antar punnāga aṭṭhi patiṭṭhāna matte āvāṭake saṇṭhitam

original: addhapasatamattalohitaṃ saṇṭhāti. Tañca rāgacaritassa rattaṃ, dosacaritassa kāḷakaṃ,

original: mohacaritassa maṃsadhovanaudakasadisaṃ, vitakkacaritassa kulatthayūsavaṇṇaṃ, saddhācaritassa

original: Cakkhu nacakkhūti evamādivasena ca duvidhaṃ hoti. Puna taṃ sanidassanattikavasena
analyzed: cakkhu na cakkhu iti evamādi vasena ca duvidham hoti puna tam sanidassana ttika vasena

original: tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ, sesamoḷārikarūpaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ,
analyzed: tividham hoti tattha rūpa āyatanam sa nidassana sa paṭigham sesa moḷārika rūpam anidassana sa paṭigham

original: sabbampi sukhumarūpaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ. Tathā kammajādittikavasena. Tattha navavidhaṃ
analyzed: sabbam pi sukhuma rūpam anidassana appaṭigham tathā kamma ja ādittika vasena tattha navavidham

original: upādinnarūpaṃ, suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, ākāso ca kammajaṃ nāma, viññattidvayaṃ, lahutādittayañca
analyzed: upādinna rūpam suddhaṭṭhakam ākāso ca kamma jam nāma viññatti dvayam

original: saddo ca akammajaṃ nāma, upacayādicatubbidhaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ ajaṃ nāma. Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ,
analyzed: saddo ca akamma jam nāma upacaya ādi catubbidham lakkhaṇa rūpam ajam nāma suddhaṭṭhakam

original: ākāso, viññattidvayaṃ, lahutādittayaṃ, saddo ca cittajaṃ nāma, tadavasesaṃ lakkhaṇarūpavirahitaṃ
analyzed: ākāsaḥ viññatti dvayam saddo ca cittajam nāma tad avasesam lakkhaṇa rūpa virahitam

original: acittajaṃ nāma, lakkhaṇarūpaṃ ajaṃ nāma. Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, ākāso, lahutādittayañca āhārajaṃ
analyzed: acittajam nāma lakkhaṇa rūpam ajam nāma suddhaṭṭhakam ākāsaḥ āhāra jam

original: nāma, sesaṃ lakkhaṇavajjitaṃ anāhārajaṃ nāma, lakkhaṇaṃ ajaṃ nāma. Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ,
analyzed: nāma sesam lakkhaṇa vajjitam anāhāra jam nāma lakkhaṇam ajam nāma suddhaṭṭhakam

original: ākāso, lahutādittayaṃ, saddo ca utujaṃ nāma, sesaṃ lakkhaṇavirahitaṃ anutujaṃ nāma,
analyzed: ākāsaḥ saddo ca utujam nāma sesam lakkhaṇa virahitam anutujam nāma

original: lakkhaṇaṃ ajaṃ nāma. Lakkhaṇāni hi jāyamānajīyamānaparibhijjamānadhammānaṃ sabhāvatāya
analyzed: lakkhaṇam ajam nāma lakkhaṇāni hi jāyamāna jīyamāna paribhijjamāna dhammānam sabhāva tāya

original: kutoci jātivohāraṃ na labhanti bhesampi jātiādippasaṅgato. Na hi “jāti jāyati, jarā
analyzed: kutoci jāti vohāram na labhanti jāti ādi ppasaṅgataḥ na hi jāti jāyati jarā

original: jīrati, maraṇaṃ mīyatī”ti voharituṃ yuttaṃ anavaṭṭhānato. Tadavasesānaṃ pana ākāsaviññattādianipphannānaṃ
analyzed: jīrati maraṇam mīyati iti voharitum yuttam anavaṭṭhānato tad avasesānam pana ākāsa viññatta ādi anipphannānam

original: yadipi paramatthato avijjamānatāya na kutoci uppatti atthi, tathāpi tathā tathā pavattarūpaṃ
analyzed: yadi api paramatthataḥ a vijjamāna tāya na kutoci uppatti atthi tathā api tathā tathā pavatta rūpam

original: upādāya nesaṃ vijjamānavohārasseva hetusamuppannavohārassāpi virodhābhāvato sahetukatā
analyzed: upādāya na īsam vijjamāna vohārassa iva hetu samuppanna vohārassa api virodha abhāvato sa hetuka tā

original: vuttā. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “rūpāyatanaṃ…pe… rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santati kabaḷīkāro
analyzed: vuttā yam pana pāḷiyam rūpa āyatanam pe rūpassa upacayaḥ rūpassa santati kabaḷīkāro

original: āhāro. Ime dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā”tiādīsu jātiyāpi kutoci jātattaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ
analyzed: āhāraḥ ime dhammā citta samuṭṭhānā ti ādīsu jātiyā api kutoci jātattam vuttam tam rūpa janaka paccayānam

original: kiccānubhāvalakkhaṇe diṭṭhattā rūpuppattikkhaṇe vijjamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, jarāmaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: kicca anubhāva lakkhaṇe diṭṭha ttā rūpa uppatti kkhaṇe vijjamāna tam sandhāya vuttam jarā maraṇānaṃ

original: pana rūpuppattikkhaṇe abhāvato na vuttaṃ. “Jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ
analyzed: pana rūpa uppatti khaṇe abhāvataḥ na vuttam jarāmaraṇam bhikkhave aniccam saṅkhatam

original: paṭiccasamuppanna”nti idaṃ pana jarāmaraṇasīsena tathāpavattaviññāṇanāmarūpādīnameva
analyzed: paṭicca samuppannanti idam pana jarā maraṇa sīsena tathā pavatta viññāṇa nāma rūpa ādīnam eva

original: gahitattā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ajjhattikaṃ, taṃ upādā, yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: gahita ttā vuttanti veditabbam yat tat rūpam ajjhattikam tam upādā yam tam rūpam

original: bāhiraṃ, taṃ atthi upādā, atthi no upādāti evamādinā nayenāpi tividhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: bāhiram tam atthi upādā atthi no upādā ti evamādinā nayena api tividham

original: Puna taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ
analyzed: puna tat sabbam diṭṭha suta muta viññāta vasena catubbidham hoti tattha rūpa āyatanam

original: diṭṭhaṃ nāma, saddo sutaṃ nāma, gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāni patvāva gahetabbato mutaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭham nāma saddaḥ sutam nāma gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbāni patvā ava gahetabbataḥ mutam

original: nāma, sesaṃ manasā viññātabbato viññātaṃ nāma. Tathā rūparūpacatukkādivasena catubbidhaṃ,
analyzed: nāma sesam manasā viññātabbataḥ viññātam nāma tathā rūpa rūpa catukka ādi vasena catubbidham

original: tattha aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ nipphannaṃ rūparūpaṃ nāma, ākāso paricchedarūpaṃ nāma, viññattidvayaṃ,
analyzed: tattha aṭṭhārasavidham nipphannam rūpa rūpam nāma ākāsaḥ pariccheda rūpam nāma viññatti dvayam

original: lahutādittayañca vikārarūpaṃ nāma, upacayādicatubbidhaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma. Tathā
analyzed: vikāra rūpam nāma upacaya ādi catubbidham lakkhaṇa rūpam nāma tathā

original: hadayavatthu vatthu, na dvāraṃ nāma, viññattidvayaṃ dvāraṃ, na vatthu nāma, cakkhādayo
analyzed: hadaya vatthu vatthu na dvāram nāma viññatti dvayam dvāram na vatthu nāma cakkhu ādayo

original: pañca pasādā vatthu ceva dvārañca nāma, sesaṃ neva vatthu na dvāraṃ nāmāti evamādinā nayena catubbidhaṃ.
analyzed: pañca pasādāḥ vatthu ca iva dvāram ca nāma sesam na iva vatthu na dvāram nāma ati evamādinā nayena catubbidham

original: Taṃ puna ekajādivasena pañcavidhaṃ. Navavidhaṃ hi upādinnarūpaṃ kammeneva, viññattidvayañca
analyzed: tam punar ekaja ādi vasena pañcavidham navavidham hi upādinna rūpam kammena iva viññatti dvayam ca

original: citteneva uppajjanato ekajaṃ nāma, saddo utucittehi uppajjanato dvijaṃ nāma, lahutādittayaṃ
analyzed: cittena iva uppajjanataḥ ekajam nāma saddo utu cittehi uppajjanataḥ dvijam nāma

original: utucittāhārehi uppajjanato tijaṃ nāma, suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, ākāso ca catūhipi uppajjanato
analyzed: utu citta āhārehi uppajjanato tijam nāma suddhaṭṭhakam ākāso ca catūhi pi uppajjanato

original: catujjaṃ nāma, lakkhaṇāni ajaṃ nāma. Evamādinā pañcavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: catujjam nāma lakkhaṇāni ajam nāma evamādinā pañcavidham hoti

original: Taṃ puna cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanaindriyaviññeyyavasena chabbidhaṃ. Sattaviññāṇadhātuviññeyyavasena
analyzed: tam puna cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya mana aindriya viññeyya vasena chabbidham satta viññāṇa dhātu viññeyya vasena

original: sattavidhaṃ. Tadeva manoviññāṇadhātuviññeyyaṃ bhūtopādāyavasena dvidhā katvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ
analyzed: sattavidham tat eva manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu viññeyyam bhūta upādāya vasena dvidhā katvā aṭṭhavidham

original: hoti. Tattha hi āpodhātu manoviññāṇeneva viññeyyaṃ bhūtarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ pasādasahitasukhumarūpaṃ
analyzed: hoti tattha hi āpodhātu manaḥ viññāṇena iva viññeyyam bhūtarūpam nāma itaram pasāda sahita sukhuma rūpam

original: manoviññāṇaviññeyyopādāyarūpaṃ nāma. Tadeva puna manoviññāṇaviññeyyopādāyarūpaṃ indriyānindriyavasena
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa viññeyya upādāya rūpam nāma tat eva puna manaḥ viññāṇa viññeyya upādāya rūpam indriya anindriya vasena

original: dvidhā katvā navavidhaṃ hoti. Taṃ puna pasādavisayaāpodhātubhāvahadayajīvitaparicchedavikāralakkhaṇaāhāravasena dasavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: dvidhā katvā navavidham hoti tam puna dasavidham hoti

original: Tadeva puna cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ
analyzed: tat eva puna cakkha āyatanam sota āyatanam ghāna āyatanam jivhā āyatanam kāya āyatanam rūpa āyatanam

original: saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ dhammāyatananti evaṃ āyatanato
analyzed: sadda āyatanam gandha āyatanam rasa āyatanam phoṭṭhabba āyatanam dhamma āyatanam ti evam āyatanataḥ

original: ekādasavidhaṃ hoti, tathā dhātuvasena. Tattha āpodhātuvivajjitabhūtattayaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
analyzed: ekādasavidham hoti tathā dhātu vasena tattha āpaḥ dhātu vivajjita bhūta ttayam phoṭṭhabba āyatanam

original: phoṭṭhabbadhātu “kāyaviññeyyaṃ, kāyaviññāṇaviññeyya”nti ca vuccati, sukhumarūpaṃ
analyzed: phoṭṭhabba dhātu kāya viññeyyam kāya viññāṇa viññeyyanti ca vuccati sukhuma rūpam

original: dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātūti, tadeva pasādasahitaṃ “manoviññeyyaṃ, manoviññāṇaviññeyya”nti
analyzed: dhamma āyatanam dhamma dhātu uti tat eva pasāda sahitam manaḥ viññeyyam manaḥ viññāṇa viññeyyanti

original: ca vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: ca vuttam sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Kasmā panettha āpodhātuvivajjitānaññeva bhūtānaṃ phoṭṭhabbatā vuttā, nanu āpodhātupi
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha āpodhātu vivajjitānaṃ aññā iva bhūtānam phoṭṭhabba tā vuttā nanu āpodhātu pi

original: sītavasena phusitvā veditabbāti? Na sītassāpi tejodhātuttā. Uṇhameva hi sītanti byapadissati.
analyzed: sīta vasena phusitvā veditabbā ati na sītassa api tejaḥ dhātu ttā uṇham eva hi sītanti byapadissati

original: Kaṭhinākaṭhinataṃ upādāya rukkhādiviraḷacchāyā viya, taṃ vā upādāya sandacchāyādi,
analyzed: upādāya tam vai upādāya sanda chāyā ādi

original: aññathā kassetaṃ sītattaṃ sabhāvaṃ siyā. “Āpodhātuyā” iti ce. Yadi evaṃ uṇhodakādīsu
analyzed: aññathā kassa itam sītattam sabhāvam siyā āpodhātuyā iti ce yadi evam uṇha udaka ādīsu

original: āpattaṃ na siyā āpotejānañca sahapavattānaṃ viruddhalakkhaṇattā, na ca sā tejosannidhāne
analyzed: āpattam na siyā āpo tejānam ca saha pavattānam viruddha lakkhaṇa ttā na ca sā tejaḥ sannidhāne

original: sītattaṃ vihāya tiṭṭhati. Na hi sabhāvā kenaci sahabhāvena taṃsabhāvaṃ jahanti abhāvāpattito,
analyzed: vihāya tiṭṭhati na hi sabhāvā kenacid sahabhāvena taṃsabhāvam jahanti abhāva āpattitaḥ

original: nāpissā sītabhāvaṃ muñcitvā aparasabhāvo atthi, yena sahabhāvo yujjeyya. Yadi siyā
analyzed: na api issā sīta bhāvam muñcitvā aparasa bhāvaḥ atthi yena sahabhāvaḥ yujjeyya yadi siyā

original: “āpo sītatta”nti, bhāvadvayaṃ siyā aññoññavilakkhaṇasabhāvattā bhāvassa, athāpi na
analyzed: āpaḥ sītattanti bhāva dvayam siyā aññoñña vilakkhaṇa sabhāvattā bhāvassa atha api na

original: sītattaṃ, āpodhātuyā sarūpaṃ sītaguṇo, so ca uṇhasannidhāne vigacchati, guṇīrūpameva
analyzed: sarūpam sarūpam sītaguṇaḥ saḥ ca uṇha sannidhāne vigacchati guṇīrūpam eva

original: tiṭṭhatīti ce? Tadā tahiṃ sayaṃ aphoṭṭhabbāva āpodhātu, na niyataphassavatīti ca
analyzed: tiṭṭhati iti ce tadā tahim sayam āpodhātu na niyata phassavatī iti ca

original: siyā, yo ca sītaphasso guṇoti suvutto, so amhehi tejodhātuvisesoti.
analyzed: siyā yaḥ ca sīta phassaḥ guṇaḥ ti su vutto saḥ amhehi tejaḥ dhātu viseso ti

original: Ayameva visesoti ce, nanu sītattaṃ, uṇhattañca aññoññaviruddhaṃ, kathaṃ tejodhātuyā
analyzed: ayam eva visesaḥ iti ce nanu sītattam uṇhattam ca aññoñña viruddham katham tejaḥ dhātuyā

original: sabhāvaṃ siyāti? Nāyaṃ doso ekakalāpe tesaṃ sambhavābhāvato, bhinnakalāpesu pana
analyzed: sabhāvam siyāti na ayam dosaḥ eka kalāpe tesam sambhava abhāvataḥ bhinna kalāpesu pana

original: pavattiyaṃ ālokandhakāranīlapītādīnaṃ vaṇṇāyatanatā viya tejodhātuttaṃ na virujjhatīti.
analyzed: pavattiyam āloka andhakāra nīla pīta ādīnam vaṇṇa āyatana tā viya tejaḥ dhātu ttam na virujjhati iti

original: Yadi āpodhātuyā na sītattaṃ sarūpaṃ, kiṃ panassā sarūpanti? Dravatā. Yadi evaṃ dravatāpi
analyzed: yadi āpodhātuyāḥ na sarūpam kim panassā drava tā yadi evam drava tā api

original: phusitvā ñātabbato phoṭṭhabbaṃ siyāti? Na sītādiṃ phusitvā manasāva vaṇṇaṃ disvā
analyzed: phusitvā ñātabbataḥ phoṭṭhabbam siyāti na sīta ādim phusitvā manasā ava vaṇṇam disvā

original: ñātabbato. Andhakāre sayantā hi atisītalatāya pattādiṃ phusitvā “udakaṃ etthā”ti
analyzed: ñātabbataḥ andhakāre sayantā hi ati sīta latāya patta ādim phusitvā udakam ettha ati

original: āsaṅkitā honti, udakaṃ vā phusitvā sappādisaññino, tasmā aphoṭṭhabbameva āpodhātu,
analyzed: āsaṅkitāḥ honti udakam vā phusitvā sappa ādi saññinaḥ tasmai a phoṭṭhabbam eva āpaḥ dhātu

original: itarabhūtattayameva phoṭṭhabbanti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: itara bhūta ttayam eva phoṭṭhabbanti gahetabbam

original: Kiṃ panetaṃ bhūtattayaṃ ekato ārammaṇaṃ katvā kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjituṃ sakkoti, na
analyzed: kim pana itam bhūtattayam ekatas ārammaṇam katvā kāya viññāṇam uppajjitum sakkoti na

original: sakkotīti? Na sakkoti. Kasmā? Ābhujitavasena vā ussadavasena vā tesu ekamevārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: sakkoti iti na sakkoti kasmai ābhujita vasena vā ussada vasena vā tesu ekam eva ārammaṇam

original: katvā uppajjanato. Ābhujitavasena hi odanathāliyaṃ sitthaṃ gahetvā thaddhamudubhāvaṃ
analyzed: katvā uppajjanataḥ ābhujita vasena hi odana thāliyam sittham gahetvā thaddha mudu bhāvam

original: vīmaṃsantassa, uṇhodakabhājane vā hatthaṃ otāretvā uṇhabhāvaṃ vīmaṃsantassa, uṇhasamaye
analyzed: vīmaṃsantassa uṇha udaka bhājane vā hattham otāretvā uṇha bhāvam vīmaṃsantassa uṇha samaye

original: vā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā vātena sarīraṃ paharāpentassa ca tattha tattha kiñcāpi itaraṃ
analyzed: vā vātapānam vivaritvā vātena sarīram ca tattha tattha kiñca api itaram

original: bhūtattayampi atthi, yathābhujitaṃ pana taṃtaṃpathavītejovāyodhātumeva yathākkamaṃ
analyzed: atthi yathā bhujitam pana taṃ tam pathavī tejaḥ vāyaḥ dhātum eva yathākkamam

original: ārabbha kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Evaṃ ābhujitavasena ārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma. Ussadavasena
analyzed: ārabbha kāya viññāṇam uppajjati evam ābhujita vasena ārammaṇam karoti nāma ussada vasena

original: pana bhuñjanasamaye sakkharaṃ ḍaṃsantassa, magge vā aggiṃ akkamantassa, balavavātena
analyzed: pana bhuñjana samaye sakkharam ḍaṃsantassa magge vā aggim akkamantassa balava vātena

original: vā kaṇṇasakkhaliyampi paharantassa ca tattha tattha kiñcāpi itarabhūtattayampi atthi,
analyzed: vā kaṇṇa sakkhaliyam pi paharantassa ca tattha tattha kiñcā api atthi

original: yathāussadaṃ pana taṃtaṃpathavītejovāyodhātumevārabbha yathākkamaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: yathāussadam pana taṃ taṃ pathavī tejaḥ vāyaḥ dhātum eva ārabbha yathākkamam kāya viññāṇam uppajjati

original: Aggimhi vā nimuggasakalasarīrassa yadipi ekappahārena agginā kāyo ghaṭṭīyati, yasmiṃ
analyzed: aggimhi vā nimugga sakala sarīrassa yadi api eka ppahārena agginā kāyaḥ ghaṭṭīyati yasmin

original: yasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kāyappasādo ussanno hoti, yattha yattha vā pana visayaghaṭṭanānighaṃso
analyzed: yasmim pana ṭhāne kāya pasādaḥ ussannaḥ hoti yattha yattha vā pana visaya ghaṭṭanā nighaṃsaḥ

original: balavā hoti, tattha tattheva paṭhamaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, pacchā itaraṭṭhānesu.
analyzed: balavā hoti tattha tattha iva paṭhamam kāya viññāṇam uppajjati pacchā itara ṭṭhānesu

original: Khaṇaparittatāya pana sahasā parivattitvā uppajjanavasena ekappahārena sakalasarīraṃ
analyzed: khaṇa paritta tāya pana sahasā parivattitvā uppajjana vasena eka pahārena sakala sarīram

original: ḍayhamānaṃ viya khāyati. Na hi ekasmiṃ khaṇe bahūni viññāṇāni uppajjanti, byāpetvā
analyzed: ḍayhamānam viya khāyati na hi ekasmin khaṇe bahūni viññāṇāni uppajjanti byāpetvā

original: vā ekaṃ. Ekekasmiṃ pana avinibbhoge kāyadasake ekameva kāyaviññāṇaṃ ussadavasena
analyzed: vā ekam ekekasmin pana avinibbhoge kāya dasake ekam eva kāya viññāṇam ussada vasena

original: uppajjati, evaṃ itaravatthūsupi viññāṇānaṃ avinibbhoge padese ekekānameva uppatti
analyzed: uppajjati evam itara vatthūsu pi viññāṇānam avinibbhoge padese ekekānam eva uppatti

original: veditabbā. Evaṃ ussadavasena ārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
analyzed: veditabbā evam ussada vasena ārammaṇam karoti nāma

original: Kena pana cittassa ārammaṇasaṅkanti hotīti? Ajjhāsayato, visayādhimattato vā. Nānāṭhānesu
analyzed: kena pana cittassa ārammaṇa saṅkanti hoti iti ajjhāsayataḥ visaya adhimattataḥ vā nānā ṭhānesu

original: hi cittapaṭimādīni passitukāmassa paṭhamaṃ ekaṭṭhāne disvā tato itaraṭṭhānesu ca
analyzed: hi citta paṭimā ādīni passitu kāmassa paṭhamam eka ṭṭhāne disvā tatas itara ṭṭhānesu ca

original: rūpāni passituṃ sarasenāvajjanaṃ uppajjati. Evaṃ ajjhāsayato saṅkanti hoti. Rūpārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: rūpāni passitum sa rasena āvajjanam uppajjati evam ajjhāsayato saṅkanti hoti rūpa ārammaṇam

original: pana mahantampi passantassa sabbatūriyanigghose uṭṭhite taṃ vā suṇantassa manuññāmanuññe
analyzed: pana mahantam pi passantassa sabba tūriya nigghose uṭṭhite tam vā suṇantassa manuñña amanuññe

original: adhimattagandharasaphoṭṭhabbe indriyesu ghaṭṭite itaritare cittaṃ saṅkamati, evaṃ
analyzed: adhimatta gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbe indriyesu ghaṭṭite itaritare cittam saṅkamati evam

original: visayādhimattato saṅkanti hotīti ayamettha saṅgahato vinicchayo. Suññato, pana atītādivasena
analyzed: visaya adhimattato hoti iti ayam ettha saṅgahato vinicchayo suññato pana atīta ādi vasena

original: paccekaṃ anantappabhedato ca vinicchayo cittavibhattiyaṃ vuttanayānusārena yathānurūpaṃ veditabbo.
analyzed: paccekam ananta ppabhedato ca vinicchayo cittavibhattiyam vutta naya anusārena yathā anurūpam veditabbo

original: Samuṭṭhānato, panettha bhavayonīsu pavattikkamato ca pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā – catusamuṭṭhānikāni
analyzed: samuṭṭhānato pana ittha bhava yonīsu pavatti kkamataḥ ca pakiṇṇaka kathā veditabbā catu samuṭṭhānikāni

original: hi rūpāni uppajjamānāni dvīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu dasakādikalāpavaseneva paṭisandhippavattīsu
analyzed: hi rūpāni uppajjamānāni dvīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu dasaka ādi kalāpa vasena iva paṭisandhi ppavattīsu

original: yathāsambhavaṃ samuppajjanti. Tattha kammajesu tāva vīsatiyā kāmāvacarakusalākusalehi
analyzed: yathāsambhavam samuppajjanti tattha kamma jesu tāva vīsatiyā kāmāvacara kusala akusalehi

original: kāmalokeyeva saṃsedajānaṃ, opapātikānañca cha vatthūni, bhāvadvaye aññataraṃ, jīvitañcāti
analyzed: saṃseda jānam opapātikānam cha vatthūni bhāva dvaye aññataram jīvitam ca ati

original: aṭṭha rūpāni yathāsambhavaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pātubhavanti. Tāni ca suddhaṭṭhakaṃ,
analyzed: aṭṭha rūpāni yathāsambhavam paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya pātubhavanti tāni ca suddhaṭṭhakam

original: jīvitañca jīvitanavakaṃ, tadeva navakaṃ cakkhunā saha cakkhudasakaṃ, sotena sotadasakaṃ,
analyzed: jīvitam ca jīvita navakam tat eva navakam cakkhunā saha cakkhu dasakam sotena sota dasakam

original: ghānena ghānadasakaṃ, jivhāya jivhādasakaṃ, kāyena kāyadasakaṃ, hadayavatthunā vatthudasakaṃ,
analyzed: ghānena ghāna dasakam jivhāya jivhā dasakam kāyena kāya dasakam hadaya vatthunā vatthu dasakam

original: bhāvaññatarena bhāvadasakañcāti nava kalāpā hutvā uppajjanti. Napuṃsakānaṃ panettha
analyzed: bhāvaññatarena bhāva dasakam ca ati nava kalāpāḥ hutvā uppajjanti napuṃsakānam pana ittha

original: bhāvadasakaṃ natthi, tathā jaccandhādīnaṃ cakkhusotaghānadasakāni. Evaṃ aṇḍajajalābujānampi,
analyzed: bhāva dasakam natthi tathā jat candha ādīnam cakkhu sota ghāna dasakāni evam aṇḍa ja jalābu jānam pi

original: tesaṃ pana paṭisandhicittena saha kāyavatthubhāvadasakāneva uppajjanti, tato pavattikāle
analyzed: tesam pana paṭisandhi cittena saha uppajjanti tatas pavatti kāle

original: jīvitanavakacakkhudasakādīni yathānurūpaṃ uppajjanti. Rūpabhave pana ghānadasakādittayaṃ,
analyzed: jīvita navaka cakkhu dasaka ādīni yathānurūpam uppajjanti rūpa bhave pana

original: bhāvadasakadvayaṃ, udaragginavakañca natthi, sesāni pañcahi rūpāvacarakusalakammehi
analyzed: bhāva dasaka dvayam udara aggi navakam ca natthi sesāni pañcahi rūpāvacara kusala kammehi

original: paṭisandhito pabhuti uppajjanti. Aññaññīnaṃ pana pañcamajjhānakusalena jīvitanavakameva.
analyzed: paṭisandhito pabhuti uppajjanti aññaññīnam pana pañcama jhāna kusalena jīvita navakam eva

original: Evaṃ kāmarūpāvacarakammasamuṭṭhitā nava rūpakalāpā dvīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu yathāsambhavaṃ
analyzed: evam kāma rūpāvacara kamma samuṭṭhitāḥ nava rūpa kalāpāḥ dvīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu yathāsambhavam

original: paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuticittoparisattarasamacittassa ṭhiti, tāva cittassa
analyzed: paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuti citta upari satta rasama cittassa ṭhiti tāva cittassa

original: uppādaṭhitibhaṅgasaṅkhātesu tīsu khaṇesu nirantaraṃ ajjhattasantāne eva uppajjanti,
analyzed: uppāda ṭhiti bhaṅga saṅkhātesu tīsu khaṇesu nirantaram ajjhatta santāne eva uppajjanti

original: tato pabhuti anuppajjitvā cuticittena saha nirujjhanti.
analyzed: tatas pabhuti an uppajjitvā cuti cittena saha nirujjhanti

original: Cittajāni pana pañcavokārabhave dvipañcaviññāṇaāruppavipākavajjitapañcasattaticittehi
analyzed: citta jāni pana pañca vokāra bhave dvi pañca viññāṇa āruppa vipāka vajjita pañca sattati cittehi

original: attano attano uppattikkhaṇe eva samuṭṭhāpitāni paṭhamabhavaṅgamupādāya cuticittapariyosānaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ uppatti kkhaṇe eva samuṭṭhāpitāni paṭhama bhavaṅgam upādāya cuti citta pariyosānam

original: ajjhattasantāne eva suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, tadeva kāyaviññattiyā saha kāyaviññattinavakaṃ,
analyzed: ajjhatta santāne eva suddhaṭṭhakam tat eva kāya viññattiyā saha kāya viññatti navakam

original: vacīviññattisaddehi vacīviññattidasakaṃ, lahutādittayena lahutādekādasakaṃ, kāyaviññattilahutādīhi
analyzed: vacī viññatti saddehi vacī viññatti dasakam lahutādittayena lahutādekādasakam kāya viññatti lahutādīhi

original: dvādasakaṃ, vacīviññattisaddalahutādīhi terasakañcāti cha kalāpā hutvā yathāyogaṃ
analyzed: dvādasakam terasakam ca ati cha kalāpāḥ hutvā yathāyogam

original: pavattanti. Rūpajanakacittesu cettha somanassasahagatakāmāvacarajavanāni iriyāpathaviññattihasanasahitaṃ
analyzed: pavattanti rūpa janaka cittesu ca ittha somanassa sahagata kāmāvacara javanāni iriyāpatha viññatti hasana sahitam

original: sabbaṃ cittajarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, sesakāmāvacarajavanābhiññāvoṭṭhabbanāni hasanavajjaṃ,
analyzed: sabbam citta ja rūpam samuṭṭhāpenti sesa kāmāvacara javana abhiññā voṭṭhabbanāni hasana vajjam

original: appanājavanāni ca iriyāpathādivirahitameva, yathāpavattaṃ pana iriyāpathaṃ avinassamānaṃ
analyzed: appanā javanāni ca iriyāpatha ādi virahitam eva yathā pavattam pana iriyāpatham avinassamānam

original: upatthambhenti. Sesāni pana rūpāvacaravipākamanodhātutadārammaṇāni ekūnavīsati tampi
analyzed: upatthambhenti sesāni pana rūpāvacara vipāka manaḥ dhātu tad ārammaṇāni ekūnavīsati tam pi

original: na karonti, suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, saddanavakaṃ, lahutādekādasakaṃ, saddalahutādidvādasakañcāti
analyzed: na karonti suddhaṭṭhakam sadda navakam lahutāda ekādasakam sadda lahutādi dvādasakam ca ati

original: cattāro kalāpe uppādenti, tatthāpi sabbesampi paṭisandhicittāni, arahantānaṃ cuticittāni,
analyzed: cattāro kalāpe uppādenti tattha api sabbesam pi paṭisandhi cittāni arahantānam cuti cittāni

original: arūpabhavūpapannāni ca na kiñci rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, āruppavipākadvipañcaviññāṇāni
analyzed: arūpa bhava upapannāni ca na kiñci rūpam samuṭṭhāpenti āruppa vipāka dvi pañca viññāṇāni

original: sabbathā na uppādentīti.
analyzed: sabbathā na uppādenti iti

original: Āhārajāni pana kāmabhave eva ajjhohaṭāhāre ṭhitena ṭhitippattena ojāsaṅkhātena āhārena
analyzed: āhāra jāni pana kāma bhave eva ajjhohaṭa āhāre ṭhitena ṭhiti pattena ojā saṅkhātena āhārena

original: samuṭṭhitāni ajjhattasantāne eva suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, lahutādekādasakañcāti dve kalāpā
analyzed: samuṭṭhitāni ajjhatta santāne eva suddhaṭṭhakam dve kalāpā

original: hutvā yāvatāyukaṃ pavattanti, na rūpabhūmiyaṃ. Utujāni ajjhattikabāhirena tejodhātusaṅkhātena
analyzed: hutvā yāvatāyukam pavattanti na rūpa bhūmiyam utu jāni ajjhattika bāhirena tejaḥ dhātu saṅkhātena

original: ṭhitippattena utunā ajjhattasantāne samuṭṭhitāni suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, saddanavakaṃ, lahutādekādasakaṃ,
analyzed: ṭhiti ppattena utunā ajjhatta santāne samuṭṭhitāni suddhaṭṭhakam sadda navakam lahu tād ekādasakam

original: saddalahutādekādasakaṃ, saddalahutādidvādasakañcāti cattāro kalāpā hutvā yāvatāyukaṃ,
analyzed: sat dala hutāt ekādasakam sat dala huta ādi dvādasakam ca ati cattāraḥ kalāpāḥ hutvā yāvatāyukam

original: bahiddhā pana pathavīpabbatadevabrahmavimānādīsu suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, samuddaghosādisaddanavakañcāti
analyzed: bahiddhā pana pathavī pabbata deva brahma vimāna ādīsu suddha ṭṭhakam samudda ghosa ādi sadda navakam ca ati

original: dve kalāpāva hutvā pavattanti. Ākāsalakkhaṇāni cettha sabbakalāpesu vijjamānānipi
analyzed: dve kalāpau ava hutvā pavattanti ākāsa lakkhaṇāni ca ittha sabba kalāpesu vijjamānāni pi

original: kalāpasaṅgahe vohārābhāvā na gaṇīyanti. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cettha utucittāhārajāni
analyzed: kalāpa saṅgahe vohāra abhāvāḥ na paṭisandhi kkhaṇe ca ittha utu citta āhāra jāni

original: na honti, na sabbatthāpi uppattikkhaṇe jarāmaraṇānīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
analyzed: na honti na sabbattha api uppatti kkhaṇe jarā maraṇāni iti evam catu samuṭṭhānika rūpassa

original: bhavayonīsu, paṭisandhippavattīsu ca pavattikkamo veditabbo.
analyzed: bhava yonīsu paṭisandhi pavattīsu ca pavatti kkamaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Apica dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasenāpi cettha tassa ajjhattaṃ, mahābhūtādivasena
analyzed: apica dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānam vasena api ca ittha tassa ajjhattam mahābhūta ādi vasena

original: bahiddhā ca pavatti evaṃ veditabbā – ajjhattikā hi kesā lomā…pe… karīsaṃ matthaluṅganti
analyzed: bahiddhā ca pavatti evam veditabbā ajjhattikāḥ hi kesāḥ lomāpe karīsam mattha luṅganti

original: ime vīsati pathavādhikakoṭṭhāsā, pittaṃ…pe… muttanti ime dvādasa āpādhikakoṭṭhāsā,
analyzed: ime vīsati pathavā adhika koṭṭhāsā ime dvādasa āpa adhika koṭṭhāsā

original: yena ca santappati, yena ca jīrati, yena ca pariḍayhati, yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ
analyzed: yena ca santappati yena ca jīrati yena ca pariḍayhati yena ca asita pīta khāyita sāyitam

original: sammāpariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti ime cattāro tejādhikakoṭṭhāsā, uddhaṃgamo adhogamo kucchisayo
analyzed: sammāpariṇāmam gacchati iti ime cattāro teja adhika koṭṭhāsāḥ uddhaṃgamaḥ adhogamaḥ kucchi sayo

original: koṭṭhāsayo aṅgamaṅgānusārī assāsapassāso cāti ime cha vāyuadhikakoṭṭhāsāti dvecattālīsa
analyzed: koṭṭhāsayaḥ aṅgam aṅga anusārī assāsa passāsaḥ ca ati ime cha vāyu adhika koṭṭhāsā ati dvecattālīsa

original: koṭṭhāsā honti. Tesu udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā utujā.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsāḥ honti tesu udariyam karīsam pubbaḥ muttanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsāḥ utu jā

original: Evametesu ekekaṃ utujaṭṭhakameva hoti, sedo assu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti ime cattāro utucittajā,
analyzed: evam etesu ekekam utu jaṭṭhakam eva hoti sedaḥ assu kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā ati ime cattāro utu citta jā

original: tesu ekekasmiṃ dve dve aṭṭhakā honti. Asitādiparipācako tejo kammajova, tattha jīvitanavakameva.
analyzed: tesu ekekasmin dve dve aṭṭhakāḥ honti asita ādi paripācako tejaḥ tattha jīvita navakam eva

original: Assāsapassāso pana cittajova, tattha cittajasaddanavakameva. Ime dasa koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā
analyzed: assāsa passāso pana tattha citta ja sadda navakam eva ime dasa koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā

original: sesā dvattiṃsa catujā.
analyzed: sesāḥ dvattiṃsa catujā

original: Tattha aṭṭhasu tejovāyokoṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ jīvitanavakañceva tīṇi ca utucittāhārajaṭṭhakāni
analyzed: tattha aṭṭhasu tejaḥ vāyo koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmin jīvita navakam ca iva tīṇi ca utu citta āhāra jaṭṭhakāni

original: honti, vāyokoṭṭhāsesu cettha utucittajasaddanavakampi hoti, sesesu catuvīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu
analyzed: honti vāyo koṭṭhāsesu ca ittha utu citta ja sadda navakam pi hoti sesesu catuvīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu

original: kesalomanakhadantānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbattha dve kāyabhāvadasakāni,
analyzed: kesa loma nakha dantānam maṃsa vinimutta ṭṭhānam ṭhapetvā sabbattha dve kāya bhāva dasakāni

original: tīṇi ca aṭṭhakāni, maṃsamuttesu pana kesādīsu utujaṭṭhakameva hoti. Tāni ca yathāvuttadasakanavakaṭṭhakāni
analyzed: tīṇi ca aṭṭhakāni maṃsa muttesu pana kesa ādīsu utu jaṭṭhakam eva hoti tāni ca yathāvutta dasaka navaka ṭṭhakāni

original: sakalasarīrabyāpīsu tacamaṃsaruhirādīsu, abyāpīsu ca kesādīsu koṭṭhāsesu avinibbhoge
analyzed: sakala sarīra byāpīsu taca maṃsa ruhira ādīsu abyāpīsu ca kesa ādīsu koṭṭhāsesu avinibbhoge

original: ekasmiṃ aṇupadese hontīti paccekaṃ anantāparimāṇā, anantadhātupaccayattā tesaṃ sarīrasmiṃ
analyzed: ekasmin aṇu padese honti iti paccekam ananta aparimāṇāḥ ananta dhātu paccaya ttā tesam sarīrasmiṃ

original: hi paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇāni anantāni cattāri mahābhūtāni ceva saupādārūpāni ca aññoññapaccayabhūtāni
analyzed: hi paramāṇu bheda sañcuṇṇāni anantāni cattāri mahābhūtāni ca iva sa upādārūpāni ca aññoñña paccaya bhūtāni

original: ajjhattaṃ dvācattālīsakoṭṭhāsasarīrārohapariṇāhasaṇṭhānādinā, bahiddhā ca pathavīpabbatādinā
analyzed: ajjhattam dvācattālīsa koṭṭhāsa sarīra āroha pariṇāha saṇṭhāna ādinā bahiddhā ca pathavī pabbata ādinā

original: ca ākārena yathāpaccayaṃ samuppannāni. Māyākārādayo viya na bālajanappabodhakāni honti.
analyzed: ca ākārena yathāpaccayam samuppannāni māyākāra ādayaḥ viya na bāla jana ppabodhakāni honti

original: Pathavīdhātu cettha sukhumasañcuṇṇā rajabhūtā eva āpodhātuyā saṅgahitā, tejodhātuyā
analyzed: pathavī dhātu ca ittha sukhuma sañcuṇṇā raja bhūtā eva āpaḥ dhātuyā saṅgahitā tejaḥ dhātuyā

original: anupālitā, vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā, vaṇṇādīhi parivāritā na vikiriyamānā ajjhattaṃ
analyzed: anupālitāḥ vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitāḥ vaṇṇa ādīhi parivāritāḥ na vikiriyamānāḥ ajjhattam

original: itthipurisamigapakkhidevabrahmādisarīrabhāvaṃ, bahiddhā ca pathavīpabbatarukkhadevabrahmalokacandasūriyanakkhattamaṇikanakādibhāvañca
analyzed: itthi purisa miga pakkhi devabrahma ādi sarīra bhāvam bahiddhā ca pathavī pabbata rukkha devabrahma loka canda sūriya nakkhatta maṇi kanaka ādi bhāvam ca

original: upagacchati, yūsagatā bandhanabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā. Avasesānupālanavitthambhanaparipācanaparivāritā
analyzed: upagacchati yūsa gatā bandhana bhūtā pana ittha āpodhātu pathavī patiṭṭhitā avasesa anupālana vitthambhana paripācana parivāritā

original: na paggharati, apaggharamānā pīṇitabhāvaṃ dasseti, usumattagatā tejodhātu sesadhātupatiṭṭhānasaṅgahavitthambhanaparivāritā
analyzed: na paggharati a paggharamānā pīṇita bhāvam dasseti usu matta gatā tejaḥ dhātu sesa dhātu patiṭṭhāna saṅgaha vitthambhana parivāritā

original: imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñcassa apūtibhāvañca sādheti, vāyodhātu vitthambhanasamudīraṇasabhāvā
analyzed: imam kāyam paripāca iti vaṇṇa sampattim ca assa a pūti bhāvañca sādha iti vāyodhātu vitthambhana samudīraṇa sabhāvā

original: sesadhātupatiṭṭhānasaṅgahānupālanaparivāritā vitthambheti cāleti, sarīravimānādīnaṃ
analyzed: sesa dhātu patiṭṭhāna saṅgaha anupālana parivāritā cālā iti sarīra vimāna ādīnam

original: gamanādipadavītiharaṇādīnaṃ ṭhitiñca sampādeti. Catassopi cetā sambhūya pathavīadhikatāya
analyzed: gamana ādi padavī itiharaṇa ādīnam ṭhitim ca sampādeti cetā sambhūya pathavī adhikatāya

original: kesādibhāvaṃ, pathavīpabbatādibhāvañca, āpādhikatāya pittādibhāvaṃ, samuddajalādibhāvañca,
analyzed: kesa ādi bhāvam pathavī pabbata ādi bhāvañca āpa adhika tāya pitta ādi bhāvam samudda jala ādi bhāvañca

original: vāyuadhikatāya uddhaṅgamavātādibhāvaṃ, pathavīsandhārakavātādibhāvañca, tejādhikatāya
analyzed: vāyu adhikatāya uddhaṅgama vāta ādi bhāvam pathavī sandhāraka vāta ādi bhāvam ca teja adhikatāya

original: paripācakaggiādibhāvaṃ, narakaggiādibhāvañca sādhenti, yāsaṃ pakopena rogajarāmaraṇañceva

analyzed: somanassa sahagatāni aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacara cittāni paṭhama dutiya tatiya catuttha jhānikāni

original: catucattālīsa rūpāvacaralokuttaracittāni cāti tesaṭṭhi cittāni sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā
analyzed: rūpāvacara lokuttara cittāni ca ati cittāni sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā

original: nāma. Tathā dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ, dve domanassasahagatāni cāti tīṇi cittāni
analyzed: nāma tathā dukkha sahagatam kāya viññāṇam dve domanassa sahagatāni ca ati tīṇi cittāni

original: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā nāma. Sesāni upekkhāsahagatāni pañcapaññāsa cittāni
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ nāma sesāni upekkhā sahagatāni pañcapaññāsa cittāni

original: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā nāma. Yathā ca cittānaṃ sukhādisampayogo, evaṃ
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ nāma yathā ca cittānam sukha ādi sampayogaḥ evam

original: taṃcittasampayuttānaṃ cetasikānampi. Na kevalañca ettheva, ito paresupi tikadukesu
analyzed: taṃ citta sampayuttānam cetasikānam pi na kevalam ca ettha iva itas paresu pi tika dukesu

original: cittavaseneva taṃsampayuttacetasikānampi saṅgaho veditabbo. Yattha pana viseso hoti,
analyzed: citta vasena iva tad sampayutta cetasikānam pi saṅgahaḥ veditabbaḥ yattha pana visesaḥ hoti

original: tattha vakkhāma. Idha pana cetasikesu sappītikāni vedanāvajjitāni cha cetasikāni
analyzed: tattha vakkhāma idha pana cetasikesu sappītikāni vedanā vajjitāni cha cetasikāni

original: eva pañcahipi vedanāhi sampayuttāni, itarāni pana kāyikasukhadukkhavajjitāhi tīheva.
analyzed: eva pañcahi pi vedanāhi sampayuttāni itarāni pana kāyika sukha dukkha vajjitāhi tīhi eva

original: Tesu ca pītivajjitā pañca yathāyogikā ceva moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccaṃ thinaṃ
analyzed: tesu ca pīti vajjitā pañca yathāyogikā ca iva mohaḥ ahirikam anottappam uddhaccam thinam

original: middhañcāti ime ekādasa yathāyogaṃ tīhipi. Tatthāpi vitakkavicārā mahaggatalokuttarabhūtāya
analyzed: ime ekādasa yathāyogam vitakka vicārāḥ mahaggata lokuttara bhūtāya

original: sukhāya eva, pīti pana sabbattha sukhāya eva, dosaissāmaccherakukkuccāni dukkhāya
analyzed: sukhāya eva pi iti pana sabbattha sukhāya eva dosaiḥ sāma acchera kukkuccāni dukkhāya

original: eva, vicikicchā upekkhāya eva, sesāni aṭṭhavīsatisomanassupekkhāhi eva vedanāhi sampayuttāni,
analyzed: eva vicikicchā upekkhāya eva sesāni aṭṭhavīsati somanassa upekkhāhi eva vedanāhi sampayuttāni

original: tatthāpi karuṇāmuditā mahaggatabhūtāya sukhāya evāti ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ cittasampayogasadisaṃ.
analyzed: tattha api karuṇā muditā mahaggata bhūtāya sukhāya eva ati ayam visesaḥ sesam citta sampayoga sadisam

original: Ayaṃ sarūpato vinicchayo.
analyzed: ayam sarūpataḥ

original: Navattabbavibhāgatoti imasmiṃ tike sabbā vedanā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānaṃ sammutiyoti
analyzed: nava ttabba vibhāgato ti imasmim tike sabbā vedanā sabbam rūpam nibbānam sammutiyo ti

original: ime dhammā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti vā “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti vā
analyzed: ime dhammā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā ati vā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā ati vā

original: “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti vā na vattabbā. Na hi vedanā vedanāya sampayuttā
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā ati vā na vattabbā na hi vedanā vedanāya sampayuttā

original: hoti rūpādayo vā, tasmā ime imasmiṃ tike na labbhanti. Ayañca sappadesattiko hoti.
analyzed: hoti rūpa ādayaḥ vā tasmai ime imasmin tike na labbhanti ayam ca sa padesa ttikaḥ hoti

original: Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresupi tikadukesu navattabbayojanā. Yaṃ yasmiñca na vuttaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca ittha evam itas paresu pi tika dukesu nava ttabba yojanā yam yasmin ca na vuttam

original: atthi, tassa sappadesatā veditabbā. Ito paraṃ pana yattha asaṅgahitā dhammā honti,
analyzed: atthi tassa sappadesa tā veditabbā itas param pana yattha asaṅgahitāḥ dhammāḥ honti

original: tattha tesaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetvā “ime navattabbā”ti ettakameva vakkhāma, tenassa sappadesatāpi
analyzed: tattha tesam vibhāgam dassetvā ime nava ttabbā ti ettakam eva vakkhāma tena assa sappadesa tā api

original: ñātabbā. Yattha pana asaṅgahitā natthi, taṃ nippadesanti vakkhāma. Tena tattha navattabbābhāvopi
analyzed: ñātabbā yattha pana asaṅgahitā natthi tam nippadesam ti vakkhāma tena tattha navattabba abhāvaḥ pi

original: viññātabbo. Sabbattha pana mātikaṃ anuddharitvāva padatthaṃ, taṃsarūpavibhāgañca
analyzed: viññātabbaḥ sabbattha pana mātikam an uddharitvā ava padattham taṃsarūpa vibhāgam ca

original: vakkhāma. Ayaṃ navattabbavibhāgato vinicchayo.
analyzed: vakkhāma ayam nava ttabba vibhāgataḥ vinicchayo

original: Vedanāttikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: vedanā tikam niṭṭhitam

original: Vipākattike aññamaññavisiṭṭhānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ pākāti vipākā, vipakkabhāvamāpannānaṃ
analyzed: vipāka ttike aññamañña visiṭṭhānam kusala akusalānam pākā ati vipākāḥ vipakka bhāvam āpannānam

original: arūpadhammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Kiñcāpi arūpadhammā viya rūpadhammāpi kammasamuṭṭhānā
analyzed: arūpa dhammānam etam adhivacanam kiñca api arūpa dhammāḥ viya rūpa dhammāḥ api kamma samuṭṭhānā

original: atthi, anārammaṇattā pana te kammasarikkhakā na hontīti sārammaṇā arūpadhammāva kammasarikkhattā
analyzed: atthi anārammaṇa ttā pana te kamma sarikkhakāḥ na honti iti sa ārammaṇāḥ arūpa dhammāḥ va kamma sarikkhattā

original: vipākāti vuttā bījasarikkhakaṃ phalaṃ viya. Yathā hi sālibījato nikkhantasīsameva
analyzed: vipākā ti vuttā bīja sarikkhakam phalam viya yathā hi sāli bījataḥ nikkhanta sīsam eva

original: sāliphalanti vuccati, na aṅkurādīni, tāni pana “sālijātāni, sālinibbattāni cā”ti
analyzed: sāliphalanti vuccati na aṅkura ādīni tāni pana sāli jātāni sāli nibbattāni ca ati

original: vuccanti, evaṃ kammasadisā arūpadhammāva “vipākā”ti vuccanti, rūpadhammā pana kammajā
analyzed: vuccanti evam kamma sadisāḥ arūpa dhammāḥ vipākā ti vuccanti rūpa dhammāḥ pana kamma jā

original: “upādinnā”ti vuccanti. Vipākadhammadhammāti vipākasabhāvā dhammā. Yathā hi jātijarāsabhāvā
analyzed: upādinnā ati vuccanti vipāka dhamma dhammā ati vipāka sabhāvāḥ dhammāḥ yathā hi jāti jarā sabhāvā

original: sattā “jātidhammā jarādhammā”ti vuccanti, evaṃ vipākajanakaṭṭhena vipākasabhāvā vipākapakatikā
analyzed: sattā jāti dhammā jarā dhammā ti vuccanti evam vipāka janaka ṭṭhena vipāka sabhāvā vipāka pakatikā

original: dhammāti attho. Tatiyapadaṃ ubhayasabhāvapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ, ayaṃ padattho.
analyzed: dhammā ti attho tatiya padam ubhaya sabhāva paṭikkhepa vasena vuttam ayam padattho

original: Tattha catūsu bhūmīsu chattiṃsa vipākacittāni vipākā nāma, tathā ekavīsati kusalāni,
analyzed: tattha catūsu bhūmīsu chattiṃsa vipāka cittāni vipākāḥ nāma tathā ekavīsati kusalāni

original: dvādasa akusalāni cāti tettiṃsa vipākadhammadhammā nāma, tīsu bhūmīsu vīsati kiriyacittāni,
analyzed: dvādasa akusalāni ca ati tettiṃsa vipāka dhamma dhammāḥ nāma tīsu bhūmīsu vīsati kiriya cittāni

original: sabbañca rūpaṃ, nibbānañcāti ime nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā nāma. Cetasikesu
analyzed: sabbam ca rūpam nibbānam ca ati ime na iva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammāḥ nāma cetasikesu

analyzed: pana cuddasa akusalāḥ vipāka dhamma dhammāḥ eva viratiyaḥ siyā vipākā siyā vipāka dhamma dhammā

original: tadavasesā pana siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammāti
analyzed: tad avasesā pana siyā vipākā siyā vipāka dhamma dhammā siyā neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammā ti

original: cittaṃ viya tividhā hontīti ayaṃ viseso, sesaṃ cittasamaṃ, idañca nippadesattikanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: cittam viya tividhāḥ honti iti ayam visesaḥ sesam citta samam idam ca nippadesa ttikan ti veditabbam

original: Vipākattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: vipāka ttikam niṭṭhitam

original: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā ādinnā phalabhāvena gahitāti upādinnā,

analyzed: sa āsava kamma nibbattānam rūpa arūpa dhammānam etam adhivacanam iminā nayena sesa pada dvaye pi

original: paṭisedhasahito attho veditabbo.
analyzed: paṭisedha sahitaḥ atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Tattha dvattiṃsa lokiyavipākacittāni, nava kammajakalāpā ca upādinnupādāniyā nāma.
analyzed: tattha dvattiṃsa lokiya vipāka cittāni nava kamma ja kalāpā ca upādinnupādāniyāḥ nāma

analyzed: avasesa lokiya cittāni ca iva akamma ja rūpa kalāpā ca anupādinnupādāniyāḥ nāma lokuttara citta nibbānāni

original: anupādinnaanupādāniyā nāma. Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavānaṃ upādānakkhandhā “amhākaṃ mātulatthero”tiādinā
analyzed: anupādinnaanupādāniyāḥ nāma kiñcā api khīṇa āsavānam upādāna kkhandhāḥ amhākam mātulatthera iti ādinā

original: vadantānaṃ paresaṃ upādānassa ārammaṇapaccayā honti, maggaphalanibbānāni pana divasaṃ

analyzed: viya makkhikāhi tejussadattāḥ upādānehi an upādinna an eva asaṃkiliṭṭha asaṃkilesikesu pi

analyzed: cetasikesu pana kusalā anupādinnupādāniyā eva karuṇā muditā siyā upādinnupādāniyā

original: siyā anupādinnupādāniyā viratiyo pana siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā,
analyzed: siyā anupādinnupādāniyā viratiyā pana siyā anupādinnupādāniyā siyā anupādinna anupādāniyā

original: sesā cittaṃ viya tividhā honti, idañca nippadesattikanti veditabbaṃ. Upādinnupādāniyattikaṃ.
analyzed: sesā cittam viya tividhāḥ honti idam ca nippadesattikan ti veditabbam upādinnupādāniyattikaṃ

original: Saṃkilesetīti saṃkileso, vibādhati upatāpetīti attho. Saṃkilesena sampayuttā saṃkiliṭṭhā,

original: saṃkilese vā niyuttā tassa ārammaṇabhāvaṃ anatikkamanatoti saṃkilesikā, saṃkilesassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayabhūtānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Saṃkiliṭṭhā ca te saṃkilesikā cāti saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccaya bhūtānam etam adhivacanam saṃkiliṭṭhā ca te saṃkilesikā ca ati saṃkiliṭṭha saṃkilesikā

original: Sesapadadvayaṃ purimattike vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sesa pada dvayam purima ttike vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Tattha dvādasa akusalacittuppādā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā nāma. Sesalokiyacittāni ceva
analyzed: tattha dvādasa akusala cittuppādā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikāḥ nāma sesa lokiya cittāni ca iva

original: sabbaṃ rūpañca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā nāma. Lokuttaracittāni, nibbānañca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā
analyzed: sabbam rūpam ca asaṃkiliṭṭha saṃkilesikā nāma lokuttara cittāni nibbānam ca asaṃkiliṭṭha asaṃkilesikā
