original: Evaṃ vibhattesu ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu taṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādāyupādāya hīnaṃ, paṇītañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam vibhattesu ca iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu tam tam rūpam upādāya upādāya hīnam paṇītam ca daṭṭhabbam

original: Sukhumaṃ pana rūpaṃ dūrerūpaṃ nāma, oḷārikaṃ santikerūpaṃ nāma. Taṃ taṃ vā pana rūpaṃ
analyzed: sukhumam pana rūpam dūrerūpam nāma oḷārikam santikerūpam nāma tam tam vā pana rūpam

original: upādāyupādāya rūpaṃ dūre santike daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: upādāya upādāya rūpam dūre santike daṭṭhabbam sesam vutta nayam eva

original: Vedanādīsu pana akusalā vedanā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Kusalākusalā oḷārikā, abyākatā
analyzed: vedanā ādīsu pana akusalā vedanā oḷārikā itarā sukhumā kusala akusalā oḷārikā abyākatā

original: sukhumā. Dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Sukhadukkhā vā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā.
analyzed: sukhumā dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā itarā sukhumā sukha dukkhā vai oḷārikā itarā sukhumā

original: Asamāpannassa vā vedanā oḷārikā, samāpannassa sukhumā. Sāsavā oḷārikā, anāsavā sukhumā.
analyzed: asamāpannassa vā vedanā oḷārikā samāpannassa sukhumā sa āsavā oḷārikā anāsavā sukhumā

original: Taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumatā daṭṭhabbā. Akusalā vedanā
analyzed: tam tam vā pana vedanam upādāya upādāya oḷārika sukhuma tā daṭṭhabbā akusalā vedanā

original: kusalābyākatāhi dūre, tā ca tāya dūreti evaṃ jātisabhāvapuggalabhūmibhedato vuttanayena
analyzed: dūre ca dūra iti evam jāti sabhāva puggala bhūmi bhedataḥ vutta nayena

original: dūrevedanā daṭṭhabbā, kusalā vedanā kusalāya santiketi evaṃ jātiādisāmaññato santikevedanā
analyzed: dūre vedanā daṭṭhabbā kusalā vedanā kusalāya santikā iti evam jāti ādi sāmaññato santikevedanā

original: daṭṭhabbā. Taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya vedanā dūresantike daṭṭhabbā. Evaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā tam tam vā pana vedanam upādāya upādāya vedanā dūre santike daṭṭhabbā evam

original: saññākkhandhādīsupi yathānurūpaṃ oḷārikasukhumatādayo veditabbāti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
analyzed: saññā kkhandha ādīsu pi yathānurūpam oḷārika sukhuma tā ādayaḥ veditabbā ti ayam ettha saṅkhepo

original: vitthāro pana vibhaṅgapāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu gahetabboti ayaṃ suttantabhājanīyanayo.
analyzed: vitthāraḥ pana vibhaṅga pāḷi aṭṭhakathāsu gahetabbo ti ayam suttanta bhājanīya nayo

original: Abhidhammabhājanīyanaye rūpakkhandhassa tāva ekavidhādito yāva ekādasavidhā rūpakaṇḍe
analyzed: abhidhamma bhājanīya naye rūpakkhandhassa tāva ekavidha āditas yāva ekādasavidhā rūpa kaṇḍe

original: vuttanayena veditabbā. Vedanākkhandho pana ekavidho phassasampayutto, duvidho sahetukadukavasena,
analyzed: vutta nayena veditabbā vedanā khandho pana ekavidhaḥ phassa sampayuttaḥ duvidhaḥ sa hetuka duka vasena

original: tividho kusalattikavasena, catubbidho catubhūmakavasena, pañcavidho sabhāvabhedena,
analyzed: tividhaḥ kusala ttika vasena catubbidhaḥ catu bhūmaka vasena pañcavidhaḥ sa bhāva bhedena

original: chabbidho chadvārikavasena, sattavidho sattaviññāṇasampayogavasena, aṭṭhavidho tesu
analyzed: chabbidho cha dvārika vasena sattavidho satta viññāṇa sampayoga vasena aṭṭhavidho tesu

original: kāyaviññāṇasampayuttaṃ sukhadukkhavasena dvidhā bhinditvā, navavidho tesu manoviññāṇasampayuttaṃ
analyzed: kāya viññāṇa sampayuttam sukha dukkha vasena dvidhā bhinditvā navavidhaḥ tesu manaḥ viññāṇa sampayuttam

original: kusalattikavasena tidhā bhinditvā, dasavidho tesu kāyaviññāṇasampayuttaṃ duvidhā,
analyzed: kusala ttika vasena tidhā bhinditvā dasavidhaḥ tesu kāya viññāṇa sampayuttam duvidhā

original: manoviññāṇasampayuttañca tidhā bhinditvāti evaṃ sahetukadukamūlaṃ paṭhamavāraṃ vatvā
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa sampayuttam ca tidhā bhinditvā ati evam sa hetuka duka mūlam paṭhama vāram vatvā

original: puna kusalattikaṭṭhāne vedanāttikapītittikasanidassanattikavajjite sabbattike yojetvā
analyzed: puna kusala ttika ṭṭhāne vedanā ttika pīti ttika sani dassana ttika vajjite sabba ttike yojetvā

original: yāva dasavidhā, aparepi aṭṭhārasa vārā vuttā. Yathā cettha sahetukadukamūlikā sabbattikayojanā,
analyzed: yāva dasavidhāḥ apare pi aṭṭhārasa vārāḥ vuttāḥ yathā ca ittha sa hetuka duka mūlikā sabbattika yojanā

original: evaṃ hetusampayuttadukādīsu anurūpadukamūlikāpi saraṇadukapariyosānā paccekaṃ sabbattikayojanāpi
analyzed: evam hetu sampayutta duka ādīsu anurūpa duka mūlikā api saraṇa duka pariyosānā paccekam sabba ttika yojanā api

original: veditabbāti ayaṃ dukamūlako yojanānayo. Yathā ca ekekadukena sabbattikayojanāvasena
analyzed: veditabbā ti ayam duka mūlakaḥ yojana anayaḥ yathā ca ekeka dukena sabba ttika yojana avasena

original: dukamūlako nayo vutto, evaṃ ekekattikena yathānurūpaṃ sabbadukayojanāvasena tikamūlako,
analyzed: duka mūlakaḥ nayaḥ vuttaḥ evam ekeka ttikena yathānurūpam sabba duka yojanā vasena tika mūlakaḥ

original: tadubhayamissakavasena ubhatovaḍḍhanako ca nayo veditabbo. Yathā cettha vedanākkhandhe,
analyzed: tad ubhaya missaka vasena ubhatovaḍḍhanakaḥ ca nayaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā ca ittha vedanā khandhe

original: evaṃ saññākkhandhādīsupi yathārahaṃ dukamūlakādinayā veditabbāti ayaṃ abhidhammabhājanīyanayo.
analyzed: evam saññā khandha ādīsu pi yathāraham duka mūlaka ādi nayā veditabbā ati ayam abhidhamma bhājanīya nayaḥ

original: Pañhāpucchakanaye pana pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā,
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka naye pana pañcannam khandhānam kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatā

original: kati sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā…pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇāti? Rūpakkhandho abyākato,
analyzed: kati sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāpe kati saraṇā kati araṇā ati rūpakkhandhaḥ abyākataḥ

original: cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā, rūpaṃ, vedanā ca vedanāttike
analyzed: cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā rūpam vedanā ca vedanā attike

original: na vattabbā, sesā tidhāpi honti, rūpaṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ, siyā upādinnupādāniyaṃ,
analyzed: na vattabbā sesā tidhā api honti rūpam na iva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam siyā upādinnupādāniyam

original: siyā anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ, sesā cattāro khandhā tīhi tikehi
analyzed: siyā anupādinnupādāniyam asaṃkiliṭṭha saṃkilesikam sesā cattāro khandhā tīhi tikehi

original: tidhāpi honti. Rūpaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ, tayo khandhā tidhāpi honti, saṅkhārakkhandho
analyzed: tidhā api honti rūpam a vitakka a vicāram tayaḥ khandhā tidhā api honti saṅkhāra kkhandho

original: tidhā ca na vattabbo ca. Rūpaṃ na vattabbaṃ, vedanā siyā pītisahagatā, na vattabbā,
analyzed: tidhā ca na vattabbaḥ ca rūpam na vattabbam vedanā siyā pīti sahagatā na vattabbā

original: tayo tidhā ca na vattabbā ca. Rūpaṃ nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbaṃ, nadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbahetukaṃ,
analyzed: tayaḥ tidhā ca na vattabbā ca rūpam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya apahātabbam na dassanena na bhāvanāya apahātabba hetukam

original: nevācayagāminaapacayagāmi, nevasekhaṃnāsekhaṃ, parittaṃ, sesā tidhāpi honti. Parittārammaṇattike
analyzed: neva ācaya gāmi na apacaya gāmi na iva asekham na asekham parittam sesā tidhā api honti paritta ārammaṇa ttike

original: rūpaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, sesā tidhā ca na vattabbā ca. Rūpaṃ majjhimaṃ, aniyataṃ, sesā
analyzed: rūpam anārammaṇam sesā tidhā ca na vattabbā ca rūpam majjhimam aniyatam sesā

original: tidhāpi. Maggārammaṇattike ca rūpaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, sesā tidhāpi vā na vattabbā. Uppannātītattikesu
analyzed: tidhā api magga ārammaṇa ttike ca rūpam anārammaṇam sesā tidhā api vā na vattabbā uppanna atīta ttikesu

original: pañcapi tidhā honti. Atītārammaṇattike rūpaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, sesā tidhā ca na vattabbā
analyzed: pañca api tidhā honti atīta ārammaṇa ttike rūpam anārammaṇam sesā tidhā ca na vattabbā

original: ca. Ajjhattattike pañcapi tidhā honti. Ajjhattārammaṇattike rūpaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, sesā
analyzed: ca ajjhatta ttike pañca api tidhā honti ajjhatta ārammaṇa ttike rūpam anārammaṇam sesā

original: tidhāpi na vattabbā ca. Cattāro khandhā anidassanaappaṭighā, rūpakkhandho tidhāpi hoti.
analyzed: tidhā api na vattabbā ca cattāro khandhāḥ anidassana appaṭighāḥ rūpa kkhandho tidhā api hoti

original: Cattāro khandhā nahetū, saṅkhārakkhandho siyā hetu, siyā na hetu. Rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ,
analyzed: cattāro khandhāḥ na hetū saṅkhāra kkhandho siyā hetu siyā na hetu rūpam ahetukam

original: hetuvippayuttaṃ, sesā dvidhāpi. Tayo khandhā siyā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū, siyā
analyzed: hetu vippayuttam sesāḥ dvidhā api tayo khandhāḥ siyā sa hetukā ca iva na ca hetū siyā

original: na vattabbā ca, saṅkhārakkhandho dvidhā ca na vattabbo ca, rūpaṃ na vattabbameva.
analyzed: na vattabbā ca saṅkhāra kkhandho dvidhā ca na vattabbaḥ ca rūpam na vattabbam eva

original: Tathā anantaradukepi. Rūpaṃ nahetuahetukaṃ, tayo dvidhāpi, saṅkhārakkhandho dvidhā
analyzed: rūpam na hetu ahetukam dvidhā api saṅkhāra kkhandhaḥ dvidhā

original: ca na vattabbo ca. Pañcapi sappaccayā, saṅkhatā, cattāro anidassanā, appaṭighā, rūpaṃ
analyzed: ca na vattabbaḥ ca sa paccayā saṅkhatā cattāro anidassanāḥ appaṭighāḥ rūpam

original: dvidhāpi. Rūpaṃ rūpī, sesā arūpino. Rūpaṃ lokiyaṃ, sesā dvidhāpi. Pañcapi kenaci
analyzed: dvidhā api rūpam rūpī sesāḥ arūpinaḥ rūpam lokiyam sesāḥ dvidhā api pañca api kenacid

original: viññeyyā, na ca kenaci viññeyyā ca. Cattāro no āsavā, saṅkhārā dvidhāpi, na vattabbā
analyzed: viññeyyā na ca kenacid viññeyyā ca cattāraḥ no āsavā saṅkhārāḥ dvidhā api na vattabbā

original: ca. Rūpaṃ sāsavo, āsavavippayutto, sesā dvidhāpi. Rūpaṃ sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā,
analyzed: ca rūpam sa āsavaḥ āsava vippayutto sesā dvidhā api rūpam sa āsavā ca iva no ca āsavā

original: tayo tathā ca na vattabbā ca. Saṅkhāro dvidhā ca na vattabbo ca. Rūpaṃ na vattabbameva,
analyzed: tayo tathā ca na vattabbā ca saṅkhāraḥ dvidhā ca na vattabbaḥ ca rūpam na vattabbam eva

original: tayo siyā āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā, siyā na vattabbā, saṅkhāro dvidhā ca
analyzed: tayo siyā āsava sampayuttā ca iva no ca āsavā siyā na vattabbā saṅkhāraḥ dvidhā ca

original: na vattabbo ca. Rūpaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca, sesā dvidhā ca na vattabbā ca.
analyzed: na vattabbaḥ ca rūpam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam ca sesā dvidhā ca na vattabbā ca

original: Iminā nayena saṃyojanagocchakādīsupi yojanā veditabbā. Kevalaṃ hi parāmāsasampayuttaduke
analyzed: iminā nayena yojanā veditabbā kevalam hi

original: rūpaṃ parāmāsavippayuttaṃ, tayo dvidhāpi, saṅkhāro dvidhāpi, diṭṭhivasena na vattabbo
analyzed: rūpam parāmāsa vippayuttam tayaḥ dvidhā api saṅkhāraḥ dvidhā api diṭṭhi vasena na vattabbaḥ

original: ca. Tatiye ettakameva viseso. Rūpaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, sesā sārammaṇā. Viññāṇaṃ cittaṃ,
analyzed: ca tatiye ettakam eva visesaḥ rūpam anārammaṇam sesā sārammaṇā viññāṇam cittam

original: sesā no cittā. Tayo cetasikā, dve acetasikā. Tayo cittasampayuttā, rūpaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ.
analyzed: sesā no cittā tayo cetasikā dve acetasikā tayo citta sampayuttā rūpam citta vippayuttaṃ

original: Viññāṇaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Tathā cittasaṃsaṭṭhadukepi. Tayo cittasamuṭṭhānā, viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: viññāṇam na vattabbam tathā citta saṃsaṭṭha duke pi tayo citta samuṭṭhānāḥ viññāṇam

original: no cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Rūpaṃ dvidhāpi. Tathā anantaradukadvayepi. Tayo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā,
analyzed: no citta samuṭṭhānam rūpam dvidhā api tathā anantara duka dvaye pi citta saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhānā

original: dve no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā. Tathā anantaradukadvayepi. Viññāṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ,
analyzed: dve no citta saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhānā tathā anantara duka dvaye pi viññāṇam ajjhattikam

original: tayo bāhirā, rūpaṃ dvidhāpi. Cattāro no upādā. Rūpaṃ dvidhāpi. Pañcapi siyā upādinnā,
analyzed: tayaḥ bāhirāḥ rūpam dvidhā api cattāraḥ no upādāḥ rūpam dvidhā api pañca api siyā upādinnā

original: siyā anupādinnā, no upādānā.
analyzed: siyāḥ anupādinnā no upādānā

original: Kilesagocchako vuttanayova. Rūpaṃ nevadassanenanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ, sesā dvidhāpi. Evaṃ yāvapītidukā yojanā veditabbā.
analyzed: kilesa gocchakaḥ rūpam pahātabbam sesā dvidhā api evam yojanā veditabbā

original: Rūpaṃ na vedanā, na sukhā, na sukhasahagatā, sesā dvidhāpi. Tathā anantaradukepi. Rūpaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, sesā dvidhāpi. Evaṃ yāva saraṇadukā yojanā veditabbā. Ayaṃ pañhāpucchakanayo.
analyzed: rūpam na vedanā na sukhā na sukha sahagatā sesā dvidhā api tathā anantara duke pi rūpam kāmāvacaram sesā dvidhā api evam yāva saraṇa dukā yojanā veditabbā ayam pañhāpucchaka nayo

original: Ime pana nayā vitthārato pāḷiaṭṭhakathāhi ñātabbā. Atthavinicchayo ca nesaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇīmātikatthasaṃvaṇṇanāya
analyzed: ime pana nayāḥ vitthārato pāḷi aṭṭhakathāhi ñātabbāḥ attha vinicchayo ca na esam dhamma saṅgaṇī mātikā ttha saṃvaṇṇanāya

original: vuttānusārena ñātabbo. Ito paraṃ atirekaṃ avatvā apubbameva vaṇṇayissāmāti ayaṃ vibhaṅganayadassanato saṃvaṇṇanānayo.
analyzed: vutta anusārena ñātabbaḥ itas param atirekam a vatvā apubbam eva vaṇṇayissāma iti ayam vibhaṅga naya dassanato saṃvaṇṇanā nayaḥ

original: Idāni panettha –
analyzed: idāni pana itthā

original: Kamatonūnādhikato, daṭṭhabbasamabhedato;
analyzed: daṭṭhabba sama bhedataḥ

original: Pāḷimuttanayo ñeyyo, khandhakosallamicchatā.
analyzed: pāḷimuttanayaḥ ñeyyaḥ khandha kosallam icchatā

original: Tattha kamatoti ettha uppattikkamo pahānakkamo paṭipattikkamo bhūmikkamo desanākkamoti
analyzed: tattha kamataḥ ti ettha uppatti kkamaḥ pahāna kkamaḥ paṭipatti kkamaḥ bhūmi kkamaḥ desanā kkamo ti

original: bahuvidhesu kamesu khandhānaṃ desanākkamova yujjati, na itare, asambhavā. Abhedena
analyzed: bahuvidhesu kamesu khandhānam desanā kkamaḥ uva yujjati na itare asambhavāḥ abhedena

original: hi pañcasu khandhesu attaggāhapatitaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanena
analyzed: hi pañcasu khandhesu attaggāha patitam veneyya janam samūha ghana vinibbhoga dassanena

original: attaggāhato mocetukāmo bhagavā hitakāmo tassa tassa janassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ cakkhuādīnaṃ
analyzed: atta ggāhataḥ mocetu kāmaḥ bhagavā hita kāmaḥ tassa tassa janassa sukha ggahaṇa attham cakkhu ādīnam

original: visayabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ paṭhamaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ desesi, tato iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayasaṃvedakaṃ
analyzed: visaya bhūtam oḷārikam paṭhamam rūpakkhandham desesi tatas iṭṭha aniṭṭha visaya saṃvedakam

original: oḷārikaṃ vedanaṃ, yaṃ vedeti, taṃ sañjānātīti evaṃ vedanāvisayassa ākāraggāhikaṃ
analyzed: oḷārikam vedanam yam vedeti tam sañjānāti iti evam vedanā visayassa ākāraggāhikam

original: saññaṃ, saññāvasenābhisaṅkhārake saṅkhāre, tesaṃ vedanādīnaṃ nissayādhipatibhūtaṃ
analyzed: saññam saññā vasena abhisaṅkhārake saṅkhāre tesam vedanā ādīnam nissaya adhipati bhūtam

original: viññāṇanti ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
analyzed: viññāṇan ti ayam tāva ettha kamaḥ

original: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā pañceva khandhā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti? Sabbasaṅkhatasabhāgekasaṅgahato,
analyzed: anūna adhikato ti kasmā pana bhagavatā pañca iva khandhāḥ vuttāḥ anūnā anadhikā ati sabba saṅkhata sa bhāga eka saṅgahato

original: attattaniyaggāhavatthussa etapparamato, aññesañca tadavarodhato. Anekappabhedesu
analyzed: etad paramataḥ aññesam ca tad avarodhataḥ aneka ppabhedesu

original: hi saṅkhatadhammesu sabhāgavasena saṅgayhamānesu rūpaṃ rūpasabhāgekasaṅgahavasena
analyzed: hi saṅkhata dhammesu sa bhāga vasena saṅgayhamānesu rūpam rūpa sabhāga eka saṅgaha vasena

original: eko khandho hoti, vedanā vedanāsabhāgekasaṅgahavasena eko khandho hoti. Esa nayo
analyzed: ekaḥ khandhaḥ hoti vedanā vedanā sabhāga eka saṅgaha vasena ekaḥ khandhaḥ hoti esa nayo

original: saññādīsupi, tasmā sabbasaṅkhatasabhāgekasaṅgahato pañceva vuttā. Etaparamañcetaṃ
analyzed: saññā ādīsu pi pañca iva vuttāḥ

original: paṭhamaṃ desitāni, tato ghānāyatanādīni tīṇi, pañcannampi pana gocaravisayattā ante
analyzed: paṭhamam desitāni tatas ghāna āyatana ādīni tīṇi pana gocara visaya ttā ante

original: manāyatanaṃ, cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ gocarattā tesaṃ anantaraṃ rūpāyatanādīni. Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi
analyzed: manāyatanam cakkhāyatana ādīnam gocara ttā tesam anantaram rūpāyatana ādīni api ca viññāṇa uppatti kāraṇa vavatthānataḥ pi

original: ayametesaṃ kamo veditabbo. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
analyzed: ayam etesam kamaḥ veditabbaḥ vuttam ha etam cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇam pe

original: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
analyzed: manam ca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manaḥ viññāṇan ti ayam tāva ettha kamaḥ

original: Tāvattatoti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva, evaṃ sati
analyzed: tāvattataḥ ti tāvabhāvataḥ idam vuttam hoti cakkha ādayaḥ api hi dhammāḥ eva evam sati

original: dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanāni vuttānīti ce? Chaviññāṇakāyuppattiyā
analyzed: dhammāyatanam iccā iva avatvā kasmā dvādasa āyatanāni vuttāni iti ce cha viññāṇa kāya uppattiyā

original: dvārārammaṇavavatthānato ayametesaṃ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni. Cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa
analyzed: dvāra ārammaṇa vavatthānataḥ ayam etesam bhedaḥ hoti iti dvādasa vuttāni cakkhu viññāṇa vīthi pariyāpannassa

original: hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ, rūpāyatanamevārammaṇaṃ. Tathā itarāni
analyzed: hi viññāṇa kāyassa cakkhāyatanam eva uppatti dvāram rūpāyatanam eva ārammaṇam tathā itarāni

original: itaresaṃ. Chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadesova uppattidvāraṃ,
analyzed: itaresam chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅga mana saṅkhāto mana āyatana ekadesaḥ upa uppatti dvāram

original: asādhāraṇañca dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇanti. Iti channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
analyzed: asādhāraṇam ca dhamma āyatanam ārammaṇanti iti channam viññāṇa kāyānam uppatti dvāra ārammaṇa vavatthānato

original: dvādasa vuttānīti ayamettha tāvattatā.
analyzed: dvādasa vuttāni iti ayam ettha tāvattatā

original: Daṭṭhabbabhedatoti ettha pana sabbāni cetāni āyatanāni anāgamanato, aniggamanato
analyzed: daṭṭhabba bhedataḥ ti ettha pana sabbāni cetāni āyatanāni anāgamanataḥ aniggamanataḥ

analyzed: ca daṭṭhabbāni na hi tāni pubbe kutoci āgacchanti na pi uddham vayā kuhiñci

original: gacchanti, atha kho pubbe udayā appaṭiladdhasabhāvāni uddhaṃ vayā paribhinnasabhāvāni,
analyzed: gacchanti atha kho pubbe udayā a paṭiladdha sabhāvāni uddham vayā paribhinna sabhāvāni

original: pubbantāparantavemajjhe paccayāyattavuttitāya avasāni pavattanti, tasmā anāgamanato,
analyzed: pubbanta aparanta vemajjhe paccaya āyatta vutti tāya avasāni pavattanti tasmai an āgamanato

original: aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni. Tathā nirīhato, abyāpārato ca. Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ
analyzed: aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni tathā nirīhataḥ abyāpārato ca na hi cakkhu rūpa ādīnam

original: evaṃ hoti “aho vata amhākaṃ sāmaggiyaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjeyyā”ti, na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṃ
analyzed: evam hoti aho vata amhākam sāmaggiyam viññāṇam nāma uppajjeyyāti na ca tāni viññāṇa uppādana attham

original: dvārabhāvena, vatthubhāvena, ārammaṇabhāvena vā byāpāramāpajjanti, atha kho dhammatāvesā
analyzed: dvāra bhāvena vatthu bhāvena ārammaṇa bhāvena vā byāpāram āpajjanti atha kho dhamma tā āvesā

original: yaṃ cakkhurūpādisāmaggiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavanti, tasmā nirīhato, abyāpārato
analyzed: yam cakkhu rūpa ādi sāmaggiyam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni sambhavanti tasmai nirīhataḥ a byāpārataḥ

original: ca daṭṭhabbāni. Apica ajjhattikāni suñño gāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā,
analyzed: ca daṭṭhabbāni apica ajjhattikāni suññaḥ gāmaḥ viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuva subha sukhatta bhāva virahita ttā

original: bāhirāni gāmaghātakacorā viya. Tathā ajjhattikāni chapāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni
analyzed: bāhirāni gāma ghātaka corā viya tathā ajjhattikāni chapāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni bāhirāni

original: tesaṃ gocarā viyāti ayamettha daṭṭhabbabhedo. Evaṃ pāḷimuttanayenettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: tesam gocarāḥ viyā ti ayam ettha daṭṭhabba bhedaḥ evam pāḷimutta nayena ittha viññātabbaḥ vinicchayo

original: Āyatanavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: āyatana vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dhātuvibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
Dhātuvibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti ettha vidahati, dhīyate,
analyzed: pana atthato tāva aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo ti ettha vidahati dhīyate

original: vidhānaṃ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātu. Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena
analyzed: vidhānam vidhīyate etāya ettha vā dhīyati iti dhātu lokiyāḥ hi kāraṇa bhāvena

original: vavatthitā. Anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti nipphādenti, sattehi ca dhīyante
analyzed: vavatthitāḥ aneka ppakāram saṃsāra dukkham vidahanti nipphādenti sattehi ca dhīyante

original: dhārīyanti, dukkhavidhānamattameva cetā, etāhi ca kāraṇabhūtāhi saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi

original: anuvidhīyati, yathāvihitañca dukkhaṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyatīti etehi atthehi yathāsambhavaṃ
analyzed: anuvidhīyati yathā vihitam ca dukkham etāsu eva dhīyati ṭhapīyati iti etehi atthehi yathāsambhavam

original: “dhātuyo”ti vuccanti.
analyzed: vuccanti

original: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññaṃ visabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu

original: dhātusamaññā, evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa cakkhādīsu dhātusamaññā
analyzed: dhātu samaññā evam etesu pi pañca kkhandha saṅkhātassa atta bhāvassa cakkha ādīsu dhātu samaññā

original: veditabbā. Lokiyalokuttarasādhāraṇatthavasena pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
analyzed: veditabbā lokiya lokuttara sādhāraṇa attha vasena pana attano sabhāvam dhārenti iti dhātuyaḥ

original: Nijjīvamattānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ dhātu cāti
analyzed: adhivacanam tasmai yathā vuttena atthena cakkhu ca tam dhātu ca ati

original: cakkhudhātu. Evaṃ sesesupīti ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: cakkhu dhātu evam sesesu pi iti ayam tāva ettha padattho

original: Dhammabhedato panettha āyatanesu vuttanayena veditabbo. Apica pañcadvārāvajjanasampaṭicchanadvayaviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: dhamma bhedataḥ pana ittha āyatanesu vutta nayena veditabbaḥ apica pañca dvāra āvajjana sampaṭicchana dvaya viññāṇam

original: manodhātu nāma. Pañcaviññāṇamanodhātuvajjitaṃ pana sabbampi viññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: manodhātu nāma pañca viññāṇa manaḥ dhātu vajjitam pana sabbam pi viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: nāma. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: nāma sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Vibhaṅganayato panettha suttantabhājanīye tāva – “pathavīdhātu āpo tejo vāyo ākāsaviññāṇadhātū”ti
analyzed: vibhaṅganayataḥ pana ittha suttanta bhājanīye tāva pathavī dhātu āpo tejaḥ vāyo ākāsa viññāṇa dhātu uti

original: cha dhātuyo uddisitvā ādito pañca ajjhattikabāhiravasena, pacchimā ca cha viññāṇavasena
analyzed: cha dhātuyaḥ uddisitvā āditas pañca ajjhattika bāhira vasena pacchimā ca cha viññāṇa vasena

original: vibhattā, aparāpi “sukhadhātu dukkhasomanassadomanassupekkhāavijjādhātū”ti cha dhātuyo
analyzed: vibhattā aparā api sukha dhātu dukkha somanassa domanassa upekkhā avijjā dhātū ti cha dhātuyaḥ

original: uddisitvā tathā tathā vibhattā, puna aparāpi “kāmadhātu byāpādavihiṃsānekkhammaabyāpādaavihiṃsādhātū”ti
analyzed: uddisitvā tathā tathā vibhattā puna aparā api kāmadhātu byāpāda vihiṃsā nekkhamma a byāpāda avihiṃsā dhātu uti

original: cha dhātuyo uddisitvā, evaṃ tīhi chakkehi paccekaṃ tebhūmakā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo sarūpato,
analyzed: cha dhātuyaḥ uddisitvā evam tīhi chakkehi paccekam tebhūmakāḥ aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ sarūpato

original: lakkhaṇāhārato, nissayavisayapayogavinābhāvādito ca vuttāti veditabbāti ayaṃ suttantabhājanīyanayo.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āhārataḥ nissaya visaya payoga vinābhāva āditas ca vuttā ati veditabbā ati ayam suttanta bhājanīya nayaḥ

original: Abhidhammabhājanīye pana sarūpeneva aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo uddisitvā pasādavisayadhātuyo āyatane vuttanayena vibhattā, satta viññāṇadhātuyo pana –

original: “Tattha katamā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu? Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cittaṃ…pe… cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Ayaṃ vuccati cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… kāyaviññāṇadhātu.
analyzed: tattha katamā cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cittaṃpe cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ayam vuccati cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu pe kāya viññāṇa dhātu

original: “Tattha katamā manodhātu? Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā…pe… kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā…pe… niruddhasamanantarā
analyzed: tattha katamā manaḥ dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu yāpe kāya viññāṇa dhātu yāpe niruddha samanantarā

original: ayaṃ vuccati manodhātu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati manaḥ dhātu

original: “Tattha katamā dhammadhātu? Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho, yañca
analyzed: tattha katamā dhammadhātu vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho yat ca

original: rūpaṃ anidassanaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ, asaṅkhatā ca dhātu…pe… ayaṃ
analyzed: rūpam anidassanam appaṭigham dhamma āyatana pariyāpannam asaṅkha tā ca dhātupe ayam

original: vuccati dhammadhātu.
analyzed: vuccati dhammadhātu

original: “Tattha katamā manoviññāṇadhātu…pe… manodhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā
analyzed: tattha katamā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātupe manaḥ dhātuyā api uppajjitvā niruddha samanantarā

original: uppajjati cittaṃ…pe… manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati cittaṃ…pe… ayaṃ vuccati
analyzed: uppajjati cittaṃ pe manaṃ ca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati cittaṃ pe ayam vuccati

original: manoviññāṇadhātū”ti –
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti

original: Evaṃ vibhattā. Tattha sabbadhammesu vā pana paṭhamasamannāhāroti ettha pañcaviññāṇavisayesu
analyzed: evam vibhattā tattha sabba dhammesu vā pana paṭhama samannāhāraḥ ti ettha pañca viññāṇa visayesu

original: sabbadhammesūti evaṃ attho gahetabbo. Manodhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarāti

original: ettha pana pi-kāro sampiṇḍanattho, tasmā manodhātuyāpi santīraṇavoṭṭhabbanādimanoviññāṇadhātuyāpīti
analyzed: ettha pana pikāraḥ sampiṇḍana ttho tasmā manaḥ dhātuyā api santīraṇa voṭṭhabbana ādi manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā api iti

original: evamattho gahetabbo. Manañca paṭiccātiādīsu manodvāre bhavaṅgamanañceva catubhūmakadhammārammaṇañca
analyzed: evamatthaḥ gahetabbaḥ manam ca paṭicca ati ādīsu manaḥ dvāre bhavaṅga manam ca iva catu bhūmaka dhamma ārammaṇañca

original: paṭicca sahāvajjanakajavanaṃ nibbattatīti attho. Ayaṃ abhidhammabhājanīyanayo.
analyzed: paṭicca sahāvat janaka javanam nibbattati iti atthaḥ ayam abhidhamma bhājanīya nayaḥ

original: Pañhāpucchakanaye pana aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ kati kusalā…pe… kati araṇāti? Soḷasa
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka naye pana aṭṭhārasannam dhātūnam kati kati soḷasa

original: dhātuyo abyākatā, dve dhātuyo tidhāpi honti…pe… dasa dhātuyo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā,

original: dve dhātuyo tidhāpi honti. Dasa dhātuyo upādinnupādāniyā, saddadhātuyo anupādinnupādāniyā,

original: pañca dhātuyo siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, dve dhātuyo tidhāpi…pe…

original: dasa dhātuyo siyā uppannā, siyā uppādino, saddadhātu siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā,

analyzed: siyā na vattabbāḥ uppādino ti cha dhātuyaḥ tidhā api dhammadhātu rūpadhātu

original: sanidassanasappaṭighā, nava dhātuyo anidassanasappaṭighā, aṭṭha dhātuyo anidassanaappaṭighā.
analyzed: sa nidassana sa paṭighāḥ nava dhātuyaḥ anidassana sa paṭighāḥ aṭṭha dhātuyaḥ anidassana appaṭighā

original: Sattarasa dhātuyo na hetū, dhammadhātu dvidhāva…pe… soḷasa dhātuyo araṇā, dve dhātuyo
analyzed: sattarasa dhātuyaḥ na hetū dhammadhātu soḷasa dhātuyaḥ araṇā dve dhātuyaḥ

original: dvidhāpīti ayaṃ pañhāpucchakanayo.
analyzed: dvidhā api iti ayam

original: Idāni panetāsaṃ –
analyzed: idāni panetāsam

original: Kamatāvattato daṭṭhabbā, paccayānaṃ vibhāgato;
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā paccayānam vibhāgataḥ

original: Dhātūnamidha viññeyyo, pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
analyzed: dhātūnam idha viññeyyaḥ pāḷi mutta vinicchayo

original: Tattha kamato tāva idhāpi desanākkamova yujjati. So ca panāyaṃ hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasena
analyzed: tattha kamataḥ tāva idha api desanā kkamaḥ uva yujjati saḥ ca pana ayam hetu phala anupubba vavatthāna vasena

original: vutto. Cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūti idaṃ hi dvayaṃ hetu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti idaṃ phalaṃ.
analyzed: vuttaḥ cakkhu dhātu rūpa dhātu uti idam hi dvayam hetu cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu uti idam phalam

original: Evaṃ sabbattha. Ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
analyzed: evam sabbattha ayam tāva ettha kamaḥ

original: Tāvattato pana yā idha suttantabhājanīye tīhi chakkehi vuttā dhātuyo ceva, tesu tesu
analyzed: tāvat tatas pana yāḥ idha suttanta bhājanīye tīhi chakkehi vuttāḥ dhātuyaḥ ca iva tesu tesu

original: suttābhidhammapadesesu “ābhādhātu…pe… anekadhātunānādhātuloko”tiādinā āgatā cāti
analyzed: sutta abhidhamma padesesu ābhā dhātupe aneka dhātu nānā dhātu loka uti ādinā āgatā ca ati

original: aññāpi bahudhātuyo dissanti, tāsampi vasena paricchedaṃ avatvā kasmā aṭṭhāraseva
analyzed: aññā api bahu dhātuyaḥ dissanti tāsam pi vasena paricchedam avatvā kasmai aṭṭhārasā iva

original: vuttāti? Tāsampi tadantogadhattā.
analyzed: vuttā ati tāsam pi

original: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṃ tassā cakkhuviññāṇādibhedena anekataṃ,
analyzed: apica vijānana sabhāve viññāṇe jīva saññīnam tassā cakkhu viññāṇa ādi bhedena aneka tam

original: cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā tasmiṃ dīgharattānusayitajīvasaññāsamūhananatthañca
analyzed: cakkhu rūpa ādi paccaya āyatta vutti tāya anicca tañca pakāsetvā tasmin dīgha ratta anusayita jīva saññā samūhanana ttham ca

original: aṭṭhāraseva vuttā. Kiñca bhiyyo – veneyyajjhāsayavasena ca. Veneyyā hi arūpamūḷho
analyzed: aṭṭhārasā iva vuttā kiñca bhiyyas ca veneyyā hi arūpa mūḷhaḥ

analyzed: rūpa ādīnam niyata bhāvassa attanaḥ tikkha manda tā anuvidhānassa ca āpādanataḥ ādhipaccam

original: veditabbaṃ. Manindriyādīnaṃ pana attano attano vijānanādilakkhaṇe ādhipaccaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbam man indriya ādīnam pana attanaḥ attanaḥ vijānana ādi lakkhaṇe ādhipaccam veditabbam

original: Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: sesam su viññeyyam eva ayam tāva ettha padattho

original: Dhammabhedato panettha jīvitindriyaṃ rūpārūpavasena dvidhā. Sukhindriyādīni pañca
analyzed: dhamma bhedato pana ittha jīvitindriyam rūpa arūpa vasena dvidhā sukhindriya ādīni pañca

original: vedanābhāvato ekadhammo, tathā paññindriyādīni cattāri amohabhāvato. Sesāni pana
analyzed: vedanā bhāvato eka dhammo tathā paññindriya ādīni cattāri amoha bhāvato sesāni pana

original: indriyāni ekekadhammā evāti evaṃ paramatthato soḷasa dhammāva dvāvīsatindriyabhāvena
analyzed: indriyāni ekeka dhammāḥ eva ati evam paramatthato soḷasa dvāvīsati indriya bhāvena

original: desitāni. Sesāni panettha cetasikarūpanibbānāni asaṅgahitānīti ayaṃ dhammabhedo.
analyzed: desitāni sesāni pana ittha cetasika rūpa nibbānāni asaṅgahitāni iti ayam dhamma bhedaḥ

original: Vibhaṅganayato panettha suttantabhājanīyaṃ nāma na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Suttante imāya
analyzed: vibhaṅga nayataḥ pana ittha suttantabhājanīyam nāma na gahitam kasmā suttante imāya

original: paṭipāṭiyā dvāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ anāgatattā. Suttantasmiṃ hi katthaci dve indriyāni
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyāḥ dvāvīsatiyāḥ indriyānaṃ anāgata ttā suttantasmim hi katthaci dve indriyāni

original: kathitāni, katthaci tīṇi, katthaci pañca, evaṃ pana nirantaraṃ dvāvīsati āgatāni
analyzed: kathitāni katthaci tīṇi katthaci pañca evam pana nirantaram dvāvīsati āgatāni

original: nāma natthi. Abhidhammabhājanīyepi viseso natthi.
analyzed: nāma natthi abhidhamma bhājanīye pi visesaḥ natthi

original: Pañhāpucchakanaye pana dvāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ kati kusalā…pe… kati araṇāti? Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka naye pana dvāvīsatiyāḥ indriyānam kati kati

original: kusalaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ akusalaṃ, saddhāsatipaññāaññindriyāni cattāri kusalābyākatāni,
analyzed: kusalam domanassindriyam akusalam saddhā sati paññā aññindriyāni cattāri kusala abyākatāni

original: manajīvitasomanassaupekkhāvīriyasamādhindriyāni cha tidhāpi, sesāni dasa abyākatāni.
analyzed: mana jīvita so manassa aupekkhā vīriya samādhi indriyāni cha tidhā api sesāni dasa abyākatāni

original: Cha indriyāni siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāti,
analyzed: cha indriyāni siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā ati

original: tīṇi tidhāpi, jīvitaṃ tidhā ca na vattabbañca, dvādasindriyāni na vattabbāni eva.
analyzed: tīṇi tidhā api jīvitam tidhā ca na vattabbam ca dvādasa indriyāni na vattabbāni eva

original: Tīṇi vipākāni, dve vipākadhammadhammāni, rūpindriyāni satta nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammāni,
analyzed: tīṇi vipākāni dve vipāka dhamma dhammāni rūpa indriyāni satta neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammāni

original: aññindriyaṃ siyā vipākaṃ, siyā vipākadhammadhammaṃ, navindriyāni tidhāpi. Navindriyāni
analyzed: aññindriyam siyā vipākam siyā vipāka dhamma dhammam nava indriyāni tidhā api nava indriyāni

original: upādinnupādāniyāni, domanassindriyaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, tīṇi anupādinnaanupādāniyāni,
analyzed: upādinnupādāniyāni domanassindriyam anupādinnupādāniyam tīṇi anupādinna anupādāniyāni

original: nava tidhāpi. Domanassindriyaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ tathā ca avitakkaavicārañca,
analyzed: nava tidhā api domanassindriyam sa vitakka sa vicāram upekkhindriyam tathā ca avitakka avicāram ca

original: nava avitakkaavicārāni, ekādasa tidhāpi. Satta rūpindriyāni ceva sukhadukkhadomanassindriyāni
analyzed: nava avitakka avicārāni ekādasa tidhā api satta rūpa indriyāni ca iva sukha dukkha domanassa indriyāni

original: cāti dasa parittāni, pacchimāni tīṇi appamāṇāni, sesāni nava tidhāva. Tattha ca somanassindriyaṃ
analyzed: dasa parittāni pacchimāni tīṇi appamāṇāni sesāni nava tattha ca somanassindriyaṃ

original: rūpāvacaravaseneva mahaggataṃ, tadavasesāni arūpāvacaravasenāpīti veditabbaṃ. Pañcindriyāni
analyzed: rūpāvacara vasena iva mahaggatam tad avasesāni arūpāvacara vasena api iti veditabbam pañcindriyāni

original: anidassanasappaṭighāni, sattarasa anidassanaappaṭighāneva.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭighāni sattarasa anidassana appaṭighāni eva

original: Paññindriyādīni cattāri hetū, sesā na hetū…pe… domanassindriyaṃ saraṇaṃ, manajīvitasomanassaupekkhāvīriyasamādhindriyāni
analyzed: paññindriya ādīni cattāri hetū sesāḥ na hetu upe domanassindriyam saraṇam mana jīvita somanassa aupekkhā vīriya samādhi indriyāni

original: dvidhāpi, sesāni pannarasa araṇānevāti ayaṃ pañhāpucchakanayo.
analyzed: dvidhā api ayam pañhāpucchaka nayaḥ

original: Indriyesu panetesu, pāḷimuttavinicchayo;
analyzed: indriyesu pana etesu

original: Kamato dāni viññeyyo, tattha kosallamicchatā.
analyzed: kamataḥ dāni viññeyyaḥ tattha kosallam icchatā

original: Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho
analyzed: kamataḥ ti ayam pi desanā kkamaḥ u va tattha ajjhatta dhamme pariññāya ariya bhūmi paṭilābho

original: hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni. So manussattabhāvo
analyzed: hoti iti atta bhāva pariyāpannāni cakkhu indriya ādīni paṭhamam desitāni saḥ manussatta bhāvaḥ

analyzed: yam dhammam upādāya itthī iti vā purisaḥ iti vā saṅkham gacchati ayam saḥ ti nidassana ttham

analyzed: tatas itthi indriyam purisa indriyam ca saḥ duvidhaḥ api jīvitindriya paṭibaddha vutti iti ñāpana ttham

analyzed: tatas jīvitindriyam yāva tassa pavatti tāva etesam vedayitānam yat ca kiñci

original: vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni. Tannirodhatthaṃ
analyzed: vedayitam sabbam tam sukham dukkhanti ñāpana ttham tatas sukha indriya ādīni tad nirodha ttham

original: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni. “Imāya paṭipattiyā
analyzed: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbā ti paṭipatti dassana tham tatas saddhā ādīni imāya paṭipattiyā

original: esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatī”ti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato
analyzed: esa dhammo paṭhamam attani pātubhavati iti paṭipattiyā amogha bhāva dassana attham tatas

original: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Tasseva phalattā, tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattā ca tato
analyzed: anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam tassa iva phala ttā tatas anantaram bhāvetabba ttā ca tatas

original: aññindriyaṃ. Ito paraṃ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca pana imasmiṃ natthi
analyzed: aññindriyam itas param bhāvanāya imassa adhigamaḥ adhigate ca pana imasmin natthi

analyzed: kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpana attham ante parama ssāsa bhūtam aññātāvindriyam desitanti

original: evaṃ kamato pāḷimuttavinicchayanayo viññeyyo.
analyzed: evam kamataḥ pāḷi mutta vinicchaya nayaḥ viññeyyaḥ

original: Indriyavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: indriya vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Paccayākāravibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paccaya ākāra vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā

original: Paccayākāravibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – avijjāpaccayātiādīsu avindiyaṃ kāyaduccaritādiṃ

analyzed: vindati paṭilabhati vā kāya su carita ādim na vindati dhammānam vā yathā sabhāvam

original: aviditaṃ karoti, antavirahite vā saṃsāre satte javāpeti, avijjamānesu vā javati,
analyzed: a viditam karoti anta virahite vā saṃsāre satte a vijjamānesu vā

original: vijjamānesu vā na javatīti avijjā. Paṭicca phalameti etasmāti paccayo, dhammānaṃ
analyzed: vijjamānesu vā na javati iti avijjā paṭicca phalam eti etasma ati paccayaḥ dhammānam

original: uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā ca upakārako dhammo. Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
analyzed: uppattiyā ṭhitiyā ca upakārakaḥ dhammaḥ avijjā ca sā paccayaḥ ca ati avijjā paccayo

original: tasmā avijjāpaccayā. Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārā.
analyzed: tasmai avijjā paccayā saṅkhatam abhisaṅkharonti iti saṅkhārā

original: Ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu vuttaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Avuttesu
analyzed: itas param saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam ti ādīsu vuttam vutta nayena iva veditabbam avuttesu

original: nāmarūpanti ekadesasarūpekasesanayena veditabbaṃ. Āye tanoti, āyatañca nayatīti āyatanaṃ,
analyzed: nāma rūpam ti eka desa sarūpa ikasesa nayena veditabbam āye tanoti āyatan ca nayati iti āyatanam

original: chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ekasesanayena veditabbaṃ. Phusatīti

original: phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Paritassatīti taṇhā. Upādiyatīti upādānaṃ. Bhavati, bhāvayati
analyzed: phassaḥ vedayati iti vedanā paritassati iti taṇhā upādiyati iti upādānam bhavati bhāvayati

original: cāti bhavo. Jananaṃ jāti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā. Maranti etenāti maraṇaṃ. Socanaṃ soko. Paridevanaṃ
analyzed: ca ati bhavaḥ jananam jāti jīraṇam jarā maranti etena ati maraṇam socanam paridevanam

original: paridevo. Dukkhayati, uppādaṭṭhitivasena dvidhā khaṇatītipi dukkhaṃ. Dummanassa bhāvo
analyzed: paridevaḥ dukkhayati uppāda ṭṭhiti vasena dvidhā dukkham dummanassa bhāvo

original: domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāso upāyāso. Sambhavantīti nibbattanti. Na kevalañca sokādīheva,
analyzed: domanassam bhusaḥ āyāsaḥ upāyāsaḥ sambhavanti iti nibbattanti na kevalam ca soka ādi iha iva

original: atha kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantītiādinā sabbapadehipi sambhavanti-saddassa
analyzed: atha kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā sambhavanti iti ādinā sabba padehi pi sambhavanti saddassa

original: yojanā kātabbā. Evaṃ hi paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
analyzed: yojanā kātabbā evam hi paccaya paccaya uppanna vavatthānam katam hoti

original: Evanti niddiṭṭhanayanidassanaṃ, tena avijjādīheva kāraṇehi, na issaranimmānādīhīti
analyzed: evam ti niddiṭṭha naya nidassanam tena avijjā ādīhi iva kāraṇehi na issara nimmāna ādīhi iti

original: dasseti. Etassāti yathāvuttassa. Kevalassāti asammissassa, sakalassa vā, dukkhakkhandhassāti
analyzed: dassa iti etassa ati yathā vuttassa kevalassa ati asammissassa sakalassa vā dukkha kkhandhassa ati

original: dukkhasamūhassa, na sattassa, na sukhasubhādīnaṃ. Samudayoti nibbatti, hotīti sambhavati.
analyzed: dukkha samūhassa na sattassa na sukha subha ādīnam samudayo ti nibbatti hoti iti sambhavati

original: Ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: ayam tā vettha padatthaḥ

original: Dhammabhedato panettha avijjāti suttantapariyāyena dukkhādīsu catūsu, abhidhammapariyāyena

original: pubbantādīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭhasu vā ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ. Saṅkhārā pana puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā
analyzed: pubbanta ādīhi saddhim aṭṭhasu vā ṭhānesu aññāṇam saṅkhārā pana puññāpuñña aneñja abhisaṅkhārā

original: tayo, kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārā tayo cāti chabbidhā. Tattha aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā,
analyzed: tayo kāya vacī citta saṅkhārā tayo ca ati chabbidhā tattha aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusala cetanā

original: pañca rūpāvacarakusalacetanā ceti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Dvādasa akusalacetanā
analyzed: pañca rūpāvacara kusala cetanā ca iti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāraḥ nāma dvādasa akusala cetanā

original: apuññābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Imesaṃ
analyzed: apuñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ nāma catasso arūpāvacara kusala cetanāḥ āneñja abhisaṅkhāraḥ nāma imesam

original: pana tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ eva dvārato pavattidassanatthaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhārādittiko vutto.
analyzed: pana tiṇṇam saṅkhārānam eva dvārataḥ pavatti dassana tham ayam vutto

original: Aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā ceva dvādasākusalacetanā ca kāyadvāre pavattiyaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro,
analyzed: aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusala cetanā ca iva dvādasa akusala cetanā ca kāya dvāre pavattiyam kāya saṅkhāro

original: vacīdvāre pavattiyaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro, etā ceva manodvāre pavattiyaṃ, manodvāre eva pavattanakā
analyzed: vacī dvāre pavattiyam vacī saṅkhāraḥ etā ca iva manaḥ dvāre pavattiyam manaḥ dvāre eva pavattanakā

original: rūpārūpakusalacetanā ca cittasaṅkhāroti vuccanti. Abhiññācetanā, panettha uddhaccacetanā
analyzed: rūpa arūpa kusala cetanā ca citta saṅkhāro ti vuccanti abhiññā cetanā pana ittha uddhacca cetanā

original: ca parato paṭisandhiviññāṇapaccayabhāve apanetabbāpi avijjāpaccayā sambhavato idha
analyzed: ca paratas paṭisandhi viññāṇa paccaya bhāve apanetabbā api avijjā paccayā sambhavataḥ idha

original: gahetabbāvāti ayaṃ tiko purimattikameva pavisatīti atthato lokiyakusalākusalacetanāva
analyzed: gahetabbā avā ti ayam tiko purima tikam eva pavisati iti atthataḥ lokiya kusala akusala cetanā ava

original: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti veditabbaṃ. Idañca suttantabhājanīyanayena, abhidhammabhājanīyanayena
analyzed: avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti veditabbam idam ca suttanta bhājanīya nayena abhidhamma bhājanīya nayena

original: pana lokiyalokuttare ekekacittakkhaṇe dvādasaṅgassa paṭiccasamuppādassa gahaṇato
analyzed: pana lokiya lokuttare eka eka citta kkhaṇe dvādasaṅgassa paṭiccasamuppādassa gahaṇato

original: sabbāpi cetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ viññāṇanāmarūpādīsupi sabbacittasampayuttavasena
analyzed: sabbā api cetanā saṅkhārā ti veditabbam evam viññāṇa nāma rūpa ādīsu pi sabba citta sampayutta vasena

original: ca dhammabhedo veditabbo. Suttantabhājanīyanayeneva pana dassayissāma.
analyzed: ca dhamma bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ suttanta bhājanīya nayena iva pana dassayissāma

original: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇādichabbidhaṃ bāttiṃsalokiyavipākaviññāṇameva
analyzed: saṅkhāra paccayāḥ viññāṇam ca cakkhu viññāṇa ādi chabbidham bāttiṃsa lokiya vipāka viññāṇam eva

original: hoti, lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantīti na gahitāni. Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ
analyzed: hoti lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭa kathāya na yujjanti iti na gahitāni viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpam

original: pana sabbalokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā tayo arūpino khandhā. Rūpaṃ sabbāni bhūtupādāyarūpāni.
analyzed: pana sabba lokiya viññāṇa sampayuttā tayo arūpino khandhāḥ rūpam sabbāni bhūta upādāyarūpāni

original: Saḷāyatanaṃ manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni. Phasso cakkhusamphassādiko chavipākaphasso,
analyzed: indriyāni phasso cakkhu samphassa ādiko cha vipāka phasso

original: tathā vedanāpi. Taṇhā rūpataṇhādibhedato chabbidho lobho. Upādānaṃ kāmupādānādito
analyzed: tathā vedanā api taṇhā rūpa taṇhā ādi bhedataḥ chabbidhaḥ lobhaḥ upādānam kāma upādāna āditaḥ

original: catubbidhā lobhadiṭṭhiyova. Bhavo pana duvidho kammabhavo, upapattibhavoti. Tattha
analyzed: catubbidhā bhavaḥ pana duvidho kamma bhavo upapatti bhavo ti tattha

original: kammabhavo tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā ca taṃsampayuttā abhijjhādayo ca. Upapattibhavo
analyzed: kamma bhavo tebhūmaka kusala akusala cetanā ca tad sampayuttāḥ abhijjhā ādayo ca upapatti bhavo

original: pana kammābhinibbattā pañcapi khandhā. So pabhedato kāmarūpārūpabhavā tayo, saññā
analyzed: pana kamma abhinibbattā pañca api khandhā so pabhedato kāmarūpa arūpa bhavā tayo saññā

original: asaññā nevasaññānāsaññā bhavā tayo, ekacatupañcavokārabhavā tayoti navavidho niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: asaññā nevasaññānāsaññā bhavā tayo eka catu pañca vokāra bhavā tayo ti navavidhaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Jātiādīni pubbe vuttāni. Tesu jātiggahaṇena viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāva

original: gahitā tadavinābhāvato. Tathā jarāmaraṇaggahaṇenāpi tesaññeva pākabhedattā. Sokādayo

original: Kimatthanti ce? Bhavacakkassa avicchedadassanatthaṃ. Sokādito hi avijjā siddhā hoti

original: bhavacakkaṃ avicchinnaṃ, anādikaṃ, apariyantaṃ, apariyosānañca hoti.
analyzed: bhava cakkam a vicchinnam anādikam a pariyantam a pariyosānam ca hoti

original: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā avijjā ādito vuttāti? Padhānadassanatthaṃ pana ādito vuttā. Tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: yadi evam kasmai avijjā āditas vuttā ati padhāna dassana attham pana āditas vuttā

analyzed: hi vaṭṭānam avijjā padhānaḥ hetu tassāḥ bhāve bhāvataḥ nirodhena ca nirujjhanataḥ evam

original: Vibhaṅganayato panettha pañhāpucchakanayo natthi, suttantabhājanīyanayāpi dhammabhede vuttanayeneva vitthārato vibhattāti veditabbo. Abhidhammabhājanīye pana –

original: Sammappadhānavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
Sammappadhānavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – sammappadhānāti kāraṇappadhānā
analyzed: pana atthato tāva sammappadhānā ati kāraṇa ppadhānā

original: upāyappadhānā. Yoniso padahanato paramaṃ dhānaṃ padhānaṃ, padhānavīriyānīti attho.
analyzed: upāya padhānā yonisas padahanataḥ paramam dhānam padhānam padhāna vīriyāni iti attho

original: Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane paṭipannako bhikkhu. Anuppannānanti anibbattānaṃ. Pāpakānanti
analyzed: idha bhikkhu iti imasmin sāsane paṭipannakaḥ bhikkhu anuppannānam ti anibbattānam pāpakānam ti

original: lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Anuppādāyāti na
analyzed: lāmakānam akusalānam dhammānam anti akosalla sambhūtānam dhammānam an uppādāya ati na

original: uppādanatthāya. Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ janeti uppādeti.
analyzed: uppādana tthāya chandam janeti iti kattu kamya tā saṅkhātam kusala chandam janeti uppādeti

original: Vāyamatīti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ karoti.
analyzed: vāyamati iti payogam parakkamam karoti vīriyam ārabhati iti kāyika cetasika vīriyam karoti

original: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti padhānavīriyaṃ
analyzed: cittam paggaṇhāti iti tena iva sahajāta vīriyena cittam ukkhipati padahati iti padhāna vīriyam

original: karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāripi padāni vīriyasseva āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
analyzed: karoti paṭipāṭiyā pana itāni cattāri pi padāni vīriyassa iva āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkamma sātacca kiriyāhi yojetabbāni

original: Uppannānanti anuppannāti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ. Pahānāyāti pajahanatthāya. Anuppannānaṃ
analyzed: uppannānam ti anuppannā ati avattabba tam āpannānam pahānāya ati pajahana atthāya anuppannānam

original: kusalānaṃ dhammānanti anibbattānaṃ kosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya.
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānanti anibbattānam kosalla sambhūtānam dhammānam uppādāya ati uppādana atthāya

original: Uppannānanti nibbattānaṃ. Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthāya. Asammosāyāti anassanatthaṃ. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti
analyzed: uppannānam ti nibbattānam ṭhitiyā āti ṭhita atthāya asammosāya āti anassana attham bhiyyobhāvāya āti

original: punappunaṃ bhavanāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya. Bhāvanāyāti vaḍḍhiyā. Pāripūriyāti
analyzed: punappunam bhavanāya vepullāya ati vipula bhāvāya bhāvanāya ati vaḍḍhiyā pāripūriyā ati

original: paripūraṇatthāya. Sesaṃ padato uttānameva.
analyzed: paripūraṇa atthāya sesam padataḥ uttānam eva

original: Atthato panettha “anuppannānaṃ pāpakāna”ntiādīsu asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena
analyzed: atthataḥ pana ittha anuppannānam pāpakānam ti ādīsu asamudācāra vasena vā ananubhūta ārammaṇa vasena

original: vā kilesānaṃ anuppatti veditabbā. Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā akusaladhammā
analyzed: vā kilesānam anuppatti veditabbā aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannāḥ akusala dhammāḥ

original: nāma natthi. Kusaladhammesu pana ratanattayappasādavipassanādivivaṭṭūpanissayakusalādivasena
analyzed: nāma natthi kusala dhammesu pana

original: anuppannāpi atthi. Tesampi uppannapubbatte sati sabbasattānaṃ ito pubbe ca āsavakkhayappasaṅgato.
analyzed: anuppannā api atthi tesam pi uppanna pubbatte sati sabba sattānam itas pubbe ca āsava kkhaya ppasaṅgato

original: Ekantappavattasādhakā tesaṃ. Tattha ekaccassa vattaganthadhutaṅgasamādhivipassanānavakammesu
analyzed: ekanta ppavatta sādhakā tesam tattha ekaccassa vatta gantha dhutaṅga samādhi vipassanā nava kammesu

original: aññatarasmiṃ niccappayuttassa, ghaṭato, vāyamato ca brahmalokā āgatattā bhavavasena
analyzed: aññatarasmim nicca ppayuttassa ghaṭataḥ vā āyamataḥ ca brahma lokāḥ āgata ttāḥ bhava vasena

original: kilesesu aladdhāsevanassa sattassa kilesā na samudācaranti, aparabhāge panassa vattādīni
analyzed: kilesesu aladdha āsevanassa sattassa kilesāḥ na samudācaranti apara bhāge panassa vatta ādīni

original: vissajjetvā kusītassa carato ceva akalyāṇamittādito kilesesu laddhāsevanassa ca ayonisomanasikāraṃ,
analyzed: vissajjetvā kusītassa carataḥ ca iva akalyāṇa mitta āditaḥ kilesesu laddha āsevanassa ca a yoniso manasikāram

original: sativossaggañca āgamma uppajjanti. Evaṃ tāva asamudācāravasena kilesānaṃ anuppatti veditabbā.
analyzed: sati vossaggam ca āgamma uppajjanti evam tāva asamudācāra vasena kilesānam anuppatti veditabbā

original: Ekaccassa pana tasmiṃ attabhāve ananubhūtapubbaṃ dibbādibhedaṃ manāpiyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ekaccassa pana tasmin atta bhāve an anubhūta pubbam dibba ādi bhedam manāpiyam ārammaṇam

original: labhitvā tattha ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma kilesā uppajjanti, alabhitvā
analyzed: labhitvā tattha ayoniso manasikāra sati vossagge āgamma kilesāḥ uppajjanti a labhitvā

original: evaṃ ananubhūtārammaṇavasena kilesānaṃ anuppatti veditabbā.
analyzed: evam ananubhūta ārammaṇa vasena kilesānam anuppatti veditabbā

original: “Uppannānaṃ pāpakāna”nti ettha pana catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ vattamānabhūtāpagataokāsakatabhūmiladdhavasena,
analyzed: uppannānam pāpakānam ti ettha pana catubbidham uppannam vattamāna bhūta apagata okāsa kata bhūmi laddha vasena

original: tesaṃ vibhāgo uppannattike vuttova. Aparampi catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ samudācāraārammaṇādhiggahitaavikkhambhitaasamugghātitavasena.
analyzed: tesam vibhāgaḥ uppanna ttike vuttaḥ iva aparam pi catubbidham uppannam samudācāra ārammaṇa adhiggahita a vikkhambhita a samugghātita vasena

original: Tattha sampati vattamānaṃyeva samudācāruppannaṃ nāma. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Yasmā panettha
analyzed: tattha sampati vattamānam yeva samudācāruppannam nāma sesam pākaṭam eva yasmā pana ittha

original: imesu uppannesu vattamānabhūtāpagataokāsakatasamudācārasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ
analyzed: imesu uppannesu vattamāna bhūta apagata okāsa kata samudācāra saṅkhātam catubbidham uppannam

original: na maggādivajjhaṃ, tasmā bhūmiladdhaārammaṇādhiggahitaasamugghātitasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: na magga ādi vajjham bhūmi laddha ārammaṇa adhiggahita a samugghātita saṅkhātam catubbidham

original: uppannaṃ sandhāyettha “uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: uppannam sandhāya ittha uppannānam pāpakānam pahānāya iti vuttam

original: Kathaṃ pana maggakkhaṇe anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādāya vāyāmo hoti, kathañca uppannānaṃ
analyzed: katham pana magga kkhaṇe anuppannānam kusalānam uppādāya vāyāmaḥ hoti katham ca uppannānam

original: ṭhitiyāti? Maggappavattiyā eva. Maggo hi pavattamāno pubbe anuppannapubbattā anuppanno
analyzed: ṭhitiyā ti magga ppavattiyā eva maggaḥ hi pavattamānaḥ pubbe anuppanna pubbattā anuppannaḥ

original: nāma vuccati. Yā cassa pavatti, ayameva ṭhiti nāmāti ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: nāma vuccati yā ca assa pavatti ayam eva ṭhiti nāma ati ayam tāva ettha padattho

original: Dhammabhedo panetthāpi ekasseva vīriyassa kiccabhedato catudhā vuttāti ayamettha pāḷimuttavinicchayo.

original: Vibhaṅganayato pana suttantabhājanīye tāva cattāro sammappadhānā lokiyalokuttarakusalacittasampayuttavīriyavasena

original: lokuttarakusalacittasampayuttavaseneva vibhattā, phalacittasampayuttā pana na gahitā.
analyzed: lokuttara kusala citta sampayutta vasena iva vibhattā phala citta sampayuttā pana na gahitā

original: Teneva pañhāpucchake “kusalā eva, vipākadhammadhammā eva, apacayagāminova, sekhāvā”tiādinā
analyzed: tena iva pañhāpucchake kusalāḥ eva vipāka dhamma dhammāḥ eva apacaya gāminaḥ uva sekhā vāti ādinā

original: vuttā. Seso panettha vinicchayo satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
analyzed: vuttā sesaḥ pana ittha vinicchayaḥ sati paṭṭhāne vutta naya anusārena veditabbo

original: Sammappadhānavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sammappadhāna vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iddhipādavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
Iddhipādavibhaṅgamātikāya pana cattāro iddhipādāti ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati
analyzed: iddhipāda vibhaṅga mātikāya pana cattāro iddhipādā ti ettha ijjhati iti iddhi samijjhati

analyzed: ettha chanda hetukaḥ chanda adhikaḥ vā samādhi chanda samādhi adhipatim

original: karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā,

analyzed: padhāna saṅkhārena ca upetam iddhi pādanti yathāvuttatthena iddhi iti saṅkhyam

original: upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena

analyzed: bhāveti iti vaḍḍheti attano santāne punappunam janeti iti

analyzed: atthaḥ iminā nayena sesesu pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ tattha vīmaṃsā ati paññā sesam padataḥ su viññeyyam eva

original: Atthato panettha tena kiṃ kathitaṃ? Catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ matthakappattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: atthataḥ pana ittha tena kim kathitam catunnam bhikkhūnam matthaka ppattam kammaṭṭhānam

original: desitā. Tato heraññikassa kahāpaṇaparivattakahattho viya yathāsabhāvadassanassa sammādiṭṭhiyā

original: bahūpakārattā sammāsaṅkappo. Svāyaṃ yathā sammādiṭṭhiyā, evaṃ sammāvācāyapi upakārako.
analyzed: bahu upakāra ttā sammāsaṅkappo yathā sammādiṭṭhiyāḥ evam upakārako

original: Yathāha “pubbe kho, gahapati, takketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindatī”ti, tasmā
analyzed: yathā āha pubbe kho gahapati takketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācam bhindati iti tasmā

original: tadanantaraṃ sammāvācā. Yasmā pana vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti, tasmā
analyzed: tad anantaram sammāvācā yasmai vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante tasmai

original: tadanantaraṃ sammākammanto. Kāyavacīduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayasucaritaṃ pūrentasseva
analyzed: tad anantaram sammā kammantaḥ kāyavacī duccaritam pahāya ubhaya su caritam pūrentassa iva

original: yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pūrati, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayānantaraṃ sammāājīvo
analyzed: yasmai ājīva ṭṭhamakam sīlam pūrati na itarassa tasmai tad ubhaya anantaram sammāājīvaḥ

original: vutto. Evaṃ “visuddhadiṭṭhisīlenāpi ettāvatā paritosaṃ akatvā idaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhitabba”nti
analyzed: vuttaḥ evam visuddha diṭṭhi sīlena api ettāvatā paritosam a katvā idam vīriyam ārabhitabbanti

original: dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāvāyāmo. Āraddhavīriyenāpi kāyādīsu sati sūpaṭṭhitā kātabbāti
analyzed: dassetum tad anantaram sammāvāyāmaḥ āraddha vīriyena api kāya ādīsu sati su upaṭṭhitā kātabbā ti

original: dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāsati. Sūpaṭṭhitāya satiyā ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ
analyzed: dassana ttham tad anantaram sammā sati su upaṭṭhitāya satiyāḥ ekatta ārammaṇe cittam samādhātum

original: sakkāti tadanantaraṃ sammāsamādhi vuttoti ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
analyzed: sakkā ati tad anantaram sammāsamādhi vutto ti ayam tāva ettha kamaḥ

original: Kiccato panesaṃ ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi
analyzed: kiccataḥ pana esam ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni seyyathīdam sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehi pi

original: attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, ārammaṇato nirodhasaccaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ paccanīka kilesehi saddhim micchādiṭṭhim pajahati ārammaṇataḥ nirodha saccam

original: sacchikaroti, asammohato sesasaccāni paṭivijjhati. Evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ micchāsaṅkappapajahanādivasena
analyzed: sacchikaroti a sammohataḥ sesa saccāni paṭivijjhati evam sammāsaṅkappa ādīnam micchāsaṅkappa pajahana ādi vasena

original: yathānurūpanti kiccatā veditabbā. Visesato panettha sammāsaṅkappo sahajātadhamme
analyzed: yathā anurūpam ti kicca tā veditabbā visesataḥ pana ittha sammāsaṅkappo sahajāta dhamme

original: abhiniropeti, sammāvācā pariggaṇhāti, sammākammanto samuṭṭhāpeti, sammāājīvo vodāpeti,
analyzed: abhiniropeti sammā vācā pariggaṇhāti sammā kammanto samuṭṭhāpeti sammā ājīvaḥ vodāpeti

original: sammāvāyāmo paggaṇhāti, sammāsati upaṭṭhāpeti, sammāsamādhi samādahatīti idamettha kiccaṃ.
analyzed: sammāvāyāmaḥ paggaṇhāti sammā sati upaṭṭhāpeti sammā samādhi samādahati iti idam ettha kiccam

original: Bhedato pana pubbabhāge sammādiṭṭhi “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā catūsu saccesu ñāṇavasena
analyzed: bhedato pana pubba bhāge sammādiṭṭhi dukkhe ñāṇa nti ādinā catūsu saccesu ñāṇa vasena

original: nānakkhaṇā nānārammaṇā nānānāmā hoti, dutiyo pana nekkhammaabyāpādaavihiṃsāsaṅkappavasena,
analyzed: nāna khaṇā nānā ārammaṇā nānā nāmā hoti dutiyaḥ pana nekkhamma abyāpāda avihiṃsā saṅkappa vasena

original: viratiyo catubbidhavacīduccaritatividhakāyaduccaritamicchājīvaviramaṇasaṅkhātacetanāvasenapi
analyzed: viratiyāḥ catur bidha vacī duccarita tividha kāya duccaritam icchā jīva viramaṇa saṅkhāta cetanā vasena api

original: virativasenapi, chaṭṭhasattamā catubbidhasammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena nānakkhaṇā
analyzed: virati vasena api chaṭṭha sattamā catubbidha sammappadhāna sati paṭṭhāna vasena nānā kkhaṇā

original: nānārammaṇā nānānāmā honti. Maggakāle panete sammādiṭṭhiādayo ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā.
analyzed: nānā ārammaṇāḥ nānā nāmāḥ honti magga kāle pana ete sammādiṭṭhi ādayaḥ eka kkhaṇāḥ eka ārammaṇā

original: Kiccato pana tāni pubbabhāge nānānāmāni labhanti, sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi
analyzed: kiccataḥ pana tāni pubba bhāge nānā nāmāni labhanti sammāsamādhi pana pubba bhāge pi

original: maggakkhaṇepi catukkapañcakajjhānavasena nānakkhaṇo nānānāmo, maggakkhaṇe pana ekārammaṇo
analyzed: magga kkhaṇe pi catukka pañcaka jhāna vasena nānā kkhaṇaḥ nānā nāmaḥ magga kkhaṇe pana eka ārammaṇaḥ

original: hoti. Ekassa hi paṭhamamaggo pādakajjhānādiniyamato paṭhamajjhānādiko vā dutiyajjhānādīsu
analyzed: hoti ekassa hi paṭhama maggaḥ pādaka jjhāna ādi niyamato paṭhama jjhāna ādikaḥ vā dutiya jhāna ādīsu

original: aññatarajjhāniko vā, dutiyamaggādayopissa paṭhamamaggasadisajjhānikā vā visadisajjhānikā
analyzed: aññatara jjhānikaḥ vā dutiya magga ādayaḥ pissa paṭhama magga sadisa jjhānikā vā visadisa jjhānikā

original: vāti so maggakālepi nānakkhaṇo nānānāmo vāti ayamettha bhedo.
analyzed: vāti saḥ magga kāle pi nāna kkhaṇaḥ nānā nāmaḥ vāti ayam ettha bhedaḥ

original: Bhūmito ca vivekato ca vinicchayo bojjhaṅgesu vuttānusārena veditabboti evaṃ vijānīyo pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
analyzed: bhūmito ca vivekato ca vinicchayaḥ bojjhaṅgesu vutta anusārena veditabbaḥ ti evam vijānīyo pāḷimutta vinicchayo

original: Maggaṅgavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: maggaṅga vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Jhānavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
Jhānavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutotiādīsu pātimokkhanti
analyzed: pana atthato tāva

original: sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Taṃ hi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehi,
analyzed: sikkhāpada sīlam tam hi yaḥ nam pāti rakkhati tam mokkheti moceti āpāyika ādīhi dukkhehi

original: tasmā “pātimokkha”nti vuccati. Saṃvaraṇaṃ, saṃvaranti vā tenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva
analyzed: tasmā pātimokkham ti vuccati saṃvaraṇam saṃvaranti vā tena ati saṃvaraḥ pātimokkham eva

original: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, kammavācāpariyosāne ijjhanakassa atthato cetanādirūpassa
analyzed: saṃvaro pātimokkha saṃvaro kamma vācā pariyosāne ijjhanakassa atthataḥ cetanā ādi rūpassa

original: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tena saṃvuto pihitakāyavacīpayogoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto.
analyzed: pātimokkha saṃvara sīlassa iva etat adhivacanam tena saṃvutaḥ pihita kāya vacī payogaḥ ti pātimokkha saṃvara saṃvutaḥ

original: Viharatīti iriyati pavatteti. Ācāragocarasampannoti ettha ācaritabbato ācāro, gāvo
analyzed: viharati iti pavattā iti ācāra gocara sampannaḥ ti ettha ācaritabbataḥ ācāraḥ gāvaḥ

original: caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃsadisatāya pana sabbopi pavattivisayo
analyzed: caranti ettha ati gocaraḥ caraṇa ṭhānam tad sadisa tāya pana sabbaḥ api pavatti visayo

original: gocaroti veditabbo. Tesaṃ vibhāgo niddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: gocaro ti veditabbo tesam vibhāgaḥ niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbo

original: Niddese hi –
analyzed: niddese hi

original: “Ācāragocarasampannoti atthi ācāro, atthi anācāro. Tattha katamo anācāro? Kāyiko
analyzed: ācāra gocara sampanno ti atthi ācāraḥ atthi anācāro tattha katamaḥ anācāraḥ kāyiko

original: vītikkamo, vācasiko vītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko vītikkamo, ayaṃ vuccati anācāro, sabbampi
analyzed: vītikkamaḥ vācasikaḥ vītikkamaḥ kāyika vācasikaḥ vītikkamaḥ ayam vuccati anācāraḥ sabbam pi

original: dussīlyaṃ anācāro, idhekacco veḷudānena vā patta…pe… pupphaphalasinānadantakaṭṭhadānena
analyzed: dussīlyam anācāraḥ idha ekaccaḥ veḷu dānena vā pattape puppha phala sināna danta kaṭṭha dānena

original: vā cāṭukamyatāya vā muggasupyatāya vā pāribhaṭutāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vā aññataraññatarena
analyzed: vā cāṭu kamyatāya vā mugga supyatāya vā pāribhaṭutāya vā jaṅgha pesanikena vā aññatara aññatarena

original: vā buddhapatikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ vuccati anācāro.
analyzed: vā buddha pati kuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikam kappeti ayam vuccati anācāro

original: “Tattha katamo ācāro? Kāyiko avītikkamo”tiādinā –
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ ācāraḥ kāyikaḥ avītikkamaḥ ti ādinā

original: Vuttavipariyāyena ācāro niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena ācāraḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: “Gocaroti atthi gocaro, atthi agocaro. Tattha katamo agocaro? Idhekacco vesiyāgocaro
analyzed: gocaro ti atthi gocaraḥ atthi agocaro tattha katamaḥ agocaraḥ idha ekacco vesiyā agocaro

original: vā hoti, vidhavā…pe… thullakumārīpaṇḍakabhikkhunīpānāgāragocaro vā, saṃsaṭṭho viharati
analyzed: vā hoti vidhavā pe thulla kumārī paṇḍaka bhikkhunī pānāgāra gocaraḥ vā saṃsaṭṭhaḥ viharati

original: rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena, yāni
analyzed: rājūhi rāja mahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiya sāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena yāni

original: vā pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni…pe… tathārūpāni kulāni sevati bhajati
analyzed: vā pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni pe tathārūpāni kulāni sevati bhajati

original: payirupāsati, ayaṃ vuccati agocaro.
analyzed: payirupāsati ayam vuccati agocaraḥ

original: “Tattha katamo gocaro? Idhekacco na vesiyāgocaro hotī”tiādinā –
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ gocaraḥ idha ekacco na vā isiyā gocaraḥ hoti itiādinā

original: Vuttavipariyāyena gocaro niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena gocaraḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Apicettha therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ purato gamananisīdanacaṅkamanaghaṭṭanābhibhavanādikāyikācittīkārakiriyānañceva
analyzed: apica ittha therānam bhikkhūnam puratas gamana nisīdana caṅkamana ghaṭṭana abhibhavana ādi kāyikā cittīkāra kiriyānam ca eva

original: there bhikkhū anāpucchā dhammakathanakhuṃsanādivācasikācittīkārakiriyānañca anācārānaṃ
analyzed: there bhikkhū an āpucchāḥ dhamma kathana khuṃsana ādi vācasika cittīkāra kiriyānaṃ ca anācārānaṃ

original: paṭipakkhavasena kāyikavācasiko ācāro veditabbo. Apica bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso
analyzed: paṭipakkha vasena kāyika vācasikaḥ ācāraḥ veditabbaḥ apica bhikkhu sa gāravaḥ sa patissaḥ

original: hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantādinā okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno
analyzed: hirottappa sampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkanta ādinā okkhitta cakkhu iriyāpatha sampanno

original: ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācāro. Gocaro
analyzed: ābhisamācārikesu sakkacca kārī garu cittīkāra bahulaḥ viharati ayam vuccati ācāraḥ gocaraḥ

original: pana tividho upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti. Tattha dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato
analyzed: pana tividhaḥ upanissaya gocaraḥ ārakkha gocaraḥ upanibandha gocaraḥ ti tattha dasa kathā vatthu guṇa samannāgato

original: kalyāṇamitto upanissayagocaro nāma. Antaragharādīsu okkhittacakkhutādīhi disā vidisā
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittaḥ upanissaya gocaraḥ nāma antara ghara ādīsu okkhitta cakkhu tā ādīhi disā vidisā

original: anoloketvā gamanaṃ ārakkhagocaro nāma. Cattāro pana satipaṭṭhānā upanibandhagocaro
analyzed: anoloketvā gamanam ārakkhagocaro nāma cattāro pana sati paṭṭhānā upanibandha gocaro

original: nāma. Yattha cittaṃ upanibandhati, ayaṃ tividhopettha gocaroti veditabbo. Imināti
analyzed: nāma yattha cittam upanibandhati ayam tividha upettha gocaraḥ iti veditabbaḥ iminā ati

original: iminā ācārena, gocarena ca samannāgato ācāragocarasampanno nāma.
analyzed: iminā ācārena gocarena ca samannāgataḥ ācāra gocara sampannaḥ nāma

original: Aṇumattesu vajjesūti aṇuppamāṇesu dosesu. Bhayadassāvīti bhayadassanasīlo, aṇumattaṃ
analyzed: aṇumattesu vajjesu iti aṇu ppamāṇesu dosesu bhaya dassāvī iti bhaya dassana sīlaḥ aṇumattam

original: reṇuṃ sinerusadisaṃ passanto viya sabbalahukampi dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ
analyzed: reṇum sineru sadisam passantaḥ viya sabba lahukam pi dukkaṭa dubbhāsita mattam pārājika sadisam

original: katvā vajjato bhayato dassanasīloti attho. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃ kiñci
analyzed: katvā vajjataḥ bhayataḥ dassana sīlaḥ ti attho samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu iti yam kiñci

original: sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ suṭṭhu ādāya gahetvā sikkhati.
analyzed: sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbam tam suṭṭhu ādāya gahetvā sikkhati

original: Indriyesu guttadvāroti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu rūpādiārammaṇanimittādīnaṃ aggahaṇasaṅkhātasatisaṃvarena
analyzed: indriyesu mana chaṭṭhesu indriyesu rūpa ādi ārammaṇa nimitta ādīnam aggahaṇa saṅkhāta sati saṃvarena

original: pihitadvāro. Bhojane mattaññūti piṇḍapāte paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu paccavekkhaṇañāṇavasena
analyzed: pihita dvāraḥ bhojane mattaññu iti piṇḍapāte paṭiggahaṇa paribhogesu paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇa vasena

original: ceva appicchatādīhi ca mattajānanako, piṇḍapātavasena cettha catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ
analyzed: ca iva appiccha tā ādīhi ca matta jānanakaḥ piṇḍapāta vasena ca ittha catunnam paccayānam

original: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā bhuñjitabbato bhojananti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ
analyzed: gahaṇam veditabbam atha vā bhuñjitabbataḥ bhojanan ti catunnam paccayānam gahaṇam

original: veditabbaṃ. Pubbarattāpararattanti ettha aḍḍharattisaṅkhātāya rattiyā pubbe pubbarattaṃ,
analyzed: veditabbam pubba ratta apara rattam ti ettha aḍḍha ratti saṅkhātāya rattiyā pubbe pubba rattam

original: iminā paṭhamayāmañceva pacchābhattañca gaṇhāti. Rattiyā pacchā apararattaṃ, iminā
analyzed: iminā paṭhama yāmam ca iva pacchābhattam ca gaṇhāti rattiyā pacchā apara rattam iminā

original: pacchimayāmañceva purebhattañca gaṇhāti. Pacchimayāmo panassa bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito.
analyzed: pacchima yāmañca iva purebhattañca gaṇhāti pacchima yāmaḥ panassa bhikkhuno niddā kilamatha vinodana ukāsaḥ ti na gahito

original: Jāgariyānuyogamanuyuttoti asubhabhāvanāsaṅkhātassa bhāvanārāmassa anuyogasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: jāgariya anuyogam anuyuttaḥ ti asubha bhāvanā saṅkhātassa bhāvanā ārāmassa anuyoga saṅkhātam

original: āsevanabhāvanaṃ anuyutto caṅkamananisajjāhi yonisomanasikārena āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi
analyzed: āsevana bhāvanam anuyuttaḥ caṅkamana nisajjāhi yoni soma nasikārena āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi

original: cittaparisodhane yuttappayuttoti attho. Sātaccaṃ nepakkanti satataṃ pavattayitabbato
analyzed: citta parisodhane yutta ppayuttaḥ ti atthaḥ sātaccam nepakkam ti satatam

original: sātaccasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ, paripākagatattā nepakkasaṅkhātañca paññaṃ anuyuttoti sambandho.
analyzed: sātacca saṅkhātam vīriyam paripāka gata ttā nepakka saṅkhātam ca paññam anuyuttaḥ ti sambandhaḥ

original: Iminā vīriyapaññāhi yuttasseva jāgariyānuyogasiddhīti dasseti.
analyzed: iminā vīriya paññāhi yuttassa iva jāgariya anuyoga siddhi iti dasseti

original: Idāni taṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ sarūpato dassento “bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammāna”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni tam jāgariya anuyogam sarūpataḥ dassentaḥ bodhi pakkhikānam dhammānam ti ādim āha

original: Bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānanti catusaccāvabodhasaṅkhātassa maggañāṇassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ
analyzed: bodhi pakkhikānam dhammānan ti catu sacca avabodha saṅkhātassa magga ñāṇassa pakkhe bhavānam

original: catusaccasatipaṭṭhānādisattatiṃsadhammānaṃ. Niddese panassa lokiyabhāvanāya visesabodhipakkhiyadhamme
ekārammaṇe pavattanasamatthatāya satta bojjhaṅgā eva niddiṭṭhā. Tesaṃ gahaṇena pana
analyzed: eka ārammaṇe pavattana samattha tāya satta bojjhaṅgāḥ eva niddiṭṭhā tesam gahaṇena pana

original: sesānampi tattha gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. So abhikkante paṭikkantetiādīsu abhikkantaṃ
analyzed: sesānam pi tattha gahaṇam veditabbam saḥ abhikkante paṭikkanta iti ādīsu abhikkantam

original: vuccati purato gamanaṃ, paṭikkantaṃ nivattanaṃ, tadubhayañca ṭhānanisajjāsayanesupi
analyzed: vuccati puratas gamanam paṭikkantam nivattanam tat ubhayam ca ṭhāna nisajja āsayanesu pi

original: purato, pacchato ca kāyassa abhigamanaapagamanavasena labbhati. Sampajānakārī hotīti
analyzed: puratas pacchatas ca kāyassa abhigamana apagamana vasena labbhati sampajāna kārī hoti iti

original: sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī, sampajaññasseva vā kārī, sampajañña-ggahaṇena cettha
analyzed: sampajaññena sabba kicca kārī sampajaññassa iva vā kārī sampajañña ggahaṇena ca ittha
