original: Evaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanādhigamaṃ dassetvā idāni yaṃ tadanantaraṃ adhigatatatiyāruppassa
analyzed: evam ākiñcaññāyatana adhigamam dassetvā idāni yam tad anantaram adhigata tatiya āruppassa

original: taṃ vasībhūtaṃ katvā tattha āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikatāya dosaṃ disvā nikantiṃ
analyzed: tam vasībhūtam katvā tattha āsanna viññāṇaṃ ca āyatana paccatthika tāya dosam disvā nikantim

original: pariyādāya taṃ samatikkamāya tadeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ “santaṃ santa”nti punappunaṃ
analyzed: pariyādāya tam samatikkamāya tat eva ākiñcaññāyatanam santam santanti punappunam

original: manasikaroto nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbaso”tiādimāha.
analyzed: manasikarotaḥ na ivasaññānāsaññāyatanam uppajjati tam dassetum sabbaso tiādim āha

original: Tattha nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato, sukhumāya ca bhāvato
analyzed: tattha nevasaññā nāsañña āyatananti oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato sukhumāya ca bhāvato

original: nevassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa saññā nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññaṃ, tadeva
analyzed: na eva assa sa sampayutta dhammassa jhānassa saññā na asaññā ati nevasaññānāsaññam tat eva

original: dhammāyatanamanāyatanapariyāpannattā āyatananti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.
analyzed: dhammāyatanam anāyatana pariyāpanna ttā āyatanam ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam

original: Atha vā yāyamettha saññā, sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena
analyzed: atha vā yā ayam ettha saññā sā paṭu saññā kiccam kātum asamattha tāya na iva saññā saṅkhāra avasesa sukhuma bhāvena

original: vijjamānattā nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā, nevasaññānāsaññā ca sā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
analyzed: vijjamāna ttā na asaññā ati nevasaññā anāsaññā nevasaññā anāsaññā ca sā sampayutta dhammānam

original: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Na kevalañcettha saññāva edisī,
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena āyatanam ca ati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam na kevalam ca ittha edisī

original: api tu phassopi nevaphasso nāphasso, cittampi nevacittaṃ nācittaṃ, evaṃ sesasampayuttadhammāpi,
analyzed: api tu phassaḥ api na iva phassaḥ na aphassaḥ cittam pi na iva cittam na acittam evam sesa sampayutta dhammā api

original: saññāsīsena panāyaṃ desanā katāti veditabbā. Tattha saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvenāti
analyzed: saññā sīsena pana ayam desanā katā ati veditabbā tattha saṅkhāra avasesa sukhuma bhāvena ati

original: accantasukhumabhāvappattasaṅkhārabhāvena. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: accanta sukhuma bhāva ppatta saṅkhāra bhāvena sesam vutta nayam eva

original: Ayaṃ panettha ādito paṭṭhāya piṇḍatthappakāsanā – “idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādinā
analyzed: ayam pana ittha āditas paṭṭhāya piṇḍattha pakāsanā idha bhikkhu pātimokkha saṃvara saṃvuto tiādinā

original: sāsane lokiyalokuttarajjhānanibbattakapuggalassa patiṭṭhābhūtasīlesu pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlavisuddhiṃ
analyzed: sāsane lokiya lokuttara jjhāna nibbattaka puggalassa patiṭṭhā bhūta sīlesu pātimokkha saṃvara sīla visuddhim

original: upadisati. “Viharatī”ti iminā tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgibhāvaṃ. “Ācāragocarasampanno”ti
analyzed: upadisati viharati iti tad anurūpa vihāra samaṅgi bhāvam ācāra gocara sampannoti

original: iminā ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ, tadupakārake ca dhamme. “Aṇumattesū”tiādinā yathāvuttasīlehi
analyzed: iminā ājīva pārisuddhi sīlam tad upakārake ca dhamme aṇumattesu iti ādinā yathā vutta sīlehi

original: acavanaṃ, tesañca anavasesato samādānaṃ. “Indriyesu guttadvāro”ti iminā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ.
analyzed: tesaṃ ca anavasesato samādānam indriyesu iminā indriya saṃvara sīlam

original: “Bhojane mattaññū”ti iminā paccayasannissitasīlaṃ, santosādiguṇañca. “Pubbarattāpararatta”ntiādinā
analyzed: bhojane iminā paccaya sannissita sīlam santosa ādi guṇam ca pubba ratta apara ratta nti ādinā

original: sīladhutaṅgesu patiṭṭhitassa bhāvanārāmassa tadupakārake dhamme. “Bodhipakkhikāna”ntiādinā
analyzed: sīla dhutaṅgesu patiṭṭhitassa bhāvanā ārāmassa tad upakārake dhamme bodhi pakkhika ananti ādinā

original: paṭipattiyā nibbedhabhāgiyataṃ. “So abhikkante”tiādinā yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ aparihānāya,
analyzed: paṭipattiyā so abhikkanta iti ādinā yathā vutta guṇānaṃ a parihānāya

original: vakkhamānānañca paṭilābhāya satisampayogaṃ. “So vivitta”ntiādinā bhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaṃ.
analyzed: paṭilābhāya sati sampayogam saḥ vivitta nti ādinā bhāvanā anurūpa senāsana pariggaham

original: “So araññagato”tiādinā jhānabhāvanārambhappakāraṃ. “So abhijjha”ntiādinā jhānabhāvanābhiyogena
analyzed: so arañña gataḥ tiādinā jhāna bhāvanā ārambha ppakāram so abhijjhanti ādinā jhāna bhāvanā abhiyogena

original: pahīnapañcanīvaraṇassa upacārajjhānuppattiṃ. “So ime pañca nīvaraṇe”tiādinā tassa
analyzed: pahīna pañca nīvaraṇassa upacāra jhāna uppattim so ime pañca nīvaraṇa iti ādinā tassa

original: uparūpari vāyamato rūpārūpajjhānuppattikkamaṃ upadisati. Ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: upari upari vā ayam atas rūpa arūpa jjhāna uppatti kkamam upadisati ayam tāva ettha padattho

original: Dhammabhedo panettha vibhaṅganaye pākaṭo bhavissati. Tīsu hi nayesu mahaggatalokuttarā
analyzed: dhamma bhedaḥ pana ittha vibhaṅga naye pākaṭaḥ bhavissati tīsu hi nayesu mahaggata lokuttarā

original: kusalavipākakiriyacittasampayuttā vitakkavicārapītisukhaupekkhāekaggatāsaṅkhātā jhānadhammā
analyzed: kusala vipāka kiriya citta sampayuttāḥ vitakka vicāra pīti sukha upekkhā ekagga tā saṅkhātāḥ jhāna dhammāḥ

original: nānānayehi vibhattā, jhānasampayuttā pana sesakāmāvacaradhammāva idha saṅgahitā.
analyzed: nānā nayehi vibhattā jhāna sampayuttā pana idha saṅgahitā

original: Kiñcāpi panettha pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlādayopi vuttā, tathāpi te jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipattidassanavasena
analyzed: kiñcā api pana ittha pātimokkha saṃvara sīla ādayaḥ api vuttā tathā api te jhānānam pubbabhāga paṭipatti dassana vasena

original: ceva jhānasampayuttadhammavasena ca vuttā, idha pana na saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ca iva jhāna sampayutta dhamma vasena ca vuttā idha pana na saṅgahitā ati veditabbā

original: Pañhāpucchake pana siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā, tīṇi jhānāni sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
analyzed: pañhāpucchake pana siyā kusalā siyā abyākatā tīṇi jhānāni sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā

original: catutthaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, upekkhā panettha vedanā na vattabbā,
analyzed: catuttham adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam upekkhā pana ittha vedanā na vattabbā

original: siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicāravajjitaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ,
analyzed: siyā vipākā siyā vipāka dhamma dhammā paṭhama jhānam vitakka vicāra vajjitam sa vitakka sa vicāram

original: vitakko panettha avitakkavicāramatto, vicāro na vattabbo, tīṇi jhānāni avitakkaavicārā,
analyzed: vitakkaḥ pana ittha avitakka vicāra mattaḥ vicāraḥ na vattabbo tīṇi jhānāni avitakka avicārā

original: dve jhānāni pītivajjitāni pītisahagatāni, tīṇi sukhavajjitāni sukhasahagatāni, catutthaṃ
analyzed: dve jhānāni pīti vajjitāni pīti sahagatāni tīṇi sukha vajjitāni sukha sahagatāni catuttham

original: upekkhāvajjitaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ, tatiyajjhāne sukhaṃ, upekkhā ca idha na vattabbaṃ…pe…
analyzed: upekkhā vajjitam upekkhā sahagatam tatiya jhāne sukham upekkhā ca idha na vattabbam pe

original: siyā mahaggatā, siyā appamāṇā, tīṇi siyā appamāṇārammaṇā, siyā na vattabbā, catutthaṃ
analyzed: siyā mahaggatā siyā appamāṇā tīṇi siyā appamāṇa ārammaṇā siyā na vattabbā catuttham

original: tidhāpi na vattabbañca, tīṇi siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā,
analyzed: tidhā api na vattabbam ca tīṇi siyā magga hetukā siyā magga adhipatino siyā na vattabbā

original: catutthaṃ tidhāpi na vattabbañca…pe… pīti bahiddhārammaṇāni, catutthaṃ tidhāpi na
analyzed: catuttham tidhā api na vattabbam cape pi iti bahiddhā ārammaṇāni catuttham tidhā api na

original: vattabbañca…pe… anidassanaappaṭighā na hetū…pe… nocittacetasikā araṇāti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighāḥ na hetu upe no cittacetasikāḥ sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Pāḷimuttanayo panettha natthi, ito paraṃ pana ettakampi avatvā vijjamānaṭṭhāne eva vakkhāma.
analyzed: pāḷimuttanayo pana ittha natthi itas param pana ettakam pi a vatvā vijjamāna ṭhāne eva vakkhāma

original: Jhānavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Appamaññāvibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
analyzed: appamaññā vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā

original: Appamaññāvibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – catasso appamaññāyotiādīsu pharaṇaappamāṇavasena
analyzed: pana atthato tāva catasso appamaññāyo ti ādīsu pharaṇa appamāṇa vasena

original: appamaññāyo. Etā hi ārammaṇavasena appamāṇe vā satte pharanti, ekasattamhi vā anavasesapharaṇavasena
analyzed: appamaññāyaḥ etāḥ hi ārammaṇa vasena appamāṇe vā satte pharanti eka sattamhi vā anavasesa pharaṇa vasena

original: appamāṇato pharantīti evaṃ pharaṇaappamāṇavasena “appamaññāyo”ti vuccanti, satta
analyzed: appamāṇataḥ pharanti iti evam pharaṇa appamāṇa vasena appamaññāyaḥ ti vuccanti satta

original: appamāṇavasenāpi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Mettāsahagatenāti mettāya samannāgatena. Ekaṃ disanti
analyzed: appamāṇa vasena api vattum vaṭṭati mettā sahagatena ati mettāya samannāgatena ekam disanti

original: puratthimādīsu catūsu disāsu yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ disaṃ, taṃdisāpariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena
analyzed: puratthima ādīsu catūsu disāsu yam kiñci ekam disam taṃdisā pariyāpanna satta pharaṇa vasena

original: cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pharitvāti phusitvā ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Viharatīti pavatteti. Tathā dutiyantiādīsu.
analyzed: ca itam vuttam pharitvā ti phusitvā ārammaṇam katvā viharati iti pavatta iti tathā dutiya ntiādīsu

original: Yathā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā, tatheva tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ, catutthañcāti attho.
analyzed: yathā ekam disam pharitvā tathā iva tad anantaram dutiyam tatiyam catuttham ca ati

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyanti eteneva nayena uparimaṃ disaṃ, heṭṭhimaṃ disaṃ, anudisañca
analyzed: iti uddham adhas tiriyanti etena iva nayena uparimam disam heṭṭhimam disam anudisam ca

original: anukkamena mettāsahagatena cetasā pharitvā viharatīti attho. Ettāvatā ekamekaṃ disaṃ
analyzed: anukkamena mettā sahagatena cetasā pharitvā viharati iti attho ettāvatā ekam ekam disam

original: pariggahetvā odhiso mettāpharaṇataṃ dassitaṃ.
analyzed: pariggahetvā odhisaḥ mettā pharaṇa tam dassitam

original: Sabbadhītiādi pana anodhiso dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha sabbadhīti sabbattha. Sabbattatāyāti
analyzed: sabbadhi itiādi pana anodhisaḥ dassana attham vuttam tattha sabbadhi iti sabbattha sabbattatāya ati

original: sabbesu hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhamittasapattamajjhattādippabhedesu attatāya, tesu vibhāgaṃ
analyzed: sabbesu hīna majjhi mukkaṭṭha mitta sapatta majjhatta ādi ppabhedesu atta tāya tesu vibhāgam

original: akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā sabbattatāyāti sabbena cittabhāvena, īsakampi
analyzed: a katvā atta sama tāya iti vuttam hoti atha vā sabbattatāya ati sabbena citta bhāvena īsakampi

original: bahi avikkhepamānoti attho. Sabbāvantanti sabbasattavantaṃ, sabbasattayuttanti attho.
analyzed: bahi a vikkhepamānaḥ ti attho sabbāvantam ti sabba sattavantam sabba satta yuttam iti attho

original: Lokanti sattalokaṃ. Puna “mettāsahagatenā”ti idaṃ “vipulenā”tiādīhi visesanehi sambandhadassanavasena
analyzed: lokam ti satta lokam puna mettā sahagatena ati idam vipulena ati ādīhi visesanehi sambandha dassana vasena

original: vā vuttaṃ, nigamanavasena vā. Tattha pharaṇavasena vipulatā veditabbā. Bhūmivasena
analyzed: vā vuttam nigamana vasena vā tattha pharaṇa vasena vipula tā veditabbā bhūmi vasena

original: pana mahaggatatā. Paguṇavasena, appamāṇasattārammaṇavasena ca appamāṇatā. Byāpādapaccatthikappahānena
analyzed: pana mahaggata tā paguṇa vasena appamāṇa satta ārammaṇa vasena ca appamāṇa tā byāpāda paccatthika ppahānena

original: averatā. Domanassappahānena niddukkhatā, saṅkhatatā, abyāpajjatā ca daṭṭhabbā. Evaṃ
analyzed: avera tā domanassa ppahānena niddukkha tā saṅkhata tā abyāpajja tā ca daṭṭhabbā evam

original: karuṇāsahagatenātiādīsupi attho veditabboti ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: karuṇā sahagatena ati ādīsu pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ti ayam tāva ettha padattho

original: Dhammabhedo panettha suviññeyyova. Vibhaṅganayena pana tīsu rūpāvacarakusalavipākakiriyācittesu
analyzed: dhamma bhedaḥ pana ittha su viññeyyaḥ va vibhaṅga nayena pana tīsu rūpāvacara kusala vipāka kiriyā cittesu

original: sampayuttā sattesu mettādibrahmavihārabhūtā adoso karuṇā muditā tatramajjhattatāti
analyzed: sampayuttā sattesu mettā ādi brahmavihāra bhūtā adosaḥ karuṇā muditā tatram ajjhatta tā ati

original: cattāro dhammā nānānayehi vibhattā, taṃsampayuttā pana kāmāvacarabhūtā ca etā idha
analyzed: cattāro dhammā nānā nayehi vibhattā tad sampayuttā pana kāmāvacara bhūtā ca etāḥ idha

original: na gahitā. Arūpāvacaralokuttaresu panetā appamaññā natthevāti. Pañhāpucchake panetā
analyzed: na gahitā arūpāvacara lokuttaresu panetā appamaññā nattha iva ati pañhāpucchake panetā

original: tāva siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā. Tisso sukhāya, catutthā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: siyā kusalā siyā abyākatā tisso sukhāya catutthāḥ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttā. Vipākattike tidhāpi, upekkhā avitakkaavicārā, sesā tidhāpi, mahaggatāva,
analyzed: sampayuttā vipāka ttike tidhā api upekkhā avitakka avicārā sesā tidhā api mahaggatā ava

original: parittārammaṇaatītārammaṇattikesu na vattabbāva, bahiddhārammaṇāva, anidassanaappaṭighāva,
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇa atīta ārammaṇa ttikesu na vattabbau bahiddha ārammaṇau anidassana appaṭighau

original: mettā hetu, sesā na hetū, no cittā, cetasikā, rūpāvacarā, sauttarāva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
analyzed: mettā hetu sesā na hetū no cittā cetasikā rūpāvacarā sauttarā ava sesam su viññeyyam eva ati

original: Appamaññāvibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: appamaññā vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sikkhāpada vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā

original: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – sikkhāpadānīti sikkhitabbapadāni,
analyzed: sikkhāpada vibhaṅga mātikāya pana atthato tāva sikkhāpadāni iti sikkhitabba padāni

original: sikkhākoṭṭhāsāti attho. Apica sabbepi kusalā dhammā sikkhitabbato sikkhā, tāsaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: sikkhākoṭṭhāsā ti attho apica sabbe pi kusalā dhammā sikkhitabbataḥ sikkhā tāsam patiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena

original: padaṃ, pañcasu pana sīlaṅgesu yaṃ kiñci aṅgaṃ. Pāṇātipātādīsu pāṇassa atīva pāto
analyzed: padam pañcasu pana sīlaṅgesu yam kiñci aṅgam pāṇa atipāta ādīsu pāṇassa atīva pāto

original: pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadhoti attho. Pāṇoti cettha vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ,
analyzed: pāṇa atipāto pāṇa vadho ti attho pāṇo ti ca ittha vohārato satto paramatthataḥ jīvitindriyam

original: tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ
analyzed: tasmin pana pāṇe pāṇa saññinaḥ jīvitindriya upacchedaka aupakkama samuṭṭhāpikā

original: aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto, tasmā pāṇātipātā. Veramaṇīti virati,
analyzed: aññatara dvāra ppavattā vadhaka cetanā pāṇātipāto tasmā pāṇātipātā veramaṇī iti virati

original: sā eva vuttanayena sikkhāpadanti veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ. Adinnanti na dinnaṃ, parapariggahitaṃ,
analyzed: sā eva vutta nayena sikkhāpadam ti veramaṇi sikkhāpadam adinnam ti na dinnam para pariggahitam

original: parapariggahitassa adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ. Parassa haraṇaṃ theyyaṃ corikāti
analyzed: para pariggahitassa a dinnassa ādānam a dinna ādānam parassa haraṇam theyyam corikā ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Atthato pana parapariggahite tathāsaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: vuttam hoti atthataḥ pana para pariggahite tathāsaññinaḥ tad ādāyaka aupakkama samuṭṭhāpikā

original: theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Kāmesūti vatthukāmesu. Micchācārāti kilesakāmavasena lāmakācārā,
analyzed: theyya cetanā adinna ādānam kāmesu iti vatthu kāmesu micchā ācārā ati kilesa kāma vasena lāmaka ācārā

original: purisassa māturakkhitādisaṅkhātāsu, itthiyā attano niyamitapurisato parapurisasaṅkhātesu

original: Dhammakammapathālamba-vedanāmūlakammato;
analyzed: dhamma kamma patha ālamba vedanā mūla kammato

original: Sāvajjaṅgādito ñeyyo, pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
analyzed: pāḷi mutta vinicchayaḥ

analyzed: saṅkhāra ārammaṇam vā tathā musāvādaḥ micchācāro itthi purisa ārammaṇaḥ surā pānam saṅkhāra ārammaṇam

analyzed: lobha moha mūlaḥ uva tathā surā pānam kammataḥ pana ittha musāvādaḥ vacī kammam sesā kāya kammam eva

original: Sāvajjato pana pāṇātipāto tāva amanussake pāṇe appasāvajjo, manussake mahāsāvajjo.

analyzed: adinnādānam vatthuno hīna ppaṇīta tāya ca iva guṇa virahita tabbanta santaka tāya

analyzed: pana

analyzed: aṅga āditaḥ pana pāṇātipātassa pāṇaḥ pāṇa saññi tā vadhaka cittam upakkamo tena maraṇa nti

analyzed: pañca aṅgāni sāhatthikaḥ āṇattikaḥ nissaggikaḥ thāvaraḥ vijjā mayaḥ iddhi mayaḥ ti cha payogā

analyzed: adinnādānassa para pariggahita tā tathāsaññi tā theyya cittam upakkamaḥ tena haraṇanti

analyzed: vasena pavattā micchācārassa agamanīya vatthu tā sevana cittam maggena magga ppaṭipatti iti

original: Evaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ dhammādito vinicchayaṃ ñatvā idāni pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīnaṃ pañcannampi –

original: Dhammakammapathālamba-samādānapayogato;

original: Khaṇḍato gahaṭṭhā yaṃ yaṃ vītikkamanti, taṃ tadeva khaṇḍaṃ hoti, netare. Gahaṭṭhā
analyzed: khaṇḍataḥ gahaṭṭhāḥ yam yam vītikkamanti tam tat eva khaṇḍam hoti na itare gahaṭṭhāḥ

original: anibaddhasīlā honti, yaṃ yaṃ sakkonti, taṃ tadeva gopenti. Sāmaṇerānaṃ pana ekasmiṃ

original: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sikkhāpada vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgamātikāya atthato tāva – catasso paṭisambhidāti cattāro pabhedā.
analyzed: paṭisambhidā vibhaṅga mātikāya atthato tāva catasso paṭisambhidā ati cattāro pabhedā

analyzed: niddese pana atthe ñāṇam attha paṭisambhidā āti ādinā ñāṇa vasena niddiṭṭha ttā ñāṇassa iva

analyzed: na aññassa kassaci iti veditabbam attha paṭisambhidā ati attha visaya ñāṇa ppabhedā attha ppabheda sat lakkhaṇa vibhāvana vavatthāna karaṇa samattha tā vasena

original: atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇanti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca atthoti hetuphalaṃ.
analyzed: atthe pa bheda gatam ñāṇanti sesa padesu pi esā iva nayaḥ ettha ca attho ti hetu phalam

original: So hi hetuvasena araṇīyato gantabbato, uppādetabbato ca “attho”ti vuccati. Pabhedato
analyzed: so hi hetu vasena araṇīyataḥ gantabbataḥ uppādetabbataḥ ca attho ti vuccati pabhedato

original: panesopi pañcavidho hoti yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ, bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti.

original: Dhammoti paccayo, so hi phalaṃ vidahati pavatteti uppādeti ceva pāpeti cāti “dhammo”ti
analyzed: dhammo ti paccayaḥ saḥ hi phalam vidahati pavatteti uppādeti ca iva pāpeti ca ati dhammo ti

original: vuccati. Pabhedato panesopi pañcavidho hoti yo koci phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo,
analyzed: vuccati pabhedato pana iso api pañcavidhaḥ hoti yaḥ koci phala nibbattakaḥ hetu ariya maggo

original: bhāsitaṃ, kusalaṃ, akusalanti.

original: Imā dhammatthaniruttiyo ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tattha tattha pabhedagataṃ
analyzed: imāḥ dhamma attha niruttiyaḥ ārammaṇam katvā paccavekkhantassa tattha tattha pabheda gatam

original: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā nāma.
analyzed: ñāṇam nirutti paṭisambhidā nāma

original: Ettha ca niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā, na paññattārammaṇā, paṭisambhidāpatto
analyzed: ettha ca nirutti paṭisambhidā sadda ārammaṇā na paññatta ārammaṇā paṭisambhidā āpatto

original: hi “phasso vedanā”tiādikaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti, “phassā vedano”tiādikaṃ
analyzed: hi phassaḥ vedanā iti ādikam saddam sutvā ayam sa bhāva nirutti iti jānāti phassāḥ vedanā iti ādikam

original: pana “na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti. Sabhāvaniruttīti ca māgadhikā bhāsā, yāya sammāsambuddhā
analyzed: pana na sabhāva nirutti iti jānāti sabhāva nirutti iti ca māgadhikā bhāsā sammāsambuddhā

original: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropenti, brahmāno ca agāmake araññe kiñci vacanaṃ
analyzed: tepiṭakam buddha vacanam tantim āropenti brahmāno ca agāmake araññe kiñci vacanaṃ

original: asutvā vaḍḍhitadārakā ca attano dhammatāya bhāsanti, yā ca apāyesu manusse devaloke

analyzed: ca iva māgadha bhāsā ussannā pacchā ca tatas andhaka yonaka damiḷa ādi desa bhāsā ca iva sakkata ādi aṭṭhārasa mahā bhāsā

original: ca nibbattā, sā hi yasmā itarāsu bhāsāsu parivattantāsupi na parivattati, sabbakālaṃ
analyzed: ca nibbattā sā hi yasmai itarāsu bhāsāsu na parivattati sabbakālam

original: attano sabhāve eva tiṭṭhati, tasmā “sabhāvaniruttī”ti vuccati. Yā brahmavohāro, ariyavohāroti
analyzed: attano sabhāve eva tiṭṭhati tasmā sabhāva nirutti iti vuccati yā brahmavohāro ariya vohāro ti

original: ca vuccati, tāya pana māgadhabhāsāya tantiṃ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ
analyzed: ca vuccati tāya pana māgadha bhāsāya tantim āruḷhassa buddha vacanassa paṭisambhidā pattānam

original: sotapathāgamanameva papañco. Sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatte eva nayasatena nayasahassena
analyzed: sota patha āgamanam eva sote pana saṅghaṭṭita matte eva naya satena naya sahassena

original: attho upaṭṭhāti. Aññāya pana bhāsāya tantiṃ āruḷhaṃ taṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ sahasā nārohati,
analyzed: atthaḥ upaṭṭhāti aññāya pana bhāsāya tantim āruḷham tam tesam cittam sahasā na ārohati

original: kicchena uggahetabbaṃ hoti, puthujjanānañca sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvāpi paṭisambhidāpatti
analyzed: kicchena uggahetabbam hoti puthujjanānam ca sakalam buddha vacanam uggahetvā api paṭisambhidā āpatti

original: nāma natthi, ariyasāvako no paṭisambhidāpatto nāma natthi, paṭisambhidāpatto aññaṃ
analyzed: nāma natthi ariyasāvako no paṭisambhidā patto nāma natthi paṭisambhidā patto aññam

original: saddaṃ nāmākhyātopasagganipātabhedato jānāti, na jānātīti? Yadaggena saddaṃ sutvā
analyzed: saddam nāma ākhyāta upasagga nipāta bhedataḥ jānāti na jānāti iti yat aggena saddam sutvā

original: “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti, tadaggena etampi jānissati,
analyzed: ayam sabhāva nirutti ayam na sabhāva nirutti iti jānāti tad aggena etam pi jānissati

original: na cetaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: na ca itam paṭisambhidā kiccam ti veditabbam

original: Paṭibhānanti dhammatthādivisayaṃ sabbatthakañāṇaṃ, taṃ ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
analyzed: paṭibhānam ti dhamma attha ādi visayam sabbatthaka ñāṇam tam ñāṇam ārammaṇam katvā paccavekkhantassa

original: pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma, imā catassopi paṭisambhidā adhigamena
analyzed: pabheda gatam ñāṇam paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā nāma imāḥ catasso api paṭisambhidāḥ adhigamena

original: pariyattiuggahaṇena sakkaccadhammassavanena atthaparipucchāya pubbayogenāti pañcahi
analyzed: pariyatti uggahaṇena sakkacca dhamma ssavanena attha paripucchāya pubba yogena ati pañcahi

original: kāraṇehi visadā honti, sekhabhūmiyaṃ, asekhabhūmiyañcāti dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchantīti
analyzed: kāraṇehi visadāḥ honti sekha bhūmiyam a sekha bhūmiyam ca ati dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedam gacchanti iti

original: veditabbā. Ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
analyzed: veditabbā ayam tāva ettha padatthaḥ

original: Dhammabhedo panetthāpi vibhaṅganaye pākaṭo bhavissati. Vibhaṅganayesu hi tīsupi dhammaniruttipaṭibhānapaṭisambhidā
analyzed: dhamma bhedaḥ pana itthā api vibhaṅga naye pākaṭaḥ bhavissati vibhaṅga nayesu hi tīsu pi dhamma nirutti paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā

original: tissopi kāmāvacarajavanasampayuttañāṇānaṃ vasena tabbisayappabhedena saddhiṃ nānappakārato
analyzed: tissaḥ api kāmāvacara javana sampayutta ñāṇānam vasena tad visaya ppabhedena saddhim nānā ppakārato

original: vibhattā. Atthapaṭisambhidā pana tesaṃ ñāṇānañceva aṭṭhalokuttaracittasampayuttānañca
analyzed: vibhattā attha paṭisambhidā pana tesam ñāṇānam ca iva aṭṭha lokuttara citta sampayuttānam ca

original: vasena tabbisayappabhedena saddhiṃ. Lokuttarañāṇānipi hi maggappattabbatāya atthabhūtanibbānārammaṇattā
analyzed: vasena tad bisaya ppabhedena saddhim lokuttara ñāṇāni pi hi magga ppattabba tāya attha bhūta nibbāna ārammaṇa ttā

original: “atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuccati.
analyzed: attha paṭisambhidā ti vuccati

original: Pañhāpucchake pana siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā, tisso paṭisambhidā siyā vipākadhammadhammā,
analyzed: pañhāpucchake pana siyā kusalā siyā abyākatā tissaḥ paṭisambhidā siyā vipāka dhamma dhammā

original: siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā, atthapaṭisambhidā tidhāpi, tisso paṭisambhidā
analyzed: siyā neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammā attha paṭisambhidā tidhā api tisso paṭisambhidā

original: parittā, atthapaṭisambhidā siyā parittā, siyā appamāṇā, niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā,
analyzed: parittā attha paṭisambhidā siyā parittā siyā appamāṇā nirutti paṭisambhidā paritta ārammaṇā

original: bahiddhārammaṇā ca, sesā tidhāpi, niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇāva, atthapaṭisambhidā
analyzed: bahiddha ārammaṇā ca sesā tidhā api nirutti paṭisambhidā paccuppanna ārammaṇā ava attha paṭisambhidā

original: tidhāpi na vattabbā ca, anidassanaappaṭighā, hetū, sahetukā, tisso paṭisambhidā sauttarā,
analyzed: tidhā api na vattabbā ca anidassana appaṭighā hetū sa hetukā tisso paṭisambhidā sauttarā

original: atthapaṭisambhidā dvidhāpi, araṇā cāti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: attha paṭisambhidā dvidhā api araṇā ca ati sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Ñāṇavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā
Ñāṇavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – ekavidhenāti ekappakārena, ekakoṭṭhāsena
analyzed: ñāṇa vibhaṅga mātikāya pana atthato tāva ekavidhena ati eka ppakārena eka koṭṭhāsena

original: vā. Ñāṇavatthūti ettha pana ñāṇañca taṃ vatthu ca nānappakārānaṃ sampattīnanti ñāṇavatthu.
analyzed: vā ñāṇa vatthu iti ettha pana ñāṇam ca tam vatthu ca nānā pakārānam sampattīnam ti ñāṇa vatthu

original: Pañca viññāṇāti cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca. Na hetū ahetukātiādīsu heṭṭhā hetudukādīsu
analyzed: pañca viññāṇā ti cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni pañca na hetū ahetukā atiādīsu heṭṭhā hetu duka ādīsu

original: vuttanayānusārena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Apica hetudukādīsu pañca viññāṇā hetū
analyzed: vutta naya anusārena sabbattha attho veditabbaḥ apica hetu duka ādīsu pañca viññāṇāḥ hetū

original: dhammāti vā sahetukā dhammāti vā na vattabbā, ekantena pana na hetū eva, ahetukā
analyzed: dhammā ati vā sa hetukā dhammā ati vā na vattabbā ekantena pana na hetū eva ahetukā

original: evāti. Evaṃ “yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā paññā”ti iminā upari ekavidhaparicchedāvasāne
analyzed: eva ti evam yāthāvaka vatthu vibhāvanā paññā iti iminā upari ekavidha pariccheda avasāne

original: vakkhamānena sambandhoti. Iminā nayena sabbattha yathānurūpaṃ attho veditabbo. Tattha
analyzed: vakkhamānena sambandho ti iminā nayena sabbattha yathānurūpam atthaḥ veditabbaḥ tattha

original: ca acetasikāti cittāni eva pañcaviññāṇasampayuttānaṃ idha aparāmaṭṭhattā.
analyzed: ca acetasikā ti cittāni eva pañca viññāṇa sampayuttānam idha a parāmaṭṭha ttā

original: Uppannavatthukā uppannārammaṇāti khaṇapaccuppannavasena anāgatapaṭikkhepo. Na hi
analyzed: uppanna vatthukā uppanna ārammaṇā ti khaṇa paccuppanna vasena anāgata paṭikkhepaḥ na hi

original: tāni anāgatesu pañcasu vatthārammaṇesu uppajjanti. Purejātavatthukā purejātārammaṇāti
analyzed: tāni anāgatesu pañcasu vattha ārammaṇesu uppajjanti purejāta vatthukā purejāta ārammaṇā ati

original: sahuppattipaṭikkhepo. Na hi tāni sahuppannaṃ vatthārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjanti. Ajjhattikavatthukāti
analyzed: sahuppatti paṭikkhepaḥ na hi tāni sahuppannam vattha ārammaṇam paṭicca uppajjanti ajjhattika vatthukā ti

original: ajjhattajjhattabhūte pañca pasāde vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanakā. Ettha ca pañca viññāṇā
analyzed: ajjhatta ajjhatta bhūte pañca pasāde vatthum katvā uppajjanakāḥ ettha ca pañca viññāṇā

original: sayampi ajjhattikā, ajjhattikavatthukā ca, manoviññāṇaṃ hadayanissitaṃ ajjhattikaṃ,
analyzed: sayam pi ajjhattikā ajjhattika vatthukā ca manaḥ viññāṇam hadaya nissitam ajjhattikam

original: bāhiravatthukaṃ, pañcaviññāṇasampayuttā tayo khandhā bāhirā, ajjhattikavatthukā,
analyzed: bāhira vatthukam pañca viññāṇa sampayuttā tayo khandhāḥ bāhirāḥ ajjhattika vatthukā

original: manoviññāṇasampayuttā tayo khandhā bāhirā, bāhiravatthukāti evaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa sampayuttā tayo khandhāḥ bāhirāḥ bāhira vatthukā ti evam catukkam veditabbam

original: Asambhinnavatthukā asambhinnārammaṇāti aniruddhavatthārammaṇā. Na hi tāni niruddhavatthārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: asambhinna vatthukā asambhinna ārammaṇā ati aniruddha vattha ārammaṇā na hi tāni niruddha vattha ārammaṇam

original: paṭicca uppajjanti. Nānāvatthukā nānārammaṇāti tāni yathākkamaṃ cakkhurūpādiniyatekekavatthārammaṇatāya
analyzed: paṭicca uppajjanti nānā vatthukā nānā ārammaṇā ti tāni yathākkamam cakkhu rūpa ādi niyata eka eka vattha ārammaṇa tāya

original: aññamaññaṃ bhinnavatthukā, bhinnārammaṇā ca. Na hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuṃ muñcitvā
analyzed: aññamaññam bhinna vatthukā bhinna ārammaṇā ca na hi cakkhu viññāṇam cakkhum muñcitvā

original: sotādīsu aññataraṃ vatthuṃ katvā rūpaṃ muñcitvā saddādīsu aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: sota ādīsu aññataram vatthum katvā rūpam muñcitvā sadda ādīsu aññatara ārammaṇam paṭicca

original: uppajjati, na itarāni cetarāni. Na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontīti iminā
analyzed: uppajjati na itarāni ca itarāni na aññamaññassa gocara visayam paccanubhonti iti iminā

original: ca nesaṃ nānārammaṇataṃyeva vibhāveti. Na asamannāhārā uppajjantīti anāvajjane na
analyzed: ca nesam na anārammaṇa taṃyā iva na asamannāhārāḥ uppajjanti iti an āvajjane na

original: uppajjanti, pañcadvārāvajjanena anāvajjite visaye na uppajjantīti attho. Na amanasikārāti
analyzed: uppajjanti pañca dvāra āvajjanena an āvajjite visaye na uppajjanti iti atthaḥ na a manasikārā ati

original: tamevettha pariyāyantarena vibhāveti. Na abbokiṇṇāti aññamaññaṃ nirantarā hutvā na
analyzed: tam eva itthā pariyāya antarena vibhāveti na aññam aññam nirantarā hutvā na

original: uppajjanti. Na apubbaṃ acarimanti ekakkhaṇepi saha na uppajjanti. Na kevalañca etāni,
analyzed: uppajjanti na apubbam acarimanti eka khaṇe pi saha na uppajjanti na kevalam ca etāni

original: aññānipi viññāṇāni dve vā taduttariṃ vā ekato na uppajjanti, ekekameva pana viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: aññāni pi viññāṇāni dve vā tad uttarim vā ekatas na uppajjanti ekekam eva pana viññāṇam

original: uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha – “aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatī”tiādi.
analyzed: uppajjati iti veditabbam yathā āha aññam uppajjate cittam aññam cittam nirujjhati itiādi

original: Na aññamaññassa samanantarāti iminā anabbokiṇṇatāya eva vibhāvanā.
analyzed: na aññamaññassa samanantarā iti iminā anabbokiṇṇa tāya eva vibhāvanā

original: Anābhogāti anāvajjanabhūtā āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā āvajjanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na samatthāti
analyzed: anābhogā ati anāvajjana bhūtā āvajjana ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā āvajjana kiccam kātum na samatthā ati

original: attho. Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi
analyzed: atthaḥ na kañci dhammam paṭivijānāti iti manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti evam vuttam ekam pi

original: kusalākusalaṃ dhammaṃ kocipi puggalo na paṭivijānāti, tehi viññāṇehi na sādhetīti
analyzed: kusala akusalam dhammam koci pi puggalaḥ na paṭivijānāti tehi viññāṇehi na sādheti iti

original: attho. Aññatra abhinipātamattāti ṭhapetvā rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ abhinipātamattaṃ āpāthagamanamattaṃ,
analyzed: atthaḥ aññatra abhinipāta mattā ati ṭhapetvā rūpa ādi ārammaṇānam abhinipāta mattam āpātha gamana mattam

original: byattataropi puggalo pañcaviññāṇehi āpāthagatārammaṇapaṭivijānanamattato aññaṃ kusalākusalapaṭivijānanaṃ
analyzed: byattataraḥ api puggalo pañca viññāṇehi āpāthagata ārammaṇa paṭivijānana mattataḥ aññam kusala akusala paṭivijānanam

original: kātuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
analyzed: kātum na sakkoti iti attho

original: Pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samanantarāpīti manodhātuyāpi. Api-saddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho,
analyzed: pañcannam viññāṇānam samanantarā api iti manaḥ dhātuyā api api saddo ca ittha sampiṇḍana attho

original: tena na kevalaṃ manodhātuyāva, tato parehipi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi tadārammaṇapariyosānehi
analyzed: tena na kevalam tatas parehi pi pañca dvārika viññāṇehi tad ārammaṇa pariyosānehi

original: na kiñci kusalākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti ayamattho dassitoti gahetabbo. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: na kiñci kusala akusalam dhammam paṭivijānāti iti ayam attho dassito ti gahetabbaḥ kiñcā api

original: pañcadvāre kusalākusalādīni javanāni uppajjanti, tathāpi tāni moghapupphāni viya
analyzed: pañca dvāre kusala akusala ādīni javanāni uppajjanti tathā api tāni mogha pupphāni viya

original: abbohārikānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Na kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappetītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Na
analyzed: abbohārikāni iti daṭṭhabbāni na kañci iriyāpatham kappeti iti ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ na

original: hi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi gamanādīsu kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, na kāyavacīkammaṃ
analyzed: hi pañcadvārika viññāṇehi gamana ādīsu kañci iriyāpatham kappeti na kāya vacī kammaṃ

original: paṭṭhapeti, na viññattiṃ vā samuṭṭhāpeti, na kusalākusalaṃ dhammaṃ samādiyati, na
analyzed: paṭṭhapeti na viññattim vā samuṭṭhāpeti na kusala akusalam dhammam samādiyati na

original: lokiyalokuttaraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjati, na tato vuṭṭhāti, na bhavato cavati, na bhavantare
analyzed: lokiya lokuttaram samādhim samāpajjati na tatas vuṭṭhāti na bhavataḥ cavati na bhavantare

original: uppajjati, sabbampetaṃ kiccaṃ manodvārikacitteneva hoti. Yathā cetesaṃ etāni kiccāni
analyzed: uppajjati sabbam petam kiccam manodvārika cittena iva hoti yathā ca etesam etāni kiccāni

original: natthi, evaṃ niyāmokkamanādīnipi. Na hi koci pañcadvārikajavanehi micchattaniyāmaṃ,
analyzed: na atthi evam niyāma ukkamana ādīni pi na hi koci pañca dvārika javanehi micchatta niyāmam

original: sammattaniyāmaṃ vā okkamati, na cetāni nāmagottaṃ vā kasiṇādipaññattiṃ vā tilakkhaṇādiṃ
analyzed: sammatta niyāmam vā okkamati na cetāni nāma gottam vā kasiṇa ādi paññattim vā tilakkhaṇa ādim

original: vā ārabbha bhavanti. Na supatītiādīsu sabbehi pañcadvārikacittehi na niddaṃ okkamati,
analyzed: vā ārabbha bhavanti na supati iti ādīsu sabbehi pañcadvārika cittehi na niddam okkamati

original: na kiñci supinaṃ passati. Niddāyantassa hi indriyesu mahāpadīpaturiyasaddādioḷārikehipi
analyzed: na kiñci supinam passati niddāyantassa hi indriyesu

original: rūpādipañcārammaṇehi ghaṭṭitesu paṭhamaṃ pañcadvārikāni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetuṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādi pañca ārammaṇehi ghaṭṭitesu paṭhamam pañca dvārikāni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭetum

original: na sakkonti, manodvārikameva āvajjanaṃ sakkoti, tasmiñca uppanne manodvārikajavanaṃ
analyzed: na sakkonti manodvārikam eva āvajjanam sakkoti tasmin ca uppanne manodvārika javanam

original: javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Dutiyavāre pana pañcadvārikaāvajjanesu yaṃ kiñci yathārahaṃ
analyzed: dutiya vāre pana yam kiñci yathāraham

original: bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, tato tadārammaṇapariyosānāni taṃtaṃdvārikavīthicittāni yathākkamaṃ
analyzed: bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭeti tatas tad ārammaṇa pariyosānāni taṃ taṃdvārika vīthi cittāni yathākkamam

original: pavattitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaranti. Tatiyavāre pana manodvārikāvajjanajavanāni pavattanti,
analyzed: pavattitvā bhavaṅgam otaranti tatiya vāre pana manodvārika vajjana javanāni pavattanti

original: tasmiṃ khaṇe rūpādipañcārammaṇavavatthānaṃ hoti, satto ca niddāya paṭibuddhoti, evaṃ
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe rūpa ādi pañca ārammaṇa vavatthānam hoti satto ca niddāya paṭibuddhaḥ ti evam

original: manodvārikacitteneva paṭibujjhati.
analyzed: manaḥ dvārika cittena iva paṭibujjhati

original: Supinampi hi teneva passati, na pañcadvārikena, tañca panetaṃ supinaṃ passanto catūhi
analyzed: supinam pi hi tena iva passati na pañcadvārikena tat ca pana etam supinam passanto catūhi

original: kāraṇehi passati dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato
analyzed: kāraṇehi passati dhātu khobhataḥ vā anubhūta pubbataḥ vā devatā upasaṃhārataḥ vā pubba nimittato

original: vā. Imesaṃ pana saṃsaggasannipātatopi bahudhā papañcenti. Tattha yaṃ vātapittādidhātukkhobhato,
analyzed: vā imesam pana saṃsagga sannipātataḥ pi bahudhā tattha yam vāta pitta ādi dhātu khobhato

original: anubhūtapubbato ca supinaṃ passati, na taṃ saccaṃ. Yaṃ devatopasaṃhārato passati,
analyzed: anubhūta pubbataḥ ca supinam passati na tat saccam yam devatā upasaṃhārato passati

original: taṃ saccaṃ vā hoti alikaṃ vā. Kuddhā hi devatā viparītampi katvā dassenti. Yaṃ pubbanimittato
analyzed: tat saccam vā hoti alikam vā kuddhāḥ hi devatāḥ viparītam pi katvā dassenti yam pubba nimittataḥ

original: passati, taṃ ekantasaccameva bodhisattakosalarājādīnaṃ pañcasoḷasamahāsupināni viya.
analyzed: passati tam ekanta saccam eva bodhisatta kosala rāja ādīnam pañca soḷasa mahā supināni viya

original: Tañca panetaṃ catubbidhaṃ supinaṃ sekhaputhujjanāva passanti, na asekhā pahīnavipallāsattā.
analyzed: tat ca pana itam catubbidham supinam sekha puthujjanā ava passanti na asekhā pahīna vipallāsa ttā

original: Kiṃ panetaṃ passanto sutto passati paṭibuddho vā? Kiñcettha, yadi sutto passati,

original: supinassa kusalādisabhāvato, bhavaṅgassa ca tadabhāvā abhidhammavirodho āpajjati.

original: Atha paṭibuddho, supinaṃ passantena katassa abbohārikassāpi vītikkamassa sabbohārikasseva
analyzed: atha paṭibuddhaḥ supinam passantena katassa abbohārikassa api vītikkamassa sa bbohārikassa iva

original: ekantasāvajjattā anāpatti na siyāti vinayavirodho āpajjati. Pakārantaro ca natthi,

original: yena supinaṃ passeyyāti supinassa abhāvova āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati. Kasmā? Yasmā kapimiddhapareto
analyzed: yena supinam passeyyāti supinassa abhāvaḥ u āpajjati iti na āpajjati kasmai yasmai

analyzed: makkaṭa niddā viya punappunam kusala ādi citta vokiṇṇattā lahu parivattā tam kapimiddham

original: Dukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

analyzed: catusacca dhammam jāniṃsu te pi imañca eva catusaccam evam eva jāniṃsu anāgata maddhānam pi

analyzed: ca iva apacayāya ca sā hi vikkhambhana vasena kilese ca tad mūlake ca vipāka dhamme apacinoti

original: Sesā abyākatā paññā nevācayāya no apacayāya.

original: Saṅghabhede samānasaṃvāsasīmāya samānasaṃvāsake saṅghe ekato ṭhite visuṃ vaggasaṅghaṃ

original: gahetvā pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ bhindantassa saṅghabhedo hoti ānantariyakammañca.
analyzed: gahetvā pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅgham bhindantassa saṅgha bhedaḥ hoti ānantariya kammaṃ ca

original: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati. Katamehi pañcahi? Kammena
analyzed: vuttam ha etam pañcahi upāli ākārehi saṅghaḥ bhijjati katamehi pañcahi kammena

original: uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti. Tattha kammenāti apalokanādīsu
analyzed: uddesena voharantaḥ anussāvanena salākaggāhena ati tattha kammena ati apalokana ādīsu

original: catūsu aññatarena kammena. Uddesenāti pātimokkhuddesena. Voharanto kathayanto tāhi
analyzed: catūsu aññatarena kammena uddesena ati pātimokkha uddesena voharanto kathayanto tāhi

original: tāhi upapattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni dīpento. Anussāvanenāti
analyzed: tāhi upapattīhi adhammam dhamma uti ādīni aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthūni dīpentaḥ anussāvanena ati

original: “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ bahussutādibhāvaṃ, kathaṃ hi nāma mādiso uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ
analyzed: nanu tumhe jānātha mayham bahu ssuta ādi bhāvam katham hi nāma mādisaḥ uddhammam ubbinayam

original: satthusāsanaṃ gāheyya, kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ
analyzed: satthu sāsanam gāheyya kim aham apāyataḥ na bhāyāmi itiādinā nayena kaṇṇa mūle vacī bhedam

original: katvā anussāvanena. Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ vohārānussāvanehi tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā
analyzed: katvā anussāvanena salākaggāhena ati evam vohāra anussāvanehi tesam cittam upatthambhetvā

original: anivattidhammaṃ katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
analyzed: a nivatti dhammam katvā gaṇhatha imam salākam ti salākaggāhena

original: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.
analyzed: ettha ca kammam eva uddesaḥ vā pamāṇam vohāra anussāvana salākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā

original: Tesu nipphannesupi abhinnova hoti saṅgho. Yadā pana vohārānussāvanehi cattāro vā
analyzed: tesu nipphannesu pi abhinnaḥ va hoti saṅghaḥ yadā pana vohāra anussāvanehi cattāraḥ vā

original: atireke vā bhikkhū salākaṃ gāhetvā vaggaṃ saṅghaṃ gahetvā visuṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ
analyzed: atireke vā bhikkhū salākam gāhetvā vaggam saṅgham gahetvā visum kammam vā uddesam

original: vā karoti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti. Abhedapurekkhārassa pana samaggasaññāya
analyzed: vā karoti tadā saṅghaḥ bhinnaḥ nāma hoti abheda purekkhārassa pana samagga saññāya

original: vaṭṭati. Samaggasaññāya hi karontassa neva bhedo hoti, na ānantariyaṃ, tathā tato
analyzed: vaṭṭati samagga saññāya hi karontassa nā iva bhedaḥ hoti na ānantariyam tathā tatas

original: ūnaparisāya karontassa. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “ekato, upāli, cattāro honti ekato cattāro,
analyzed: ūna parisāya karontassa vuttam ha etam ekatas upāli cattāraḥ honti ekatas cattāro

original: navamo anussāvetī”tiādi.
analyzed: navamaḥ anussāveti itiādi

original: Imesu pana pañcasu ānantariyesu saṅghabhedo vacīkammaṃ, sesāni kāyakammāni, sabbāneva
analyzed: imesu pana pañcasu ānantariyesu saṅgha bhedaḥ vacī kammam sesāni kāya kammāni sabbān eva

original: kho tāni kāyadvāratopi vacīdvāratopi samuṭṭhahanti. Saṅghabhedopi hi hatthamuddāya
analyzed: kho tāni kāya dvārataḥ api vacī dvārataḥ api samuṭṭhahanti saṅgha bhedaḥ upi hi hattham uddāya

original: bhedaṃ karontassa kāyadvāratopi samuṭṭhāti, saṅghabhedo cettha kappaṭṭhitiyo. Kappavināse
analyzed: bhedam karontassa kāya dvārataḥ pi samuṭṭhāti saṅgha bhedaḥ ca ittha kappa ṭṭhitiyaḥ kappa vināse

original: eva hi saṅghabhedato muccati, sesānaṃ pana tathā niyamo natthi. Yena ca pañcapetāni
analyzed: eva hi saṅgha bhedataḥ muccati sesānam pana tathā niyamaḥ natthi yena ca

original: kammāni katāni honti, tassa saṅghabhedova niraye vipaccati, sesāni “ahosi kammaṃ
analyzed: kammāni katāni honti tassa saṅgha bhedaḥ uva niraye vipaccati sesāni ahosi kammam

original: nāhosi kammavipāko”ti evamādīsu saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Saṅghabhedābhāve lohituppādo,
analyzed: evamādīsu saṅkhyam gacchanti saṅgha bheda abhāve lohita uppādaḥ

original: tadabhāve arahantaghāto, tadabhāve mātughāto, pitughāto vā, tasmimpi sīlasampannatare.
analyzed: tad abhāve arahantaghātaḥ tad abhāve mātughātaḥ pitughātaḥ vā tasmin pi sīla sampannatare

original: Purimāni cettha cattāri sabbesaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇāni, saṅghabhedo pana
analyzed: purimāni ca ittha cattāri sabbesam gaha ṭṭha pabbajitānam sādhāraṇāni saṅgha bhedaḥ pana

original: pakatattassa bhikkhunova, asādhāraṇo aññesaṃ, bhikkhunīpi hi saṅghaṃ na bhindati,
analyzed: pakatattassa bhikkhuno va asādhāraṇaḥ aññesam bhikkhunī pi hi saṅgham na bhindati

original: pageva itare. Pañcapi cetāni dukkhavedanāsampayuttāni, dosamūlāni cāti veditabbāni.
analyzed: pageva itare pañca api cetāni dukkha vedanā sampayuttāni dosa mūlāni ca ati veditabbāni

original: Aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbatteyyāti ettha ariyasāvakassa aṭṭhamabhavāgahaṇaṃ kena niyāmitanti?
analyzed: aṭṭhamam bhavam nibbatteyya ti ettha ariya sāvakassa aṭṭhama bhava āgahaṇam kena niyāmitan ti

original: Vipassanāya. Yassa hi sā tikkhā, so ekaṃ eva bhavaṃ nibbattitvā arahattaṃ patvā ekabījī
analyzed: vipassanāya yassa hi sā tikkhā saḥ ekam eva bhavam nibbattitvā arahattam patvā ekabījī

original: nāma hoti. Yassa mandā, so dutiye…pe… chaṭṭhe vā bhave arahattaṃ patvā kolaṃkolo
analyzed: nāma hoti yassa mandā saḥ dutiye pe chaṭṭhe vā bhave arahattam patvā kolaṃkolaḥ

original: nāma hoti. Yassa pana atimandā, so sattamaṃ bhavaṃ nātikkamati, tattha niyamena arahattaṃ
analyzed: nāma hoti yassa pana ati mandā so sattamam bhavam na atikkamati tattha niyamena arahattam

original: pāpuṇitvā sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti. Sacepi hissa sattame bhave niddaṃ okkantassa
analyzed: pāpuṇitvā sattakkhattuparamaḥ nāma hoti sace pi hissa sattame bhave niddam okkantassa

original: matthake asani vā pabbatakūṭo vā pateyya, tasmimpi kāle arahattaṃ patvāva parinibbāti.
analyzed: matthake asani vā pabbata kūṭaḥ vā pateyya tasmim pi kāle arahattam patvā ava parinibbāti

original: Uttamakoṭiyā hi sattamabhavānatikkamanaññeva sandhāyeva “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti vuttoti.
analyzed: uttama koṭiyā hi sandhāya iva niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ ti vuttaḥ ti

original: Ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhātiādīsu dasasahassacakkavāḷasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahantaḥ sammāsambuddhā ati ādīsu dasa sahassa cakkavāḷa saṅkhātam

original: jātikhettaṃ ekā lokadhātu nāma āṇāvisayakhettesu buddhuppattisaṅkāya evābhāvato.
analyzed: jāti khettam ekā lokadhātu nāma āṇā visaya khettesu buddha uppatti saṅkāyaḥ eva abhāvato

original: Tattha dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ uppattipaṭisedhaṃ akatvā jātikhette eva kato. Ṭhapetvā imaṃ
analyzed: tattha dvinnam buddhānam uppatti paṭisedham a katvā jāti khette eva kato ṭhapetvā imam

original: cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā na uppajjanti buddhattahetūnaṃ anādibuddhaparamparādīnaṃ
analyzed: cakkavāḷam aññasmin cakkavāḷe buddhāḥ na uppajjanti buddha tta hetūnam anādi buddha paramparā ādīnam

original: tathābhāvā. Tato eva hi sattā niravasesato nibbutiṃ na pāpuṇanti. Yadi hi sabbacakkavāḷesu
analyzed: tathābhāvāḥ tatas eva hi sattāḥ niravasesataḥ nibbutim na pāpuṇanti yadi hi sabba cakkavāḷesu

original: buddhā uppajjeyyuṃ, sabbe sattā ito pubbe niravasesato nibbutiṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ, na ca
analyzed: buddhāḥ uppajjeyyum sabbe sattāḥ itas pubbe niravasesataḥ nibbutim pāpuṇeyyum na ca

original: taṃ atthi, tasmā anādibuddhaparamparāya vivaṭṭūpanissayasampannānaṃ nivāsabhūte imasmiṃ
analyzed: tam atthi tasmai anādi buddha paramparāya vivaṭṭu upanissaya sampannānam nivāsa bhūte imasmin

original: cakkavāḷe eva uppajjantīti veditabbā. Te cetthāpi dullabhā, tesaṃ dullabhattā evettha
analyzed: cakkavāḷe eva uppajjanti iti veditabbā te ca itthā api dullabhā tesam dullabha ttā eva itthā

original: kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyampi buddhuppādarahitaṃ hoti. Yadi ca te sulabhā bhaveyyuṃ, ekasmiṃ
analyzed: kappānam asaṅkhyeyyam pi buddhuppāda rahitam hoti yadi ca te sulabhāḥ bhaveyyum ekasmin

original: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyiasaṅkhyeyye catusaṭṭhibuddhānampi uppajjituṃ sakkā bhaveyya antarakappassa
analyzed: vivaṭṭa ṭṭhāyi asaṅkhyeyye catur aṭṭhi buddhānam pi uppajjitum sakkā bhaveyya antara kappassa

original: buddhantarattā. Bhaddakappesu cettha pañca buddhā eva uppajjanti. Kathaṃ panetthāpi
analyzed: buddhantarattāḥ bhaddakappesu ca ittha pañca buddhāḥ eva uppajjanti katham pana itthā api

original: dullabhatarā cakkavāḷantaresu uppajjeyyuṃ, buddhānañca dullabhatā kāraṇadullabhatāya,
analyzed: dullabhatarā cakkavāḷantaresu uppajjeyyum buddhānam ca dullabha tā kāraṇa dullabha tāya

original: tasmā imasmiññeva cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjanti? Etthāpi na devabrahmalokesu, manussaloke
analyzed: tasmai imasmin ñeva cakkavāḷe buddhāḥ uppajjanti ettha api na deva brahma lokesu manussa loke

original: eva pana uppajjanti ettheva sabbaso tividhasaddhammādhārassa saṅgharatanassa pātubhāvato,
analyzed: eva pana uppajjanti ettha iva sabbaso tividha saddhamma ādhārassa saṅgha ratanassa pātubhāvato

original: itaralokesu niravasesato pakārāsambhavato ca.
analyzed: itara lokesu niravasesataḥ pakāra asambhavataḥ ca

original: Yadi hi buddhā devalokādīsu uppajjeyyuṃ, manussā bhayena upasaṅkamitumeva na sakkonti,
analyzed: yadi hi buddhāḥ deva loka ādīsu uppajjeyyum manussāḥ bhayena upasaṅkamitum eva na sakkonti

original: pageva dhammasavanapabbajjādiṃ kātuṃ, teneva amhākaṃ bodhisatto attano rūpakāyānubhāvādisampattiyā
analyzed: pagā iva dhamma savana pabbajja ādim kātum tena iva amhākam bodhisatto attanaḥ rūpa kāya anubhāva ādi sampattiyā

original: uppannaamanussasaṅkākutūhalaṃ janaṃ nijjhāpetuṃ uttānaseyyakādiniyāmena vaḍḍhitvā
analyzed: uppanna amanussa saṅkā kutūhalam janam nijjhāpetum uttānaseyyaka ādi niyāmena vaḍḍhitvā

original: dārapariggahādiṃ akāsi, evaṃ katvā pabbajitampi naṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya pavisitvā paṇḍavapabbatapasse
analyzed: dāra pariggaha ādim akāsi evam katvā pabbajitam pi nam rājagahe piṇḍāya pavisitvā paṇḍava pabbata passe

original: nisīditvā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjantaṃ bimbisāro nānappakārato manussabhāvaṃ vicinitvāva
analyzed: nisīditvā piṇḍapātam paribhuñjantam bimbisāraḥ nānappakārataḥ manussa bhāvam vicinitvā ava

original: upasaṅkamituṃ visahi, no aññathā. Lokanitthāraṇatthāya hi buddhā uppajjanti, na attano
analyzed: upasaṅkamitum no aññathā loka nitthāraṇa tthāya hi buddhāḥ uppajjanti na attanaḥ

original: sakkārādiatthāya, tasmā manussesu eva uppajjantīti veditabbo. Tatthāpi imasmiṃ jambudīpe
analyzed: sakkāra ādi atthāya tasmā manussesu eva uppajjanti iti veditabbaḥ tattha api imasmim jambudīpe

original: eva, tatthāpi imasmiṃ majjhimapadese eva. Na kevalañca buddhāva, paccekabuddhā, aggasāvakamahāsāvakā
analyzed: eva tattha api imasmin majjhima padese eva na kevalañca paccekabuddhāḥ aggasāvaka mahāsāvakā

original: ca cakkavattiādayo ca aññepi puññavantasattā ettheva uppajjanti.
analyzed: ca cakkavatti ādayaḥ ca aññe pi ettha iva uppajjanti

original: Apubbaṃ acarimanti ettha mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇato pure pubbaṃ nāma, dhātuantaradhānato
analyzed: a pubbam a cariman ti ettha mātukucchismim paṭisandhi ggahaṇataḥ pure pubbam nāma dhātu antara dhānataḥ

original: pacchā carimaṃ nāma, ubhinnamantarā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ nāma. Etthantare aññassa buddhassa
analyzed: pacchā carimam nāma ubhinnam antarā apubbam acarimam nāma etthantare aññassa buddhassa

original: uppatti nivāritā, dhātuantaradhāne pana jāte aññassa uppatti na nivāritā. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: uppatti nivāritā dhātu antara dhāne pana jāte aññassa uppatti na nivāritā kiñcā api

original: na nivāritā, antarakappaṃ pana khepetvāva uppajjantīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: na nivāritāḥ antara kappam pana khepetvā ava uppajjanti iti veditabbam

original: Pañca hi antaradhānāni nāma adhigamaantaradhānaṃ paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ pariyattiantaradhānaṃ
analyzed: pañca hi antaradhānāni nāma adhigama antaradhānam paṭipatti antaradhānam pariyatti antaradhānam

original: liṅgaantaradhānaṃ dhātuantaradhānanti. Tattha adhigamoti maggaphalābhiññāpaṭisambhidāyo,
analyzed: liṅga antaradhānam dhātu antaradhānam ti tattha adhigamaḥ ti magga phala abhiññā paṭisambhidāyo

original: so parihāyamāno paṭisambhidāto paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Parinibbānato hi vassasahassameva
analyzed: saḥ parihāyamānaḥ paṭisambhidātaḥ paṭṭhāya parihāyati parinibbānataḥ hi vassa sahassam eva

analyzed: paṭisambhidāḥ nibbattetum sakkonti tatas param abhiññā tā api nibbattetum a sakkontā

original: sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavā honti, tato anāgāmino, tato sakadāgāmino, sotāpannā ca honti,

original: tesu dharantesupi adhigamo anantarahitova hoti, pacchimakassa pana sotāpannassa jīvitakkhayena
analyzed: tesu dharantesu pi adhigamaḥ anantara hitaḥ va hoti pacchimakassa pana sotāpannassa jīvita kkhayena

original: adhigamo antarahito nāma hoti. Idaṃ adhigamaantaradhānaṃ.
analyzed: adhigamaḥ antarahitaḥ nāma idam adhigama antaradhānam

original: Tato maggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ asakkontā “natthi dāni no ariyadhammapaṭivedho”ti jhānavipassanāsu
analyzed: tatas magga phalāni nibbattetum a sakkontā natthi dāni no ariya dhamma paṭivedho ti jhāna vipassanāsu

original: vosānaṃ āpajjitvā kosajjabahulā catupārisuddhisīlamattaṃ rakkhanto aññamaññaṃ na
analyzed: vosānam āpajjitvā kosajja bahulā catu pārisuddhi sīla mattam rakkhantaḥ aññam aññam na

original: codenti, na sārenti, akukkuccakā honti, tato paṭṭhāya khuddānukhuddakāni maddanti,
analyzed: codenti na sārenti a kukkuccakāḥ honti tatas paṭṭhāya khudda anukhuddakāni maddanti

original: tato garukāpattiṃ āpajjanti, pārājikamattameva rakkhanti, tesu dharantesupi paṭipatti
analyzed: tatas garuka āpattim āpajjanti pārājika mattam eva rakkhanti tesu dharantesu pi paṭipatti

original: anantarahitāva hoti, pacchimakassa pana bhikkhuno sīlabhedena vā jīvitakkhayena vā
analyzed: anantarahitā ava hoti pacchimakassa pana bhikkhuno sīla bhedena vā jīvita kkhayena vā

original: paṭipatti antarahitā nāma hoti. Idaṃ paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ nāma.
analyzed: paṭipatti antarahitā nāma hoti idam paṭipatti antaradhānam nāma

original: Pariyattīti sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ, gacchante gacchante kāle adhammikehi
analyzed: pariyatti iti sa aṭṭhakatham tepiṭakam buddha vacanam gacchante gacchante kāle adhammikehi

original: kaliyugarājādīhi vipannasassādisampattitāya paccayadāyakā duggatā honti, bhikkhū
analyzed: kali yuga rāja ādīhi vipanna sassa ādi sampatti tāya paccaya dāyakāḥ duggatāḥ honti bhikkhū

original: ca paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike gahetuṃ na sakkonti. Tato aṭṭhakathā parihāyati,
analyzed: ca paccayehi kilamantāḥ antevāsike gahetum na sakkonti tatas aṭṭhakathā parihāyati

original: pāḷivaseneva pariyattiṃ dhārenti, tato pāḷiṃ sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: pāḷi vasena iva pariyattim dhārenti tatas pāḷim sakalam dhāretum na sakkonti paṭhamam

original: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati, tañcassa parihāyanaṃ matthakato paṭhāya. Paṭhamameva
analyzed: abhidhamma piṭakam parihāyati tat ca assa parihāyanam matthakataḥ paṭhāya paṭhamam eva

original: hi mahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati, tato yamakaṃ kathāvatthu puggalapaññatti dhātukathā
analyzed: hi mahā apakaraṇam parihāyati tatas yamakam kathā vatthu puggala paññatti dhātu kathā

original: vibhaṅgo dhammasaṅgaho ca anukkamena parihāyanti, tato matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ
analyzed: vibhaṅgaḥ dhamma saṅgaho ca anukkamena parihāyanti tatas matthakataḥ paṭṭhāya suttanta piṭakam

original: parihāyati, paṭhamaṃ hi aṅguttaranikāyo ekādasakanipātato paṭṭhāya yāvaekakanipātā
analyzed: parihāyati paṭhamam hi aṅguttara nikāyaḥ ekādasaka nipātataḥ paṭṭhāya yāvaekaka nipātā

original: parihāyati, tato matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo, paṭhamaṃ hi mahāvaggo parihāyati,
analyzed: parihāyati tatas matthakataḥ paṭṭhāya saṃyutta nikāyo paṭhamam hi mahā vaggo parihāyati

original: tato saḷāyatanavaggo khandhakavaggo nidānavaggo sagāthāvaggoti, evaṃ majjhimanikāyadīghanikāyādayo

original: paṭṭhāya ettha vuttānusāratova ñātabbo, suttantabhājanīyādayo hi vibhaṅganayabhedā

original: ettha, ito paresu ca vibhaṅgesu natthīti.
analyzed: ettha itas paresu ca vibhaṅgesu na atthi iti

original: Ñāṇavibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ñāṇa vibhaṅga mātikattha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgamātikatthavaṇṇanā

analyzed: khuddaka vatthu vibhaṅga mātikāya pana ayam nikkhepa paricchedena saddhim atthataḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Mātikāya hi ādito tāva – jātimadotiādayo tesattati ekakā nikkhittā, tato kodho ca

original: Atthato pana “jātimado”tiādīsu jātiuccākulīnataṃ nissāya “khattiyādīnaṃ catunnampi
analyzed: atthato pana jāti mado ti ādīsu jāti ucca akulīna tam nissāya khattiya ādīnam catunnam pi

original: nissāya gottamado. Nirābādhataṃ, yobbaññaṃ, “ciraṃ sukhaṃ jīviṃ jīvāmi jīvissāmī”ti
analyzed: nissāya gottama daḥ nirābādha tam yobbaññam ciram sukham jīvim jīvāmi jīvissāmi iti

original: kittiyasaññeva vā nissāya yasamado. Parisuddhasīlaṃ, upacārappanājhānaṃ, sippakosallaṃ,

analyzed: nissāya sīla mada ādayaḥ veditabbā

original: Atra atra visaye icchā assāti atriccho, puggalo, tassa bhāvo atricchatā. Evaṃ mahicchatādīsupi
analyzed: atra atra visaye icchā assa ati atriccho puggalo tassa bhāvaḥ atricchatā evam mahicchata ādīsu pi

analyzed: patthanā vasena pavattaḥ lobhaḥ atricchatā yāya attanā laddham paṇītam pi lāmakam viya

original: khāyati, parena laddhaṃ lāmakampi paṇītaṃ viya khāyati. Sāyaṃ aparāparalābhapatthanālakkhaṇā.

original: Santaguṇavibhāvanāvasappavatto ceva taduppannehi atimahantehipi vatthūhi asantussanākārappavatto

original: ca lobho mahicchatā. Yāya samannāgato puggalo paccayehi duppūro aggi viya upādānena,

original: Evametehi dvādasahi padehi savatthuke māne kathetvā idāni avatthukaṃ dassetuṃ “māno”tiādi

analyzed: attānudiṭṭhi nāma tassā pana rūpam attataḥ samanupassati rūpavantam vā attānam

original: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ samanupassatī”ti evaṃ rūpakkhandhe catasso diṭṭhiyo.
analyzed: attani vā rūpam rūpasmim vā attānam samanupassati iti evam rūpakkhandhe catasso diṭṭhiyaḥ

original: Evaṃ sesakkhandhesupīti vīsativatthukatā veditabbā.
analyzed: evam sesa kkhandhesu pi iti vīsati vatthuka tā veditabbā

original: Tattha ca rūpaṃ attatodiādinā pañcakkhandhe attato gahaṇavasena pavattā pañca ucchedadiṭṭhiyo,
analyzed: tattha ca rūpam atta todi ādinā pañca kkhandhe attataḥ gahaṇa vasena pavattā pañca uccheda diṭṭhiyaḥ

original: sesā pana sassatadiṭṭhiyoti veditabbā. “Natthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattā pana natthikadiṭṭhi
analyzed: sesā pana sassata diṭṭhiyaḥ ti veditabbā natthi dinna nti ādi naya ppavattā pana natthika diṭṭhi

original: micchādiṭṭhi nāma, lāmakadiṭṭhīti attho. Aratittike pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi sattānaṃ vihiṃsanā
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi nāma lāmaka diṭṭhī iti attho aratittike pāṇi leḍḍudaṇḍa ādīhi sattānam vihiṃsanā

original: vihesā nāma. Dvārattayappavattaakusaladhammassa cariyā adhammacariyā nāma. Dovacassatātike
analyzed: vihesā nāma dvāra ttaya pavatta akusala dhammassa cariyā adhammacariyā nāma

original: sāva kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāsaññā nānārammaṇesu pavattito, nānābhūtattā ca nānattasaññā
analyzed: sā ava kāma byāpāda vihiṃsā saññā nānā ārammaṇesu pavattitaḥ nānā bhūta ttā ca nānatta saññā

original: nāma. Uddhaccattike kusītassa bhāvo kosajjaṃ, pamādova. Anādariyattike ovādassa anādiyanavasappavatto
analyzed: nāma uddhacca ttike kusītassa bhāvaḥ kosajjam pamādaḥ uva anādariya ttike ovādassa

original: kodho anādariyaṃ nāma. Assaddhiyattike ratanattayakammaphalānaṃ asaddahanavasappavattā
analyzed: kodhaḥ anādariyam nāma assaddhiya ttike rata nattaya kamma phalānam asaddahana vasa ppavattā

original: akusaladhammā assaddhiyaṃ nāma. Pañcavidhamacchariyavasena “dehī”ti vacanassa ajānanā avadaññutā nāma.
analyzed: akusala dhammā assaddhiyam nāma pañcavidha macchariya vasena dehi iti vacanassa a jānanā avadaññu tā nāma

original: Uddhaccattike manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu aguttadvāratā asaṃvaro nāma. Kāyikavācasikavītikkamo
analyzed: uddhaccattike mana chaṭṭhesu indriyesu agutta dvāra tā asaṃvaraḥ nāma kāyika vācasika vītikkamaḥ

original: dussīlyaṃ nāma. Ariyattike buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ dassanopāsanādīsu anicchā
analyzed: dussīlyam nāma ariyattike buddha paccekabuddha sāvakānam dassana upāsana ādīsu anicchā

original: ariyānaṃ adassanakamyatā nāma. Bodhipakkhikasaddhammassa savanadhāraṇādīsu anicchā
analyzed: ariyānam a dassana kamya tā nāma bodhi pakkhika saddhammassa savana dhāraṇa ādīsu anicchā

original: saddhammaṃ asotukamyatā nāma. Parassa dosāropane randhagavesitāsaṅkhāto upārambhova
analyzed: saddhammam a sotu kamya tā nāma parassa dosa āropane randha gavesitā saṅkhāto upārambhaḥ uva

original: upārambhacittatā nāma. Muṭṭhassaccattike uddhaccaṃ cetaso vikkhepo nāma. Ayonisomanasikārattike

original: “anicce nicca”ntiādinā, saccapaṭipakkhavasena vā anupāyamanasikārasaṅkhātaṃ āvajjanacittaṃ
analyzed: anicce nicca nti ādinā sacca paṭipakkha vasena vā anupāya manasikāra saṅkhātam āvajjana cittam

original: ayonisomanasikāro nāma. Micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappādayo aṭṭha micchāmaggā kummaggo
analyzed: ayoniso manasikāraḥ nāma micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappa ādayaḥ aṭṭha micchāmaggāḥ kummaggo

original: nāma, micchāmaggassa āsevanā kummaggasevanā nāma. Thinamiddhaṃ cetaso ca līnattaṃ nāma. Tikaṃ.
analyzed: nāma micchāmaggassa āsevanā kummaggasevanā nāma thinamiddham cetaso ca līnattam nāma tikaṃ

original: Catukkesu cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu “kattha manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti taṇhāya uppādo
analyzed: catukkesu cīvara ādīsu catūsu paccayesu kattha manāpam labhissāmi iti taṇhāyaḥ uppādaḥ

original: cattāro taṇhuppādā nāma. Na gacchanti etāhi ariyāti agatiyo, chandadosamohabhayā.
analyzed: cattāro taṇhuppādāḥ nāma na gacchanti etāhi chanda dosa moha bhayā

original: Tā hi agantabbamaggagamanāni akattabbakaraṇāni cattāri agatigamanāni nāma. Tattha
analyzed: tāḥ hi agantabba magga gamanāni akattabba karaṇāni cattāri agati gamanāni nāma tattha

original: chandoti pakkhapātarāgo. Bhayanti tathāpavatto doso. Aniccādīsu “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā
analyzed: chandaḥ ti pakkhapāta rāgaḥ bhayanti tathā pavattaḥ dosaḥ anicca ādīsu niccam sukham attā

original: subha”nti evaṃ pavattā cattāro vipariyāsā viparītato dhamme esanato. Tesu vā āsanato
analyzed: evam pavattā cattāro vipariyāsāḥ viparītataḥ dhamme esanato tesu vā āsanato

original: pavisanato cattāro vipariyāsā nāma. Te saññācittadiṭṭhivipariyāsavasena paccekaṃ
analyzed: pavisanato cattāro vipariyāsāḥ nāma te saññā citta diṭṭhi vipariyāsa vasena paccekam

analyzed: saññā citta vipariyāsā dve arahatta maggena ati veditabbā

original: Adiṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ, asute sutaṃ, amute mutaṃ, aviññāte viññātanti evaṃ pavattā cattāro

analyzed: apare pi cattāro anariya vohārāḥ nāma ime ca purimehi saddhim aṭṭha

analyzed: musāvāda ādi vacīduccaritāni cattāri vacīduccaritāni nāma jāti jarā byādhi maraṇa bhayāni

analyzed: diṭṭhiyaḥ nāma catukkam

original: pañca byasanā nāma. Tattha byasanāti vināsasahajātā, tato uppannā akusalā. Bahujanassa

original: gehasitā dhammā nāma. Amanāpiyesu chasu ārammaṇesu paṭigho cha virodhavatthūni nāma.

original: Virodho eva vatthu virodhavatthu. Chasu ārammaṇesu taṇhāva cha taṇhākāyā nāma. Satthudhammasaṅghasikkhāsu,
analyzed: virodhaḥ eva vatthu virodha vatthu chasu ārammaṇesu taṇhā ava cha taṇhākāyāḥ nāma satthu dhamma saṅgha sikkhāsu

original: appamāde, paṭisanthāre ca agāravā cha agāravā nāma. Kammārāmatā, bhassaniddāsaṅgaṇikasaṃsaggapapañcārāmatā

analyzed: ca ati ime apare pi cha parihāniyāḥ dhammāḥ nāma

analyzed: somanassa ṭṭhāniyesu rūpa ādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu uppannā geha sita somanassa sampayuttā

original: Esa nayo itaradvayepi. Aññāṇasahitā panettha vedanupekkhā upekkhāti veditabbā, yā

analyzed: vedanā cha gehasitāni somanassāni iti ādinā chakkattayena vuttā atthi me attā ati

original: vā, “natthi me attā”ti vā, “attanā vā attānaṃ sañjānāmī”ti vā, “attanā vā anattānaṃ

original: sañjānāmī”ti vā, “attanā vā attānaṃ sañjānāmī”ti vā, “so me ayaṃ attā kārako vedako
analyzed: sañjānāmi iti vā attanā vā attānam sañjānāmi iti vā saḥ me ayam attā kārakaḥ vedakaḥ

analyzed: natthi iti uccheda diṭṭhi pañca api khandhe attā ati gahetvā saññā khandhena sesānam

original: ca veditabbā. Chakkaṃ.

original: attho. Tattha ca chattakhaggabījaniannapānadhanadhaññādiupakaraṇavasena bāhiraṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: tattha ca chatta khagga bīja nianna pāna dhana dhañña ādi upakaraṇa vasena bāhiram rūpam

original: veditabbaṃ. Dāsadāsiñātiparijanahatthiassādiupakaraṇavasena vedanādayo veditabbā.
analyzed: veditabbam dāsa dāsi ñāti parijana hatthi assa ādi upakaraṇa vasena vedanā ādayaḥ veditabbā

original: Imehi bāhirehi rūpādīhi “itthasmīti evasmī”tiādinā sabbattha yojanā veditabbā. Aṭṭhārasakaṃ dutiyaṃ.

analyzed: vasena chattiṃsa tathā anāgate chattiṃsa honti paccuppanne pana ekassa yathā lābha vasena

original: tānipi labbhanti, sabbasattānaṃ vasena paccuppannepi chattiṃsa labbhanti. Iti evaṃ

analyzed: vasena aṭṭha satam taṇhā vicaritāni honti iti atthaḥ aṭṭha taṇhā vicarita satam hoti iti ettha api

original: evameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: evam eva atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Taṇhāvicaritāni niṭṭhitāni.
analyzed: taṇhā vicaritāni niṭṭhitāni

Dhammahadayavibhaṅgamātikāya pana padatthādito vinicchayo pubbe vuttova. Yasmā pana
analyzed: dhamma hadaya vibhaṅga mātikāya pana padattha āditaḥ vinicchayaḥ pubbe vuttaḥ iva yasmā pana

original: Dutiyakoṭṭhāse pana –

analyzed: pañca āyatanāni pañca dhātuyaḥ ekam saccam dasa indriyāni tayaḥ hetū tayaḥ āhārāḥ ekaḥ

original: phasso…pe… ekaṃ citta”nti –
analyzed: phassa upe ekam cittam ti

original: Mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā vibhattā. Tattha cakkhurūpasotamanodhammānaṃ vasena pañcāyatanadhātuyo

analyzed: sampayutta tā yoga abhāvā sabbārūpa kkhandhena api hi kusala ādinā aññaḥ sampayuttaḥ nāma natthi

original: 4. Puggalapaññattimātikā
analyzed: puggala paññatti mātikā

original: Ekakamātikatthavaṇṇanā

analyzed: upādāya kāla disā ādikā upādāya kāla disā ādikā taṃ taṃ bhūta nimittam bhāvanā visesaḥ ca

original: cesā paññatti vuttā, na pana paññāpanaṭṭhena. Yā tassa tassatthassa paññāpanā, sā

original: avijjamānapaññattiyeva.

original: Yā pana aññaṃ paṭhamādiṃ upanidhāya apekkhitvā dutiyaṃ rassaṃ dīghaṃ dūraṃ santikantiādikā

analyzed: tad aññā apekkhūpanidhā chatta pāṇī iti ādikā hattha gatūpanidhā kuṇḍalī iti ādikā sampayuttu upanidhā

analyzed: nāma āsītikā iti ādikā pana santati paññatti nāma

original: Sace hi yesaṃ maggasamaṅgikkhaṇe kappavināso bhaveyya, neva tāva kappo vinasseyya,

analyzed: nāma jātā ati kiñcā api kappa vināsana kāle sāsanam natthi gata koṭike hi kāle kappa vināso

original: Sotāpannoti nibbānasamuddaninnatāya sotasaṅkhātassa maggassa paṭhamasamaṅgī vuccati,
analyzed: sotāpannaḥ ti nibbāna samudda ninna tāya sota saṅkhātassa maggassa paṭhama samaṅgī vuccati

original: idha pana phalaṭṭho adhippeto. Tasseva ca pabhedadassanatthaṃ “sattakkhattuparamo”tiādi
analyzed: idha pana phala aṭṭhaḥ adhippeto tassa iva ca pabheda dassana tham satta kkhattu paramaḥ tiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Sattavārā paramā assa bhavūpapattīti sattakkhattuparamo, tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ
analyzed: vuttam satta vārā paramā assa bhava upapatti iti satta kkhattu paramaḥ tatas param aṭṭhamam

original: bhavaṃ nādiyatīti attho. Sotāpanno hi yo sattakkhattuṃ devesu, manussesu ca paṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: bhavam na ādiyati iti attho sotāpannaḥ hi yaḥ sattakkhattum devesu manussesu ca paṭisandhim

original: gahetvā sattame bhave dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo nāma. Kulato
analyzed: gahetvā sattame bhave dukkhassantam karoti ayam sattakkhattuparamaḥ nāma kulataḥ

original: kulaṃ bhavato bhavaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo. So hi devamanussavasena dve gatiyo bhave
analyzed: kulam bhavataḥ bhavam gacchati iti kolaṃkolo saḥ hi deva manussa vasena dve gatiyaḥ bhave

original: saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo nāma. Kammapaṭisandhiyā ekaṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: saṃsaritvā dukkhassantam karoti ayam kolaṃkolaḥ nāma kamma paṭisandhiyā ekam kammaṃ

original: kilesabījaṃ assāti ekabījī. So hi ekasmiññeva bhave khīṇāsavo hoti. Kiṃ panassa bhedassa
analyzed: kilesa bījam assāti ekabījī saḥ hi ekasmin ñeva bhave khīṇa āsavaḥ hoti kim panassa bhedassa

original: niyāmakanti? Vipassanābhiññābhedā. Sotāpannesu hi yo vipassanāya pamatto, so sattakkhattuparamo
analyzed: niyāmakan ti vipassanā abhiññā bhedā sotāpannesu hi yaḥ vipassanāya pamattaḥ so satta kkhattu paramaḥ

original: hoti. Yo kiñci appamatto, so kolaṃkolo. Yo pana vipassanāya ativiya appamatto, so
analyzed: hoti yaḥ kiñci appamatto so kolaṃkolaḥ yaḥ pana vipassanāya ativiya appamatto so

original: ekabījī hoti. Ye pana abhiviya pamattā vaṭṭajjhāsayā anāthapiṇḍikavisākhāsakkādayo,
analyzed: eka bījī hoti ye pana abhiviya pamattāḥ vaṭṭa ajjhāsayāḥ anāthapiṇḍika visākha sakka ādayo

original: te punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarantā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke osāpetvā brahmalokesupi
analyzed: te punappunam vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarantāḥ āditas paṭṭhāya cha deva loke osāpetvā brahma lokesu pi

original: yathākkamaṃ nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbanti, na te idha gahitā. Te hi manussagatiṃ
analyzed: yathākkamam nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbanti na te idha gahitā te hi manussa gatim

original: punappunaṃ ādiyanti. Ye pana manussagatiyampi bhavaṃ ādiyanti, tesaṃ vasena sattakkhattuparamo
analyzed: punappunam ādiyanti ye pana manussa gatiyam pi bhavam ādiyanti tesam vasena satta kkhattu paramaḥ

original: kolaṃkolo mānusikabhavanibbattako eva ekabījī gahito. Te pana saddhādhurena āgatā

original: tayo, paññādhurena āgatā tayoti sotāpanno chabbidho hotīti veditabbo.

original: Paṭisandhivasena pana sakiṃ imaṃ manussagatiṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī, dutiyamaggaphalasamaṅgī.

original: imasmiṃ buddhakāle parinibbānena, anāgate metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle parinibbāyissāmī”ti

original: visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti. Ime cattāropi puggalā tathā tathā ovaditvā āsavakkhaye
analyzed: visuddha sīlaḥ api paṭipattim na pūreti ime cattāraḥ api puggalā tathā tathā ovaditvā āsava kkhaye

analyzed: arahattam pāpuṇāti tena samasamāḥ va bhavissanti iti

original: Chakkādīsu –
analyzed: chakka ādīsu

original: “Cha puggalā – atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati,

original: Atthekacco puggalo…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti, na ca sāvakapāramiṃ pāpuṇāti. Atthekacco

analyzed: dhamme dukkhassanta karaḥ hoti āgāmī hoti āgantā itthattanti

original: Chakkaṃ, “satta puggalā – satta udakūpamā puggalā sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti, ummujjitvā
analyzed: chakkam satta puggalā satta udaka upamā puggalā sakim nimuggaḥ nimuggaḥ uva hoti ummujjitvā

analyzed: mātikam nikkhipitvā pāḷiyam niddeso kato tattha chakke paṭhamena padena sammāsambuddhaḥ

analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ saḥ hi an ācariyakaḥ attanā uppāditena sabbaññuta ññāṇa padaṭṭhānena arahatta magga ñāṇena

analyzed: sabba ākārataḥ saccāni abhisambujjhitvā sabbaññu tam pāpuṇi dasa ñāṇa balesu ca vasi bhāvanti

original: itthatta”nti vuttāti.
analyzed: itthattanti vuttā iti

original: Sattake paṭhamena padena sāsane aniviṭṭhasaddho niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammehi ekantakāḷakehi

original: samannāgato gahito. So hi samudde udakabhīrukapuriso viya saṃsāre apāye nimuggo nimuggova

analyzed: dutiyena padena sāsane devadatta ādayaḥ saddha ādi parihāniyam

original: sati ubhatobhāgavimuttova nāma hoti.
analyzed: sati ubhatobhāga vimuttā uva nāma hoti

original: Saddhāvimuttoti sukkhavipassako, rūpajjhānalābhī ca yathāvutto chabbidho sekho ca.
analyzed: saddhā vimuttaḥ ti sukkha vipassakaḥ rūpa jjhāna lābhī ca yathā vuttaḥ chabbidhaḥ sekho ca

original: Ayaṃ hi saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Kathaṃ panetassa diṭṭhippattato nānattanti?

original: Āgamanīyapaṭipadāya. Diṭṭhippatto hi paññāsampadāya pubbabhāge vipassanāya kilese
analyzed: āgamanīya paṭipadāya diṭṭhi ppatto hi paññā sampadāya pubbabhāge vipassanāya kilese

analyzed: vikkhambhentaḥ āgataḥ etam eva hi bhedam sandhāya niddese ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā

original: honti, no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: honti no ca kho yathā diṭṭhi ppattassa iti vuttam

analyzed: dhammena sarati anussarati iti dhamma anusārī sotāpatti magga ṭṭhassa etam nāmam phale

analyzed: nāmam phale pana patte saddhāvimuttaḥ nāma hoti

analyzed: lokuttara dhammam hi nibbattentānam dve dhurāni nāma dve abhinivesāḥ nāma dve sīsāni

analyzed: nāma tattha saddhādhuram paññādhuranti dve dhurāni nāma ekaḥ pana samatha abhiniveso

analyzed: ekaḥ vipassanā abhiniveso ti dve abhinivesāḥ ekaḥ ca arahattam matthakam pāpuṇantaḥ ubhatobhāga vimutto

analyzed: hoti eko paññā vimutto ti imāni dve sīsāni nāma ye hi keci lokuttaram dhammam nibbattenti

original: sabbe te dve ime dhamme dhuraṃ katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi
analyzed: sabbe te dve ime dhamme dhuram katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi

original: ṭhānehi vimuccanti. Tesu yo bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samathavasena
analyzed: ṭhānehi vimuccanti tesu yaḥ bhikkhu aṭṭha samāpatti lābhī paññam dhuram katvā samatha vasena
